Just like the previous games players command an aircraft from a third-person view, engaging enemies, dodging enemy fire and rockets and navigating through canyons and narrow passages. Gameplay requires quick reflexes and is arcade-like in design. The iconic F-14 Super Tomcat of the previous games has been replaced by a F-14D Super Tomcat with the addition of two new aircraft, F/A-18E Super Hornet and F-15E Strike Eagle.

In the standard EX arcade mode there is a branching mission path with various objectives. Sometimes enemies need to be engaged, while other times friendly fighters help along, stealth must be used, or a specific target needs to be pursued and taken out. There are two main weapons: regular cannon fire for close distances and rockets that can only be used when they are locked on. There is also a Climax gauge that can be activated when it is full. Time slows down and multiple enemies can be targeted. As soon as the aircraft leaves the Climax mode, all selected targets are engaged with rockets at once. Cannon fire is unlimited, and rockets as well, as long as the player does not use them constantly. At the same time enemy rockets need to be dodged by moving up, down, left or right, or doing barrel rolls. Just like the previous game in the series there is a limited amount of manoeuvrability without complete freedom. It is however possible to move the speed of the aircraft.

During the games players can unlock many EX options to further customize the arcade mode, as well as make available different paint schemes: Standard, Camouflage, Special and Low Visibility. There is also a secondary scoring mode with an unlimited amount of credits.

AfterDark.bat_name: After Dark 射擊光槍-暗夜獵人-夜幕第一章
AfterDark.title: 暗夜獵人-夜幕第一章
AfterDark.notes:
在宇宙空间的《夜猎人》中，装载并准备猎杀夜间的邪恶生物。这是该公司于2012年发布的《天黑后》的续集。继续《After Dark》游戏中的故事，格伦仍在努力消灭世界上的一个恶魔般的邪恶，这个邪恶正在肆虐，并摧毁一切穿过它的东西。你将面对吸血鬼、僵尸、恶魔、动画雕像和其他奇异的怪物，所有这些都有一门可靠的大炮提供保护。After Dark中的轮子功能仍然存在，必须在某些事件中使用，当你需要操纵物体或躲避攻击时。然而，这把枪现在有了一个新功能——一个拉动时可以在蓝色或红色弹药之间切换的杠杆。某些敌人也会是蓝色或红色的；一定要搭配颜色，以减少额外的伤害！

[英文原文]
Load up and get ready to hunt evil creatures of the night in Night Hunter by Universal Space. This is a sequel to After Dark that the company had released back in 2012.

Continuing with the story found in the After Dark game, Glenn is still on a quest to stamp out a demonic evil in the world that is wreaking havoc and laying waste to everything that crosses it’s path. You will face vampires, zombies, demons, animated statues and other bizarre monsters, all with a trusty cannon providing protection. The wheel feature from After Dark is still present and must be used during certain events when you need to steer an object or dodge an attack. The gun now has a new feature however – a lever that when pulled will switch between blue or red ammo. Certain enemies will also be blue or red; be sure to match the colors to deal out extra damage!

AkaiKatanaShinNesica.bat_name: Akai Katana Shin for NESiCAxLive   射擊-赤刀真NESiCAxLive
AkaiKatanaShinNesica.title: 赤刀真NESiCAxLive
AkaiKatanaShinNesica.notes:
重新引导您进入大正时代的史诗故事，Cave的Akai Katana系列中的三部作品吸引了热情的射击迷的心。新功能包括在线排行榜和新的音乐编排。

[英文原文]
Be guided anew into an epic tale set in the Taisho era with three titles from Cave's Akai Katana series that has captured the hearts of passionate shoot 'em up fans. New features include an online leaderboard and new musical arrangements.

Akuma.title: 射擊光槍-惡魔
Akuma.notes:
在这款突破性的新游戏中，跟随阿库玛的黑暗传说。邪恶的仪式将可怕的恶魔从将他们锁在神圣符文中的诅咒中解放出来。使用这款游戏独有的令人敬畏的符文战术系统选择你的目标，然后在许多噩梦般的地点追逐你的对手，这增加了街机游戏迄今为止从未见过的深度和沉浸感。使用“Bi-Optic”3D系统，你遇到的野兽会从屏幕上飞向你。这项新技术可以提供令人印象深刻的视觉效果，让你几乎可以触摸到它们。你击败的每只野兽都会在游戏黑暗而激烈的环境中解锁新的深度。

[英文原文]
Follow the Dark Legend of Akuma in this groundbreaking new game. Evil rituals have freed terrifying demons from the curse that had locked them inside sacred runes. Choose your target using the awesome rune tactical system, unique to this game and then chase your opponent through many nightmarish locations which adds a level of depth and immersion never seen in an arcade game until now.

Using the "Bi-Optic" 3D system, the beasts , that you encounter, will literally fly off the screen towards you. This new technology allows for impressive visuals so realistic you could almost touch them. Each beast you defeat unlocks new depth in the game's dark and intense environment.

Aleste.title: 射擊-戰刃雅士達
Aleste.notes:
与之前的游戏相比，《Senjin Aleste》采用了一种新的游戏系统，玩家可以访问四艘不同的船只，并在游戏过程中在它们之间进行交换，每艘船只都有自己独特的武器。生命与船只紧密相连，每艘船被视为一条生命，当四艘船全部沉没时，游戏结束。然而，随着时间的推移，被击落的船只会复活，每艘船底部对应的四米表示。游戏有四个难度级别：新手、休闲、原创和专家，每个难度都会改变敌人发射的子弹数量和被击落船只的重生时间。

[英文原文]
Senjin Aleste features a new gameplay system compared to previous titles, with the player having access to four different ships and being able to swap between them during gameplay, with each ship having its own unique weapons. Lives are tied to the ships, with each ship counting as one life, the game ending when all four ships are lost. Downed ships are revived over time, however, indicated by four meters at the bottom corresponding to each ship.

The game features four difficulty levels: Novice, Casual, Original and Expert, with each difficulty changing the amount of bullets fired by enemies and the respawn time for downed ships.

AliensArmageddon.bat_name: Aliens Armageddon 射擊光槍-異形大決戰
AliensArmageddon.title: 异形：大决战
AliensArmageddon.notes:
在《异形世界™末日》中，异形瘟疫在地球上释放，造成世界末日般的破坏。人类生存的唯一希望就是杀出一条通往深空货船的生命，离开地球。外星人拥有 55 英寸 LED 箱体、增强的枪支系统、引人注目的 外星人礼帽和四个疯狂的不间断射击动作关卡，玩家将与所有新外星敌人的猛攻作战。在《异形世界末日》中，异形瘟疫在地球上爆发，造成了世界末日般的破坏。人类唯一的生存希望就是奋力登上深空货船，把地球抛在身后。《异形》配备了一个55英寸的LED橱柜、增强的枪支系统、引人注目的《异形》头饰和四个疯狂的不间断射击动作级别，玩家将与所有新的外星敌人作战。

[英文原文]
在《异形世界™末日》中，异形瘟疫在地球上释放，造成世界末日般的破坏。人类生存的唯一希望就是杀出一条通往深空货船的生命，离开地球。Aliens 拥有 55 英寸 LED 箱体、增强的枪支系统、引人注目的 Aliens 礼帽和四个疯狂的不间断射击动作关卡，玩家将与所有新外星敌人的猛攻作战。
In Aliens™ Armageddon a Xenomorph plague is unleashed on Earth causing apocalyptic devastation. Mankind’s only hope for survival is to fight their way to a deep space cargo ship and leave the Earth behind. Aliens features a 55 inch LED cabinet, enhanced gun system, eye catching Aliens topper and four frantic levels of non-stop shooting action, with players battling an onslaught of all new alien enemies.

AliensExtermination.bat_name: Aliens_ Extermination 射擊光槍-異形_滅絕
AliensExtermination.title: 异形：灭绝
AliensExtermination.notes:
自从殖民地海军陆战队离开 等级426行星和外星人人口以来，已经很多年了。 是时候回去干掉外星怪物了......以及更多！世界似乎很熟悉，但场景并非如此。 自从海军陆战队上次访问以来，“Wheland Yutan公司”重新编程了一支合成人类军队，以阻止任何阻碍公司开发致命生物武器的事物。  这不再像杀死外星人妈妈那么简单。殖民地海军陆战队离开LV-426星球和外星人已经很多年了。是时候回去消灭外星怪物了……还有更多！ 这个世界看起来很熟悉，但实际情况并非如此。自从海军陆战队上次访问以来，“Wheland Yutan Corporation”重新编程了一支合成人类军队，以阻止任何东西阻碍该公司开发致命的生物武器。这已经不像杀死外星母亲那么简单了。

[英文原文]
自从殖民地海军陆战队离开 LV-426 行星和外星人人口以来，已经很多年了。 是时候回去干掉外星怪物了......以及更多！

世界似乎很熟悉，但场景并非如此。 自从海军陆战队上次访问以来，“Wheland Yutan Corporation”重新编程了一支合成人类军队，以阻止任何阻碍公司开发致命生物武器的事物。  这不再像杀死外星人妈妈那么简单。
It’s been years since the Colonial Marines left planet LV-426 and the Alien population behind.  It’s time to go back to finish off the Alien monsters… and more! 

The world seems familiar, but the scenario is not.  Since the Marine’s last visit, the “Wheland Yutan Corporation”, reprogrammed an army of synthetic humans to stop anything from getting in the way from the Company’s development of their deadly Bio Weapons.   It’s not as simple as just killing Mother Alien any more.

AlpineRacer.title: 體育-超級高山滑雪
AlpineRacer.notes:
超级高山赛车手这部街机经典的翻拍版配备了全新的角色和完全重新设计的课程。与Raw Thrills合作，Super Alpine Racer有一个垂直安装的55英寸高清显示器。橱柜的t型折叠中融入了多色LED！多枢轴平台模拟了下坡滑雪者的动作。通过内置的鼓风机感受风吹过你的头发，然后穿过大门射击，以获得额外的动力，在空中表演疯狂的技巧时，快速通过对手。

[英文原文]
Super Alpine Racer
This remake of the arcade classic comes with brand new characters and completely redesigned courses. In collaboration with Raw Thrills, Super Alpine Racer has a vertically mounted 55″ HD monitor. There are multi-colored LEDs infused into t-moldings of the cabinet! The multi-pivot platform simulates the movements of a downhill skier. Feel the wind through your hair from the built-in air blowers and shoot through the gates to gain an additional boost to speed past your opponents while performing insane tricks in the air.

AAA.bat_name: America_s Army Arcade 射擊光槍-美國陸軍街機_全屏需要調小分辨率_
AAA.title: 美国陆军
AAA.notes:
与美国陆军领导人共同开发的 全球VR为市场带来了一款非常逼真且引人入胜的战争游戏，该游戏以陆军新兵战争演习为中心。该游戏还包括大量真实的美国陆军训练视频。美国军队从一开始就旨在招募、吸引和留住新玩家，同时奖励经验丰富的玩家。Global VR与美国陆军领导人共同开发，为市场带来了一款以陆军征兵战争演习为中心的非常逼真和引人入胜的战争游戏。游戏还包括大量真实的美国陆军训练视频。美国陆军从一开始就旨在招募、俘虏和留住新玩家，同时奖励有经验的玩家。

[英文原文]
与美国陆军领导人共同开发的 Global VR 为市场带来了一款非常逼真且引人入胜的战争游戏，该游戏以陆军新兵战争演习为中心。该游戏还包括大量真实的美国陆军训练视频。America's Army 从一开始就旨在招募、吸引和留住新玩家，同时奖励经验丰富的玩家。
Developed in conjunction with U.S. Army leaders, Global VR brought to the market a very realistic and engaging war game centered on Army Recruit War Exercises. The game also includes a significant amount of authentic US Army training videos. America's Army was designed from the start to recruit, captivate and retain new players, while rewarding experienced players at the same time.

AngryBirds.bat_name: Angry Birds Arcade 光槍射擊-憤怒的小鳥 街機版
AngryBirds.title: 光槍射擊-憤怒的小鳥 街機版
AngryBirds.notes: Angry Birds is a strategy game similar to titles such as Crush the Castle where it is the player's job to help the angry birds retrieve their eggs that have been stolen by nasty green pigs. Throughout the 105 levels the player controls a catapult loaded with one of several different species of birds to crash them into the fortified buildings with the pigs inside. To complete a level, all pigs must have been smashed through either the birds directly or pieces of the collapsing building.

AquapazzaAquaplusDreamMatch.bat_name: Aquapazza_ Aquaplus Dream Match   格鬥-星之翼_夢幻賽場
AquapazzaAquaplusDreamMatch.title: 格鬥-星之翼 夢幻賽場
AquapazzaAquaplusDreamMatch.notes:
《Aquapazza：Aquaplus Dream Match》是Examu于2011年开发的一款2D街机格斗游戏。这是Aquaplus和Leaf的联合合作，他们开发了所有的游戏和特色角色。标题中的“梦幻对决”引用了来自各种Aquaplus游戏的角色，包括Utawareromono、Tears to Tiara和to Heart。

[英文原文]
Aquapazza: Aquaplus Dream Match (アクアパッツァ アクアプラスドリームマッチ) is a 2011 2D arcade fighting game developed by Examu. It is a joint collaboration between Aquaplus and Leaf, who developed all the titles and featured characters. The "Dream Match" in the title references the characters of the game coming together from various Aquaplus titles, including Utawarerumono, Tears to Tiara, and To Heart.

ArcanaHeart2Nesica.bat_name: Arcana Heart 2 for NESiCAxLive   格鬥-聖靈之心2NESiCAxLive
ArcanaHeart2Nesica.title: 格鬥-聖靈之心2NESiCAxLive
ArcanaHeart2Nesica.notes:
《Arcana Heart 2》是《Arcana心脏》的续作。这是Examu在将特许经营权从Yuki Enterprise转让给该公司后开发和发行的系列游戏中的第一款。这也是Examu专有的eX Board的第一款游戏，这是一款基于Windows XP Embedded的街机板，将成为该系列其他游戏和Examu发布的其他街机游戏的标准平台。该游戏在AOU2008娱乐博览会上亮相。游戏有6个新的战斗机，每个战斗机都有自己独特的Arcana。新技术也包括在内，比如阿卡纳爆炸，让玩家暂时变得无懈可击；Arcana Homing，一种允许玩家在瞄准对手的同时同时缩小与对手之间距离的功能；以及“关键之心”，这是每个角色独有的毁灭性特殊攻击。

[英文原文]
Arcana Heart 2 is the sequel to Arcana Heart. It was the first game in the series to be developed and published by Examu after the rights of the franchise had been transferred to the company from Yuki Enterprise. It was also the first game for Examu's proprietary eX-Board, an arcade board based on Windows XP Embedded that would become the standard platform for the rest of the series and other arcade games published by Examu. The game was unveiled at the AOU2008 Amusement Expo.

The game features 6 new fighters, each with their own unique Arcana. New techniques were also included, such as the Arcana Blast, allowing the player to become temporarily invulnerable; Arcana Homing, a feature allowing the player to simultaneously close the distance between them and the opponent while homing in on them; and the Critical Heart, a devastating special attack unique to each character.

ArcanaHeart3Exboard.bat_name: Arcana Heart 3 _eX-Board_   格鬥-聖靈之心3_eX-Board_
ArcanaHeart3Exboard.title: 聖靈之心3
ArcanaHeart3Exboard.notes:
凭借其独特的战斗系统和众多特色天使，这些女孩首次出现在Steam上的[Arcana Heart 3 LOVE MAX！！

[英文原文]
With its own unique battle system and a wide selection of characteristic angels, the girls are appearing on Steam for the first time in [Arcana Heart 3 LOVE MAX!!!!!]!!

ArcanaHeart3Nesica.bat_name: Arcana Heart 3_ LOVE MAX SixStarS______   格鬥-聖靈之心3_愛的極限六星
ArcanaHeart3Nesica.title: 格鬥-聖靈之心3：愛的極限六星
ArcanaHeart3Nesica.notes:
《Arcana Heart 3》：爱六颗星！！！！！！以前只在日本街机上提供，现在由于全球玩家的压倒性需求，已经移植到Steam上！六颗星！！！！！！有一个完整的模式列表可供选择，包括故事、生存分数攻击、审判时间攻击、对抗、训练、重播剧场，当然，您将能够通过在线比赛与世界各地的玩家作战。《Arcana Heart 3:Love Max》中的所有23个角色都将回归，新加入的Minori Amanohara将与DLC战士Shark Girl和Dark Heart一起加入。

[英文原文]
Arcana Heart 3: LOVE MAX SIX STARS!!!!!!, previously only available in Japanese arcades, has now been ported to Steam due to overwhelmingly demand from players worldwide!

Six Stars!!!!!! has a full roster of modes to choose from including Story, Survival Score Attack, Trial Time Attack, Versus, Training, Replay Theater, and of course you will be able to battle players around the world with online matches. All 23 characters from Arcana Heart 3: Love Max return and are joined by newcomer Minori Amanohara with DLC fighters Shark Girl and Dark Heart to follow.

ArcticThunder.bat_name: Arctic Thunder   競速-北極雷霆
ArcticThunder.title: 競速-北極雷霆
ArcticThunder.notes:
《北极惊雷》是中途岛街机赛车系列的第四部，是一款梦幻雪地摩托赛车游戏，游戏玩法就像克鲁斯和冰上卡丁车赛车手的混合体。你可以通过赢得比赛来获得金牌或大量积分来解锁大多数秘密。游戏玩法包括用武器击落敌人，在前方提升自己，并耍花招。

[英文原文]
Arctic Thunder, the fourth installment in Midway's arcade racing series, is a fantasy snowmobile-racing game that plays like a mix of Cruis'n and a kart racer on ice.  You earn Gold Medals or lots of points to unlock most secrets, and you do this by winning races. The gameplay involves shooting down enemies with weapons, boosting yourself ahead, and pulling off tricks.

Ballistics.bat_name: Ballistics   競速-急速旋轉賽車
Ballistics.title: 競速-急速旋轉賽車
Ballistics.notes:
《弹道》是一款未来主义赛车游戏，你可以在不同地方的高科技隧道中以极快的速度比赛。游戏发生在2090年；世界是平静和稳定的。为了获得一些动作和娱乐，极限运动已经发展起来，弹道学是其中较大的运动之一。你扮演的是竞争者之一；弹道学飞行员。有不同的联盟可以竞争，你可以更换你的赛车（赛车）的底盘和发动机等零件。

[英文原文]
Ballistic is a futuristic racing game where you race at enormous speeds through high tech tunnels in different places.

The game takes place in the year 2090; the world is calm and stable. To get some action and entertainment, extreme sports have developed and Ballistics is one of the bigger ones. And you play as one of the contenders; a Ballistics Pilot.

There are different leagues to contend in, and you may replace parts such as chassis and engine of your speeder (the racing vehicle).

Batman.title: 蝙蝠俠
Batman.notes:
重拍已经进行了很长时间，但被搁置了几次。ZX Spectrum有史以来最好的游戏之一，仅次于它的继任者Head Over Heels，我们的团队也对其进行了重新制作。帮助蝙蝠侠找到散落在洞穴、豪宅和其他地方的七件蝙蝠工艺品。最后找到蝙蝠艇，完成这次冒险。

[英文原文]
A remake that was in the works for a long time and was on-hold a few times. One of the best games for ZX Spectrum ever created, surpassed only by its succesor Head Over Heels, which was also remade by our team. Help BatMan find seven pieces of the BatCraft scattered around the caves, mansion and other places. In the end find the BatCraft and finish this adventure.

BattleFantasia.bat_name: Battle Fantasia   格鬥-戰鬥幻想
BattleFantasia.title: 戰鬥幻想
BattleFantasia.notes:
以奇幻RPG为主题的2D格斗游戏《战斗幻想曲》现在出现在Steam上，而《修订版》则采用了最新的平衡和改进的视觉效果！附赠免费原声带DLC！

[英文原文]
"Battle Fantasia", the fantasy RPG themed 2D Fighting game is now appearing on Steam, and "REVISED" with the latest balances and improved visual effects! Comes with FREE Soundtrack DLC!

batlgr3t.bat_name: Battle Gear 3 Tuned 競速-格鬥賽車3_終極調校版
batlgr3t.title: 競速-格鬥賽車3 終極調校版
batlgr3t.notes:
2003年12月在日本街机上发布，作为原版《战斗装备3》的更新。

[英文原文]
Released in Japanese arcades in December 2003, as an update to the original Battle Gear 3.

batlgr3.bat_name: Battle Gear 3 競速-格鬥賽車3
batlgr3.title: 競速-格鬥賽車3
batlgr3.notes:
Battle Gear 3是一款2002年由Taito发布的街机在线赛车游戏，基于箱根等真实的日本地点，以及日产、丰田和马自达等日本著名制造商授权的改装跑车上的激烈比赛。

[英文原文]
Battle Gear 3 is a 2002 arcade online racing game released by Taito and based on real Japanese locations such as Hakone and touge races on board tuned sports cars licensed by famous Japanese makers including Nissan, Toyota and Mazda.

BattleGear4.bat_name: Battle Gear 4   競速-格鬥賽車4
BattleGear4.title: 競速-格鬥賽車4
BattleGear4.notes:
一个驾驶模拟器，玩家可以在狭窄的日本高速公路上与街头合法汽车比赛。游戏的重点是手动换档、漂移和准合法驾驶策略。与Battle Gear 3相比，这款游戏的某些功能发生了变化。*欧洲车型（如大众高尔夫和雷诺Clio（Lutecia）V6）和欧洲赛段（如摩纳哥赛道和蒙特卡洛拉力赛）的加入代表了对Initial D的背离。*战斗装备3中的Takumi模式被删除。相反，系统中实施了严重的速度惩罚，迫使玩家使用刹车。*关键用户可以使用更广泛的调谐系统。这次，性能硬件也可用，而不是简单地改装外部部件。这些可以在在线虚拟车库中执行。*玩家还可以激活“车库扩展”功能。这包括拥有一个团队、定制贴花、乙烯基和设置名称等的好处。

[英文原文]
A driving simulator where by players race street legal cars on narrow Japanese speedways. The focus of the game is on manual shifting, drifting and quasi-legal driving tactics.

When compared to the Battle Gear 3, there are certain features changed in this game.

* The addition of European models (for example, Volkswagen Golf and Renault Clio (Lutecia) V6) and the European stages (with notable examples of the Monaco track and Monte Carlo Rally) representing a departure from Initial D.
* The Takumi Mode in Battle Gear 3 is removed. Instead, a severe speed penalty is implemented into the system, forcing the player to use the brakes.
* A more extensive tuning system is available to the key users. Instead of simply modding the external parts, the performance hardwares are available as well this time. These can be performed in the online virtual garage.
* A player can also activate the "Garage Extension" functions. This includes the benefit of having a team, customizing decals, vinyls and setting names and such.

BattleGear4Tuned.bat_name: Battle Gear 4 Tuned   競速-格鬥賽車4 Tuned
BattleGear4Tuned.title: 競速-格鬥賽車4 Tuned
BattleGear4Tuned.notes:
Battle Gear 4是Taito Corporation于2005年7月发布的街机赛车游戏。这是Battle Gear系列的第五款产品。2006年，机柜更新为《战斗装备4》Tuned规范，其中包含更多的汽车、课程和新的游戏模式。

[英文原文]
Battle Gear 4 is an arcade racing game by Taito Corporation released in July 2005. It is the fifth product of the Battle Gear series. In 2006 the cabinets have then been updated to the Battle Gear 4 Tuned specification, which contains more cars, courses, and a new game mode.

BBHHome.bat_name: Big Buck Hunter Pro Home 射擊光槍-獵鹿人專業版home
BBHHome.title: 猎鹿人专业版home
BBHHome.notes:
'88 Games（在日本被称为“超级体育特辑”）是科乐美“田径”系列的第三部。顾名思义，该运动员将通过八个项目参加1988年夏季奥运会：100米短跑、跳远、400米接力、Skeet射击、110米栏、射箭、标枪和跳高。我们的目标是通过第一轮比赛获得每一场决赛的资格，然后赢得每一场比赛的金牌。1988年7月，《88 Games》在日本上映。

[英文原文]
'88 Games (known as "Hyper Sports Special" in Japan) is the third instalment in Konami's '"Track & Field" series. As the name implies, the player is to compete into the 1988 Olympic Summer Games through eight events: 100m Dash, Long Jump, 400m Relay, Skeet Shooting, 110m Hurdles, Archery, Javelin Throw and High Jump. The goal is to qualify for every final through a first round of event, then to win the gold medal in each of them. '88 Games was released in July 1988 in Japan.

BBHPro.bat_name: Big Buck Hunter Pro 射擊光槍-獵鹿人專業版
BBHPro.title: 猎鹿人专业版
BBHPro.notes:
Big Buck Hunter Pro是一款街机风格的狩猎游戏。基于新平台，它具有双人同步“枪战”模式和改进的图形。与其像前辈那样选择一个地区，不如先选择要狩猎的动物类型。一开始，您可以在白尾鹿、麋鹿、叉角羚羊、大角羊和驼鹿之间进行选择，选择将带您前往北美的各个地点。有许多“小动物”贯穿狩猎场景，总共有 12 个，包括松鼠、兔子、负鼠和美洲狮。每隔几轮就会有一个奖励回合，包括人工目标、猎鸟，如鸭子和野鸡、青蛙、沙鼠、野猪，甚至还有一个奶牛绑架 UFO 回合，目标是射击尽可能多的 不明飞行物就像在以前的游戏中一样，你只射击雄性（雄鹿和公牛），射击雌性动物（母鹿和奶牛）会导致失败。更远的距离和更准确的射击会获得更高的分数。Big Buck Hunter Pro是一款街机风格的狩猎游戏。基于一个新的平台，它具有两个玩家同时进行的“枪战”模式，并具有改进的图形。与其像以前那样选择一个地区，不如从选择想要狩猎的动物类型开始。一开始，您可以在白尾鹿、麋鹿、叉角羚、大角羊和驼鹿之间做出选择，然后您可以前往北美的各个地方。在狩猎场景中，有许多“动物”可以得分，总共有十二种，包括松鼠、兔子、负鼠和山狮。每隔几轮就有一轮奖励，包括人工目标、狩猎鸟类，如鸭子和野鸡、青蛙、沙鼠、野猪，甚至还有一轮绑架奶牛的不明飞行物，目的是尽可能多地拍摄不明飞行物。与之前的游戏一样，你只射击雄性（雄鹿和公牛），射击雌性动物（公牛和奶牛）会导致失误。距离越远、射击越准确，得分越高。

[英文原文]
Big Buck Hunter Pro 是一款街机风格的狩猎游戏。基于新平台，它具有双人同步“枪战”模式和改进的图形。与其像前辈那样选择一个地区，不如先选择要狩猎的动物类型。一开始，您可以在白尾鹿、麋鹿、叉角羚羊、大角羊和驼鹿之间进行选择，选择将带您前往北美的各个地点。

有许多“小动物”贯穿狩猎场景，总共有 12 个，包括松鼠、兔子、负鼠和美洲狮。
每隔几轮就会有一个奖励回合，包括人工目标、猎鸟，如鸭子和野鸡、青蛙、沙鼠、野猪，甚至还有一个奶牛绑架 UFO 回合，目标是射击尽可能多的 UFO。

就像在以前的游戏中一样，你只射击雄性（雄鹿和公牛），射击雌性动物（母鹿和奶牛）会导致失败。更远的距离和更准确的射击会获得更高的分数。
Big Buck Hunter Pro is an arcade style hunting game. Based on a new platform, it features a two-player simultaneous “Shootout” mode with improved graphics. Rather than selecting a region like in its predecessors, you begin by selecting the type of animal you want to hunt. At the beginning the choice stands between whitetail deer, elk, prong horn antelope, big horn sheep and moose where the choice takes you to the various locations in North America.

There are a number of "critters" that run through the hunting scene that give points, twelve in total including squirrel, rabbit, possum and mountain lion.
Every few rounds there is a bonus round that include artificial targets, hunting birds, such as duck and pheasant, frogs, gerbils, boars and there is even a cow abducting UFO round where the objective is to shoot as many UFO's as possible.

Like in previous games you only shoot the males (bucks and bulls), shooting a female animal (does and cows) results in a miss. Longer distance and more accurate shots give higher scores.

BBHWorld.bat_name: Big Buck Hunter World 射擊光槍-獵鹿人世界版
BBHWorld.title: 射擊光槍-獵鹿人世界版
BBHWorld.notes:
Big Buck Hunter这款快节奏、令人上瘾的街机射击游戏将把街机体验带到您的客厅！全新的控制和瞄准机制将使其成为街机射击游戏的必备体验。

[英文原文]
Big Buck Hunter will bring the arcade experience to your living room with this fast paced, addictive arcade shooter! The all new control and aim mechanics will make this a must pick up and play arcade shooter experience.

BladeArcus.bat_name: Blade Arcus   格鬥-光明格鬥
BladeArcus.title: 格鬥-光明格鬥
BladeArcus.notes:
在一个由刀刃、魔法和拳头控制的世界里，各种各样的战士聚集在一起作战！这是一款2D格斗游戏，角色来自《闪亮之刃》和《闪亮之心》。

[英文原文]
In a world controlled by blade, magic, and fist, diverse warriors gather for battle! This is a 2D fighting game featuring characters from Shining Blade and Shining Hearts.

BladeStrangers.bat_name: Blade Strangers   格鬥-劍騎烈傳 刃之異邦人
BladeStrangers.title: 劍騎烈傳 刃之異邦人
BladeStrangers.notes:
一股仅被称为Lina的恶意力量正在吞噬来自一个巨大的跨维度服务器网络的数据，该网络由被称为“motes”的有感知计算机监控。在绝望中，尘粒召唤来自各种平行游戏世界的英雄，在一对一的战斗中相互对抗。

[英文原文]
A malevolent force known only as Lina is devouring data from a vast, interdimensional network of servers overseen by sentient computers called ”motes.” In desperation, the motes summon heroes from a variety of parallel game worlds to face off against each other in one-on-one combat.

BladeStrangersAPM3.bat_name: Blade Strangers _APM3_   格鬥-劍騎烈傳 刃之異邦人APM3
BladeStrangersAPM3.title: 劍騎烈傳 刃之異邦人APM3
BladeStrangersAPM3.notes:
一股仅被称为Lina的恶意力量正在吞噬来自一个巨大的跨维度服务器网络的数据，该网络由被称为“motes”的有感知计算机监控。在绝望中，尘粒召唤来自各种平行游戏世界的英雄，在一对一的战斗中相互对抗。

[英文原文]
A malevolent force known only as Lina is devouring data from a vast, interdimensional network of servers overseen by sentient computers called ”motes.” In desperation, the motes summon heroes from a variety of parallel game worlds to face off against each other in one-on-one combat.

BlazBlueCalaminityTrigger.bat_name: BlazBlue_ Calamity Trigger   格鬥-蒼翼默示錄_厄運扳機
BlazBlueCalaminityTrigger.title: 蒼翼默示錄 厄運扳機
BlazBlueCalaminityTrigger.notes:
《罪恶装备》系列创作者的第一款高分辨率2D战斗机！BlazBlue是一款传统的2D战斗机，两个角色参与决斗。游戏的故事涉及一个强大的委员会之间的异议和破坏，这个委员会非正式地被称为“图书馆”，它控制着一个曾经拯救人类的大国，但现在它以保护性的、有人说是镇压性的方式行使权力。

[英文原文]
The first hi-res 2D fighter from the creators of the Guilty Gear series! BlazBlue is a traditional 2D fighter where two characters participate in a duel. The story of the game involves dissent and destruction among a powerful council, known unofficially as "the Library," which controls a great power that once saved humanity, but which now wields its power in protective, some say repressive, ways.

BBCF.bat_name: BlazBlue_ Central Fiction 格鬥-蒼翼默示錄_神觀之夢
BBCF.title: 蒼翼默示錄 神觀之夢
BBCF.notes:
将2D格斗游戏与视觉小说相结合，BlazBlue系列在大量粉丝的支持下继续发展！最新安装的BlazBlue:Centralfiction是Azure Saga的结局，揭示了世界隐藏的真相！

[英文原文]
Combining a 2D fighting game with a visual novel, the BlazBlue series continues on with massive fan support! The latest installation, BlazBlue: Centralfiction, serves as the ending to the Azure Saga, revealing the hidden truth of the world!

BBCP.bat_name: BlazBlue_ Chronophantasma   格鬥-蒼翼默示錄_刻之幻影
BBCP.title: 蒼翼默示錄 刻之幻影
BBCP.notes:
《BlazBlue：Chronophantasma Extend》是BlazBlue系列的第六部，融合了2D战斗动作游戏和视觉小说。

[英文原文]
'BlazBlue: Chronophantasma Extend' is the sixth installment of the BlazBlue series, a combination of 2D fighting action game and visual novel.

BlazBlueContinuumShift.bat_name: BlazBlue_ Continuum Shift   格鬥-蒼翼默示錄_連鎖反應
BlazBlueContinuumShift.title: 蒼翼默示錄 連鎖反應
BlazBlueContinuumShift.notes:
广受好评的BlazBlue系列的第二款游戏《BlazBlue:Continuum Shift Extend》增加了许多游戏模式、故事场景、新动作和全新的可玩角色，以进一步增强BlazBlue的体验，巩固其作为有史以来最伟大的2D战斗机之一的地位

[英文原文]
The second entry in the critically acclaimed BlazBlue franchise, BlazBlue: Continuum Shift Extend adds a number of gameplay modes, story scenarios, new moves, and an all-new playable character to further enhance the BlazBlue experience and solidify its status as one of the all-time great 2D fighters

BlazBlueContinuumShift2.bat_name: BlazBlue_ Continuum Shift II   格鬥-蒼翼默示錄_連鎖反應2
BlazBlueContinuumShift2.title: 蒼翼默示錄 連鎖反應2
BlazBlueContinuumShift2.notes:
BlazBlue Continuum Shift II包含主机版本的全套单人游戏功能，如街机、故事攻击、训练和故事模式，还具有用于多人游戏的ad-hoc网络模式。这一令人印象深刻的功能列表以专门为手持版本创建的新内容为高潮，包括额外的故事材料和全新的模式，如Legion 1.5和Abyss Mode。

[英文原文]
BlazBlue Continuum Shift II contains the complete set of single player features from the console version, such as Arcade, Story Attack, Training, and Story mode, and also has an ad-hoc Network mode for multiplayer play. This impressive list of features is topped off with new content created solely for the handheld version, including extra story material and brand new modes such as Legion 1.5 and Abyss Mode.

BlazBlueCrossTagBattle.bat_name: BlazBlue_ Cross Tag Battle 格鬥-蒼翼默示錄_交叉組隊戰
BlazBlueCrossTagBattle.title: 蒼翼默示錄 交叉組隊戰
BlazBlueCrossTagBattle.notes: THE COLLISION IS INEVITABLE! THE IMPACT WILL BE UNAVOIDABLE! Cross over between 4 different universes! Play as characters from the BlazBlue, Persona, Under Night In-Birth, and (for the first time ever in a fighting game), RWBY series!

BlazingAngels.title: 熾天使
BlazingAngels.notes:
《炽热天使：二战中队》是一款适用于PC、Xbox、Xbox 360、PlayStation 3和Wii的飞行战斗视频游戏[1]。它由Ubisoft Bucharest在2006年第二财政季度为北美和欧洲地区开发。游戏中有46架不同的二战战斗机，玩家可以作为一个虚构的中队参加几场二战活动。在线支持允许16名玩家参加正面和合作的战斗。《炽热的天使：第二次世界大战的中队》于2006年3月24日在美国上映，并于3月31日在欧洲上映。

[英文原文]
Blazing Angels: Squadrons of WWII is a flight combat video game for the PC, Xbox, Xbox 360, PlayStation 3 and Wii[1]. It was developed by Ubisoft Bucharest during the second fiscal quarter of 2006 for both the North American and European regions. The game features 46 different World War II fighter planes and allows the player or players to take part in several World War II events as a fictional squadron. Online support allows 16 players to take part in head-to-head and co-operative battles. Blazing Angels: Squadrons of WWII was released on March 24, 2006 in the United States and March 31, 2006 in Europe.

BlockKing.bat_name: Block King Ball Shooter 射擊光槍-激投伝説
BlockKing.title: 激投伝説
BlockKing.notes: Block King Ball Shooter is a ball shooter game, featuring a cannon controller with recoil and adjustable firepower, suitable for two players. The players throw balls at a huge 70 inch high definition LCD screen with the goal of breaking apart the castle.

bldyr3b.bat_name: Bloody Roar 3 格鬥-獸化格鬥 3
bldyr3b.title: 獸化格鬥 3
bldyr3b.notes:
游戏玩法（控制）有六个不同的按钮，命令如下：；使用L2和R2进行拳打脚踢、投掷、野兽形态和左右侧步，也可以通过双击向下或向上侧步来完成。主要特征仍然是变身为野兽的能力，这在所有血腥咆哮游戏中都有涉及。一旦角色转变，他们就会恢复失去的所有健康，变得比以前强壮得多。

[英文原文]
The gameplay (the controls) had six different buttons and the commands would be; punch, kick, throw, beast form, and side-step left and right with L2 and R2, which can also be done by double tap down or up to side-step. The main feature is still the ability to transform into beasts, which is involved in all of the Bloody Roar games. Once the character transforms, they regain all the health they have lost and become much stronger and powerful than before.

BorderBreakScramble.title: 边境保卫战
BorderBreakScramble.notes:
《Border Break Scramble》是《Border Break Union》的续作/更新。

[英文原文]
Border Break Scramble is a sequel/update to Border Break Union.

BugBusters.bat_name: Bug Busters 射擊光槍-甲蟲剋星
BugBusters.title: 甲蟲剋星
BugBusters.notes:
Bug Busters是有史以来第一款喷雾射击视频游戏。玩家可以控制喷雾罐，而不是枪或操纵杆，它们可以喷射真实的空气进行逼真的模拟——你甚至需要摇晃罐子才能重新装弹！成为英雄Gadoori或Dajaba，在3个阶段完成9个难度逐渐增加的关卡。这些楼层以各种地点的形式出现，如医院、污水处理系统、餐厅和学校。有30多种怪诞的虫子要杀死，10种虫子boss和各种物品和bonusse散布在各个关卡中。

[英文原文]
Bug Busters is the first ever spray-shooting video game. Players take control of aerosol cans rather than guns or joysticks, which spray real air for lifelike simulation - you even have to shake the can up to reload!

Become heroes Gadoori or Dajaba and take on 9 progressively harder levels to be completed over 3 stages. The levels are in the forms of various locations such as a hospital, a sewerage system, a restaurant and a school. There are more than 30 kinds of grotesque bugs to kill, 10 kinds of bug bosses and various items and bonusses scattered throughout the levels.

ByonByon.bat_name: ByonByon 射擊光槍-Byon Byon大作戰
ByonByon.title: Byon Byon大作戰
ByonByon.notes:
Byon Byon consists of numerous minigames where the player must use the unique fist controller to punch various targets and animals. The controller is very unique, with the game described as a "telescopic fist simulator".

The controller is essentially a plastic fist enclosed in a clear plastic cylinder, with handles on the sides. Players must aim the tube, and then pull back on the handles to "punch". The game is characterized not only by its control scheme, but also by its wacky and over the top Japanese graphics.

CC.title: 格鬥-混沌代碼
CC.notes:
简单但高度灵活的高速2D格斗游戏！享受所有华丽动作的战斗快感！

[英文原文]
Simple yet highly flexible hi-speed 2D Fighting game! Enjoy the thrill of fighting with all the flashy moves!

CSNEO.title: 反恐精英NEO
CSNEO.notes:
反恐精英Neo（日语：カウンターストライク ネオ) 是日本街机改编的《反恐精英》，最初的《半条命》多人游戏修改版。它由Namco发布，在Linux系统上运行。游戏具有独特的地图、派系和设置，但游戏玩法和武器选择与其他游戏保持不变。Neo包括几个主要和次要的变化。游戏没有传统的恐怖分子对反恐场景，双方分别更名为CSF和NEO。它结合了配对和Elo衍生的评级系统，以帮助球员和球队保持平衡。这款游戏采用动漫风格，以便在日本更好地推广。

[英文原文]
Counter-Strike Neo (Japanese: カウンターストライク ネオ) is a Japanese arcade adaptation of Counter-Strike, the original Half-Life multiplayer modification. It is published by Namco and runs on a Linux system. The game features unique maps, factions, and setting, though the gameplay and the weapon selection remain the same as other games.

Neo includes several major and minor changes. The game does not feature traditional Terrorist versus Counter-Terrorist scenarios, the two sides are renamed CSF and NEO respectively. It incorporates a matchmaking and Elo-derived rating system to help keep players and teams on even footing. The game is anime-styled to better market it in Japan.

CaladriusAC.title: 女神骑士团 爆裂
CaladriusAC.notes:
Caladrius是由MOSS开发和发布的滚动射击游戏，于2013年4月25日首次在日本Xbox 360上发布。它后来于2015年9月4日在北美和欧洲以数字形式发布。在主机首次亮相后，Caladrius被移植到名为Caladrius AC的街机上，增加了额外的游戏模式并支持Sega的ALL。网络系统。

[英文原文]
Caladrius is a scrolling shooter developed and published by MOSS, first released in April 25, 2013 for the Xbox 360 in Japan. It was later released digitally in North America and Europe on September 4, 2015. After its console debut, Caladrius was ported to arcades under the name Caladrius AC, adding extra game modes and supporting Sega's ALL.Net system.

fghtjam.bat_name: Capcom Fighting Jam 格鬥-卡普空大亂鬥
fghtjam.title: 卡普空大亂鬥
fghtjam.notes:
Capcom Fighting Evolution在日本和欧洲发行，名为Capcom Fight Jam，是Capcom于2004年发行的一款格斗游戏。它最初是作为Namco System 246硬件的街机游戏发布的。游戏中的角色来自街头霸王系列的三个不同化身，以及Darkstalkers系列和CPS III街机游戏Red Earth的角色，每个角色都使用他们所代表的游戏中的战斗系统。Capcom Fighting Evolution的角色来自《街头霸王II》、《街头霸王阿尔法》、《街道霸王III》和《黑暗追踪者》系列，以及单人游戏《红土》。每个系列有四个可选择的角色，不包括原始角色英格丽和老板角色皮隆和Shin Akuma。每个角色都使用游戏中的战斗系统，该系统决定了他们可以使用的技术和他们的超级组合仪表。英格丽德将她独特的战斗风格与自己的技术结合起来，共有六种战斗风格。比赛由两对两的耐力型小组赛组成。玩家选择一对角色，然后开始与第一个选定的角色进行比赛。如果他们当前的角色在一轮中被击败，那么玩家可以选择用另一个角色开始下一轮。

[英文原文]
Capcom Fighting Evolution, released in Japan and Europe as Capcom Fighting Jam is a 2004 fighting game published by Capcom. It was originally released as an arcade game for the Namco System 246 hardware. The game features characters from three different incarnations of the Street Fighter series, as well as characters from the Darkstalkers series and the CPS III arcade game Red Earth, with each character employing the fighting system from the game which they represent.

Capcom Fighting Evolution features characters from the Street Fighter II, Street Fighter Alpha, Street Fighter III, and the Darkstalkers series, as well as the single game Red Earth. There are four selectable characters representing each series, excluding original character Ingrid and the boss characters Pyron and Shin Akuma. Each character uses a fighting system from the game which determines the techniques they can use and their Super Combo Gauge. Ingrid uses her unique fighting style with her own techniques, for a total of six fighting styles.

The game consists of two-on-two endurance-style tag team matches. The player selects a pair of characters and then begins a match with the first one selected. If their current character is defeated in one round, then the player can choose to begin the next round with the other character.

Cars.title: 汽車總動員
Cars.notes:
迪士尼/皮克斯电影的官方游戏！超越活动中心项目的有限探索，对“散热器弹簧”的广阔世界进行完全自由的“全面探索”！这部电影中的10个角色和全新的情节会让你高兴好几个小时！被评为“E”级的娱乐节目，对全家来说都很有趣！

[英文原文]
The official game of the Disney/Pixar movie! Go beyond the limited exploration of the activity center program with totally free-wheelin' TOTAL exploration of the vast world of 'Radiator Springs'! 10 characters straight from the movie with an all-new plot will keep you delighted for many hours! Rated 'E' entertainment that's wonderful fun for the whole family!

Castlevania.bat_name: Castlevania_ The Arcade 射擊光槍-惡魔城_街機版
Castlevania.title: 恶魔城街机版
Castlevania.notes:
恶魔城：拱廊是一款街机游戏，是 科乐美的 恶魔城特许经营权的一部分。该游戏于 2008 年 7 月 23 日宣布。该游戏于 2009 年 10 月 2 日在日本发布。宣布于 2009 年在欧洲发布，但仅在 2008 年出现在测试地点。游戏玩法类似于 死亡之屋等光枪射击游戏。玩家使用特殊的 LED 鞭子遥控器。遥控器有两个按钮。用于激活鞭的顶部拇指按钮，提示玩家在屏幕上挥动遥控器以伤害敌人。食指的底部按钮用于激活子武器，例如刀或十字架。通过收集以可破坏蜡烛和木箱的形式散落在每个阶段的心（最多 25 个）来填充子武器。最多两名玩家可以同时玩游戏。游戏中的角色包括吸血鬼猎人、女枪手和小女巫。《恶魔城：街机》是一款街机游戏，是科乐美《恶魔城》系列的一部分。游戏于2008年7月23日公布。该游戏于2009年10月2日在日本发布。2009年宣布在欧洲发布，但直到2008年才在测试地点出现。游戏玩法类似于《死亡之屋》等轻枪射击游戏。玩家使用特殊的LED鞭子遥控器。遥控器有两个按钮。一个用于激活鞭子的拇指按钮，提示玩家在屏幕上摆动遥控器以伤害敌人。食指的底部按钮用于激活子武器，如刀或十字架。通过收集以可破坏蜡烛和木箱形式散布在每个阶段的心形物（最多25个）来重新填充子武器。最多两名玩家可以同时玩游戏。游戏中的角色包括吸血鬼猎人、枪手女士和小女巫。

[英文原文]
Castlevania： The Arcade 是一款街机游戏，是 Konami 的 Castlevania 特许经营权的一部分。该游戏于 2008 年 7 月 23 日宣布。该游戏于 2009 年 10 月 2 日在日本发布。宣布于 2009 年在欧洲发布，但仅在 2008 年出现在测试地点。

游戏玩法类似于 The House of the Dead 等光枪射击游戏。玩家使用特殊的 LED 鞭子遥控器。遥控器有两个按钮。用于激活鞭的顶部拇指按钮，提示玩家在屏幕上挥动遥控器以伤害敌人。食指的底部按钮用于激活子武器，例如刀或十字架。通过收集以可破坏蜡烛和木箱的形式散落在每个阶段的心（最多 25 个）来填充子武器。

最多两名玩家可以同时玩游戏。游戏中的角色包括吸血鬼猎人、女枪手和小女巫。
Castlevania: The Arcade is an arcade game, part of the Castlevania franchise by Konami. The game was announced on July 23, 2008. The game was released in Japan on October 2, 2009. A European release was announced for 2009 but only appeared at test locations in 2008.

The gameplay is similar to light gun shooters such as The House of the Dead. Players utilize a special LED whip remote. The remote has two buttons. A top thumb button used to activate the whip, prompting players to swing the remote at the screen to damage enemies. A bottom button for the index finger is used to activate subweapons, such as knives or crosses. Subweapons are refilled by collecting hearts (up to 25) strewn about each stage in the form of destructible candles and wooden crates.

Up to two players can play the game at once. Characters in the game include the Vampire Hunter, the Lady Gunner, and the Little Witch.

ChaosCodeNSOC103.bat_name: Chaos Code_ New Sign of Catastrophe v1_03_00   格鬥-混沌代碼_新生浩劫103
ChaosCodeNSOC103.title: 混沌代碼 新生浩劫103
ChaosCodeNSOC103.notes:
简单但高度灵活的高速2D格斗游戏！享受所有华丽动作的战斗快感！

[英文原文]
Simple yet highly flexible hi-speed 2D Fighting game! Enjoy the thrill of fighting with all the flashy moves!

ChaosCodeNSOC211.bat_name: Chaos Code_ New Sign of Catastrophe v2_11   格鬥-混沌代碼_新生浩劫211
ChaosCodeNSOC211.title: 混沌代碼 新生浩劫211
ChaosCodeNSOC211.notes:
简单但高度灵活的高速2D格斗游戏！享受所有华丽动作的战斗快感！

[英文原文]
Simple yet highly flexible hi-speed 2D Fighting game! Enjoy the thrill of fighting with all the flashy moves!

ChaosBreaker.title: 混沌斩断
ChaosBreaker.notes:
Chaos Breaker运行在Taito的Type X街机板上，是一款以幻想为主题的基于精灵的2D战斗游戏，角色看起来像是来自《龙与地下城》或《魔兽世界》领域。玩家选择一个由三个角色组成的团队，就像《斗士之王》系列一样。游戏中有六个不同的种族，包括：人类、黑暗精灵、精灵、奥克、矮人和亡灵。

[英文原文]
Running on Taito's Type X arcade board, Chaos Breaker is a fantasy-themed sprite-based 2D fighting game with characters that look to be out of the Dungeon's & Dragons or World of Warcraft realm. Players select a team of three characters, much like in the King of Fighters series. There are six different races featured in the game including: human, dark elf, elf, ork, dwarf and undead.

ChaosBreakerNesica.title: 混沌斩断 NESiCAxLive
ChaosBreakerNesica.notes:
Chaos Breaker运行在Taito的Type X街机板上，是一款以幻想为主题的基于精灵的2D战斗游戏，角色看起来像是来自《龙与地下城》或《魔兽世界》领域。玩家选择一个由三个角色组成的团队，就像《斗士之王》系列一样。游戏中有六个不同的种族，包括：人类、黑暗精灵、精灵、奥克、矮人和亡灵。

[英文原文]
Running on Taito's Type X arcade board, Chaos Breaker is a fantasy-themed sprite-based 2D fighting game with characters that look to be out of the Dungeon's & Dragons or World of Warcraft realm. Players select a team of three characters, much like in the King of Fighters series. There are six different races featured in the game including: human, dark elf, elf, ork, dwarf and undead.

ChaseChaseJoker.bat_name: Chase Chase Jokers 多人遊戲-追緝王牌
ChaseChaseJoker.title: 追緝王牌
ChaseChaseJoker.notes: Chase Chase Jokers is an action game where players race in a maze collecting keys and have to avoid being tagged by their opponents. It can be played up to 6 players simultaneously, in a 3vs3 tag mode. The game is divided into two teams; the "Human" team and the "Monster" team, each team consisting of 3 players. Teams are randomly attributed at the start of the game.

ChaseHQ2.title: 追擊HQ2
ChaseHQ2.notes:
玩家控制三辆主要车辆。其中之一是现代库存跑车、巡逻跑车和条纹肌肉车。每个级别都包含一个简单的目标，即比赛到最后，目的是击败反派车辆，该车辆必须损坏到足以被取下并将罪犯拘留。一些反派角色采用了巧妙的战术，使游戏更具挑战性。游戏玩法也基于积分系统。

[英文原文]
The player takes control of three main vehicles. One of which is a modern stock sports car, a patrol sports car and a striped muscle car. Each level consists of one simple goal of racing to the end with the intent of defeating the villain vehicle, which has to be damaged enough to be taken down and the criminals taken into custody. Some villains have tricky tactics that make gameplay more challenging. Gameplay is also based on a point system.

ChronoRegalia.bat_name: Chrono Regalia 策略-時空王權
ChronoRegalia.title: 時空王權
ChronoRegalia.notes:
《Chrono Regalia》是世嘉于2019年2月21日在日本为街机（使用其ALLS UX硬件）开发和发布的一款高幻想实时战略游戏。Chrono Regalia仅使用游戏的触摸屏进行控制，让玩家在一对一的比赛中与他人作战，将回合制策略游戏与收藏卡牌游戏相结合。它的独特之处在于它的实时“步进”方法，在这种方法中，玩家的回合是以先到先得的方式自动完成的。该游戏于2019年7月24日进行了重大修订，名为Chrono Regalia EX，增加了新的游戏模式（Tansaku模式）和新的单位。玩家选择四个单位进行控制，每个单位在他们的“牌组”中都有六张可定制的卡片（包括武器和咒语），并且必须操纵它们穿过一座四车道的桥，以便直接攻击对手的角色（或“Chronos”），同时保护自己的角色。每个单位开始处于待命状态，必须放置在他们所在的车道一侧，在车道上，他们开始一次向前移动一个方块，直到他们被对方单位击败，或者直到他们过桥并对对手造成伤害。玩家还有MP和卡牌量规，允许他们从每个单位的手牌（或补充手牌）中打牌，每张牌都有特殊效果。游戏还有一个被称为“御庭”的有限使用特殊能力，它利用自己的量规。与其他具有收藏卡系统的游戏类似，玩家可以通过加查系统获得不同稀有的新卡。此外，与当时的其他世嘉网络街机游戏类似，它使用了IC卡和ALL。Net在线服务，用于在线多人游戏和持久玩家统计。这些后来于2020年3月31日停止，大大降低了游戏的功能。

[英文原文]
Chrono Regalia is a high-fantasy real-time strategy game developed and released by Sega for arcades (using their ALLS UX hardware) in Japan on February 21, 2019.

Using only the game's touchscreen for its controls, Chrono Regalia has players battling others in a one-on-one match that combines turn-based strategy games with collectible card games. It is unique for its real-time "step" approach, in which player turns are done automatically in a first-come approach. The game later received a major revision on July 24, 2019, titled Chrono Regalia EX, adding a new game mode (Tansaku Mode) and new Units.

Players choose four Units to control, each with a customizable assortment of six cards in their "deck" (including weapons and spells), and must maneuver them across a four-lane bridge in order to directly attack the opponent's character (or "Chronos") while defending their own. Each Unit starts on standby and must be placed on their side of a lane, in which they begin moving forward one tile at a time until they are defeated by an opposing Unit or until they cross the bridge and deal damage to the opponent. Players also have MP and Card gauges, which allow them to play cards from each Unit's hand (or replenish their hand), with each card having special effects. The game also has a limited-use special ability known as "Regalia", which utilizes its own gauge.

Similar to other games with a collectible card system, players can earn new cards of different rarities through a gacha system. Also, similar to other Sega networked arcade games at the time, it utilized IC cards and the ALL.Net online service for online multiplayer and persistent player stats. These were later discontinued on March 31, 2020, significantly reducing the game's functionality.

cobrata.bat_name: Cobra The Arcade 光槍-眼鏡蛇_街機版
cobrata.title: 眼鏡蛇 街機版
cobrata.notes:
Cobra The Arcade是一款由Namco开发和发行的轨道射击视频游戏。它基于寺泽武一的漫画《眼镜蛇》和电视剧《太空眼镜蛇》，但有一个原创故事。与《时间危机》系列一样，《眼镜蛇街机》使用脚踏板来掩护并重新装弹。与《时间危机II》和《时间危机3》一样，它对所有危及生命的射击使用相同的“危机闪光”系统，如果被关键子弹或障碍物击中，或者计时器达到零，则有一人丧生。如果在所有生命丧失后继续使用，则分数重置为0。

[英文原文]
Cobra The Arcade is a rail shooter video game developed and published by Namco. It is based on Buichi Terasawa's manga Cobra and the TV series Space Cobra but with an original story.

Like the Time Crisis series, Cobra The Arcade uses a foot pedal to take cover and reload the gun. Like Time Crisis II and Time Crisis 3, it uses the same "crisis flash" system for all life-threatening shots and one life is lost due to hit by a critical bullet or an obstacle, or if the timer reaches zero. If a continue is used after all lives are lost, the score is reset to 0.

cobrataw.bat_name: Cobra_ The Arcade World _CBR2 Ver_ B_ 光槍-眼鏡蛇_街機版 2005
cobrataw.title: 光槍-眼鏡蛇 街機版 2005
cobrataw.notes:
Cobra The Arcade是一款由Namco开发和发行的轨道射击视频游戏。它基于寺泽武一的漫画《眼镜蛇》和电视剧《太空眼镜蛇》，但有一个原创故事。与《时间危机》系列一样，《眼镜蛇街机》使用脚踏板来掩护并重新装弹。与《时间危机II》和《时间危机3》一样，它对所有危及生命的射击使用相同的“危机闪光”系统，如果被关键子弹或障碍物击中，或者计时器达到零，则有一人丧生。如果在所有生命丧失后继续使用，则分数重置为0。

[英文原文]
Cobra The Arcade is a rail shooter video game developed and published by Namco. It is based on Buichi Terasawa's manga Cobra and the TV series Space Cobra but with an original story.

Like the Time Crisis series, Cobra The Arcade uses a foot pedal to take cover and reload the gun. Like Time Crisis II and Time Crisis 3, it uses the same "crisis flash" system for all life-threatening shots and one life is lost due to hit by a critical bullet or an obstacle, or if the timer reaches zero. If a continue is used after all lives are lost, the score is reset to 0.

ComeOnBaby2.bat_name: Come On Baby_ 2 Winter Championship 小遊戲-加油寶貝_2_冬季冠軍賽
ComeOnBaby2.title: 加油寶貝 2 冬季冠軍賽
ComeOnBaby2.notes: Come On Baby 2 follows up on the original with even more ridiculous sports and even more ridiculous babies. For the second tournament, the setting is the Alps and the babies compete in winter sports instead of the previous game's summer sports.

Contra.bat_name: Contra_ Evolution 射擊-魂鬥羅_進化
Contra.title: 魂鬥羅 進化
Contra.notes:
The Contra Anniversary Collection brings this classic Run and Gun franchise back to modern platforms and a new generation of gamers.

   Grab power ups and blast your way through waves of menacing enemies and bosses that will put your reaction skills to the test. Also included is a digital Bonus Book with tons of concept documents and sketches, the official chronology of the franchise, an exclusive interview with the veteran producer of the series, and more!


Alone or with a friend, Contra provides hours of nail biting action. In a pinch; make sure you know the code!

Contra (Arcade)
Super Contra
Contra (NA)
Contra (JP)
Super C
Contra III: The Alien Wars
Operation C
Contra Hard Corps
Super Probotector Alien Rebels
Probotector

Coopers9.bat_name: Coopers_s 9 射擊光槍-浴血九號
Coopers9.title: 浴血九號
Coopers9.notes:
这款游戏是一部轻松、充满动作的喜剧，讲述了两名刺客的故事。卡洛斯·库珀是一个国际暗杀组织的负责人。他的两名致命刺客已经决定，他们的时间已经到了为卡洛斯工作的时候了，他们想离开这个犯罪团伙。当他们去把这个消息告诉老板时，老板却不为所动地接受了这个消息，太糟糕了！然后，他们必须与老同事作战，并试图活着逃离库珀公司大楼。有八个关卡供玩家快速通关，所有关卡都设置在不同的位置。

[英文原文]
The game is a light hearted, action packed, comedy caper following two assassins.

Carlos Cooper is the head of an international assassins organization. Two of his deadly assassins have decided that their time is up working for Carlos and want to leave the criminal gang. When they go and break the news to their boss he takes the news as they expected, badly! They then must battle their old colleagues and try to escape the Cooper Corporation building alive.

Features eight levels for players to blast their way through, all set in various locations.

CottonRnR.bat_name: Cotton Rock_n_Roll   射擊-棉花小魔女
CottonRnR.title: 棉花小魔女
CottonRnR.notes:
与棉花和丝绸同行，开启一场全新的冒险，纪念棉花系列30周年！邪恶的事情正在酝酿之中，柳树正在从仙境消失，仙女女王请求丝绸寻求女巫纳塔·德·科顿的帮助。一辈子你都可以吃柳树，因为她对柳树有着无法满足的渴望，科顿愿意帮助她的老朋友，一起踏上另一段冒险之旅。这款来自历史悠久的《棉花》系列的全新游戏为另一场奇幻冒险奠定了基础，共有6个标志性的可玩角色，包括其他游戏中的明星！每个角色都有自己的机制和攻击，让你从不同的游戏风格中进行选择，找到合适的匹配！在保持标志性的Cotton风格的同时，引入了几种新的射击机制，如Psyvariar的Buzz System或Sanvein的Time Mode。特征：-各种可玩角色-共16个阶段-令人振奋的原声-新的游戏系统-一款具有现代高清图形的全新游戏-可解锁内容

[英文原文]
Accompany Cotton and Silk on a brand-new adventure commemorating the 30th anniversary of the Cotton series!

Something sinister is in the making, the Willows are vanishing from Fairyland and the Fairy Queen asks Silk to seek the witch Nata de Cotton for help. For a lifetime all-you-can-eat willow supply, as she has an insatiable craving for them, Cotton is willing to help out her old friend and embark on another adventure together.

This brand-new game from the long-standing Cotton series sets the stage for another fantastic adventure, featuring a total of 6 iconic playable characters, including stars from other games! Each character has their own mechanics and attacks, allowing you to choose from different playstyles and find the right match!

While staying true to the iconic Cotton style, several new shoot 'em up mechanics are introduced, like Psyvariar's Buzz System or Sanvein's Time Mode.

Features:
- Various playable characters
- 16 stages in total
- Exhilarating Soundtrack
- New gameplay systems
- A brand-new game with modern HD graphics
- Unlockable content

CrazyRide.bat_name: Crazy Ride   競速-瘋狂之旅
CrazyRide.title: 瘋狂之旅
CrazyRide.notes:
《疯狂骑行》是UNIS于2019年在街机上发布的一款游戏，与世嘉的《疯狂出租车》系列相似。玩家只有有限的时间来接送尽可能多的乘客，以赚取票价。玩家可以选择许多不同的角色和车辆。玩家的汽车配备了几个硝基增强，玩家一路上会看到许多不同的角色，包括吉他手，甚至是圣诞老人。

[英文原文]
Crazy Ride is a 2019 arcade release by UNIS, in a similar vein to Sega's "Crazy Taxi" series. The player has a limited time frame to pick up and drop off as many passengers as they can in order to earn fares. Many different characters and vehicles are available for the player to choose. The player's car is equipped with several nitro boosts, and the player will see many different characters along the way, including a guitarist, and even Santa Claus.

CrazySpeed.bat_name: Crazy Speed   競速-極速狂飆
CrazySpeed.title: 極速狂飆
CrazySpeed.notes:
环球空间于2010年在街机上发布了《疯狂速度》，赛车手们在世界各地展开了战斗。它具有清晰流畅的3D图形，有很多车辆可供选择，并配有新的升级。使用卡片系统保存您的进度，并连接到两个街机橱柜进行激烈的一对一竞争。特点：•高品质街机风格赛车•离线模式可用：竞赛模式（与CPU相比）；时间攻击（争分夺秒）；玩家与本地玩家•红色LED照明，在任何场所都能引人注目•从世界各地的众多跑车和赛道中进行选择；由于车辆升级，建立重播兴趣。•从众多油漆作业和艺术贴纸中进行选择，以应用于每辆车！•基于检查站的封闭赛道赛车•在720p显示器上，惊人的3D图形以每秒60帧的速度尖叫•支持多种语言，包括英语、西班牙语、中文等•在线比赛、竞赛、奖励和排名（可能并非所有地区都有）•卡片保存系统和读卡器（请询问卡片可用性）•高质量的赛车控制包括方向盘、油门和制动踏板、上/下换档器；4-箭头D-Pad•《疯狂速度2》

[英文原文]
Released in 2010 by Universal Space for the arcade, racers battle around the world in Crazy Speed. It sports sharp and smooth 3D graphics with lots of vehicles to choose from and soup up with new upgrades. Save your progress using a card system and link up to two arcade cabinets for intense one-on-one competition.

Featuring:
• High quality arcade style racing
• Offline modes available: Race Mode (Versus the CPU); Time Attack (Race Against the clock); Player Vs. Player local
• Red LED lighting for a striking appearance in any venue
• Choose from numerous sports cars & tracks from around the world; build replay interest thanks to vehicle upgrades.
• Choose from a plethora of paint jobs & art stickers to apply to each vehicle!
• Checkpoint based & closed circuit course racing
• Fantastic 3D graphics scream along at 60 frames a second on the 720p display
• Multiple language support including English, Spanish, Chinese and more
• Online races, competitions, rewards & rankings (may not be available in all areas)
• Card save system & reader (please ask about card availability)
• Quality racing controls include a steering wheel, gas & brake pedal, up/down gear shifter; 4-arrow D-Pad
• Followed up by Crazy Speed 2

CrimzonClover.bat_name: Crimzon Clover for NESiCAxLive   射擊-紅蓮四羽NESiCAxLive
CrimzonClover.title: 紅蓮四羽NESiCAxLive
CrimzonClover.notes:
Crimzon Clover是一款由Yotsubane开发并在第79届Comiket上发布的垂直滚动dojin子弹地狱Flash游戏。它的名字是指深红色的三叶草，一种原产于欧洲的三叶草。最初于2011年1月11日在日本为Windows发布，NESiCAxLive街机版本于2013年4月25日发布。

[英文原文]
Crimzon Clover (クリムゾンクローバー) is a vertically scrolling dojin bullet hell Flash game developed by Yotsubane and released at the 79th Comiket. Its name is a reference to the crimson clover, a species of clover native to Europe. Originally released for Windows on January 11, 2011 in Japan, a NESiCAxLive arcade version was released on April 25, 2013.

CrossfirePaintball.bat_name: Crossfire_ Maximum Paintball   射擊光槍-Crossfire_ Maximum Paintball
CrossfirePaintball.title: Crossfire: Maximum Paintball
CrossfirePaintball.notes: Crossfire: Maximum Paintball is a non-violent lightgun shooter game developed by GFX Construction and published by Team Play for arcades in 2003.

CruisnBlast.bat_name: Cruis_n Blast   競速-動感飛車
CruisnBlast.title: 動感飛車
CruisnBlast.notes:
克鲁斯赛车游戏系列中的街机赛车手。这款游戏标志着有执照的汽车首次出现在Cruis'n游戏中，有兰博基尼、日产、雪佛兰和悍马的汽车。除了这些汽车，还有一些不太严重的汽车，如警车、吉普车和三角龙。在比赛开始时，玩家可以选择增强汽车的发动机、操控性、喷漆或添加额外的爆炸。Cruis'n Blast使用了一个简化的控制系统，只有一个加速踏板、Blast按钮和车轮。在转弯过程中短暂释放加速度将引发漂移，一旦转弯结束，漂移将爆炸成涡轮。与之前的Cruis'n游戏一样，双击加速会使汽车在两个轮子上跳起来，这将变成一个技巧，用于跳过其他汽车或坡道。使用Blast将涡轮增压与技巧相结合。猛烈地撞击人工智能汽车会摧毁它们，尽管任何玩家汽车都是无懈可击的。游戏中的五首曲目，死亡谷、马达加斯加、伦敦、里约热内卢和新加坡，都有独特的美学和事件。龙卷风和地震都使死亡谷的赛道变形，一队花车阻碍了里约的比赛，一只霸王龙跟随参赛者穿过马达加斯加。在比赛结束时，任何技巧或漂移都会从你在排行榜上的总时间中减去。通过创建帐户，玩家可以保存到Cruis'n Club，保存他们的姓名、照片和任何汽车的升级，尽管游戏中的每辆车都是单独升级的。

[英文原文]
An arcade racer in the long running Cruis'n racing game series. This game marks the first time licensed cars have been in a Cruis'n game, with cars from Lamborghini, Nissan, Chevrolet, and Hummer. In addition to these cars there are also less serious cars like a police car, jeep, and triceratops. Upon starting a race the player can choose to boost a car's engine, handling, paint, or add an additional Blast.

Cruis'n Blast uses a simplified control system, with only an acceleration pedal, Blast button, and wheel. Briefly releasing the acceleration during a turn will initiate a drift, which will explode into a turbo once the turn is finished. As in previous Cruis'n games double tapping accelerate will hop the car up on two wheels, which will turn into a trick is used to jump over other cars or a ramp. Using a Blast will combine a turbo with a trick. Slamming into AI cars hard enough will destroy them, although any player car is invulnerable.

The five tracks in the game, Death Valley, Madagascar, London, Rio de Janeiro, and Singapore, all have unique aesthetics and events. A tornado and an earthquake both deform the track in Death Valley, a parade of floats get in the way of the race in Rio, and a T-Rex follows the competitors through Madagascar. At the end of a race any tricks or drifts are subtracted from your total time for the leaderboard. By creating an account a player can be saved to the Cruis'n Club, saving their name, photograph, and upgrades to any cars, although every car in the game is upgraded individually.

CyberDiver.bat_name: Cyber Diver   射擊光槍-Cyber Diver
CyberDiver.title: Cyber Diver
CyberDiver.notes:
Cyber Diver是一款在日本街机上发布的多人第一人称射击游戏。它是作为《半条命2：幸存者》的精神继承者而开发的，运行在相同的引擎上，具有相同的团队死亡竞赛游戏玩法。故事发生在一个被称为“网络潜水员”的世界里，人们进入了由GENESYS公司创建的未来虚拟现实环境，为争夺霸权而战。游戏具有多人模式和“单人战斗”模式，一名玩家可以与人工智能控制的敌人作战。多人模式由两支最多10名玩家的队伍（每队5人）进行，目的是使用武器库、特殊能力和爆炸桶等环境危险对敌方队伍造成尽可能大的伤害。虽然如果玩家受到太大伤害，他们可能会被杀死，但对玩家造成的任何伤害也会从球队的整体健康中减去。每轮比赛持续5分钟，当计时器达到零时，剩余生命最多的队伍获胜。玩家可以在本地与同一街机的玩家或通过台东NESYS网络与其他街机的玩家进行比赛。玩家还可以购买NESYS卡来记录他们的游戏统计数据、查看他们的国家排名、保存他们在比赛中的个人设置等。有六个角色类别，或“工作”，可以扮演：通灵师、游侠、守护者、狙击手、医生和傻瓜。每一份工作都是一个具有独特个性和武器装载的角色。任何《半条命2：幸存者》玩家都会熟悉这款游戏的武器库，其中包括冲锋枪、霰弹枪、弩，甚至SLAM（一种可以远程引爆的可投掷爆炸装置）。每个任务还具有一定的生命值、护甲、速度、打击力（近战武器的攻击力）和射击力（投射物或命中扫描武器的伤害）。Psychicer、Ranger、Guardian和Dummy默认可用，而Medic和Sniper只能在玩NESYS卡时解锁。

[英文原文]
Cyber Diver is a multiplayer-focused first-person shooter released in Japanese arcades. It was developed as a spiritual successor to Half-Life 2: Survivor, running on the same engine and featuring the same team deathmatch gameplay. The story takes place in a world where people known as "Cyber Divers" enter a futuristic virtual reality environment created by the GENESYS Corporation to battle each other for supremacy.

The game features a multiplayer mode as well as a "Single Battle" mode where one player can fight against AI-controlled enemies. The multiplayer mode is played by two teams of up to 10 players (5 on each team) with the aim being to deal as much damage to the enemy team as possible using an arsenal of weapons, special abilities, and environmental hazards such as explosive barrels. While players can be killed if they receive too much damage, any damage dealt to a player is also subtracted from their team's overall health. Each round lasts 5 minutes and the team with the most life remaining when the timer reaches zero wins. Matches can be played locally with players in the same arcade or with players in other arcades via Taito's NESYS network. Players can also purchase a NESYS card to record their gameplay stats, view their national ranking, save their personal settings across matches, and more.

There are six character classes, or "Jobs", to play as: Psychicer, Ranger, Guardian, Sniper, Medic, and Dummy. Each Job is a character with a unique personality and weapon loadout. The game's arsenal will be familiar to any Half-Life 2: Survivor player, containing submachine guns, shotguns, crossbows, and even the SLAM (a throwable explosive device that can be detonated remotely). Each Job also has a certain amount of health, armor, speed, striking force (the attack power of melee weapons), and shooting power (the damage of projectile or hitscan weapons). The Psychicer, Ranger, Guardian, and Dummy are available by default, while Medic and Sniper can only be unlocked while playing with a NESYS card.

D1GP.title: D1GP Arcade
D1GP.notes:
D1 Grand Prix Arcade（程式化为D1GP Arcade）是由Yuke开发并由Taito Corporation发行的街机赛车游戏，于2008年9月发布。该游戏于2007年底进行了定位测试，并于2008年9月正式发布。游戏对D1大奖赛的各个方面进行了采样，并展示了其中的一些赛道、车手和赛车。游戏还邀请了铃木真武对玩家的跑步进行“评论”。

[英文原文]
D1 Grand Prix Arcade (stylized as D1GP Arcade) is an arcade racing game developed by Yuke's and published by Taito Corporation, released in September 2008. The game underwent location test in late 2007, and was officially published in September 2008. The game samples various aspects of the D1 Grand Prix, and features some of the tracks, drivers and cars of it. The game also features Manabu Suzuki who "comments" the player's run.

DarkAwakeNesica.bat_name: DARK AWAKE_ The King Has No Name for NESiCAxLive   格鬥-混沌破壞者 NESiCAxLive
DarkAwakeNesica.title: 混沌破壞者 NESiCAxLive
DarkAwakeNesica.notes:
《黑暗觉醒》在台东的Type X街机版上运行，是一款以幻想为主题的基于精灵的2D格斗游戏，角色看起来像是来自《龙与地下城》或《魔兽世界》。玩家选择一个由三个角色组成的团队，就像《斗士之王》系列一样。游戏中有六个不同的种族，包括：人类、黑暗精灵、精灵、奥克、矮人和亡灵。

[英文原文]
Running on Taito's Type X arcade board, Dark Awake  is a fantasy-themed sprite-based 2D fighting game with characters that look to be out of the Dungeon's & Dragons or World of Warcraft realm. Players select a team of three characters, much like in the King of Fighters series. There are six different races featured in the game including: human, dark elf, elf, ork, dwarf and undead.

DOA5.title: 死或生5：終極版
DOA5.notes:
Dead or Alive 5 Ultimate（缩写为DOA5 Ultimate或简称DOA5U）是《死或生》系列中的一款格斗游戏，由Team Ninja开发，由Tecmo Koei于2013年9月在PlayStation 3和Xbox 360上发布。随后在2013年晚些时候推出了街机版。这是Koei Tecmo自2000年《死或生2千年》以来发布的第一款街机游戏。DOA5 Ultimate是2012年《死或生5》的扩展版，融合了PlayStation Vita《死或活5 Plus》的一些功能以及其他内容，包括五个新角色或回归该系列的角色（包括两个忍者盖登角色），一个全面的故事模式，以及游戏系统的调整和扩展，其中许多都是在线多人标签团队模式（包括引入两对两标签团队战斗）。游戏获得了普遍好评。名为《死或生5终极版：核心战士》的免费试玩版DOA5 Ultimate与零售游戏一起在PlayStation Store上发布。街机版Dead or Alive 5 Ultimate:arcade于2013年12月24日发布，由世嘉发行。《终极版》之后是2015年的《死或生5》最后一轮。

[英文原文]
Dead or Alive 5 Ultimate (abbreviated to DOA5 Ultimate or just DOA5U) is a fighting game in the Dead or Alive series, developed by Team Ninja, and released by Tecmo Koei for the PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360 in September 2013. It was followed by an arcade edition later in 2013. It is the first arcade game to be released by Koei Tecmo since Dead or Alive 2 Millenium in 2000.

DOA5 Ultimate is an expanded edition of 2012's Dead or Alive 5, incorporating some features from the PlayStation Vita's Dead or Alive 5 Plus as well as additional content, including five characters that are new or returning to the series (including two Ninja Gaiden characters), a comprehensive story mode, as well as gameplay system tweaks and expansions, many of them in the online multiplayer tag team mode (including an introduction of two-on-two tag team battles). The game received generally favorable reviews.

A free-to-play cut version of DOA5 Ultimate, titled Dead or Alive 5 Ultimate: Core Fighters, was released on the PlayStation Store alongside the retail game. The arcade edition Dead or Alive 5 Ultimate: Arcade was released on 24 December 2013, distributed by Sega. Ultimate was followed by Dead or Alive 5 Last Round in 2015.

DOA6.title: 死或生6
DOA6.notes:
DEAD OR ALIVE 6是一款快节奏的3D格斗游戏，由Koei Tecmo Games制作，具有令人惊叹的图形和多层次的舞台，创造了一种真正有趣的竞争体验。[介绍DOA系列]《死或生》系列是由Koei Tecmo Games的NINJA团队制作的AAA级格斗游戏系列。由快节奏的3D格斗游戏组成，始于1996年的《死或生》街机游戏，此后出现在世界各地的众多游戏机和街机上。在《死或生6》中，DOA的世界比以往任何时候都更加充满活力，具有增强的视觉效果和更新的战斗系统，旨在提供最高水平的新战斗娱乐。[故事]故事将围绕《死或生5》的事件展开，重点讲述两个独立的主要故事；即“忍者和道泰克”与“多诺万领导的麻省理工学院”之间的战斗，以及第六届生死锦标赛期间发生的事件。还将为回归的角色添加新的支线故事情节。[新的视觉效果]借助新的图形引擎，DOA6旨在将格斗游戏的视觉娱乐提升到一个全新的水平。这些图形既美观又逼真，展现出增强的面部表情，如人物模型上汗水和污垢的描绘等特效，以及逼真的热门效果。[三角系统]按照传统，《死或生6》中的打斗是基于三角系统的：击打、击打、保持和保持。适时发起攻击，击败对手的攻击，比如在对手试图投掷时发起攻击，将导致高反击攻击并造成更多伤害。[新战斗力学-刹车系统]在这个新的标题中，我们将在《死或生》系列中引入一个新的特殊移动量规（断裂量规），为战斗增添了一种新的戏剧性战略元素。即使对于刚接触格斗游戏的人来说，这个元素也是易于访问和使用的，只需按下[RB]按钮即可激活。[打破打击]一个强大的、高伤害的特殊动作，可以击倒你的对手。该动作的第一部分还可以抵御来袭的攻击，既可以作为进攻动作，也可以作为防守动作！[暂停]一种方便的反击技巧，也可以在玩家严重昏迷时使用。由于其光损伤输出，它只能在紧张的情况下使用。[致命冲刺]一个强大的组合，带有戏剧性的收尾动作，通过连续按下[RB]按钮激活。虽然它易于初学者使用，但经验丰富的竞争对手也可以以多种创造性的方式使用它。[新危险区][隆隆声危险]如果撞到旁观者，他们会把球员推回舞台中央。这是一个将真正的街头斗争氛围与战略相结合的陷阱。[大规模杀伤]如果对手被“重击”或“致命冲刺”击倒在一大堆箱子或桶里，将导致巨大的链式爆炸。这将导致巨大的破坏，并产生令人兴奋的冲动。

[英文原文]
DEAD OR ALIVE 6 is fast-paced 3D fighting game, produced by Koei Tecmo Games, featuring stunning graphics and multi-tiered stages that create a truly entertaining competitive experience.

[Introducing the DOA Series]
The DEAD OR ALIVE franchise is a AAA fighting game series produced by Koei Tecmo Games' Team NINJA. Composed of fast-paced 3D fighting games that began with the original DEAD OR ALIVE arcade game in 1996, and have since appeared on a multitude of consoles and arcade machines around the world. In DEAD OR ALIVE 6, the world of DOA is brought back more vibrant than ever, featuring both enhanced visuals and an updated combat systems, aimed to provide the highest possible level of new fighting entertainment.

[Story]
The story will follow the events of DEAD OR ALIVE 5, focusing on 2 separate main narratives; namely, the battle between “Ninja and DOATEC” versus “M.I.S.T. lead by Donovan”, and the events that occur during the 6th DEAD OR ALIVE Tournament. New side story episodes will also be added for returning characters.

[The New Visuals]
With the help of a new graphics engine, DOA6 aims to bring visual entertainment of fighting games to an entirely new level. The graphics are made to be both enticingly beautiful and realistic, bringing out enhanced facial expressions, such special effects as depiction of sweat and dirt on character models, and realistic hit effects.

[The Triangle System]
Following the tradition, fights in DEAD OR ALIVE 6 are based on a triangle system: strikes beat throws, throws beat holds, and holds beat strikes. Landing a well-timed attack of the type that beats your opponent’s attack, like landing a strike when an opponent tries to throw, will result in a Hi Counter attack and do more damage.

[New Combat Mechanics - Break System]
In this new title, we are introducing a new Special Move Gauge (Break Gauge) to the DEAD OR ALIVE series, adding a new dramatic strategic element to the fights. This element is made to be accessible and easy to use even for people who are new to the world of fighting games, and is activated by simply pressing the [RB] button.

[Break Blow]
A strong, high-damage special move that knocks your opponents down. The first part of the move also parries incoming attacks, working as both an offensive and defensive move!

[Break Hold]
A convenient counter technique that can also be used while the player is heavily stunned. It should only be used in tight situations due to its light-damage output.

[Fatal Rush]
A powerful combo with a dramatic finishing move, activated by consecutively pressing the [RB] button. While it is made to be easy to use for beginner players, it can also be employed in more than one creative way by the experienced competitors.

[New Danger Zones]
[Rumble Danger]
If knocked into onlookers, they will push the player back into the center of the stage. It is a trap that combines the atmosphere of a real street fight with strategy.

[Mass-Destruction]
If the opponent is knocked back into a large stack of boxes or barrels with a “Break Blow” or ”Fatal Rush” it will cause a large chain-explosion. This will lead to a huge burst of damage and produces an exhilarating rush.

DaemonBrideExboard.bat_name: Daemon Bride _eX-Board_   格鬥-惡魔新娘_eX-Board_
DaemonBrideExboard.title: 惡魔新娘 eX-Board
DaemonBrideExboard.notes:
《Daemon Bride》是Examu的一款鲜为人知的游戏，仅在日本的街机上发行。《Daemon Bride》是一款关于一群与恶魔或天使有契约的高中生的游戏，拥有天使和恶魔主题的平衡阵容。它的特色是一个有着漂亮男孩的女妖和一条魔法蛇的迷人女性，但也有一些更古怪的角色，比如带着愤怒的交换金的帮派成员和带着撒旦作为鸟的狗。

[英文原文]
Daemon Bride is one of the lesser known titles by Examu, released only in arcades in Japan. Sporting a balanced roster with angelic and demonic themes, Daemon Bride is a game about a bunch of high schoolers that have contracts with demons or angels. It features staples such as a succubus with a pretty boy and alluring female with a magic snake, but also more oddball characters such as gang member with angry quid and dog with Satan as a bird.

DaemonBrideAG.title: 惡魔新娘 意外收获
DaemonBrideAG.notes:
《Daemon Bride》是Examu的第二个电子游戏系列，其玩法与前作《Arcana Heart》大不相同。例如，虽然角色是搭档在一起的，但它们不能像《Arcana Heart》那样互换，而且游戏也更加强调基于投射物的战斗。虽然它从未见过主机版本，但Examu在即将到来的《额外增益》之前发布了各种单曲、戏剧CD，甚至还有修订版。

[英文原文]
Daemon Bride is Examu's second videogame series and play much differently from it's predecessor Arcana Heart. For example while characters are partnered together, they are not interchangeable like in Arcana Heart, also the game puts a bit more emphasis on projectile based combat. While it never saw a console release Examu released various singles, drama CDs, and even a revision prior to the upcoming Additional Gain.

DariusBurst.bat_name: Dariusburst_ Another Chronicle   射擊-大流士爆裂 編年史救世主
DariusBurst.title: 大流士爆裂 編年史救世主
DariusBurst.notes:
1904 D.C.（大流士历）——当贝尔塞病毒将超空间网络撕裂时，人类太空舰队中所有有网络连接的飞船都被剥夺了所有通信能力。随后的混乱使整个舰队在一眨眼之间就被摧毁了。银鹰战斗机是大流士星球上唯一逃脱大屠杀的飞船。这两艘配备了Burst技术的尖端飞船被委托给人形AI终端Ti2和试飞员Riga Pratica。在没有网络支持的情况下，这两位英雄独自驾驶银鹰爆发战斗机进入敌方领土，冒着压倒性的困难为大流士争取胜利和解放。现在是华盛顿特区1910年，对超空间网络的修复已经开始重新连接分散在广阔太空中的人类口袋。从大流士传送的战斗数据很快就看到了在每个有人居住的星系中建造的配备了Burste的银鹰战斗机。人类大反攻的舞台已经准备好了。一群英雄振翅高飞，飞向战场，书写历史。

[英文原文]
1904 D.C. (Darius Calendar)— When a Belser virus rent the hyperspace network to tatters, every craft in the human space fleet with a network link was stripped of all communications capabilities. The ensuing chaos saw the entire fleet devastated in the blink of an eye. The Silver Hawk fighters were the only craft from Planet Darius to escape the massacre. Equipped with Burst technology, these two cutting-edge craft were entrusted to humanoid AI terminal Ti2 and test pilot Riga Pratica. Flying the Silver Hawk Burst fighters alone into enemy territory without network support, the two heroes braved overwhelming odds to secure victory and liberation for Darius.

It is now 1910 D.C., and repairs on the hyperspace network have begun to reconnect the pockets of humanity scattered across the vast reaches of space. Combat data transmitted from Darius soon sees Burstequipped Silver Hawk fighters constructed in every inhabited galaxy. The stage is set for mankind’s grand counteroffensive. A team of heroes takes wing, flying into battle and the pages of history.

DarkEscape4D.bat_name: Dark Escape 4D 光槍射擊-暗黑逃生4D
DarkEscape4D.title: 暗黑逃生4D
DarkEscape4D.notes:
与NAMCO的恐怖射击游戏Dark Escape 4D一起面对你的恐惧。这款新的3D游戏独树一帜。戴着抗菌涂层的3D眼镜，玩家试图通过用疯子提供的武器射击来逃离疯子生病和扭曲的游戏。实验生物和亡灵生物从游戏柜的46英寸高清屏幕上跃出。玩家可以选择玩四个以恐惧为主题的阶段中的任何一个。一旦所有四个阶段都完成，第五阶段将获得额外奖励。游戏知道你什么时候害怕恐慌传感器在屏幕上显示每个玩家的心率，并记录每次恐慌发作。你不仅能看到怪物，还能感觉到它们！通过前后内置的鼓风机，玩家可以在脖子后面感受到追赶僵尸的气息，或者在怪物向他们扑来时感受到脸上的一股气流。重型后坐炮和隆隆声座椅提供了额外的恐怖元素，与游戏的沉浸式游戏相辅相成。每个玩家都有自己的5.1声道环绕声扬声器（总共七个+一个低音扬声器），这样他们就可以真正体验到来自周围的恐怖。所有这些强大的功能相结合，创造了有史以来最独特、最可怕的街机游戏体验之一！

[英文原文]
Face your fears with NAMCO's horror shooter, Dark Escape 4D. This new 3D game is in a class of its own. Wearing anti-bacterial coated 3D glasses, players try to escape from a mad man's sick and twisted game by shooting their way out with weapons that he provides. Experimental creatures and the undead leap from the game cabinet's 46" high definition screen.

Players can choose to play any of the four fear-themed stages. A bonus fifth stage is available once all four stages are completed.

THE GAME KNOWS WHEN YOU ARE SCARED
Panic sensors display each player's heart rate on the screen and records every panic attack.

YOU DON'T JUST SEE THE MONSTERS, YOU FEEL THEM TOO!
With built-in air blowers in the front and back, players feel the breath of a chasing zombie on the back of their necks or a blast of air on their face when a monster lunges at them. Heavy recoil guns and a rumble seat provide additional terrifying elements that complement the game's immersive game play.

Each player has their own 5.1 channel surround sound speakers (a total of seven + a woofer) so they can truly experience the terror coming from all around.

All of these intense features combine to create one of the most unique and frightening arcade gaming experiences ever!

Daytona3.bat_name: Daytona Championship USA   競速-夢遊美國冠軍賽
Daytona3.title: 夢遊美國冠軍賽
Daytona3.notes:
美国代托纳锦标赛是街机赛车的圣杯——这款全新的参赛作品于1993年首次推出，将世嘉的第一赛车带入了21世纪！美国代托纳锦标赛有三条全新赛道，其中包括重新翻修的代托纳国际赛道！此外，原有的三门经典课程已为现代时代重新制作。新的游戏功能包括实时摄像头，这样你就可以在超越朋友时享受最大的吹牛权利！美国代托纳锦标赛的全新产品是受“直播电视”启发的视频广告牌。这个全新的功能让观众可以看到比赛中发生了什么，无论是撞车、传球还是找出谁赢谁输！你有什么需要再次拿起国旗。…因为DAYTONA回来了！

[英文原文]
Daytona Championship USA is the holy grail of arcade racing - First launched in 1993, this brand new entry brings Sega’s #1 racer screeching into the 21st century! Daytona Championship USA features three brand new tracks including a recreation of the newly renovated DAYTONA International Speedway! In addition, the original three classic courses have been remastered for the modern era. New game features include a live camera feed so you can enjoy maximum bragging rights as you overtake your friends! Brand new to Daytona Championship USA is the ‘Live TV’ inspired video billboard. This brand new feature allows spectators to see what’s happening in the race, whether it’s a crash, a pass for position or to find out who’s winning or losing! Have you got what it takes to take the flag again.... because DAYTONA is back!

Daytona3NSE.bat_name: Daytona Championship USA - NSE   競速-夢遊美國冠軍賽NSE
Daytona3NSE.title: 夢遊美國冠軍賽NSE
Daytona3NSE.notes:
这款软件更新充满了令人兴奋的新功能，将史诗般的美国代托纳锦标赛游戏体验提升到了一个全新的水平。*改进的汽车操控-让玩家更好地控制他们的汽车，感觉更接近所有的动作。*新的动态游戏内相机-这项新功能让玩家能够以动态相机角度体验比赛，使游戏感觉更加自然。*新的图形和改进的照明——这两个功能与动态游戏内摄像头相结合，提供了明亮、清晰和现代的游戏体验。*新车模型和损伤建模-玩家可以用新车挑战他们的朋友，见证令人瞠目结舌的撞车事故和汽车损坏。*新的前三名比赛亮点-此功能通过让玩家知道他们相对于竞争对手的比赛位置，将代托纳的竞技游戏精神带到了前面。*新车涂装——新涂装使所有汽车看起来都很新鲜，吸引了现有和新玩家。*更新了实时玩家摄像头——这改进了实时超车摄像头系统，让玩家展示他们的比赛面孔，感觉更接近比赛！

[英文原文]
Packed with exciting new features, this software update takes the epic Daytona Championship USA gameplay experience to a whole new level.

* Improved Car Handling – Lets players have greater control of their car and feel even closer to all the action.
* New Dynamic In-Game Camera – This new feature lets players experience the race with dynamic camera angles making the gameplay feel more natural.
* New Graphics and Improved Lighting – These two features combined with the dynamic in-game camera deliver a bright, crisp and modern gameplay.
* New Car Models and Damage Modelling – Players can challenge their friends with new cars and witness jaw-dropping crashes and damage to cars.
* New Top 3 Race Highlights – This feature brings Daytona’s competitive game sprit to the front by letting players know their race position in relation to their competitors.
* New Car Liveries – New liveries make all the cars look fresh attracting existing and new players.
* Updated Live Player Camera – This improves the live overtake camera system, letting players show their race face and feel closer to the action!

DeadHeat.bat_name: Dead Heat   競速-極致白熱
DeadHeat.title: 極致白熱
DeadHeat.notes:
Dead Heat（在日本称为Maximum Heat）是一款由Polygon Magic开发的顶级街机赛车游戏，由Namco Bandai于2010年10月19日（在北美）和2011年4月20日（在日本）为街机（使用基于PC的Namco System ES1硬件）发布。《Dead Heat》是一款快节奏的街头赛车游戏，由最初的《Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune》背后的工作室制作，玩家可以在四个城市（纽约、芝加哥、旧金山和伦敦）中的一个城市参加高强度八人制比赛，拥有各种现实生活中的汽车（包括调谐器车，在美国版中还有肌肉车）。它包括一个用于加速、高速漂流、多次跳跃和障碍的亚硝酸系统，以及一个基于PIN的进度系统（允许玩家自定义他们的车辆）。与Namco Bandai当时的一些其他赛车和汽车游戏（如Mario Kart Arcade GP 2和Tank！Tank！Tank！）类似，游戏机在每个显示器上方都有一个摄像头，可以拍摄玩家的照片，用于（向他人）指示其车辆的驾驶员。玩家可以选择让他们的照片在未来的比赛中作为该机器的CPU竞争对手出现。日本版游戏还包括一个可选的安装式头罩（带偏振镜头），用于立体3D模式。该游戏后来于2013年在北美推出了一款以摩托车为主题的续集，名为《Dead Heat Riders》。它保留了大部分相同的游戏机制和界面，以及四个地区。虽然原版游戏的配乐由Yuzo Koshiro（因Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune而闻名）创作，但续集的配乐由Hideki Naganuma（因Jet Set Radio而闻名）制作。

[英文原文]
Dead Heat (known in Japan as Maximum Heat) is an over-the-top arcade car street racing game developed by Polygon Magic and released by Namco Bandai for arcades (using PC-based Namco System ES1 hardware) on October 19, 2010 (in North America) and April 20, 2011 (in Japan).

A fast-paced street racing game from the studio behind the original Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune, Dead Heat puts players in high-octane eight-player races in one of four cities (New York, Chicago, San Francisco, and London) with a wide selection of real-life cars (including tuner cars and, in the US version, muscle cars). It includes a nitrous system for speed boosts, high-speed drifting, numerous jumps and obstacles, and a PIN-based progression system (allowing players to customize their vehicles).

Similar to some of Namco Bandai's other racing and vehicle games at the time (such as Mario Kart Arcade GP 2 and Tank! Tank! Tank!), the game machine includes a camera above each display that takes a picture of the player, which is used to indicate (to others) the driver of their vehicle. Players can opt to have their photo appear as CPU rivals for that machine in future races. The Japanese version of the game also includes an optional mounted head visor (with polarized lenses) for a stereoscopic 3D mode.

The game later received a motorbike-focused sequel in North America in 2013, titled Dead Heat Riders. It retains much of the same gameplay mechanics and interface, as well as the four locales. While the original game features a soundtrack by Yuzo Koshiro (of Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune fame), the sequel features a soundtrack by Hideki Naganuma (of Jet Set Radio fame).

DeadHeatRiders.bat_name: Dead Heat Riders   競速-極致白熱車手
DeadHeatRiders.title: 極致白熱車手
DeadHeatRiders.notes:
基于Bandai Namco广受欢迎的《Dead Heat Street Racing》街机游戏，《Dead Heat Riders》采用了同样令人兴奋的、并驾齐驱的赛车前提，并将其应用于摩托车赛车。骑上你的自行车，在开发团队亲自调查的4个非常详细的城市中比赛。就像Dead Heat街头赛车游戏一样，放大纽约、芝加哥、伦敦和旧金山的街道，但现在每个城市都有不同的球场。骑在重新设计的摩托车旋转座椅上时，从5种不同的超级摩托车中选择。另一个伟大的功能是Namco的专利软件技术，该技术可以分析和存储注册玩家的驾驶风格，后来将注册玩家模仿为“幽灵司机”。这允许当前的玩家与之前的驱动器进行比赛，即使他们不在身边。这款游戏还采用了经过彻底修改的配乐，旨在与每场比赛的激烈程度相匹配。使用内置摄像头享受更多社交比赛！这会为玩家拍摄一张照片，并使用这张照片在比赛中实时识别你的车和你正在与之比赛的其他玩家。

[英文原文]
Based on Bandai Namco’s popular Dead Heat Street Racing arcade game, Dead Heat Riders takes that same exciting, neck-and-neck racing premise and applies it to motorcycle racing.

Hop on your bike to race through 4 incredibly detailed cities, which were personally surveyed by the development team. Just like the Dead Heat street racing game, zoom through the streets of New York, Chicago, London and San Francisco but now on different courses through each city. Select from 5 different superbikes as you ride on a recreated motorcycle swivel seat.

Another great feature is found with Namco’s patented software technology that analyses and stores registered players driving styles, later mimicking registered players as “ghost drivers”. This allows current players to race against previous drives, even when they are not around.

This title also features a completely revamped soundtrack, designed to match the white knuckle intensity of each race.

Enjoy more social racing with the Integrated Camera! This takes a picture of the players and uses that photo to identify your car and other players you are racing against in real-time during the race.

DSPS.bat_name: Deadstorm Pirates Special 光槍射擊-海盜大冒險 特別版
DSPS.title: 海盜大冒險 特別版
DSPS.notes:
Deadstorm Pirates特别版街机采用了街机最受欢迎的Deadstorm海盗，添加了额外的内容，并将其放在一个全新的2人封闭式展台柜中。特别版机柜现在在驾驶室的前部有一个巨大的发光头骨，游戏增加了两个全新的关卡，并解锁了原始游戏中的奖励关卡，供所有人玩。有七个阶段可供选择，还有一个全新的结局，玩家将一遍又一遍地玩Deadstorm Pirates特别版。一起玩或独自骑行，与海浪和怪物作战，在射击大炮时感受反冲。这个游戏在相当长的一段时间内已经证明了它在玩家中的受欢迎程度。凭借其明亮的橱柜和令人兴奋的游戏玩法，Deadstorm Pirates吸引了来自各个年龄段和技能水平的玩家。

[英文原文]
Deadstorm Pirates Special Edition arcade machine takes the swashbuckling arcade favorite, Deadstorm Pirates, adding extra content and puts it in a brand new 2 player closed booth cabinet. The Special Edition cabinet now features a large lit up skull on the front of the cab, and the game adds two brand new stages as well as unlocking the bonus stage found in the original game for all to play. With seven stages to choose from and a brand new ending, players will be playing Deadstorm Pirates Special Edition over and over again. Play together or ride solo, as you battle waves and monsters, feeling the recoil as you fire your canon. This game has proven its popularity with players over quite some time. With its bright cabinet and exciting gameply, Deadstorm Pirates draws in players of all ages and skill levels from all across the floor.

DealOrNoDealDeluxe.bat_name: Deal Or NoDeal Deluxe   益智-一擲千金豪華版
DealOrNoDealDeluxe.title: 一擲千金豪華版
