Deathsmiles2.bat_name: Deathsmiles II_ Makai no Merry Christmas
Deathsmiles2.title: Deathsmiles II: Makai no Merry Christmas
Deathsmiles2.notes:
《死亡之笑II》：马卡伊没有圣诞快乐魔界のメリークリスマス,点燃。《冥界的圣诞快乐》是日本开发商Cave于2009年发布的一款横向滚动射击街机游戏。这是第三个使用水平方向显示器播放的洞穴射击游戏（之前是Progear和最初的Deathsmiles）。《死亡微笑2》也是第一款使用多边形而不是传统精灵作为图形的CAVE街机游戏。

[英文原文]
Deathsmiles II: Makai no Merry Christmas (デススマイルズII 魔界のメリークリスマス, lit. Netherworld's Merry Christmas) is a horizontal side scrolling shoot 'em up arcade game by Japanese developer Cave, released in 2009. It is the third Cave shoot 'em up to be played using a horizontally-oriented monitor (preceded by Progear and the original Deathsmiles). Deathsmiles II is also the first CAVE arcade game to use polygons instead of their traditional sprites for graphics.

DengekiBunkoFightingClimax.bat_name: Dengeki Bunko_ Fighting Climax APM3 Edition   射擊-電擊文庫戰鬥巔峯APM3
DengekiBunkoFightingClimax.title: 電擊文庫戰鬥巔峯APM3
DengekiBunkoFightingClimax.notes:
Dengeki Bunko: Fighting Climax is a 2D arcade fighting game developed by Ecole Software and French Bread and published by Sega. The game celebrates the 20th anniversary of ASCII Media Works' Dengeki Bunko imprint, featuring various characters from light novels published under the imprint. The game was first released in Japanese arcades in March 2014. The game's theme song is "Belief" by Mami Kawada.

An updated version of the game, titled Dengeki Bunko: Fighting Climax Ignition, was released in July 2015. The update contains additional characters and more balanced gameplay.The updated version was released on PlayStation 3, PlayStation 4 and PlayStation Vita in December 2015 only in Japan. The updated version's theme song is "ID" by LiSA.  Unlike the first Dengeki Bunko, Ignition was never localized. However, an unofficial English patch for PS3 as well as a modified arcade rip with English translations and rollback netcode for Windows are available.

DenshaDeGo.bat_name: Densha de Go__   競速-電車GO
DenshaDeGo.title: 電車GO
DenshaDeGo.notes:
Released after the PS2 game launch for Windows XP

Coverage: (the complete) Yamanote Line, (Rapid) Chūō Line, (the complete) Osaka Loop Line, and (much of the) Tōkaidō Main Line (specifically, the JR Kyoto Line and JR Kobe Line). The (Rapid) Chūō Line as modeled represents the period during which the tracks west of Mitaka were undergoing substantial engineering work connected to the eventual (and now completed) track elevation project.

At first glance, features more arcade-like gameplay, due to its system of chained points; despite that the gameplay is relaxed.
Features a large number of trains and the most advanced and detailed graphics of the series (although many textures look artificial and undersaturated).

Trains can be seen from external views, but there are again no internal cabs.

Gameplay innovations include conductor mode where the player acts as station announcer and door opener rather than driver. This requires the user to have memorized (or have readily available) a list of the stations.

There appears to be relatively little time and intra-station compression in this game - distances are more prototypical. Furthermore, scheduled routes and timetables are more prototypical.

Each line was ported to the PSP as an individual game, under the Densha de Go! Pocket titles

DenshaDeGoRetro.bat_name: Densha de Go__ _DDG 1 _ DDG 2 Retro_   競速-電車GO_DDG 1 _ DDG 2 Retro_
DenshaDeGoRetro.title: 電車でGO！DDG1 DDG2
DenshaDeGoRetro.notes:
在Windows XP的PS2游戏发布后发布覆盖范围：（完整）山手线、（快速）Chūō线、（完整）大阪环线和（大部分）东海本线（特别是JR京都线和JR神户线）。所建模的（快速）Chūō线代表了三鹰以西的轨道正在进行与最终（现已完成）轨道升级项目相关的大量工程工作的时期。乍一看，由于其链式点数系统，其游戏玩法更像街机；尽管游戏玩法很放松。以大量的火车和该系列中最先进、最详细的图形为特色（尽管许多纹理看起来是人造的、不饱和的）。从外部可以看到火车，但内部也没有司机室。游戏玩法创新包括指挥模式，玩家扮演电台播音员和开门者，而不是司机。这要求用户记住（或随时可用）电台列表。在这个游戏中，时间和站内压缩似乎相对较少——距离更典型。此外，预定的路线和时间表更具原型性。每一行都被移植到PSP作为一个单独的游戏，在Densha de Go！袖珍标题

[英文原文]
Released after the PS2 game launch for Windows XP

Coverage: (the complete) Yamanote Line, (Rapid) Chūō Line, (the complete) Osaka Loop Line, and (much of the) Tōkaidō Main Line (specifically, the JR Kyoto Line and JR Kobe Line). The (Rapid) Chūō Line as modeled represents the period during which the tracks west of Mitaka were undergoing substantial engineering work connected to the eventual (and now completed) track elevation project.

At first glance, features more arcade-like gameplay, due to its system of chained points; despite that the gameplay is relaxed.
Features a large number of trains and the most advanced and detailed graphics of the series (although many textures look artificial and undersaturated).

Trains can be seen from external views, but there are again no internal cabs.

Gameplay innovations include conductor mode where the player acts as station announcer and door opener rather than driver. This requires the user to have memorized (or have readily available) a list of the stations.

There appears to be relatively little time and intra-station compression in this game - distances are more prototypical. Furthermore, scheduled routes and timetables are more prototypical.

Each line was ported to the PSP as an individual game, under the Densha de Go! Pocket titles

DinoKing.bat_name: Dino King Battle_ King of Jurassic 小遊戲-恐龍王者_侏羅紀霸主爭霸賽
DinoKing.title: 恐龍王者 侏羅紀霸主爭霸賽
DinoKing.notes: Dino King Battle is a trading card arcade game developed by Taito and sold by Kids Medal Game, or by D-Gate in South Korea, and sold by Taito in Japan. The title in Korea is "공룡왕" (literally translated as "Dinosaur King"). In Japan, the trading card game version service ended on July 31, 2008, but in South Korea it is still available as of 2012. Both the medal game and card game were released in 2005, but the medal game version was released earlier, around spring.

DirtyDrivin.title: Dirty Drivin’
DirtyDrivin.notes:
Dirty Drivin是一款结合了经典街机元素的高能战斗赛车游戏。我们拥有疯狂的定制车辆、毁灭性和狡猾的武器、充满能量的史诗般的环境，以及对道路规则的鲁莽无视。所有这些都可以归结为一次美妙的骑行。Dirty Drivin'功能：•14首令人震惊的曲目•10次极其狂野的骑行•100款令人惊叹的车辆升级•可连接8个位置•使用我们的标准PIN帐户系统，玩家可以创建个人资料来保存他们的游戏进度•Dirty Drivin具有真正的高清分辨率、42英寸1080p显示屏和光滑的引人注目的橱柜。与所有《Raw Thrills》游戏一样，《Dirty Drivin》的设计从一开始就注重可靠性和耐用性。

[英文原文]
Dirty Drivin’ is a high energy combat racing game that combines classic arcade ingredients. We’ve got insane custom vehicles, devastating and devious weapons, epic environments sprinkled liberally with power-ups and a reckless disregard for the rules of the road. All of which boils down to a deliciously sweet ride.

Dirty Drivin’ features:

• 14 outrageous tracks
• 10 extremely wild rides
• 100’s of awesome vehicle upgrades
• Linkable to 8 positions
• Using our standard PIN account system, players can create profiles to save their game progress
• Dirty Drivin’ features true hi-def resolution, a 42″ 1080p display, and a slick attention-grabbing cabinet. As with all Raw Thrills games, Dirty Drivin’ is designed from the ground up for reliability and durability.

DoNotFallRunforYourDrink.title: 不要掉下去
DoNotFallRunforYourDrink.notes:
《Do Not Fall》是一款紧张刺激的动作平台游戏。扮演一个生活在特殊自动售货机内的无畏冒险家，你将穿越七个不同的冒险世界，收集足够的原料来生产和分配机器的饮料！这听起来和看起来都很容易，但玩家需要证明他们的反射足够快，以避免沿途消失的瓷砖、障碍物和陷阱。玩家将尽一切努力避免被撞倒或从水面上掉下来！如果你想用你的技能在不同的多人游戏模式下挑战其他玩家，也可以进行多人游戏。所以，召集你的朋友，开始一场精彩的战斗，看看谁将成为“在场上”的国王。

[英文原文]
Do Not Fall is an intense and thrilling action-platform game. Playing as a fearless adventurer who lives inside a special vending machine, you will go through seven different adventure worlds to collect enough ingredients to produce and dispense the drink for the machine!

It might sound and look easy, but player will need to prove their reflex is quick enough to avoid disappearing tiles, obstacles, and traps along the way. The player will do whatever it takes to avoid being knocked off or drop from the surface!

Multiplayer is also available if you want to take your skills to challenge other players in different multiplayer game mode. So gather your friends and start an awesome battle to see who will be the king “on”the floor.

DoodleJump.bat_name: Doodle Jump 平臺-塗鴉跳躍
DoodleJump.title: 平臺-塗鴉跳躍
DoodleJump.notes:
The goal of Doodle Jump is simple: get as high as possible. There's no real end - just death. The player takes on the role of Doodler, a little four-legged thing which constantly bounces off the platforms the levels of the game consists off. Of course the platforms aren't just neatly arranged so that the Doodler can blindly make his way up. Instead the player has to guide around the little fellow through the automatically generated levels by tilting the device in the desired direction. The gameplay is based on PapiJump.

Besides the constant threat of falling down either by missing a platform or landing on a platform that breaks on contact or explodes after a while, other obstacles await the Doodler. Monster (including bosses), UFOs and Black holes are a constant threat to the highscore. To deal with some of them, Doodler shoots stuff out of his nose when the player taps the screen making it possible to take out the enemies lurking above. In addition power-ups are available like the shield that makes the Doodler immune for a few seconds and various different kinds of speed-enhancers including spring shoes and a jetpack.

dbzenkai.bat_name: Dragon Ball Zenkai Battle Royale 格鬥-龍珠ZENKA_殊死戰
dbzenkai.title: 龍珠ZENKA 殊死戰
dbzenkai.notes:
龙珠：善凯之战（Doragon Bōru Zenkai Batoru，点燃。龙珠：全速战斗）是一款2011年街机格斗视频游戏。2015年，街机游戏进行了更新，更名为《龙珠：真开之战》，并于2015年夏天发布，最初名为《龙球：真开大逃杀》。 Zenkai Battle的战斗系统与龙珠Z的战斗系统相似：Tenkaichi Tag Team。这是第一款能够让角色在地面上实际奔跑的全3D格斗游戏（与武道财系列中的悬停在地面上不同）。Zenkai Battle也是一个里程碑，因为它是第一个使用GGPO网络代码的商业3D游戏。单人模式包括大逃杀和团队战斗，双人模式包括团队战斗。两者都可以作为国家对战模式在网上进行，在此期间，“龙珠争夺战”战斗随机发生：在战斗royale模式下，在“龙珠角逐”中获得第一名的人获得一个龙珠，在团队战斗模式下的“龙珠竞争”中获胜的一对各获得一个龙珠。当收集到七个龙珠时，会解锁一个特殊奖励（例如毁灭之神比鲁斯等可玩角色）。可以让可玩角色穿不同的服装。他们所有的服装都可以改变调色板，并且可以为任何角色添加额外的配件，如Roshi大师的太阳镜和光环。一些替代服装是：Gohan穿着战损服装，Yamcha穿着土匪服装，撒旦先生穿着披风服装，Majin Buu穿着睡衣。

[英文原文]
Dragon Ball: Zenkai Battle (ドラゴンボール　ゼンカイバトル Doragon Bōru　Zenkai Batoru, lit. Dragon Ball: Full-Throttle Battle) is a 2011 arcade fighting video game. In 2015, the arcade game received an update, it was renamed to Dragon Ball: Zenkai Battle and has been released in the summer of 2015 and it was originally Dragon Ball: Zenkai Battle Royale (ドラゴンボール　ＺＥＮＫＡＩバトルロイヤル Doragon Bōru　Zenkai Batoru Roiyaru). 

Zenkai Battle features a similar fighting system to that of Dragon Ball Z: Tenkaichi Tag Team. It is the first full 3D fighting game that enables characters to actually run on the ground (contrary to hovering above it like in the Budokai Tenkaichi series). Zenkai Battle also marks a milestone as it is the first commercial 3D title to use GGPO netcode. The single-player modes include battle royale and team battle, and the two-player modes include team battle. Both can be played online as national vs. mode, during which "Competition for Dragon Balls" battles randomly occur: the person who gets first place in a "Competition for Dragon Balls" in battle royale mode gets one Dragon Ball, and the winning pair of the "Competition for Dragon Balls" in team-battle mode get one Dragon Ball each. When seven Dragon Balls are collected, a special bonus is unlocked (such as playable characters like the God of Destruction Beerus).

It is possible to make playable characters wear different outfits. All of their outfits can have their color palette changed and additional accessories, such as Master Roshi's sunglasses and halos, can be added to any character. Some of the alternate outfits are: Gohan in his battle damaged outfit, Yamcha in his bandit outfit, Mr. Satan in his caped outfit, and Majin Buu in his pyjamas.

DragonDanceNesica.bat_name: Dragon Dance for NESiCAxLive   益智-龍舞彈珠
DragonDanceNesica.title: 龍舞彈珠
DragonDanceNesica.notes:
*要更改密钥，请右键单击并运行Controlls Configuration**按键：K/、/M/。用于方向，Z/X/C/A/S/D用于按钮，5+1用于硬币+开始，ESC用于退出

[英文原文]
* To change keys , right click and run Controlls Configuration

** KEYS : K/,/M/. for direction , Z/X/C/A/S/D for buttons , 5 + 1 for Coins + Start , ESC for Exit

Drakons.bat_name: Drakons_ Realm Keepers   射擊光槍-龍族-王國守護者
Drakons.title: 龍族-王國守護者
Drakons.notes:
乘坐一条巨大的龙翱翔，射击敌人，征服新的领域，在这场激动人心的高空飞行中，从肾上腺素娱乐，Drakons:领域守护者。有趣的是，两名玩家在面对黑暗魔法的同时，感受骑龙的高飞兴奋。当你踏上穿越神秘世界的激动人心的旅程时，参与史诗般的老板之战，让你珍惜生命。“Drakons:Realm Keepers”提供了令人心跳加速的动作和令人惊叹的视觉效果，使其成为所有冒险者和龙爱好者的必玩之作。准备好在这场史诗般的奇幻冒险中释放你内心的英雄，成为传奇的王国守护者！

[英文原文]
Soar on a gigantic dragon, shoot enemies, and conquer new realms in this thrilling, high-flying ride from Adrenaline Amusements, Drakons: Realm Keepers. Fun for two players, feel the high-flying excitement of riding a dragon while facing off against dark magic. Engage in epic boss battles that have you holding on for dear life as you embark on an exhilarating journey through mystical worlds. “Drakons: Realm Keepers” delivers heart-pounding action and breathtaking visuals, making it a must-play for all adventure seekers and dragon enthusiasts. Get ready to unleash your inner hero and become a legendary Realm Keeper in this epic fantasy adventure!

SDR.bat_name: Dream Raiders 射擊光槍-盜夢英雄
SDR.title: 盗梦英雄
SDR.notes:
潜入梦幻般的冒险世界！登上这台造型精美的梦想机器，将兴奋提升到一个新的水平。选择您的梦想之旅，尽可能多地突袭宝藏，同时用您的 梦想破灭者抵御奇怪而不可思议的敌人的攻击。成功完成您的突袭，并在激动人心的奖励阶段被带入新的领域。在世嘉这款梦幻般的全新豪华游戏中，九种独特的梦幻体验等待着您。骑龙、驾驶 UFO、骑马或穿上你的超级套装，飞向天空！梦想突袭者提供令人兴奋的令人振奋的体验，每个人都会喜欢。激烈的运动、风、声音和视觉效果相结合，为玩家提供与众不同的街机体验！潜入冒险的梦幻世界！登上这台造型精美的梦想机器，感受一种新的兴奋。选择你的梦想之旅，尽可能多地突袭宝藏，同时用你的梦想爆破器抵御奇怪而不可思议的敌人的攻击。成功完成你的突袭，并在激动人心的奖励阶段被带入新的领域。世嘉这款梦幻般的新豪华游戏为您带来九种独特的梦想体验。骑龙，驾驶不明飞行物，骑马或穿上你的超级西装，飞向天空！Dream Raiders以令人兴奋的混合体验为特色，每个人都会喜欢。激烈的动作、风、声音和视觉的结合，给玩家带来了前所未有的街机体验！

[英文原文]
潜入梦幻般的冒险世界！登上这台造型精美的梦想机器，将兴奋提升到一个新的水平。选择您的梦想之旅，尽可能多地突袭宝藏，同时用您的 Dream Blasters 抵御奇怪而不可思议的敌人的攻击。

成功完成您的突袭，并在激动人心的奖励阶段被带入新的领域。在世嘉这款梦幻般的全新豪华游戏中，九种独特的梦幻体验等待着您。骑龙、驾驶 UFO、骑马或穿上你的超级套装，飞向天空！Dream Raiders 提供令人兴奋的令人振奋的体验，每个人都会喜欢。激烈的运动、风、声音和视觉效果相结合，为玩家提供与众不同的街机体验！
Dive into a dream world of adventures! Climb on board this beautifully modelled dream machine and be transported to a new level of excitement. Choose your dream ride and raid as many treasures as you can whilst fending off attacks by strange and incredible enemies with your Dream Blasters.

Successfully complete your raid and be carried off into new realms in thrilling bonus stages. Nine unique dream experiences await you in this fantastic new deluxe game from Sega. Ride a dragon, pilot a UFO, get on horseback or put on your super suits and head for the skies! Dream Raiders features an exciting mix of exhilarating experiences that everyone will enjoy. The combination of intense motion, wind, sound and visuals combine to give players an arcade experience like none other!

EXVS2XB.title: 機動戰士高達極限對決2 XBoost
EXVS2XB.notes:
《Mobile Suit Gundam Extreme Vs.2 XBoost》（发音为“Cross Boost”）是街机游戏《Mobile Suit-Gundam Extreme Vs.2》的更新，作为《Extreme Vs.》系列10周年的一部分，于2020年11月进行了内测，然后于2021年3月10日发布。对Burst系统进行了几次更改。虽然战斗和射击爆发将保持不变，但机动性被改变为只提供纯粹的动作提升。Extended和Linkage将合并形成新的Covering Burst，它同样可以用于防御或增强合作伙伴的EX Gauge，并将引入Raging Burst技术，为用户提供超高防护，减少他们在攻击中的错位。新增加的是EX Burst X，当玩家与队友一起激活他们的Burst时。EX Burst X现在将根据他们自己的爆发为团队提供额外的增益。为了帮助玩家协调他们的爆发，游戏现在也显示了合作伙伴的Boost Gauge。除了移动设备的变化外，一些诉讼，如Hambrabi和Hyperion，其成本也发生了变化。当一个角色使用他们的突发攻击时，他们在执行攻击时也会短暂出现他们的面部照片。

[英文原文]
Mobile Suit Gundam Extreme Vs. 2 XBoost (pronounced "Cross Boost") is an update to the arcade game Mobile Suit Gundam Extreme Vs. 2, announced as part of the 10th anniversary of the Extreme Vs. series, with a closed beta test in November 2020, before being released on March 10, 2021.

Several changes were made to the Burst System. While Fighting and Shooting Burst would remain untouched, Mobility was changed to only provide a pure movement boost. Extended and Linkage would be merged to form the new Covering Burst, which can similarly be used defensively or to boost the partner's EX Gauge and Raging Burst would be introduced, which gives its user hyper armor and reduces their stagger from attacks.

A new addition would be the EX Burst X, when the player activates their Burst alongside their teammate. The EX Burst X will now give the team additional buffs based on their own burst.

Likely to help players coordinate their Burst, the game now displays the partner's Boost Gauge as well.

Aside from moveset changes, some suits, such as the Hambrabi and Hyperion, had their cost changed.

When a character uses their Burst Attack, there will also be a short appearance of their mugshot as they perform their attack.

EADP.bat_name: Elevator Action Death Parade 射擊光槍-電梯激戰_槍戰大樓
EADP.title: 電梯激戰 槍戰大樓
EADP.notes:
电梯动作：死亡游行是一款动作游戏，由台东公司开发和发行，于2009年在日本发行。

[英文原文]
Elevator Action: Death Parade is an Action game, developed and published by Taito Corporation, which was released in Japan in 2009.

ElevatorActionInvasion.bat_name: Elevator Action Invasion  射擊光槍-電梯大戰
ElevatorActionInvasion.title: 电梯大战
ElevatorActionInvasion.notes:
这款动感十足的游戏专注于双人射击动作，让您置身于两名全副武装的特工的表演中，他们潜入了一个已被邪恶的半机械人士兵军队占领的设施。瞄准并获得连击以获得最高分，并使用控制面板上的电梯控制在综合体中导航。这款动作游戏专注于双人射击动作，将您带入两名全副武装的特工的表演中，他们渗透到一个被邪恶的半机械人士兵军队占领的设施中。瞄准并获得组合以获得最高分数，并使用控制面板上的电梯控制装置在综合体中导航。

[英文原文]
这款动感十足的游戏专注于双人射击动作，让您置身于两名全副武装的特工的表演中，他们潜入了一个已被邪恶的半机械人士兵军队占领的设施。瞄准并获得连击以获得最高分，并使用控制面板上的电梯控制在综合体中导航。
Focusing on dual player shooting action, this action-packed game puts you into the shows of two well-armed special agents, who infiltrate a facility that has been overtaken by an army of evil cyborg soldiers. Take aim and earn combos to rack up the highest score, and use the elevator controls on the control panel to navigate through the complex.

ElevatorAction.title: 平臺- 電梯迷宮
ElevatorAction.notes:
*要自定义密钥，请右键单击并运行Controlls+General Settings玩家扮演一名间谍，潜入一座满是电梯的建筑。他必须从大楼里收集秘密文件，并使用一系列越来越复杂的电梯穿过大楼的30层。玩家被从紧闭的门后出现的敌方特工追捕。玩家必须通过武力或躲避来智胜他们。成功完成一个关卡需要收集所有秘密文件，并从上到下遍历建筑。在建筑物的较低楼层，电梯系统非常复杂，需要一些解谜技能。

[英文原文]
* To customize keys , right click and run Controlls + General Settings

The player assumes the role of a spy who infiltrates a building filled with elevators. He must collect secret documents from the building and traverse the 30 levels of the building using an increasingly complex series of elevators. The player is pursued by enemy agents who appear from behind closed doors. The player must outwit them via force or evasion. Successful completion of a level involves collecting all the secret documents and traversing the building from top to bottom. In the lower floors of the building, the elevator systems are so complex that some puzzle-solving skills are needed.

EnEinsPerfektewelt.bat_name: En-Eins Perfektewelt for NESiCAxLive   格鬥-完美世界
EnEinsPerfektewelt.title: 完美世界
EnEinsPerfektewelt.notes:
《EN Eins Perfektewelt》是《Akatsuki Blitzkampf Ausf》的续集。Achse。副标题来自德语短语“Perfekte Welt”，意思是“完美世界”，指的是新的主角EN Eins，他是克隆批次中最后一个幸存的克隆人，旨在击败圣殿骑士团的一位领导人，如Valkyria（她可玩的克隆人Tempelritter的老板版），以创造一个完美的世界。游戏还重新引入了Mycale的替代者和前主持人Kati作为可玩角色，并引入了Anonym Guard作为Anonym Merel Lambuth的替代者。

[英文原文]
EN-Eins Perfektewelt (エヌアイン完全世界, EN-Ain Kanzen Sekai, EN-Eins Perfect World) is a sequel to Akatsuki Blitzkampf Ausf. Achse.

The subtitle comes from the German phrase "Perfekte Welt," meaning "Perfect World", referring to the new titular protagonist EN-Eins, the last surviving clone of his cloning batch who aims to defeat one of Knights Templar’s leaders, such as Valkyria (a boss version of her playable clone, Tempelritter) for the sake of creating a perfect world. The game also re-introduces Mycale's replacement and former host, Kati as a playable character, as well introducing Anonym-Guard as a replacement for Anonym Merel Lambuth.

ExceptionNesica.bat_name: Exception for NESiCAxLive   射擊-意外
ExceptionNesica.title: 意外
ExceptionNesica.notes:
当一个老妇人的计算机系统被一个一心想要彻底消灭的病毒接管时，你就可以控制一个普通的软件程序，将其转化为精英战斗机器。重新建立这个系统，把你的性格塑造成一个强大的报复工具。

[英文原文]
When an old woman's computer system is taken over by a virus bent on total annihilation, you assume control of an ordinary software program transformed into an elite combat machine. Retake the system and build your character into a formidable instrument of retribution.

FZeroAXMonster.bat_name: F-Zero AX Monster Ride 競速-零式賽車AX_巨獸狂飆
FZeroAXMonster.title: 零式賽車AX 巨獸狂飆
FZeroAXMonster.notes:
F-Zero AX是任天堂F-Zero系列赛车游戏中的一款。它大约在GameCube的对应产品F-Zero GX之后发布，也是由Amusement Vision共同开发的。一些（如果不是全部）橱柜配有GameCube存储卡读卡器；AX可以读/写GX保存游戏和解锁内容。据说还有一场国际比赛，但需要更多信息（TODO）。在开发过程中，该游戏被称为F-Zero AC。一个用于Cycraft机柜的版本被发布为F-Zero AX Monster Ride。

[英文原文]
F-Zero AX is an entry in Nintendo's F-Zero series of racing games. It was released around the same time/after its GameCube counterpart, F-Zero GX, and was also co-developed by Amusement Vision. Some, if not all, cabinets come with a reader for GameCube memory cards; AX can read/write GX save games and unlock content. There was also supposedly an international competition, but more information is needed (TODO).

During development the game was known as F-Zero AC. A version for Cycraft cabinets was released as F-Zero AX Monster Ride.

FZeroAX.bat_name: F-Zero AX 競速-零式賽車AX街機版
FZeroAX.title: 零式賽車AX街機版
FZeroAX.notes:
F-Zero AX由任天堂于2003年生产。伟大的未来主义赛车游戏，超级饥荒著名赛车手的续集。它运行在Sega、Namco和任天堂制造的Triforce板上。该机柜设有一个插槽，玩家可以在其中放置GameCube存储卡，以保存街机和游戏机版本F-Zero GX的玩家信息。如果你有一个GameCube存储卡，上面有一个F-Zero GX保存，你就可以在街机游戏中使用车库里的车辆。贴花和配色方案等自定义元素也将转移到街机游戏中。

[英文原文]
F-Zero AX was produced by Nintendo in 2003.

Great futuristic racing game and the sequel of the famous racer of Super Famicon. It runs on the Triforce board made by Sega, Namco and Nintendo. The cabinet features a slot where players can put their GameCube memory card to keep their player information from the arcade and F-Zero GX, the console version of the game. If you have a GameCube memory card with an F-Zero GX save on it, you'll be able to use vehicles from your garage in the arcade game. Custom touches such as decals and color schemes will also transfer over to the arcade game.

FamilyGuyBowling.bat_name: Family Guy Bowling 保齡球-惡搞之家保齡球
FamilyGuyBowling.title: 惡搞之家保齡球
FamilyGuyBowling.notes:
America’s Favorite Family is Right Up Your Alley! Features 8 playable characters from the show. Play up to 4 players at a time, and host local tournaments with up to 8 players.


    Choose your bowler from 8 playable Family Guy characters.
    Red Pin Bowling Award options
    Standard Marquees available for Home units.
    Suitable for all general audiences, with adult mode option for the grown up locations.
    Video clips from the show play before and after games.
    Local Tournament Features for 4-8 players.

FarCryParadiseLost.bat_name: Far Cry Paradise Lost 射擊光槍-孤島驚魂_新的曙光
FarCryParadiseLost.title: 孤岛惊魂：新的曙光
FarCryParadiseLost.notes:
失乐园是一款双人街机光枪轨道射击游戏，于 2007 年发布，由 Gloval VR开发，由 育碧发行。它基于 《惊呼本能》并使用了该游戏中的模型、纹理和资产。玩家扮演杰克·卡佛 （杰克·卡佛）和一位身份不明的伙伴，他们使用一对旋转式机枪进行战斗，这些机枪也有数量有限的火箭和手榴弹。从游戏一开始，玩家就可以从四个关卡中选择一个，在这个关卡中，他们将沿着固定的路径在环境中导航，同时与雇佣兵、变异的 三角函数和类似恐龙的小蜥蜴作战。《失乐园》是一款由Gloval VR开发、Ubisoft发行的2007年发行的两人街机柜式轻枪轨射击游戏。它基于《孤岛惊魂本能》，并使用了该游戏中的模型、纹理和资源。玩家扮演杰克·卡佛和一个身份不明的伙伴，他们使用一对旋转式机枪进行战斗，这些机枪也有数量有限的火箭和手榴弹。从游戏开始，玩家可以选择四个级别中的一个，在这个级别中，他们将沿着一条固定的路径在环境中导航，同时与雇佣兵、变种三角人和类似恐龙的小蜥蜴作战。

[英文原文]
Paradise Lost 是一款双人街机光枪轨道射击游戏，于 2007 年发布，由 Gloval VR 开发，由 Ubisoft 发行。它基于 Far Cry Instincts，并使用了该游戏中的模型、纹理和资产。玩家扮演杰克·卡佛 （Jack Carver） 和一位身份不明的伙伴，他们使用一对旋转式机枪进行战斗，这些机枪也有数量有限的火箭和手榴弹。从游戏一开始，玩家就可以从四个关卡中选择一个，在这个关卡中，他们将沿着固定的路径在环境中导航，同时与雇佣兵、变异的 Trigens 和类似恐龙的小蜥蜴作战。
Paradise Lost is a two-player arcade cabinet light gun rail-shooter game released in 2007, developed by Gloval VR and published by Ubisoft. It is based on Far Cry Instincts and uses models, textures, and assets from that game. The player(s) take the role of Jack Carver and an unidentified partner, who fight using a pair of swivel-mounted machine guns, which also have a limited number of rockets and grenades. From the beginning of the game the player(s) can select one of four levels, in which they will navigate through the environment along a fixed path while battling mercenaries, mutant Trigens, and small dinosaur-like lizards.

fateulc.bat_name: Fate_ Unlimited Codes 格鬥-命運_無限代碼
fateulc.title: 命運 無限代碼
fateulc.notes:
《Fate/unlimited codes》是一款由Cavia策划、Eighting开发、Capcom发行的格斗游戏。它于2008年6月11日在日本为街机发行。与该类型的其他游戏一样，命运/无限代码的游戏过程建立在两个角色之间的战斗之上，使用打击组合将对手的生命值降至零。玩家与计算机对手或其他玩家进行一系列战斗，最多两到三场（取决于玩家设置的值）一对一的胜利。根据玩家的设置，单轮比赛的时间可能是有限的，也可能是无限的。根据所使用的组合以及在回合中他们的帮助所造成的伤害，使用分数来统计计算游戏在某些模式下的成功。

[英文原文]
Fate/unlimited codes is a fighting game planned by Cavia, developed by Eighting, and published by Capcom. It was released in Japan for arcades on June 11, 2008.

As in other games of the genre, the game process of Fate/unlimited codes is built on a battle between two characters, using combinations of strikes to lower an opponent's health points to zero. A player conducts a series of battles up to two or three (depending on the value set by the player) one-on-one victories with computer opponents or with another player. The timing of individual rounds may be limited or unlimited, depending on the player's settings. Depending on the combinations used and the damage inflicted with their help during the round, points are used that are used to statistically calculate the success of the game in certain modes.

FightingClimaxIgnition.bat_name: Fighting Climax Ignition   格鬥-電擊文庫 巔峯格鬥者再燃
FightingClimaxIgnition.title: 電擊文庫 巔峯格鬥者再燃
FightingClimaxIgnition.notes:
Dengeki Bunko:Fighting Climax是一款2D街机格斗游戏，由Ecole Software和French Bread开发，Sega发行。该游戏庆祝ASCII Media Works的Dengeki Bunko印记20周年，该印记以该印记下出版的轻小说中的各种角色为特色。该游戏于2014年3月首次在日本街机上发布。游戏的主题曲是川田真美的《信仰》。2015年7月，游戏的更新版本《Dengeki Bunko:Fighting Climax Ignition》发布。更新包含更多角色和更平衡的游戏玩法。更新版本于2015年12月在PlayStation 3、PlayStation 4和PlayStation Vita上仅在日本发布。更新版本的主题曲是李萨的《ID》。与第一个登关地堡不同，Ignition从未本地化。然而，PS3有一个非官方的英文补丁，以及一个经过修改的街机翻录，带有英文翻译和Windows的回滚网络代码。

[英文原文]
Dengeki Bunko: Fighting Climax is a 2D arcade fighting game developed by Ecole Software and French Bread and published by Sega. The game celebrates the 20th anniversary of ASCII Media Works' Dengeki Bunko imprint, featuring various characters from light novels published under the imprint. The game was first released in Japanese arcades in March 2014. The game's theme song is "Belief" by Mami Kawada.

An updated version of the game, titled Dengeki Bunko: Fighting Climax Ignition, was released in July 2015. The update contains additional characters and more balanced gameplay.The updated version was released on PlayStation 3, PlayStation 4 and PlayStation Vita in December 2015 only in Japan. The updated version's theme song is "ID" by LiSA.  Unlike the first Dengeki Bunko, Ignition was never localized. However, an unofficial English patch for PS3 as well as a modified arcade rip with English translations and rollback netcode for Windows are available.

FightingExLayer.bat_name: Fighting Ex Layer   格鬥-格鬥領域EX
FightingExLayer.title: 格鬥領域EX
FightingExLayer.notes:
经过漫长的等待，Arika的EX角色再次聚集在一起，进行另一场激动人心的战斗！Kairi、Skullomania、Blaire、Pullum和其他人都带着最新的图案回来了。这一次，他们带来了一个全新的系统——“；Gougi系统&quot；与高吉共同把握胜利！

[英文原文]
After a long wait, Arika's EX characters gather once again for another exciting battle! Kairi, Skullomania, Blaire, Pullum and the others are all back with the latest graphics. And this time they're bringing a brand new system - the "Gougi System". Grasp victory with Gougi!

FightingClimax.title: 格斗-電擊文庫戰鬥巔峯APM3
FightingClimax.notes:
Dengeki Bunko:Fighting Climax是一款2D街机格斗游戏，由Ecole Software和French Bread开发，Sega发行。该游戏庆祝ASCII Media Works的Dengeki Bunko印记20周年，该印记以该印记下出版的轻小说中的各种角色为特色。该游戏于2014年3月首次在日本街机上发布。游戏的主题曲是川田真美的《信仰》。2015年7月，游戏的更新版本《Dengeki Bunko:Fighting Climax Ignition》发布。更新包含更多角色和更平衡的游戏玩法。更新版本于2015年12月在PlayStation 3、PlayStation 4和PlayStation Vita上仅在日本发布。更新版本的主题曲是李萨的《ID》。与第一个登关地堡不同，Ignition从未本地化。然而，PS3有一个非官方的英文补丁，以及一个经过修改的街机翻录，带有英文翻译和Windows的回滚网络代码。

[英文原文]
Dengeki Bunko: Fighting Climax is a 2D arcade fighting game developed by Ecole Software and French Bread and published by Sega. The game celebrates the 20th anniversary of ASCII Media Works' Dengeki Bunko imprint, featuring various characters from light novels published under the imprint. The game was first released in Japanese arcades in March 2014. The game's theme song is "Belief" by Mami Kawada.

An updated version of the game, titled Dengeki Bunko: Fighting Climax Ignition, was released in July 2015. The update contains additional characters and more balanced gameplay.The updated version was released on PlayStation 3, PlayStation 4 and PlayStation Vita in December 2015 only in Japan. The updated version's theme song is "ID" by LiSA.  Unlike the first Dengeki Bunko, Ignition was never localized. However, an unofficial English patch for PS3 as well as a modified arcade rip with English translations and rollback netcode for Windows are available.

FR.bat_name: Ford Racing_ Full Blown   競速-福特賽車_全速
FR.title: 福特賽車 全速
FR.notes:
《Ford Racing:Full Blown》是世嘉于2006年发布的一款赛车游戏。该游戏是2005年主机和PC游戏《福特赛车3》（也由Razorworks开发，但由Empire Interactive发布）的街机移植版，但对街机游戏进行了一些调整。

[英文原文]
Ford Racing: Full Blown is a racing game released by Sega in 2006. The game is an arcade port of the 2005 console and PC title Ford Racing 3 (also developed by Razorworks but published by Empire Interactive) but with some adjustments made for arcade play.

FrenzyExpress.bat_name: Frenzy Express   競速-狂熱平衡車
FrenzyExpress.title: 狂熱平衡車
FrenzyExpress.notes:
Frenzy Express是一款快节奏的模拟游戏，以全球流行的“滑板车”为基础。该机器最大的特点是玩家获得的互动水平。这台机器包含一辆真正的踏板车，玩家可以用它在舞台上行走。车把使玩家能够转向，刹车位于踏板车的后部。加速是通过位于滑板车两侧的带把手的轮子来实现的。玩家推下方向盘，就像你骑着一辆真正的踏板车时，他/她会推下地面一样。游戏玩法类似于疯狂出租车，除了玩家不是接送乘客，而是快递员，必须接送包裹。到达落客点的方式完全取决于玩家，但有一个时间限制，每过一秒，落客点上的钱就会减少。为了使游戏更加有趣，有许多坡道和其他适合跳跃和表演空中杂技的物体，可以为玩家获得加分。

[英文原文]
Frenzy Express is a fast-paced simulation game that builds on the worldwide fad "Scooters." The machine's biggest feature is the level of interaction the player gets.

The machine contains a actual scooter which the player uses to travel around the stages. The handlebar enables the player to steer and the brake is locate at the back of the scooter. Acceleration is achieved by a wheel with grips, which is located on both sides of the scooter. The player push off the wheel much like he/she would push off the ground if you were riding a real scooter.

Gameplay is similar to Crazy Taxi, except instead of picking up and dropping off passengers, the player is a courier and must pick up and drop off packages. The way you reach the drop off point is entirely up to the player, but there is a time limit and each second that ticks by means less money at the drop off point.

To make the game more fun, there are many ramps and other objects suitable for jumping and performing aerial acrobatics which earns the player bonus points.

Friction.title: 冲突
Friction.notes:
摩擦由 海岸到海岸娱乐于 2011 年制作。派遣成群结队的机器人坏家伙，根据操作员的设置，通过变形机器人 Boss 控制的血腥。三个级别让玩家穿过装满可破坏物体的设施，射击桶、板条箱等，以获得机枪、霰弹枪或火箭发射器等道具。游戏玩法本质上类似于 区域51等游戏，但具有现代图形。射击屏幕以重新加载，每次射击时屏幕都会闪烁。游戏可以由操作员设置无限期保持高分列表或每月重置一次。它由美国一个名为 摩擦游戏工作室的独立团队开发。到目前为止，它仅在美国作为套件发布，可以安装到任何 CRT 游戏柜 詹姆斯中，但在中国发布了带有机枪而不是手枪的完整专用版本。它使用基于 PC 的硬件和专为该游戏设计的独特 IO 板。《摩擦》由Coast To Coast Entertainment于2011年制作。根据改造机器人老板控制的血腥场面的操作员设置，派遣成群的机器人球员。三个级别让玩家通过装有可摧毁物体的设施射击桶、板条箱等，以获得机关枪、霰弹枪或火箭发射器等力量。游戏玩法在性质上类似于《51区》等游戏，但具有现代图形。在屏幕外拍摄以重新加载，每次拍摄时屏幕都会闪烁。游戏可以由操作员设置为无限期维护高分列表，也可以在每个月的工作日重置。它是由美国一个名为Friction Game Studios的独立团队开发的。到目前为止，它只在美国作为一个套件发布，可以安装在任何CRT游戏柜JAMMA中，也可以不安装，但在中国发布了一个带有机枪而不是手枪的完整专用版本。它使用基于PC的硬件和专为这款游戏设计的独特IO板。

[英文原文]
Friction 由 Coast To Coast Entertainment 于 2011 年制作。

派遣成群结队的机器人坏家伙，根据操作员的设置，通过变形机器人 Boss 控制的血腥。三个级别让玩家穿过装满可破坏物体的设施，射击桶、板条箱等，以获得机枪、霰弹枪或火箭发射器等道具。游戏玩法本质上类似于 Area 51 等游戏，但具有现代图形。射击屏幕以重新加载，每次射击时屏幕都会闪烁。游戏可以由操作员设置无限期保持高分列表或每月重置一次。它由美国一个名为 Friction Game Studios 的独立团队开发。到目前为止，它仅在美国作为套件发布，可以安装到任何 CRT 游戏柜 JAMMA 中，但在中国发布了带有机枪而不是手枪的完整专用版本。它使用基于 PC 的硬件和专为该游戏设计的独特 IO 板。
Friction was produced by Coast To Coast Entertainment in 2011.

Dispatch hordes of robotsbad guys depending on operator settings of gore controlled by transforming robot bosses. Three levels put the player through facilities loaded with destructible objects shoot barrels, crates and more to gain powerups such as a machine gun, shotgun or rocket launcher. Gameplay is similar in nature to titles like Area 51 but with modern graphics. Shoot off screen to reload and the screen flashes with every shot. The game can be set by the operator to maintain high score list indefinitely or reset it every monthweekday.It was developed by an independent team in the US called Friction Game Studios. So far it has only been released as a kit in the US that can be installed into any CRT game cabinet JAMMA or not but a full dedicated version with machine guns instead of pistols was released in China. It uses PCbased hardware and a unique IO board designed just for this game.

Frogger.title: 青蛙过河
Frogger.notes:
这是90年代末对街机经典游戏《青蛙蛙》的翻拍。通过在丛林、繁忙的街道、下水道甚至云层中左、右、下、上跳来导航青蛙怪，以拯救他的五个小伙伴，以及神话中的金蛙。道奇汽车、老鼠和食人鳄鱼来维持生命。捕捉一些虫子以获得特殊能力和点数。在线与朋友对决。记住，不要跳到正在下沉的海龟身上。

[英文原文]
This is a late-90s remake of the original arcade classic Frogger. Navigate Frogger by hopping left, right, down and up through jungles, busy streets, sewers, and even the clouds to save his five little buddies, as well as the golden frogs of myth. Dodge cars, rats, and man eating alligators to stay alive. Snag some bugs for special abilities and points. Play against a friend online. Just remember, don't hop on sinking turtles.

GG.title: 神铳
GG.notes:
世嘉金枪是世嘉于 2010 年为世嘉 铃声宽硬件发布的一款光枪游戏。它由中国世嘉开发，由负责 死亡之屋系列的同一团队开发。游戏的许多资产，包括引擎本身，都是直接从 死者之家4移植而来的。Sega Golden Gun是Sega于2010年为Sega RingWide硬件发布的一款轻枪游戏。它是由中国世嘉开发的，由负责《死亡之屋》系列的同一个团队开发的。游戏的许多资产，包括引擎本身，都是直接从《死亡之屋4》移植过来的。

[英文原文]
世嘉金枪是世嘉于 2010 年为世嘉 RingWide 硬件发布的一款光枪游戏。它由中国世嘉开发，由负责 The House of the Dead 系列的同一团队开发。游戏的许多资产，包括引擎本身，都是直接从 The House of the Dead 4 移植而来的。
Sega Golden Gun is a light gun game released by Sega in 2010 for Sega RingWide hardware. It was developed by Sega of China, by the same team responsible for the The House of the Dead series. Many of the game's assets, including the engine itself, were ported directly from The House of the Dead 4.

GGXX.title: 罪惡裝備XXAC加強版R
GGXX.notes:
终极战斗动作，现在Steam上的GUILTY GEAR XX系列的缩影！附赠配乐！

[英文原文]
Ultimate battle action, and the epitome of the GUILTY GEAR XX series now on Steam! Bonus soundtracks included!

GGXrd.title: 罪惡裝備：啓示者2
GGXrd.notes:
令人惊叹的3D细胞动画和压倒性的内容量，下一代格斗游戏&quot；GUILTY GEAR Xrd REV 2“；现在已经在Steam上发布了！总共有25个独特的角色和大量的游戏模式，准备好摇滚吧！

[英文原文]
Astonishing 3D cell animations and overwhelming content volume, the next-generation fighting game "GUILTY GEAR Xrd REV 2" is now out on Steam! Total cast of 25 unique characters, and tons of game modes, get ready to ROCK!

GGXrdAPM3.title: 罪惡裝備：啓示者2 APM3
GGXrdAPM3.notes:
令人惊叹的3D细胞动画和压倒性的内容量，下一代格斗游戏&quot；GUILTY GEAR Xrd REV 2“；现在已经在Steam上发布了！总共有25个独特的角色和大量的游戏模式，准备好摇滚吧！

[英文原文]
Astonishing 3D cell animations and overwhelming content volume, the next-generation fighting game "GUILTY GEAR Xrd REV 2" is now out on Steam! Total cast of 25 unique characters, and tons of game modes, get ready to ROCK!

GRID.bat_name: GRID   競速-超級房車賽_起點
GRID.title: 超級房車賽 起點
GRID.notes:
GRID是一种与众不同的赛车体验。为每个人提供无与伦比的轮对轮比赛，每场比赛都是不可预测的，因为你在征服赛车运动世界的道路上创造了对手和对手。

[英文原文]
GRID is a racing experience like no other. Offering unrivalled wheel-to-wheel racing for everyone, where every race is unpredictable as you create rivals and nemeses on your road to conquering the world of motorsport.

GtiClub3.bat_name: GTI Club_ Supermini Festa_   競速-GTI俱樂部_小型車競賽
GtiClub3.title: GTI俱樂部 小型車競賽
GtiClub3.notes:
GTI俱乐部超级迷你嘉年华！双胞胎标志着经典赛车街机游戏机系列的回归。与原版一样，玩家驾驶包括Mini Cooper在内的小型赛车。还有一系列最多可供4名玩家玩的迷你游戏。与其专注于跑车和高速，不如参加GTI Club Supermini Festa！这更多的是利用你的驾驶技能和手刹在艰难的赛道上导航。与最初的GTI俱乐部一样，玩家必须找到捷径和替代路线，以尽快通过球场，击败对手。比赛类型包括“战斗赛”和“综艺赛”。Variety战斗允许多达四名玩家在基于驾驶的迷你游戏中相互对抗。在“标签”模式下，在课程开始时随机选择一名玩家在他们的车上携带炸弹。携带炸弹的玩家必须撞上其他汽车，给它们贴上“标签”并卸下炸弹。游戏过程中有一个计时器倒计时，当计时器达到零时，炸弹爆炸，该玩家被淘汰。另一种迷你游戏类型是足球模式，玩家用他们的汽车将一个巨大的足球射入球门。一旦计时器归零，得分最高的玩家就是赢家。

[英文原文]
GTI Club Supermini Festa! twin marks the return of a classic racing arcade game machine series. Like the original, players race small cars including the Mini Cooper. There are also a range of minigames for up to 4 players.

Rather than focusing on sports cars and high speed, in GTI Club Supermini Festa! it is more about using your driving skills and handbrake to navigate through tough tracks. Like the original GTI Club, players must find shortcuts and alternative routes to get through the course as quickly as possible to beat their rivals.

Race types include "Battle Race" and "Variety Battle". Variety battle allows up to four players to face off against one another in driving based minigames. In 'Tag' mode, one player is randomly selected at the beginning of the course to carry a bomb on top of their car. The player with the bomb must ram into other cars to 'tag' them and offload the bomb. A timer counts down during play, and when the timer reaches zero the bomb explodes and that player is eliminated.

Another minigame type is the Soccer mode, where players use their cars to hit a giant soccer ball into the goal. Once the timer reaches zero, the player with the highest score is the winner.

GaelcoChampionshipTuningRace.bat_name: Gaelco Championship Tuning Race   競速-Gaelco錦標賽
GaelcoChampionshipTuningRace.title: Gaelco錦標賽
GaelcoChampionshipTuningRace.notes:
Gaelco锦标赛改装赛©2005年Gaelco。Gaelco锦标赛改装赛让你驾驶一辆运动原型车，在一个令人惊叹的逼真赛车模拟中。有两种游戏模式可供选择：街机模式，与其他玩家或CPU进行激烈的正面竞争。还有锦标赛模式，游戏玩法是时间攻击，与影子车比赛并击败最佳时间圈，在这种情况下成为“影子车”。您可以在四种不同的汽车之间进行选择，并通过在街机模式下进行美学调整或在锦标赛模式下进行技术调整来制作自己的汽车。在比赛期间，在街机模式下，您将根据您在超车、超速、打滑、时间记录方面的驾驶技能以及是否在比赛中获得第1至第3名来积累积分。在每场比赛结束时，这些积分将可供您在“汽车改装”中兑换配件，但前提是您已经完成了前三个位置。然而，在锦标赛-时间攻击模式下，发动机将被调整，您将有有限的时间进行识别圈，并从技术上微调您的汽车，改变悬架、车轮或汽车的空气动力学。比赛将在拉斯维加斯市和郊区的4条赛道上举行。所有的赛道都有不同的布局，这将增加游戏的难度，此外，干燥、倾倒或潮湿的天气条件也会提高难度。这种组合为您提供了总共12种不同的赛道条件。在这两种模式下，比赛仅限于几圈。“Gaelco锦标赛改装赛”捕捉到了比赛的真实体验，让你坐在驾驶座上。赛车的所有力量、速度和荣耀现在都触手可及，细节和现实感前所未有！！！

[英文原文]
Gaelco Championship Tuning Race © 2005 Gaelco.

Gaelco Championship Tuning Race puts you behind the wheel of a Sport Prototype Car, in an amazingly realistic racing simulation. There are two Game modes available: Arcade Mode where there is a strong head to head competition against other players or CPUs. And Tournament Mode, where the game play is Time Attack, racing against the shadow car and beating the best time lap, becoming in that case, the 'shadow car'. You can choose between four different cars and make them your own, by tuning them aesthetically in the Arcade Mode or technically in the Tournament Mode.

During the race, in the Arcade Mode, you will accumulate points depending on your driving skills on overtaking, speeding, skidding, time record and if you finish from 1st to 3rd position in the race. These points will be available for you to exchange in the 'Car tuning' for accessories, at the end of each race, but only, if you have finished in the first three positions.

However, in the Tournament –Time Attack Mode, the engine will be adjusted and you will have a limited time to do a recognition lap and technically fine-tune your car changing the suspension, the wheels or the aerodynamics of the car. The race will take place in 4 racing circuits in Las Vegas city and the suburbs.
All the circuits have got a different layout, that will increase the difficulty of the game, additionally, the weather condition Dry, Dump or Wet, will also contribute to the level of difficulty. This combination offers you a total of 12 different circuit’s conditions for racing. In both modes, the competition is limited to a number of laps.

Capturing the exact experience of competition, 'Gaelco Championship Tuning Race', straps you in the driver's seat. All the power, speed and glory of racing are now at your fingertips with unprecedented details and realism!!!

GaiaAttack4.bat_name: Gaia Attack 4 射擊光槍-地球守護隊_4人_
GaiaAttack4.title: 地球护卫队
GaiaAttack4.notes:
盖亚攻击4是来自 台东的四人组队光枪射击游戏，运行在 台东X2型硬件系统上，拥有 60 英寸高清大屏幕，旨在射击怪物、外星人，尽可能多地赢得相应的门票。该游戏可以通过单个游戏或四个玩家的合作游戏来玩，并且游戏具有来自现实世界环境的许多剧院风格的游戏功能，并覆盖着卡通计算机图像。Gaia Attack 4是来自台东的四人组轻枪射击游戏，运行在台东Type X2硬件系统上，配有60英寸高清液晶大屏幕，旨在射击怪物，尽可能多地赢得外星人相应的门票。这款游戏可以由单人游戏或四人合作游戏进行，游戏特色是来自现实世界环境的多种剧场风格，并叠加了卡通电脑图像。

[英文原文]
Gaia Attack 4 是来自 Taito 的四人组队光枪射击游戏，运行在 Taito Type X2 硬件系统上，拥有 60 英寸高清大屏幕，旨在射击怪物、外星人，尽可能多地赢得相应的门票。

该游戏可以通过单个游戏或四个玩家的合作游戏来玩，并且游戏具有来自现实世界环境的许多剧院风格的游戏功能，并覆盖着卡通计算机图像。
Gaia Attack 4 is four players in groups light gun shooter from Taito, runs on Taito Type X2 hardware system, with a large 60 inch high definition LCD screen, aims to shooting monsters, aliens as many as possible to win corresponding tickets.

This game can be played by single individual game or four players' cooperation game, and game play features in many theater-styles from real world environments, overlaid with cartoon computer images.

GalagaAssault.title: 蜜蜂战机
GalagaAssault.notes:
对于那些几十年来一直是Galaga粉丝的人，以及可能第一次玩Galaga的门票兑换新手来说，Bandai Namco和Raw Thrills再次联手推出Galaga ASSAULT。摧毁一浪敌舰，有机会击败母舰并赢得奖金！Galaga Assault有一个全新的“添加船只”功能，允许玩家购买更多船只并扩展到最多12艘攻击船只的舰队。

[英文原文]
For those who have been Galaga fans for Decades and for the ticket redemption rookies who may be playing Galaga for the first time, Bandai Namco and Raw Thrills have joined forces again to present GALAGA ASSAULT.

Destroy a wave of enemy ships for a chance to defeat the mothership and win the bonus!

Galaga Assault has an all new "add ships" feature that allows the player to buy more ships and expand to an armada of up to 12 attacking ships.

Gashaaaan2.bat_name: Gashaaaan Refill____ 彈球射擊-激射衝擊_充能再戰____
Gashaaaan2.title: 彈球射擊-激射衝擊：充能再戰!!!!
Gashaaaan2.notes:
The game features two main modes: Wai-wai Mode, a casual mix of free-for-all and cooperative play, and Versus Mode, in which two teams of two compete in three consecutive mini-game battles without sudden game overs interrupting the action. In Wai-wai Mode, players progress through a series of stages, either four random stages followed by a final stage, or up to six if a special seasonal stage is active. Each stage has a performance threshold that must be met; failing to do so ends the game immediately. In Versus Mode, all three rounds are played regardless of early performance, and victory is decided by the number of coins collected.

The gameplay centers on simple, intuitive ball throws that must hit on-screen targets quickly and accurately, earning coins or completing objectives within a time limit. The mini-games offer surprising variety: players might illuminate falling constellations, hunt colorful marine creatures, mine sparkling gemstones, or fend off UFOs in dramatic, boss-style encounters. 
Seasonal stages, which rotate approximately every two months, add themed challenges such as feeding chicks, banishing evil spirits, competing in relay races, or ringing New Year’s bells, with each event available only during specific months.

The game runs on Konami’s e-AMUSEMENT platform but does not support the e-AMUSEMENT PASS card system. While mechanically straightforward, Gashaaaan 2: Refills thrives on variety, timing, and cooperative intensity. 
Whether smashing glass bottles to clear a path, striking fast-moving targets, or working together to beat the clock, it delivers a distinctive blend of reflex-based action and quirky charm, wrapped in an energetic cabinet experience that remains a hidden treasure of arcade history.

Ghost Squad Evolution is the arcade followup to the original Ghost Squad. It was developed and published by Sega and released in 2007. The game uses the Sega Lindburgh system. 

In Ghost Squad: Evolution the player is a member of Alpha Unit, or members of the “Ghost Squad”, an unofficial unit of the anti-terrorist group, Multi-Operation-Program (M.O.P.). Non-playable characters include fellow M.O.P. members consisting of the Commander, who provides radio backup and pertinent advice to the player. Along with the Bravo and Charlie Unit who assist the player in suppressing the terrorist threat.

The rifle can be set from single shot, to 3 burst shot to automatic fire. As well as a special effects to suit the situation Night Vision, Flash Light for the mounted gun, and scope for sniper rifle. The gun also features an action button which is used to pull off special moves like hand-to-hand combat. As well as recoil effects on every shot fired.

GhostBusters.bat_name: GhostBusters 射擊光槍-捉鬼敢死隊
GhostBusters.title: 捉鬼敢死隊
GhostBusters.notes:
《捉鬼敢死队》是2016年《捉鬼克星》系列电影的续作。然而，这与电影的故事或任何角色都没有关系。它被描述为以电影事件为背景，讲述了四个无名捉鬼敢死队在曼哈顿的冒险故事。他们在不同的地点接受任务，有时每个地点都有多个级别。逐步解锁的地点包括阿尔德里奇庄园、圣楼公墓、韦夫林山疯人院、第13街车站、夏洛特女王和林博。游戏最多有四个本地玩家，每个玩家都可以在同一屏幕上控制一个Ghostbuster。单独游戏时，其他角色由CPU控制。有两个男性和两个女性角色，在健康、速度、伤害和武器过热方面有不同的统计数据。他们还拥有独特的武器和手榴弹类型。角色在环境中遵循一条基本线性的路径，通过双杆控制，可以独立于拍摄方向移动。每个角色都有一个主要武器，如步枪、霰弹枪、迷你枪或用于捉鬼的手枪。手榴弹可以作为二次攻击投掷，但需要一段时间才能再次使用。手榴弹包括闪光弹、电击、暗物质和黏液。主武器可能会过热，因此有时需要等待一段时间或使用单独的钥匙清空热量表。攻击和杀戮的点数在小组成员之间分配。它们还可以以各种方式相互帮助，包括死后复活。在任何时候，P.K.E.仪表都可以被激活，以扫描环境中的超自然活动。这需要为点定位特殊的绿点，或者追踪通常会导致强敌的紫色轨迹。当P.K.E.被激活时，移动速度较慢。环境中的许多物品都是可破坏的，可以射击以获得额外的分数。更强大的鬼魂不能完全被主要武器击败。当他们的健康计为空时，需要切换到质子束。该装置不会过热，并使用旋转机械装置将光束对准某个方向，该方向会不断变化，如红色箭头图标所示。当正确的角度保持一段时间以填满一米时，食尸鬼可以被猛烈地撞击，几次撞击后，食尸鬼就可以被困住，并使用按钮捣碎序列来增加分数。敌人的攻击可以通过闪避卷来躲避，而且通常可以找到健康包。许多级别都有可选的收藏品。这些点数添加到一个等级系统中，随着每个新角色等级的增加，都会提供技能点数，以升级角色的各种统计数据和能力。在游戏的一个单独的收容单元部分，可以详细查看遇到的所有鬼魂。

[英文原文]
Ghostbusters is a tie-in to the 2016 Ghostbusters movie as a reboot of a franchise. However, there are no ties to the film's story or any of the characters. It is described as set after the events of the movie and follows the adventures of a group of four nameless Ghostbusters in Manhattan. They receive tasks at various locations, sometimes with multiple levels for each one. The locations, unlocked gradually, include Aldridge Manor, St. Lou's Cemetery, Wavering Hills Asylum, 13th Street Station, The Queen Charlotte and Limbo. The game is played with up to four local players, who can each control a Ghostbuster on the same screen. When playing alone, the other characters are controlled by the CPU. There are two male and two female characters with different statistics for health, speed, damage and weapon overheat. They also have a unique weapon and grenade type.

The characters follow a largely linear path in the environment, with twin stick controls for movement independent of the shooting direction. Each character has a main weapon such as a rifle, shotgun, mini-gun or pistols used to take out ghosts. A grenade can be thrown as a secondary attack, with some time before it is available again. Grenades include a flashbang, electro-shock, dark matter and slime. The main weapon can overheat, so sometimes it is required to wait a little or use a separate key to empty the heat meter. Points are distributed among the group members for attacks and kills. They can also assist each other in various ways, including revives when dead. At all times, the P.K.E. meter can be activated to scan the environment for paranormal activity. This is required to locate special green spots for points, or to track purple trails that generally lead to a strong enemy. While P.K.E. is activated, movement is slower. Many items in the environments are destructible and can be shot for additional points.

Stronger ghosts cannot be defeated entirely with the primary weapon. When their health meter is empty, it is needed to switch to the proton beam. That one cannot overheat and a circling mechanic is used to aim the beam in a certain direction, which changes constantly, shown through an icon with a red arrow. When the correct angle has been held for some time to fill a meter, the ghoul can be slammed and after a few slams it can be trapped, with a button-mash sequence for a points multiplier. Enemy attacks can be evaded through dodge rolls, and often health packs can be found. Many levels have optional collectibles.

The points add to a leveling system and with each new character level skill points are provided to upgrade a character for various statistics and abilities. In a separate containment unit section of the game, all the ghosts that were encountered can be viewed in detail.

GigaWingGenerations.title: 翼神
GigaWingGenerations.notes:
《GigaWing Generations》是该系列的第三款游戏，之前是《Giga Wing》和《Giga Wing 2》。这个没有角色来驾驶4个可选的飞机，也没有故事线。每艘飞船的能力变化比之前的《Giga Wing》游戏更大，包括飞行速度和射击类型。玩家现在可以选择（从两个阶段中）先处理哪个阶段（在之前的Giga Wings中，飞机的选择影响了起始阶段）。这也是该系列中第一款使用垂直对齐显示器的游戏。

[英文原文]
GigaWing Generations is the third game in the series, preceded by Giga Wing and Giga Wing 2. This one has no characters to pilot the 4 selectable planes and no story line. Each ship varies in ability more drastically than they do in previous Giga Wing games including flight speed and shot type. The player now selects which stage (out of two) to tackle first (in previous Giga Wings the plane choice affected the starting stage). It's also the first game in the series to use a vertically aligned monitor.

For beginners and pros alike, welcome to a different kind of fighting game.

PowerInstinctV.bat_name: Gouketsuji Ichizoku_ Senzo Kuyou _Taito Type X2_   格鬥-豪血寺一族_先祖供養 TTX2
PowerInstinctV.title: 豪血寺一族：先祖供養 TTX2
PowerInstinctV.notes:
《Goketsuji Ichizoku Matsuri Senzo Kuyou》是《权力本能》系列的第七部，也是最新作品。它由Atlus于2009年8月8日在日本发布。如果有可能在美国上映，粉丝们为该系列提出的一个名字是《权力本能节：祖先纪念》，但目前还没有发布任何相关信息。2012年2月22日，该游戏的更新版本在街机系统NESiCAxLive上发布。进行了许多更改和调整。例如，可变形角色的变形版本现在有了自己的应力射击技术。

[英文原文]
Goketsuji Ichizoku Matsuri Senzo Kuyou, also known as Goketsuji Ichizoku Senzo Kuyou (豪血寺一族 先祖供養) is the seventh installment and the latest entry in the Power Instinct series. It was released by Atlus in Japan on August 8, 2009.

A proposed name by fans for the series, if a US release is possible, was Power Instinct Festival: The Ancestors Commemoration, however, no information on such has been released.

In February 22 of 2012, an updated version of the game was released for the Arcade system NESiCAxLive. Many changes and adjustments were made. For example, the transformed versions of the transformable characters now have their own Stress Shot techniques.

Goketsuji.bat_name: Gouketsuji Ichizoku_ Senzo Kuyou for NESiCAxLive   格鬥-豪血寺一族_先祖供養
Goketsuji.title: 豪血寺一族 先祖供養
Goketsuji.notes:
《Goketsuji Ichizoku Matsuri Senzo Kuyou》是《权力本能》系列的第七部，也是最新作品。它由Atlus于2009年8月8日在日本发布。如果有可能在美国上映，粉丝们为该系列提出的一个名字是《权力本能节：祖先纪念》，但目前还没有发布任何相关信息。2012年2月22日，该游戏的更新版本在街机系统NESiCAxLive上发布。进行了许多更改和调整。例如，可变形角色的变形版本现在有了自己的应力射击技术。

[英文原文]
Goketsuji Ichizoku Matsuri Senzo Kuyou, also known as Goketsuji Ichizoku Senzo Kuyou (豪血寺一族 先祖供養) is the seventh installment and the latest entry in the Power Instinct series. It was released by Atlus in Japan on August 8, 2009.

A proposed name by fans for the series, if a US release is possible, was Power Instinct Festival: The Ancestors Commemoration, however, no information on such has been released.

In February 22 of 2012, an updated version of the game was released for the Arcade system NESiCAxLive. Many changes and adjustments were made. For example, the transformed versions of the transformable characters now have their own Stress Shot techniques.

GrooveCoaster2.title: 节奏过山车2：天的节日
GrooveCoaster2.notes:
Groove Coaster 2:Heavenly Festival（在日本以外的一些地区被称为Rhythmvaders 2）于2015年1月22日发布，其中“LEVEL”系统被删除，取而代之的是一个名为“Groove COIN”系统的新系统，玩家可以根据自己的表现获得“GROOVECOIN”，并将其用作虚拟商品的货币。

[英文原文]
Groove Coaster 2: Heavenly Festival (known as Rhythmvaders 2 in some areas outside Japan) was released on January 22, 2015, in which the "LEVEL" system was removed and was replaced by a new system called the "GROOVE COIN" system, in which players can get "GROOVE COINs" according to their performance and use them as currency for virtual goods.

GGXrdSIGN.bat_name: Guilty Gear Xrd -SIGN- 格鬥-罪惡裝備未知次元_徵兆
GGXrdSIGN.title: 罪惡裝備未知次元 徵兆
GGXrdSIGN.notes:
让你久等了。GUILTY GEAR Xrd-标志-终于在Steam上了！

[英文原文]
Kept you waitin'. GUILTY GEAR Xrd -SIGN- is finally here on Steam!

GGS.bat_name: Guilty Gear_ Strive   格鬥-罪惡裝備 -奮戰
GGS.title: 罪惡裝備 -奮戰
GGS.notes:
Guilty Gear系列中开创的尖端2D/3D混合图形在“Guilty Gear-STRIVE-”中提升到了一个新的水平。新的艺术方向和改进的角色动画将超越你在格斗游戏中见过的任何东西！用罪恶装备发现游戏的味道——努力！让自己沉浸在新的游戏机制中，这些机制旨在为格斗游戏新手提供简单和欢迎的体验，同时为退伍军人提供深刻和创造性的体验。《Ride the Fire》将进入一个充满顶级动作、风格和乐趣的重金属风格的另类未来！火焰！《Guilty Gear-Strive》是广受好评的《Guilty Gear》格斗游戏系列的最新作品。由石川大辅创作，Arc System Works开发，《Guilty齿轮-Strive-》保持了该系列高辛烷值配乐、突破性的混合2D/3D单元格阴影图形和激烈、有益的游戏体验的声誉。◆宇宙的命运将被决定…与那个人进行最后的对抗，那个人对世界及其居民的所有破坏和损害负有责任。加入Sol Badguy，他的竞争对手Ky Kiske，以及总共15个独特角色的首发阵容，他们将面对一个20年的故事的惊人结局！◆为您的眼睛和耳朵提供感官刺激随着系列创作者和音乐作曲家石川大辅创作的震撼曲目摇滚起来！用杀手级的原声敲击你的头，击败你的对手，同时被迄今为止最令人惊叹和最具活力的3D细胞阴影视觉效果所震撼！◆格斗游戏的新革命！Guilty Gear-Strive带来了许多新的创新游戏机制，旨在让新加入该系列的玩家快速学习基础知识，同时保持Guilty Gears所称赞的深度、创造性的游戏玩法。该系列的新成员，如破墙机械师，将为战斗提供新的、令人兴奋的方法。

[英文原文]
The cutting-edge 2D/3D hybrid graphics pioneered in the Guilty Gear series have been raised to the next level in “GUILTY GEAR -STRIVE-“. The new artistic direction and improved character animations will go beyond anything you’ve seen before in a fighting game!

Discover the Smell of the Game with Guilty Gear -Strive-! Immerse yourself in new gameplay mechanics designed to be simple and welcoming for fighting game newcomers, yet deep and creative for veterans. Ride the Fire into a heavy metal inspired alternate future full of over-the-top action, style and fun! Blazing!

“Guilty Gear -Strive-“ is the latest entry in the critically acclaimed Guilty Gear fighting game franchise. Created by Daisuke Ishiwatari and developed by Arc System Works, “Guilty Gear -Strive-“ upholds the series’ reputation for a high octane soundtrack, groundbreaking hybrid 2D/3D cell-shaded graphics and intense, rewarding gameplay.

◆The fate of the universe will be determined…
Head into the final confrontation with That Man, the person responsible for all the destruction and damage to the world and and it's inhabitants. Join Sol Badguy, his rival Ky Kiske, and a total starting roster of 15 unique characters as they face the astonishing conclusion to a story 20 years in the making!

◆A Sensory BLAST for Your Eyes and Ears
Rock out to the thrashing tracks laid down by series creator and music composer, Daisuke Ishiwatari! Bang your head and beat your opponent to the killer soundtrack while being blown away by the most stunning and dynamic 3D cell-shaded visuals produced to date!

◆New Revolution in Fighting Games!
Guilty Gear -Strive- brings a number of new and innovative game play mechanics designed to allow players new to the series to quickly learn the fundamentals while maintaining the deep, creative gameplay Guilty Gear is praised for. New additions to the series such as a wall-breaking mechanic will allow for new and exciting approaches to battle.

GHA.bat_name: Guitar Hero Arcade  音樂-吉他英雄
GHA.title: 吉他英雄
GHA.notes:
动视（活动）和科乐美（科乐美）曾经合作，以确保《吉他英雄》系列符合科乐美在音乐游戏方面的专利，他们开发了游戏的街机版本，名为《吉他英雄街机》（吉他英雄街机）于2009年初在各大街机厅发放。该游戏主要基于《吉他英雄三、摇滚传奇》（吉他英雄III：摇滚传奇）的玩法，减少了一些功能，如角色定制，但保留了从互联网为街机下载新歌曲的能力。Activision和Konami之前曾合作确保《吉他英雄》系列符合Konami在音乐游戏方面的专利，他们开发了这款游戏的街机版，名为《吉他英雄街机》，于2009年初分发给街机。该游戏主要基于《吉他英雄III：摇滚传奇》的游戏玩法，减少了一些角色定制等功能，但保留了从互联网下载新歌曲的能力。

[英文原文]
动视（Activision）和科乐美（Konami）曾经合作，以确保《吉他英雄》系列符合科乐美在音乐游戏方面的专利，他们开发了游戏的街机版本，名为《吉他英雄街机》（Guitar Hero Arcade），于2009年初在各大街机厅发放。该游戏主要基于《吉他英雄III：摇滚传奇》（Guitar Hero III: Legends of Rock）的玩法，减少了一些功能，如角色定制，但保留了从互联网为街机下载新歌曲的能力。
Activision and Konami, who have previously worked together to make sure that the Guitar Hero series meets with Konami's patents on music games, developed an arcade console version of the game, titled Guitar Hero Arcade, distributed to arcades in early 2009. The game is primarily based on the Guitar Hero III: Legends of Rock gameplay, reducing some of the features such as character customization, but keeping the ability to download new songs for the cabinet from the Internet.

GundamSpiritsOfZeon.bat_name: Gundam Spirits Of Zeon 射擊光槍-機動戰士高達_修羅雙星
GundamSpiritsOfZeon.title: 机动战士高达：修罗双星
GundamSpiritsOfZeon.notes:
机动战士高达：吉翁之魂 是基于高达系列的街机光枪游戏。值得注意的是，玩家扮演反派主角，而不是为 E.F.S.F。服务。游戏设定在U.C.0079周围，两个主要角色，中尉库尔特·罗斯威尔和中尉罗宾·布拉德肖，在上面使用他们各自的机动战士：MS-06渣古II，来执行吉翁给他们各自的任务。第一部分名为 双重屠杀以正常方式播放故事。第二部分名为 士兵的记忆能够进行时间跳跃/时间旅行来选择其他任务，但必须完成才能获得一些徽章才能接收其他锁定任务Mobile Suit Gundam:Spirits of Zeon是一款基于Gundam系列的街机轻枪游戏。值得注意的是，玩家扮演的是反派主角，而不是为E.F.S.F.服务。游戏以U.C.0079为背景，两个主要角色，库尔特·罗斯威尔中尉和罗宾·布拉德肖中尉，在上面使用他们各自的移动套装：MS-06 Zaku II，来执行泽恩赋予他们的任务。第一部名为《双重屠杀》，以正常的方式讲述了这个故事。第二部分名为《士兵的记忆》，可以跳过时间/时间旅行来选择其他任务，但必须完成才能获得一些徽章来接受其他锁定的任务

[英文原文]
机动战士高达：吉翁之魂 是基于高达系列的街机光枪游戏。值得注意的是，玩家扮演反派主角，而不是为 E.F.S.F. 服务。游戏设定在U.C.0079周围，两个主要角色，中尉库尔特·罗斯威尔和中尉罗宾·布拉德肖，在上面使用他们各自的机动战士：MS-06渣古II，来执行吉翁给他们各自的任务。

第一部分名为 Dual Carnage，以正常方式播放故事。第二部分名为 Memory of Soldier，能够进行时间跳跃/时间旅行来选择其他任务，但必须完成才能获得一些徽章才能接收其他锁定任务
Mobile Suit Gundam: Spirits of Zeon is Arcade Light Gun Game based on the Gundam franchise. Notable is that players act as Villain Protagonist, rather than served for E.F.S.F.. The game sets around U.C.0079, two main characters, Lieutenent Kurt Roswell & Lieutenent Robin Bradshaw, are above to use their respective Mobile Suits: MS-06 Zaku II, to operate their respective missions given by Zeon.

The first installment was titled Dual Carnage, which playthrough the story in normal way. The second installment, titled Memory of Soldier, was able to Time Skip/ Time Travel to choose other missions, but must fulfill to gained some Badges to receive other locked missions

gdvsgdnx.bat_name: Gundam vs_ Gundam Next 動作-高達VS高達NEXT
gdvsgdnx.title: 高達VS高達NEXT
gdvsgdnx.notes:
《机动套装高达：高达vs.下一个高达》是一部于2009年3月18日在日本上映的射击游戏。Mobile Suit Gundam:Gundam vs.Gundam Next是Namco Bandai Games的Gundam vs视频游戏系列中的一款游戏，是Mobile Suit Gondam:Gundarm vs.Gundarm的续集。前作的所有功能都保留了，包括所有玩家可用的单位，但G-Crossover已被删除。推出了一个新的系统Next Dash，可以立即取消移动。自动闭锁已被手动闭锁所取代。《Z Gundam》、《Gundam Wing》、《Gondam SEED》、《冈达姆SEED Destiny》和《Gundam0083》的音乐主题发生了变化。Gundam 00的音乐主题已经添加，Mobile Suit Gundam也添加了一个额外的主题。

[英文原文]
Mobile Suit Gundam: Gundam vs. Gundam Next is a shooter that was released on March 18, 2009 in Japan. Mobile Suit Gundam: Gundam vs. Gundam Next is the a game in the Gundam VS video game series from Namco Bandai Games, it is the sequel to Mobile Suit Gundam: Gundam vs. Gundam. All the features from the previous title remain, including all player-usable units, with the exception that G-Crossover has been removed. A new system Next Dash, which can cancel moves instantly was introduced. Automatic blocking has been replaced by manual blocking. The music theme for Z Gundam, Gundam Wing, Gundam SEED, Gundam SEED Destiny, and Gundam 0083 are changed. Music theme for Gundam 00 has been added, and an additional theme has been added for Mobile Suit Gundam.

gdvsgd.bat_name: Gundam vs_ Gundam _GVS1 Ver_ A_ 動作-高達VS高達 _GVS1 Ver_A_
gdvsgd.title: 高達VS高達 GVS1 Ver A

GundamPod.title: 機動戰士高達：戰場的羈絆
GundamPod.notes:
移动套装高达：战场的债券有一个P.O.D（全景光学显示器），类似于移动套装驾驶舱。它有可调节的座椅、环绕声扬声器、投影屏幕和手脚控制装置。一场比赛大约持续10-15分钟，大多数情况下有4个P.O.D.或更多。如果你和其他人在一起，玩家之间可以进行语音聊天，但这不是必需的。每个人必须将他们的飞行员卡插入其插槽和钱中才能开始游戏。海外玩家之间可以进行游戏。在游戏中，玩家将成为动漫系列中巨型机器人移动服的飞行员。飞行员通过两个战斗场景进行游戏，总游戏时间为10分钟。一个大型监视器回放最后一场战斗，一个倾斜的触摸屏用户界面用于管理飞行员的战斗数据。几乎所有的文字都是汉字、平假名和片假名。

[英文原文]
Mobile Suit Gundam: Bonds of the Battlefield features a P.O.D (Panoramic Optical Display) that resembles a Mobile Suit Cockpit. It has adjustable seats, surround sound speakers, a projector screen, and controls both at the hands and feet. A single game lasts about 10–15 minutes and mostly has 4 P.O.Ds or more. If you are with other people voice chat can be possible between players, though it is not required. Each person must insert their pilot card into its slot and money to begin gameplay. Gameplay between players oversea is possible and available.

In the game, players become pilots of giant robot mobile suits from the anime series. Pilots play through two battle scenarios lasting a total game time of ten minutes. A large monitor replays the last battle and an angled touch screen user interface is used to manage pilot battle data. Almost all text is in kanji, hiragana, and katakana.

Gunslinger.bat_name: Gunslinger Stratos 3   射擊-槍神斯托拉塔斯3
Gunslinger.title: 槍神斯托拉塔斯3

H2Overdrive.title: H2超速駕駛
H2Overdrive.notes:
玩家使用不同难度的动力艇与其他船只以及附近橱柜上的其他七名玩家进行比赛。在比赛中，玩家可以遇到箱子，这些箱子可以给他们提供从速度提升到MegaHull和HullCrusher能力的力量，这些能力可以用来摧毁对方的船只。在机柜上，使用油门而不是踏板来移动船。在油门上，一个红色按钮用于给船增压。与Hydro Thunder不同，船只现在可以表演特技以及各种杂技动作。

[英文原文]
Players race using powerboats with various levels of difficulty against other boats, as well as seven other players on nearby cabinets. During the races, players can run into crates that give them power-ups that can range from speed boosts to MegaHull and HullCrusher abilities, which can be used to destroy opposing boats. On the cabinet, a throttle is used to move the boat, instead of pedals. On the throttle, a red button is used to boost the boat. Unlike in Hydro Thunder, boats can now perform stunts, as well as various acrobatic maneuvers.

Harley.bat_name: Harley-Davidson_ King of the Road   競速-哈雷戴維森_公路之王
Harley.title: 哈雷戴維森 公路之王
Harley.notes:
哈雷戴维森：路之王（Harley Davidson:King of the Road）是2009年为Sega Lindbergh街机硬件发布的摩托车游戏。这是继1997年的《Harley-Davidson&L.A.Riders》之后，世嘉推出的第二款受哈雷戴维森启发的街机游戏。

[英文原文]
Harley-Davidson: King of the Road (ハーレー ダビッドソン キング オブ ザ ロード) is a motorcycle game released for Sega Lindbergh arcade hardware in 2009. It is the second Harley-Davidson-inspired arcade game to be produced by Sega, following 1997's Harley-Davidson & L.A. Riders.

HauntedMuseumII.bat_name: Haunted Museum II 射擊光槍-混戰博物館2
HauntedMuseumII.title: 混战博物馆2
HauntedMuseumII.notes:
恐惧笼罩着这座城市。 超过 100 人失踪......推测是被一群疯狂的狂欢节角色拍摄的。 两名特工跟随线索来到一个破旧的游乐园入口。 他们现在知道他们必须做什么......进入 恐怖岛寻找并释放俘虏......并永远关闭大门！恐惧笼罩着这座城市。100多人失踪了……据推测是被一群疯狂的狂欢节人物带走的。两名特工跟随线索来到一个破旧的游乐园入口。他们现在知道他们必须做什么……进入恐怖岛寻找并释放俘虏……并永远关闭大门！

[英文原文]
恐惧笼罩着这座城市。 超过 100 人失踪......推测是被一群疯狂的狂欢节角色拍摄的。 两名特工跟随线索来到一个破旧的游乐园入口。 他们现在知道他们必须做什么......进入 Frightfearland 寻找并释放俘虏......并永远关闭大门！
Fear has gripped the city.  Over 100 people have gone missing… presumed taken by a group of lunatic carnival characters.  Two special agents follow leads to the entrance of a dilapidated amusement park.  They now know what they must do… enter Frightfearland to find and free the captives… and close the gates forever!

HauntedMuseum.bat_name: Haunted Museum 射擊光槍-混戰博物館1
HauntedMuseum.title: 混战博物馆1
HauntedMuseum.notes:
Haunted Museum（恐慌博物馆）是 台东出品的一款光枪游戏。在游戏中，您将扮演两名特工，他们来调查当地博物馆的神秘失踪事件。尽管一旦他们进入内部，他们发现一股超自然的力量控制了这座建筑，使展品栩栩如生，毫不羞于攻击他们。如果这还不够，这些展品有自己的世界，可以将两者运送到不同的环境中，无论多么难以置信（例如太空或水下）。征服每个世界后，一个球体会落在建筑物大厅的纪念碑上。因此，特工们出发去找出究竟是谁或什么影响了博物馆。闹鬼博物馆（日本恐慌博物馆）是台东的一款轻枪游戏。在游戏中，你扮演两名特工，他们来调查当地博物馆的神秘失踪事件。尽管一旦他们进入，他们发现一种超自然的力量控制着这座建筑，使展品栩栩如生，不羞于攻击它们。如果这还不够，展品有自己的世界，将两者带入不同的环境，无论多么难以置信（如太空或水下）。每征服一个世界，一个球体就会落在建筑大厅的纪念碑上。因此，特工们出发去找出到底是谁或什么影响了博物馆。

[英文原文]
Haunted Museum（日本的 Panic Museum）是 Taito 出品的一款光枪游戏。在游戏中，您将扮演两名特工，他们来调查当地博物馆的神秘失踪事件。尽管一旦他们进入内部，他们发现一股超自然的力量控制了这座建筑，使展品栩栩如生，毫不羞于攻击他们。如果这还不够，这些展品有自己的世界，可以将两者运送到不同的环境中，无论多么难以置信（例如太空或水下）。征服每个世界后，一个球体会落在建筑物大厅的纪念碑上。因此，特工们出发去找出究竟是谁或什么影响了博物馆。
Haunted Museum (Panic Museum in Japan) is a Light Gun Game by Taito. In it you play two agents who have come to investigate mysterious disappearances in a local museum. Though once they get inside they find that a supernatural force has a hold over the building, bringing the exhibits to life that are not shy about attacking them. If that wasn't enough, the exhibits have worlds of their own that transport the two into different settings no matter how implausible (such as space or underwater). With each world conquered, an orb falls into place on a monument in the lobby of the building. So the agents head out to find out who or what is exactly affecting the museum.

Homura.title: 炎
Homura.notes:
一个邪恶的堕落天使偷走了神圣的水晶，这是天堂不可触碰的宝藏之一。凭借这颗水晶，他获得了控制德川家康思想的力量，并迫使他占领大阪城堡，利用新获得的力量掌权。在天堂，各个天国家族的领袖组成一个委员会，目的只有一个。..夺回神圣水晶。但他们不能独自做到这一点，所以他们决定利用囚犯Homura来帮助他们。虽然他们不想释放他，但他是唯一一个血液一半是天使，一半是人类的人，这使他对水晶的力量免疫。Homura起初拒绝了，但当他发现他的母亲是大阪的受害者之一时，他拿起剑，准备再次战斗。..Homura是一个自上而下的枪战地狱说服。玩家扮演Homura，在充满恶魔的4个关卡中奋力拼搏。每个阶段都有一条分支路径，Homura可以选择走哪条路线。然而，这些路径将在阶段结束时相遇，所以老板之战将永远是一样的。游戏中有几种处理敌人的方法，最常见的是投射攻击（这是该类型的常态）。这场比赛的独特之处在于Homura的剑刃技术；使用时，它会使敌人的子弹向他们反弹。一次砍下的子弹越多，得分倍数就越高。剑砍每次使用后都需要充电几秒钟。还有强大的特殊攻击，可以清除屏幕上的所有敌人或对boss造成巨大伤害。被杀的敌人会投钱，用来填满一米。当仪表充满时，一个“选项”助手被添加到Homura的侧面，增加额外的火力。宽高比可以在选项菜单中以多种方式更改，其中一种方式是将屏幕侧向放置（用于将电视侧放），使其更类似于原始街机机柜的设置。还有一个可解锁的美术馆，玩家在游戏中玩得越久，就会添加更多的图片。

[英文原文]
An evil fallen angel steals the Divine Crystal, one of Heaven's untouchable treasures. With this crystal he gains the power to control the thoughts of Shogun Ieyasu Tokugawa, and forces him to occupy Osaka castle and put himself in power using his newfound powers. In Heaven, the leaders of the individual heavenly families form a council with one aim... to regain the Divine Crystal. But they can't do this alone, so they decide to use the prisoner Homura to aid them. While they don't want to release him, he is the only one who's blood is half that of an angel and half human making him immune against the Crystal's powers. Homura refuses at first, but when he finds out that his mother was one of the victims at Osaka he picks up his sword and is ready to fight once again...

Homura is a top-down shoot'em up of the bullet-hell persuasion. The player takes on the role of Homura as he fights his way through 4 levels filled with demons. Each stage has a branching path where Homura can pick which route to take. The paths will meet up at the end of the stage however, so the boss fight will always be the same.

There are several ways to dispose of the enemies in the game, where the common one is a projectile attack (as it the norm of the genre). What sets this game apart is Homura's sword slash technique; When used it makes the enemies' bullets bounce back towards them. The more bullets are slashed at once, the higher the score multiplier will be. The sword slash has to be recharged for a few seconds each time after use. There are also powerful special attacks which will clear the screen of all enemies or do massive damage to bosses.

Killed enemies drop money, which is used to fill up a meter. When the meter is full, an "option" helper is added to Homura's side adding additional fire power.

The aspect ratio can be changed in the options menu in a multitude of ways, one of which means placing the screen sideways (for standing the TV on its side) to make it more similar to the original arcade cabinet's setup.

There is also an unlockable art gallery which will have more pictures added to it the further the player makes it through the game.

HotWheels.title: 風火輪賽車
HotWheels.notes:
Collect the best vehicles in the Hot Wheels™ universe, build spectacular tracks and dive into breathtaking races.

COLLECTOR OR ARTIST? BOTH
The most iconic and sought after Hot Wheels™ vehicles are waiting for you. Get ready to make them race at full speed!

ALWAYS RUNNING
Prove your skills by competing in awesome races and get ready for pure fun! Drift, charge the booster and launch yourself into spectacular loops. But be careful! If you're too slow gravity will do its job.

The bigger the challenge, the greater the glory.
Race side by side with your friends in split screen mode for 2 players or face up to 12 opponents in online challenges.

CREATE THE SHAPE OF YOUR TRACK
Waiting to host your races are enormous interactive environments with their own distinguishing features, where every object can become an integral part of the track.

Unleash your creativity with the most exciting track editor ever! Build your track by taking advantage of what surrounds you, and create amazing layouts inside and outside the race course. Bend and stretch the iconic "orange piece", add loops, special boosters, obstacles and special elements to make an incredible amusement park for your races.

RACE IN YOUR WORLD
Furnish your own personal room with a huge number of elements that you will collect during your adventure and host the most amazing races inside it.

HOTDSD.bat_name: House of the Dead_ Scarlet Dawn 射擊光槍-死亡之屋_猩紅黎明_中文_
HOTDSD.title: 死亡之屋：猩红黎明
HOTDSD.notes:
死者之屋：猩红黎明是 死者之家系列的第五款街机游戏。它发生在 2006 年，介于《亡灵之屋 4》和《亡灵之屋 三、的事件之间。游戏的故事讲述了 AMS 特工 凯特·格林和 泰勒潜入稻草人庄园的故事，就在一群生物工程生物发动攻击时。从那时起，他们必须奋力寻找安全之地，同时探索豪宅并揭开疫情的幕后黑手。与该系列的前几款游戏一样，玩家使用枪支控制器射击屏幕上出现的敌人。每个生物都有一个弱点，被击中时会造成额外伤害。除了怪物之外，还有一些平民必须避开。玩家还必须跟踪随时可能需要救援的伙伴。未能在时间用完之前这样做会导致终身监禁。该系列的一个新功能是引入了快速事件，玩家需要快速射击特定目标。重新加载是自动的，但也可以通过指向屏幕外部手动完成。除了主机枪外，玩家还可以在每个关卡之前选择另外两个物品（霰弹枪、手榴弹、火箭发射器等）。在日本版本中，物品是用硬币购买的，这些硬币会因成功行动而获得奖励，例如暴击、获得收藏品和拯救平民，而在国际版本中，物品可以自由选择。另一个日本独有的功能是使用 Aime 卡。它们用于存储进度、保存收集的硬币、完成成就、检查高分和参加全国排行榜。工程师学会功能的一部分也是一个等级系统，玩家每完成一个阶段即可获得经验，每升一级都会获得金币奖励。游戏有两种游戏模式：普通模式和大师模式。普通模式适合初次玩家，包括辅助事件。大师模式适合高级玩家，拥有更强大、更快的敌人。《死亡屋：猩红黎明》是《死亡屋》系列的第五款街机游戏。故事发生在2006年，在《死亡屋4》和《死亡屋3》的事件之间。游戏的故事讲述了AMS特工凯特·格林和瑞安·泰勒在一群生物工程生物攻击时潜入稻草人庄园的故事。从那时起，他们必须在探索豪宅和揭露疫情幕后黑手的同时，奋力争取安全。与该系列之前的游戏一样，玩家使用枪支控制器在敌人出现在屏幕上时射击敌人。每种生物都有一个弱点，被击中时会造成额外伤害。除了怪物，还有平民必须避开。玩家还必须随时跟踪可能需要救援的伙伴。如果在时间用完之前不这样做，将面临终身监禁。该系列的一个新功能是引入快速时间事件，玩家需要快速射击特定目标。重新加载是自动的，但也可以通过指向屏幕外手动完成。除了主机枪外，玩家还可以在每个关卡前选择另外两件物品（霰弹枪、手榴弹、火箭发射器等）。在日本版本中，物品是用硬币购买的，硬币是为了奖励成功的行动，如关键射击、获得的收藏品和拯救的平民，而在国际版本中，可以自由选择物品。另一个日本独有的功能是使用Aime卡。它们用于存储进度、保存收集的硬币、完成成就、查看高分和参加国家排行榜。Aime功能的一部分也是一个等级系统，玩家在完成每个阶段后都会获得经验，每升一级都会获得硬币奖励。游戏有两种游戏模式：正常模式和主模式。正常模式适用于首次参赛者，包括辅助活动。大师模式适用于高级玩家，有更强更快的敌人。

[英文原文]
House of the Dead： Scarlet Dawn 是 House of the Dead 系列的第五款街机游戏。它发生在 2006 年，介于《亡灵之屋 4》和《亡灵之屋 III》的事件之间。游戏的故事讲述了 AMS 特工 Kate Green 和 Ryan Taylor 潜入稻草人庄园的故事，就在一群生物工程生物发动攻击时。从那时起，他们必须奋力寻找安全之地，同时探索豪宅并揭开疫情的幕后黑手。


与该系列的前几款游戏一样，玩家使用枪支控制器射击屏幕上出现的敌人。每个生物都有一个弱点，被击中时会造成额外伤害。除了怪物之外，还有一些平民必须避开。玩家还必须跟踪随时可能需要救援的伙伴。未能在时间用完之前这样做会导致终身监禁。该系列的一个新功能是引入了快速事件，玩家需要快速射击特定目标。重新加载是自动的，但也可以通过指向屏幕外部手动完成。

除了主机枪外，玩家还可以在每个关卡之前选择另外两个物品（霰弹枪、手榴弹、火箭发射器等）。在日本版本中，物品是用硬币购买的，这些硬币会因成功行动而获得奖励，例如暴击、获得收藏品和拯救平民，而在国际版本中，物品可以自由选择。另一个日本独有的功能是使用 Aime 卡。它们用于存储进度、保存收集的硬币、完成成就、检查高分和参加全国排行榜。Aime 功能的一部分也是一个等级系统，玩家每完成一个阶段即可获得经验，每升一级都会获得金币奖励。

游戏有两种游戏模式：普通模式和大师模式。普通模式适合初次玩家，包括辅助事件。大师模式适合高级玩家，拥有更强大、更快的敌人。

House of the Dead: Scarlet Dawn is the fifth arcade game in the House of the Dead series. It takes place in 2006, between the events of The House of the Dead 4 and The House of the Dead III. The game's story follows AMS agents Kate Green and Ryan Taylor who infiltrate Scarecrow Manor just as a horde of bioengineered creatures attack. From then on they have to fight their way to safety while exploring the mansion and uncovering who is behind the outbreak.

Like in previous games in the series, the player uses a gun controller to shoot enemies as they appear on the screen. Each creature has a weak spot that deals extra damage when hit. In addition to the monsters, there are also civilians that have to be avoided. The player also has to keep track of the partner who at any time might need to be rescued. Failure to do so before time runs out leads to a life penalty. A new feature to the series is the introduction of quick-time events in which the player needs to quickly shoot a specific target. Reloading is automatic but can also be done manually by pointing outside the screen.

In addition to the main machine gun, the player can choose two more items (shotgun, grenade, rocket launcher, etc.) ahead of each level. In the Japanese version, items are bought with coins which are awarded for successful actions such as critical shots, collectibles obtained and saved civilians while in the international versions items can be chosen freely. Another Japan-exclusive feature is the use of Aime cards. They are used for storing progress, keeping collected coins, completing achievements, checking high scores and taking part in national leaderboards. Part of the Aime functionality is also a level system where players earn experience for each stage completed and are rewarded with coins for every level up.

The game has two game modes: normal mode and master mode. The normal mode is for first time players and includes assistance events. The master mode is for advanced players and has stronger and faster enemies.

Hummer.title: 悍馬
Hummer.notes:
4x4悍马是一款赛车游戏，玩家可以使用通用汽车公司十辆获得许可的越野车中的一辆。游戏的核心是职业模式，玩家必须在不同的比赛中成功驾驶。用挣来的钱，他可以为他的车买新设备。除了通常的圆形赛道外，游戏还包括在开阔地形上的越野比赛，玩家必须调整自己的方向，并在每一次不规则的情况下进行挑战，例如撞倒赛道边界或打破太久，都会导致积分损失。

[英文原文]
4x4 Hummer is a racing game where the player can use one of ten licensed off-road vehicles by General Motors. The heart of the game is the career mode where the player has to drive successfully in different races. With the earned price money he can buy new equipment for his car. Besides the usual round courses the game also features off-road races in open terrain where the player has to orientate himself and challenges where every irregularity, e.g. knocking down the course boundaries or breaking for too long, results in a loss of points.

hummerextreme.bat_name: Hummer Extreme Edition   競速-悍馬至尊版
hummerextreme.title: 悍馬至尊版
hummerextreme.notes:
悍马：极限版是世嘉的越野赛车游戏。这款游戏由通用汽车授权，让你驾驶悍马SUV。玩家必须在各种不同的地形中导航，包括雪、泥和泥土。使用“驾驶员更换系统”，单个机柜可以作为2人游戏运行。驾驶员根据检查站的时间和与其他车辆的接触而改变。课程包括Bluster Canyon（初级）、Isolated Jungle（中级）、Calibou Valley（高级）和Industrial Hill（专业）。每个过程中都有各种各样的障碍，可以摧毁这些障碍来积累能量。一旦仪表达到最大值，玩家可以使用加速按钮，使玩家加速并在短时间内变得坚不可摧。

[英文原文]
Hummer: Extreme Edition is an off-road racing game from Sega. The game is licensed by General Motors and puts you behind the wheel of a Hummer SUV. Players must navigate a variety of different terrains including snow, mud, and dirt.

A single cabinet can operate as a 2-player game using the "Driver Change System". The driver changes according to the timing of checkpoints and contact with other cars. Courses available are Bluster Canyon (beginner), Isolated Jungle (intermediate), Calibou Valley (advanced), and Industrial Hill (pro). There are various obstacles throughout each course which can be destroyed to accumulate boost. Once the gauge reaches maximum, players can use the boost button which makes the player speed up and become indestructible for a short period of time.

HyperSportsChina.bat_name: Hyper Sports _Remake_   體育-超激鬥競技場_重製版
HyperSportsChina.title: 超激鬥競技場 重製版
HyperSportsChina.notes:
Hyper Sports，在日本被称为Hyper Olympic'84，是Konami于1984年发布的街机游戏。它是1983年《田径》的续集，有七个全新的奥运项目。与其前身一样，Hyper Sports每个玩家有两个跑步按钮和一个动作按钮。日本发行的这款游戏获得了1984年夏季奥运会的官方许可。

[英文原文]
Hyper Sports, known in Japan as Hyper Olympic '84 is an arcade game published in 1984 by Konami. It is the sequel to 1983's Track & Field and features seven all-new Olympic events. Like its predecessor, Hyper Sports has two run buttons and one action button per player. The Japanese release of the game sported an official license for the 1984 Summer Olympics.

HyperStreetFighterII.bat_name: Hyper Street Fighter II - The Anniversary Edition for NESiCAxLive   格鬥-街頭霸王2 十五週年紀念版
HyperStreetFighterII.title: 街頭霸王2 十五週年紀念版
HyperStreetFighterII.notes:
本次发布是为了庆祝《街头霸王》系列15周年。所有《街头霸王2》游戏（《世界勇士》、《超级格斗》、《冠军版》、《Super》、《Turbo》和《Super Turbo》）中的所有角色都被整合到一个全新的《街头霸王2中》中。

[英文原文]
This release celebrates the 15th anniversary of the Street Fighter series. All of the characters from all the Street Fighter 2 games (the World Warrior, Hyper Fighting, Championship Edition, Super, Turbo, and Super Turbo) have been brought into one, brand new Street Fighter 2.

Ikaruga.bat_name: Ikaruga for NESiCAxLive   射擊-斑鳩
Ikaruga.title: 斑鳩
Ikaruga.notes:
Ikaruga是由Treasure开发的射击游戏。它是《光芒银枪》的精神续作，最初于2001年12月在日本街机上发行。游戏的故事讲述了一位名叫Shinra的叛军飞行员使用一种名为Ikaruga的特殊设计的战斗机与敌国作战，该战斗机可以在黑白两极之间切换。这种极性机制是游戏的关键特征，也是其舞台和敌人设计的基础。游戏中的所有敌人和子弹都是黑色或白色的。与玩家颜色相同的子弹会被吸收，而其他子弹会杀死玩家。游戏有单人模式和合作模式

[英文原文]
Ikaruga is a shoot 'em up video game developed by Treasure. It is the spiritual sequel to Radiant Silvergun and was originally released in Japanese arcades in December 2001. The game's story follows a rebel pilot named Shinra as he battles an enemy nation using a specially designed fighter called the Ikaruga which can flip between two polarities, black and white. This polarity mechanic is the game's key feature and the foundation for its stage and enemy design. All enemies and bullets in the game are either black or white. Bullets which are the same color as the player are absorbed while the others will kill the player. The game features both single-player and cooperative modes

InfinityBladeFX.title: 无尽之剑
InfinityBladeFX.notes:
Infinity Blade FX将奇幻RPG动作带回街机！这款游戏基于流行的手机游戏《无尽之刃》，其华丽的视觉效果由EPIC的虚幻引擎3提供支持，所有这些都可以使用大型多点触控屏幕进行控制。玩家使用基本的手指滑动动作与各种具有挑战性的对手进行激战。当你向邪恶的神王和无限之刃前进时，你可以攻击、格挡、躲闪或阻挡各种小黄人。你还可以升级你的技能、武器和盔甲，让你的任务更加刺激，值得一次又一次地玩。

[英文原文]
Infinity Blade FX brings fantasy RPG action back to the arcade! Based on the popular mobile game Infinity Blade, this game features gorgeous visuals powered by EPIC’s Unreal Engine 3, all controlled using the large multi-touch screen.

Players use basic finger swipe moves to spar with a variety of challenging opponents. You can attack, parry, dodge or block against the various minions as you advance your way towards the sinister God-King and the Infinity Blade. You can also upgrade your skills, weapons and armor to make your quest more exciting and worth playing over and over again.

ID4Exp.bat_name: Initial D_ Arcade Stage 4 _Export_   競速-頭文字D ARCADE STAGE 4
ID4Exp.title: 頭文字D ARCADE STAGE 4
ID4Exp.notes:
Initial D Arcade Stage 4（在美国也称为Initial D4）是一款基于Initial D系列的2007年街机赛车游戏。这是《Initial D Arcade Stage》系列的第四款游戏。还有一个限量版，名为Initial D Arcade Stage 4 Kai。这是最后一个进行完整英语本地化的条目。与该系列中的旧游戏不同，这些游戏是对原始游戏的修订，Initial D Arcade Stage 4有一个为Sega Lindbergh街机系统编写的全新物理引擎。这个新系统允许汽车在过弯时在赛道上滑动或漂移。

[英文原文]
Initial D Arcade Stage 4 (also known as Initial D4 in the US) is a 2007 arcade racing game based on the Initial D series. It is the fourth game in the Initial D Arcade Stage series. A limited edition, called Initial D Arcade Stage 4 Kai, also exists. This is the last entry to have a full English localization.

Unlike the older games in this series, which were revisions of the original title, Initial D Arcade Stage 4 has a completely new physics engine written for the Sega Lindbergh arcade system. This new system allows cars to actually slide, or drift, across the track when clearing corners.

ID4Jap.bat_name: Initial D_ Arcade Stage 4 _Japanese_   競速-頭文字D ARCADE STAGE 4 日版
ID4Jap.title: 頭文字D ARCADE STAGE 4 日版
ID4Jap.notes:
Initial D Arcade Stage 4（在美国也称为Initial D4）是一款基于Initial D系列的2007年街机赛车游戏。这是《Initial D Arcade Stage》系列的第四款游戏。还有一个限量版，名为Initial D Arcade Stage 4 Kai。这是最后一个进行完整英语本地化的条目。与该系列中的旧游戏不同，这些游戏是对原始游戏的修订，Initial D Arcade Stage 4有一个为Sega Lindbergh街机系统编写的全新物理引擎。这个新系统允许汽车在过弯时在赛道上滑动或漂移。

[英文原文]
Initial D Arcade Stage 4 (also known as Initial D4 in the US) is a 2007 arcade racing game based on the Initial D series. It is the fourth game in the Initial D Arcade Stage series. A limited edition, called Initial D Arcade Stage 4 Kai, also exists. This is the last entry to have a full English localization.
