ID5.bat_name: Initial D_ Arcade Stage 5 _Export_   競速-頭文字D ARCADE STAGE 5
ID5.title: 頭文字D ARCADE STAGE 5
ID5.notes:
《Initial D Arcade Stage 5》（回归日文版）于2009年发布，是《Initial D Arcade Stage》系列的第五个版本。第二次发布之前的硬件（屏幕大多像Sega RingEdge）。一些显著的差异包括重大的物理变化。与最初的D街机第4阶段/极限阶段相反，最初的D Arcade第5阶段具有更真实的驾驶物理，包括轮胎和制动器磨损。虽然轮胎和刹车磨损在游戏中没有显示在任何地方，但经验丰富的玩家可以在比赛中注意到物理变化的差异。首次出现在游戏中的新角色有：小林川、大宫中本、冒名顶替计划D、小川凯（R.T.Katagiri S.V.）和井川秀夫。Happogahara等新课程也从Arcade Stage到Arcade Stage Ver.3/Street Stage（只有白天使用的是晚上）和Extreme Stage也出现了，白天和晚上之间有全天时间，还有R.T.Katagiri S.V.的主场Nagao。

[英文原文]
Released in 2009, Initial D Arcade Stage 5 (return to Japanese version) is the fifth release in the Initial D Arcade Stage series. Released for the previous hardware for the second time (The screen mostly like Sega RingEdge). A few notable differences include heavy physics changes. Opposite to Initial D Arcade Stage 4/Extreme Stage, which took on a "drifting" physics, Initial D Arcade Stage 5 had a more realistic driving physics which includes tire and brake wear down. Although the tire and brake wear are not displayed anywhere in game, experienced players can notice the difference in the change in physics as they progress in races.

New characters that appeared for the first time in the game are: Kobayakawa, Satoshi Omiya, Imposter Project D, Kai Kogashiwa (R.T. Katagiri S.V.), and Hideo Minagawa. New courses such as Happogahara, which also used from Arcade Stage to Arcade Stage Ver.3/Street Stage (only daytime used is night) and only Extreme Stage also appeared with full daytimes between day and night and Nagao, R.T. Katagiri S.V.'s homecourse.

ID6.bat_name: Initial D_ Arcade Stage 6 Double Ace   競速-頭文字D ARCADE STAGE 6 AA
ID6.title: 頭文字D ARCADE STAGE 6 AA
ID6.notes:
最初的D街机第6阶段AA于2011年3月发布。引入了一种新模式，标签战。与其前身一样，这款游戏的驱动物理发生了变化。引入了漂移计和更新的转速表，以帮助告知玩家他们是否在漂移。转速表现在会通知玩家他们的速度是否低于档位范围。在线网络扩展到支持早期版本游戏流行的地区，最终实现了全国和国际比赛。这是该系列首次通过在线更新将新车和课程添加到游戏中，而无需像IDAS4 1.5这样的升级套件。游戏还增加了里程系统，向玩家显示他们的总行驶里程。里程数可用于兑换后来在更新中可用的独家汽车。首次出现在游戏中的新角色有：池田龙二、冈山博雅、围棋和林和。

[英文原文]
Initial D Arcade Stage 6 AA was released in March 2011.

A new mode, Tag Battle, was introduced. Like its predecessor, the game saw a change in its driving physics. A drift gauge and an updated tachometer was introduced to help inform players whether they're drifting or not. The tachometer now inform players if their speed is below the gear range. Online network is extended to support regions in which earlier versions of the game was known to be popular in, finally achieving both national wide and international matches. For the first time in series, new cars and courses are added to the game through online updates without upgrade kits like IDAS4 1.5. The game also added a mileage system to show players their total driven mileage. Mileages can be used to redeem exclusive cars that were later available in updates. New characters that appeared for the first time in the game are: Ryuji Ikeda, Hiroya Okuyama, and Go and Rin Hojo.

ID7.bat_name: Initial D_ Arcade Stage 7 Double Ace Cross   競速-頭文字D ARCADE STAGE 7 AAX
ID7.title: 頭文字D ARCADE STAGE 7 AAX
ID7.notes:
世嘉开发的基于动漫和漫画《Initial D》的长期运行的Initial D Arcade Stage街机赛车游戏系列中的第七款游戏。此游戏包括新的关东行动标签战模式，您和朋友可以在该模式下标记团队对手角色，一个上坡，另一个下坡。

[英文原文]
The 7th game in the long running Initial D Arcade Stage arcade racing game series developed by Sega, based on the anime and manga Initial D. This entry includes the new Operation Kanto Tag Battle mode where you and a friend can tag-team rival characters, with one racing uphill and the other racing downhill.

ID8.bat_name: Initial D_ Arcade Stage 8 Infinity 競速-頭文字D ARCADE STAGE 8 無限
ID8.title: 頭文字D ARCADE STAGE 8 無限
ID8.notes:
初始D街机8无限∞于2014年7月17日发布。与其前身一样，这款游戏继承了前一版本的所有游戏模式，并显著增加了初始D工厂和D硬币。在故事模式中，玩家可以扮演团队或对手，查看驾驶训练库或每个故事的任务。游戏增加了一个新功能“1天1次继续”，允许玩家每天免费继续，而无需插入积分。新的球场，如Momiji线，首次出现在特殊阶段，也出现了新的布局和箱根，这是Ryosuke的FC和Rin Hojo的R32之间的战斗地点。街机舞台第三版/街头舞台角色，如三木、川井敦郎和兰Evo团队也出现了。

[英文原文]
Initial D Arcade Stage 8 Infinity ∞ was released July 17, 2014. Like its predecessor, this game carries over all game modes from the previous version with a notable addition of Initial D Factory and D Coins. In Story Mode, the players can play the Team Side or Rival Side to see Driving Training Curiculum or what mission is for each story. The game added a new feature "1 Day 1 Time Continue" to allow players to have a free continue per day without inserting credits. New courses such as Momiji Line, for the first time in Special Stage, also appeared with new layout and Hakone, the place for battle between Ryosuke's FC and Rin Hojo's R32. Arcade Stage Ver.3/Street Stage characters such as Miki, Atsuro Kawai and The Lan Evo Teams also appeared.

IDZTP.bat_name: Initial D_ Arcade Stage Zero   競速-頭文字D_零之挑戰者
IDZTP.title: 頭文字D 零之挑戰者
IDZTP.notes:
2018年10月9日在Sega Nu2街机系统板上发布。与前作不同，这款游戏现在使用了6速换挡器（类似于万安午夜最大调游戏中的换挡器），而不是顺序换挡器。角色设计取自《New Initial D The Movie》，采用了全新的背景音乐，这些背景音乐是《Backdraft Smiths》、《Clutcho》、《The Hug Me》、《阀门》和《Gekkou Green》等电影中的摇滚歌曲。之前游戏中的少数欧洲节拍歌曲也有特色，但必须解锁。此外，除了电影中出现的丰田86外，这些车辆已经减少了上一场比赛中出现的原始车辆。然而，今年晚些时候，通过免费更新增加了更多的车辆。

[英文原文]
Released for the Sega Nu2 arcade system board on October 9, 2018. Unlike its predecessors, this game now uses a 6-speed gear shifter (similar to the ones found in the Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune games) as opposed to the sequential ones. The character designs are taken from New Initial D the Movie with entirely new BGMs that are rock songs from the films such as Backdraft Smiths, Clutcho, The Hug Me, The Valves, and Gekkou Green. A small number of Eurobeat songs from previous games are also featured but have to be unlocked. Also, the vehicles have been reduced by original ones featured in the last games, except for the Toyota 86, which was featured in the films. However, more vehicles were added through free updates later in the year.

IDZv2TP.bat_name: Initial D_ Arcade Stage Zero Ver_2   競速-頭文字D_零之挑戰者V2 tp
IDZv2TP.title: 頭文字D 零之挑戰者V2 tp
IDZv2TP.notes:
2018年10月9日在Sega Nu2街机系统板上发布。与前作不同，这款游戏现在使用了6速换挡器（类似于万安午夜最大调游戏中的换挡器），而不是顺序换挡器。角色设计取自《New Initial D The Movie》，采用了全新的背景音乐，这些背景音乐是《Backdraft Smiths》、《Clutcho》、《The Hug Me》、《阀门》和《Gekkou Green》等电影中的摇滚歌曲。之前游戏中的少数欧洲节拍歌曲也有特色，但必须解锁。此外，除了电影中出现的丰田86外，这些车辆已经减少了上一场比赛中出现的原始车辆。然而，今年晚些时候，通过免费更新增加了更多的车辆。

[英文原文]

Unlike its predecessors, this game now uses a 6-speed gear shifter (similar to the ones found in the Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune games) as opposed to the sequential ones. The character designs are taken from New Initial D the Movie with entirely new BGMs that are rock songs from the films such as Backdraft Smiths, Clutcho, The Hug Me, The Valves, and Gekkou Green. IDTA.bat_name: Initial D_ The Arcade _Season 3_   競速-頭文字D_第三賽季
IDTA.title: 頭文字D 第三賽季
IDTA.notes:
Initial D The Arcade是一款基于Initial D系列的2021街机赛车游戏。这是第十款Initial D街机游戏，尽管它与arcade Stage系列是分开的。与之前使用专有游戏引擎的游戏不同，这款游戏使用了虚幻引擎4。与之前街机舞台游戏的一对一体验不同，Initial D the Arcade一次最多可容纳四名玩家参赛。尽管如此，一对一的战斗仍然存在，故事中出现了几场。该游戏也是第一个使用不同玩家化身模型的游戏，而不是从Arcade Stage 4到Arcade Stage Zero重复使用的相同模型。这款游戏于2020年7月23日和24日首次推出，进行了位置测试，即“点火”。2020年12月11日，在其首次“官方直播”中透露了更多信息。在2021年1月8日至18日的最后一次测试中，它再次正式可玩。该游戏于2021年2月19日进行了第二次播出，然后于2021年1月25日在日本全国范围内发布。2021年7月29日起，出口版在亚洲发布。2023年2月25日，官方社区推特账户宣布将把游戏的运营扩展到其他国家。2023年8月29日，世嘉和Wahlap合作在中国发布了这款游戏。在正式发布之前，在一次会议上进行了位置测试。这包括与导出版本不同的游戏的完全中文本地化，以及通过微信的二维码扫描仪而不是娱乐IC卡登录。然而，中国版本与世嘉的服务器分开运行，并使用第二季的旧版本。Aime卡上有Arcade Stage Zero保存文件的玩家将获得连续游戏奖励。这些奖励包括之前拥有的每辆完全调校的汽车的全调汽车票、基于玩家魅力水平和名气的游戏、Arcade Stage Zero化身t恤和连帽衫、基于玩家里程的化身和装扮代币。持有世嘉世界车手锦标赛保存文件的玩家将获得一件t恤和连帽衫，以及一张基于其车手级别的全调汽车票。

[英文原文]
Initial D The Arcade is a 2021 arcade racing game based on the Initial D series. It is the tenth Initial D arcade game, although it is separate from the Arcade Stage series. Unlike previous games, which used proprietary game engines, the game makes use of Unreal Engine 4.
Unlike the previous one-on-one experience of the Arcade Stage games, Initial D The Arcade features up to four players racing at any one time. Despite this, one-on-one battles are still available, with several appearing in the story. The game was also the first to use a different player avatar model as opposed to the same ones reused from Arcade Stage 4 to Arcade Stage Zero.

This game was first playable on the 23rd and 24th of July 2020, in its location test, or "Ignition". More information was revealed on the 11th of December 2020 in its first "official live broadcast". It was officially playable again from the 8th through to the 18th of January 2021 during its final test. The game had a second broadcast on the 19th of February 2021 before its nationwide release in Japan on the 25th of February 2021. An export edition was released in Asia starting from the 29th of July 2021.

On 25th February 2023, the official community Twitter account announced that it would be expanding the operation of the game into other countries. On 29th August 2023, the game was released in China with the collaboration between Sega and Wahlap. A location test was held at a convention before the official release. This includes a full Chinese localization of the game unlike the export version and login via WeChat's QR scanner instead of an Amusement IC card. However, the Chinese release runs separate from Sega's servers and uses an older version from season 2.

Players with a save file from Arcade Stage Zero on their Aime card were given continuous play rewards. These rewards include a full tune car ticket for each fully tuned car previously owned, titles based on the player's charisma level and fame, an Arcade Stage Zero avatar t-shirt and hoodie, avatar and dress up tokens based on the player's mileage. Players with a Sega World Driver Championship save file were given a t-shirt and hoodie and one full tune car ticket based on their driver level.

Injustice.title: 正义联盟：英雄联盟
Injustice.notes:
《不义联盟2》是一款由NetherRealm Studios开发、华纳兄弟互动娱乐公司发行的格斗视频游戏。这是2013年《不义：众神在我们中间》的续集。该游戏最初于2017年5月在PlayStation 4和Xbox One上发布；微软Windows版本于2017年11月晚些时候发布。游戏的扩展版本名为《不义联盟2：传奇版》，于2018年3月在PlayStation 4、Xbox One和Microsoft Windows上发布。与上一期类似，为Android和iOS设备发布了配套的移动应用程序。由汤姆·泰勒撰写的同名前传漫画系列也于2017年4月开始发行。核心游戏玩法仍然与其前身相似，尽管对返回的游戏机制进行了小幅调整。《不义联盟2》引入了一个名为齿轮系统的新功能，这是一个战利品掉落系统，可以用服装和装备奖励玩家，这些服装和装备可以用来定制角色的外观，修改他们的能力和统计数据。据开发者称，在《真人快打》系列的原始发行商Midway Games倒闭之前，就已经存在将角色扮演游戏（RPG）风格的进度系统实现为战斗游戏的想法。导演Ed Boon还试图将多人射击游戏使用的游戏机制，如个性化、角色创建、战利品和升级，融入战斗游戏类型中，从而开发了Gear System。《不义联盟2》的故事情节围绕蝙蝠侠及其叛乱者在超人政权垮台后试图恢复社会展开；然而，新成立的超级恶棍团体“社会”和外星人Brainiac的到来迫使蝙蝠侠考虑释放被监禁的超人，以帮助对抗威胁。该游戏得到了评论家的积极评价，他们称赞了它的故事、演示、改进的游戏机制、丰富的游戏内容和角色定制选项，同时批评了它的随机战利品和微交易系统。

[英文原文]
Injustice 2 is a fighting video game developed by NetherRealm Studios and published by Warner Bros. Interactive Entertainment. It is the sequel to 2013's Injustice: Gods Among Us. The game was initially released in May 2017 for the PlayStation 4 and Xbox One; a Microsoft Windows version was released later in November 2017. An expanded version of the game, titled Injustice 2: Legendary Edition, was released in March 2018 for the PlayStation 4, Xbox One, and Microsoft Windows. Similar to the previous installment, a companion mobile app was released for Android and iOS devices. A prequel comic book series of the same name, written by Tom Taylor, was also released beginning in April 2017.

The core gameplay remains similar to its predecessor, albeit with minor adjustments to returning game mechanics. Injustice 2 introduces a new feature called the Gear System, a loot-dropping system that rewards players with costume pieces and equipment that can be used to customize characters' appearances and modify their abilities and stats. According to developers, the idea for implementing a role playing game (RPG)-style progression system into a fighting game had existed since before the fall of Midway Games, the original publisher for the Mortal Kombat series. Director Ed Boon also sought to incorporate gameplay mechanics used by multiplayer shooter games, such as personalization, character creation, loot, and leveling up, into the fighting game genre, which led to the development of the Gear System.

Injustice 2's storyline centers around Batman and his insurgency's attempt to restore society after the fall of Superman's regime; however, the arrivals of the newly formed supervillain group "The Society" and the alien Brainiac forces Batman to consider freeing the imprisoned Superman to help combat the threats. The game received positive reviews from critics, who praised its story, presentation, improved gameplay mechanics, abundance of in-game content, and character customization options, while criticizing its random loot and microtransaction systems.

JojoLastSurvivor.title: JOJO的奇妙冒險：最後的生還者
JojoLastSurvivor.notes:
JoJo的奇异冒险：最后的幸存者是一款第三人称战斗royale动作游戏。该游戏在一场比赛中最多可支持20名玩家，并包含该系列第3、4、5和6部分的角色。玩家每人控制一个角色，在广阔的地图上漫游，随着危险区域逐渐吞噬环境，地图的有效大小逐渐减小。玩家在地图上随机部署在预定的方形区域。然后，他们必须相互战斗，耗尽敌人的生命值，直到一个生命值耗尽，敌人被消灭。玩家需要使用他们的站立能力才能成为最后一个站立的人。根据模式的不同，玩家也可以分成不同的阵营，而不是让盟友一起战斗并能够复活。《Last Survivor》的独特之处在于能够升级你的角色。玩家通过从倒下的敌人那里收集扑克筹码来升级，其风格类似于Daniel J.D'Arby的Stand Osiris。通过升级，玩家将获得更多Stand的能力。举个例子，Jotaro必须达到4级才能使用Star Platinum The World’s Time Stop。

[英文原文]
JoJo’s Bizarre Adventure: Last Survivor is a 3rd person battle royale action game. The game supports up to 20 players in a single match and features characters from Parts 3, 4, 5 and 6 of the series.

The players each control one character and roam in a vast map, whose effective size reduces gradually as a dangerous zone progressively engulfs the environment. The players are deployed randomly on the map in predetermined square zones. They then must fight each other, depleting the enemy's health bar until one is depleted and the enemy is eliminated. Players will need to utilize their Stand powers to be the last person standing. Depending on the mode, players can also be split into distinct sides instead with allies fighting together and being able to be revived.

Unique to Last Survivor is the ability to level up your character. Players level up by collecting poker chips from fallen enemies, similar in style to those produced by Daniel J. D'Arby's Stand Osiris. By leveling up, players will gain access to more of their Stand's abilities. An example of this is that Jotaro must be level 4 in order to use Star Platinum The World's Time Stop.

JurassicPark.bat_name: Jurassic Park 射擊光槍-侏羅紀公園街機版
JurassicPark.title: 侏罗纪公园街机
JurassicPark.notes:
侏罗纪公园：街机》是一款基于《侏罗纪公园》系列的第一人称视角的 3D 光枪射击游戏。努布拉岛上的一座火山喷发，使公园所在的岛屿变得不稳定。玩家是被派去追踪和捕捉几种恐龙物种的团队的一员。游戏共有九个阶段和三个 老板：三角龙、霸王龙和棘龙。在玩游戏时，玩家必须射击 30 多个不同的敌人。玩游戏时总共可以使用五种不同的武器。它们是 X-22叛徒、泰坦2000、冲击螺栓、冻伤加农炮和 三重威胁该游戏可以单人玩，也可以与朋友一起玩。侏罗纪公园：街机是一款基于侏罗纪公园特许经营权的第一人称视角的3D轻枪射击游戏。努布拉岛上爆发了一座火山，使公园所在的岛屿变得不稳定。玩家是被派去追踪和捕捉几种恐龙物种的团队的一员。游戏共有九个阶段和三个老板：三角龙、霸王龙和棘龙。在玩游戏时，玩家必须击落30多个不同的敌人。游戏中总共可以使用五种不同的武器。这些是X-22叛徒、泰坦2000、冲击螺栓、冻伤大炮和三重威胁。这个游戏可以单独玩，也可以和朋友一起玩。

[英文原文]
侏罗纪公园：街机》是一款基于《侏罗纪公园》系列的第一人称视角的 3D 光枪射击游戏。努布拉岛上的一座火山喷发，使公园所在的岛屿变得不稳定。玩家是被派去追踪和捕捉几种恐龙物种的团队的一员。

游戏共有九个阶段和三个 Boss：三角龙、霸王龙和棘龙。在玩游戏时，玩家必须射击 30 多个不同的敌人。玩游戏时总共可以使用五种不同的武器。它们是 X-22 Renegade、Titan 2000、Shockbolt、Frostbite 加农炮和 Triple Threat。该游戏可以单人玩，也可以与朋友一起玩。
Jurassic Park: Arcade is a 3D lightgun shooter played from a first-person perspective based on the Jurassic Park franchise. A volcano has erupted on Isla Nublar leaving the island the park stands on unstable. The player is part of a team send to track down and capture several dinosaur species.

The game offers a total of nine stages and three bosses: a Triceratops, Tyrannosaurus and Spinosaurus. While playing the player has to gun down over thirty different enemies. A total of five different weapons can be used while playing. These are the X-22 Renegade, Titan 2000, Shockbolt, Frostbite cannon and Triple Threat. The game can be played solo or with a friend.

JusticeLeague.title: 動作-正義聯盟英雄聯盟
JusticeLeague.notes:
《正义联盟英雄联盟》是一款基于正义联盟漫画书的街机游戏。

[英文原文]
Justice League Heroes United is an arcade game based on the Justice League comic book.

KOn2.title: 輕音少女：課後節奏精選
KOn2.notes:
开！！Hokage节奏选择（放学后节奏选择）是世嘉基于K-on的第二款纸牌游戏！K-ON之后将获得许可证！Hokage Rhythm于2013年发布。这款游戏基于PSP版本K-on！Hokage直播。动画中有46张不同的卡片、7个舞台和音乐。

[英文原文]
K-ON!! Hokage Rhythm Selection (After School Rhythm Selection) is the second card game from Sega based on K-ON! licence coming after K-ON! Hokage Rhythm released in 2013. The game is based on the PSP version named K-ON! Hokage Live. There are 46 different cards, 7 stages and music from the anime.

KODrive.bat_name: K_O_ Drive _Prototype_   競速-死亡飛車
KODrive.title: 死亡飛車
KODrive.notes:
早在2012年，世嘉就在迪拜举行的DEAL 2012贸易展上推出了一款名为KO Drive的新型战斗驾驶街机游戏。之后，该游戏偶尔出现在其他贸易展上，但最终被取消。这款易于上手的战斗赛车游戏在设计时考虑了多人游戏。路线包括伦敦、拉斯维加斯、上海、多伦多、开罗和罗马。

[英文原文]
Back in 2012, Sega unveiled a new combat driving arcade game called KO Drive at the DEAL 2012 trade show in Dubai. Afterwards, the game made an occasional appearance at other trade shows, but ultimately was cancelled.

This easy to pick up battle-racing game has been designed with multiplayer action in mind. Tracks include London, Vegas, Shanghai, Toronto, Cairo and Rome.

Kasiori.title: 卡西里
Kasiori.notes:
一个以漂亮女孩为主题的坠落物体拼图！-一款落块益智游戏，可爱漂亮的女孩出现在游戏中，用一个以“糖果”为主题的益智游戏相互对抗。如果你把从屏幕顶部并排落下的三个糖果放在一起，糖果就会消失。● 当你把瓶子撞在一起时，瓶子里的糖果会碎出来。当它断裂时，一条链在八个方向上出现。● 您可以在单人模式或双人模式下玩，这是根据故事量身定制的。-流行的《棉花摇滚》的主角棉花也出现了，并被用作玩家角色。

[英文原文]
A falling object puzzle with a sweets motif of beautiful girls!

-A falling block puzzle game in which cute beautiful girls appear and play against each other with a puzzle with the motif of “sweets”.
If you arrange three sweets that fall from the top of the screen side by side, the sweets will disappear.

● When you hit the bottles against each other, the sweets in the bottle will break and appear. When it breaks, a chain occurs in eight directions.

● You can play in either the one-player mode or the two-player mode, which is tailored to the story.

-Cotton, the main character of the popular “Cotton Rock and Roll”, has also appeared and is used as a player character.

KeyOfAvalon.title: The Key of Avalon
KeyOfAvalon.notes:
Avalon no Kagi是一款基于纸牌的街机游戏。这个游戏是棋盘游戏和纸牌游戏的混合体。游戏有一个读卡器，插槽可以在几秒钟内读取整副牌。其次，有一个触摸屏，根本不使用任何按钮进行播放。起初，游戏让你从十几个不同的化身中进行选择，也让你阅读你的牌组。游戏设置了一个由四名玩家组成的棋盘，他们有两个角色。一个是名为“阿瓦隆钥匙”的持有者。持有者必须参观四座塔楼中的三座和剩下的城堡才能赢得比赛。剩下的追捕者试图通过撞到钥匙架并与你的同伴怪物开始战斗来获得钥匙。要在球场上移动，你每回合使用六张牌。有怪物卡、怪物支持卡和角色支持卡，分为颜色（绿色、黄色、红色、蓝色）、稀有值（共有五种），以及它们在攻击、防御和移动方面的价值。

[英文原文]
Avalon no Kagi is a card-based arcade game.

The game is a mix of board game and card game. The game has a card reader, where the slot can read an entire deck of cards in a matter of seconds. Secondly, there is a touchscreen, using no buttons at all to play.

At first the game makes you choose out of about a dozen different avatars as well making you read your deck. The game lays out a board with four players which have two roles. One is the holder with the name “Key of Avalon”. The holder must visit three out of four towers and the the remaining castle to win the game. The remaining chasers try to get the key by bumping into the holder and starting the battle with your accompanied monster. To move on the field, you use six cards in each turn. There are monster cards, monster support and character support cards, divided into colors (green, yellow, red, blue), rarity value (of which there are five), and also their value in attack, defense and movement.

KingOfFightersXIV.title: 拳皇14
KingOfFightersXIV.notes:
KOF XIV是备受赞誉的《拳王》系列格斗游戏中的最新成员。KOF XIV由资深创作者和《致命怒火》创作者小田康行领导，在实现新的3D视觉效果的同时，采用了该系列众所周知的标志性游戏玩法，这是该系列主线作品的第一次！这款游戏在基础游戏中拥有50个角色的强大阵容，以及4个DLC角色（单独出售），包括回归粉丝的最爱和新角色，非常适合老手和新手！

[英文原文]
KOF XIV is the newest entry in the acclaimed THE KING OF FIGHTERS series of fighting games. Lead by veteran creator and FATAL FURY creator Yasuyuki Oda, KOF XIV takes the iconic gameplay that the series is known for while implementing new 3D visuals, a first for a mainline entry in the series! Featuring a robust roster of 50 characters in the base game along with 4 DLC characters (sold separately), including both returning fan favorites and new characters, this entry is perfect for veterans and newcomers alike!

KingofFightersSkyStage.title: 拳皇：天空舞台
KingofFightersSkyStage.notes:
KOF Sky Stage是一款街机垂直射击游戏，角色为战斗机之王。为了营救被困在奥罗奇维度监狱的战士，这些英雄被赋予了在天空中飞行的能力，并利用他们的能力击落各种恶魔和幽灵。

[英文原文]
KOF Sky Stage is an arcade vertical  shooting game with King of Fighters characters. In order to rescue fighters trapped in Orochi's dimensional prison, these heroes have been given the ability to fly through the skies and use their abilities to shoot down various demons and wraiths.

KingofFightersXIII.title: 拳皇13
KingofFightersXIII.notes:
《拳王XIII》最初于2010年在台东Type X街机版上发布，是该系列中最后一款使用基于精灵图形的游戏。移植到PC的内容比街机游戏更多，比如新角色、新阶段和游戏模式。 Global Match版本（于2025年2月20日发布）配备了回滚网络代码，用于令人兴奋的在线游戏，以及全新的在线大厅，允许您一次加入/观看多个玩家的比赛。此外，还有36个可玩角色的阵容，包括NESTS Style Kyo、Classic Iori和Mr.Karate！KOF有史以来最伟大的2D图形在你面对在线和世界各地的玩家时栩栩如生！・3-ON-3团队战斗：选择一个默认的3个角色的团队，或者通过选择3个角色来组建自己的团队，与团队战斗直到胜利！通过选择最适合你的角色来制定你自己的团队战略！・故事：在此模式下，您将体验到游戏原始街机版本中未涉及的各种背景故事。通过主角Ash Crimson和其他没有直接参加比赛的角色的眼睛，发现KOF“Ash Saga”的真相及其秘密。你的决定和战斗结果可能会让你发现新的故事元素；尝试所有不同的选项和每个场景！・网络：“战士之王XIII Steam版”现在具有大幅改进的网络代码，将为您提供迄今为止最舒适的在线体验！新的网络代码提高了您和对手之间的通信速度，并根据您的PC环境量身定制了您的在线体验！《拳王XIII Steam版》提供三种不同类型的在线对战，让玩家在无休止的激烈战斗中挑战世界各地的其他对手：‐“排名赛”：根据指定规则进行比赛，您的成绩将反映在排名中。-“玩家匹配”：在此模式下玩游戏不会影响您的结果。你可以随便和别人打架。-“友谊赛”：邀请在线玩家，通过这种模式挑战他们，进行激烈的竞争！・任务：在这种模式下完成三种不同类型的任务，提高你的技能！-“时间攻击”：在最短的时间内击败所有CPU对手。-“生存”：选择一个角色，在尽可能多的CPU对手中战斗。-“尝试”：在这种模式下，每个角色有10个任务，主要集中在组合上。当你完成所有10个任务时，你将掌握该角色的一些组合。・教程：锦标赛主持人Rose Bernstein将教你基本技术，并解释仪表及其用途。第一次参加KOF的球员应该从这里开始适应比赛。・自定义：此模式允许您编辑在线个人资料并更改角色调色板。您可以创建一个在线使用的团队，添加在玩游戏时收集的图标，或输入要在个人资料中使用的预设消息。对于每个字符，您最多可以制作五个自定义颜色图案。在世界舞台上展示你的个性！

[英文原文]
Originally released in 2010 on the Taito Type X arcade board, The King of Fighters XIII was the last game in the series to use sprite based graphics. The port to PC included more content than the arcade game such as new characters, stages and game modes. 

The Global Match version (released on Feb 20, 2025) comes with rollback netcode for exhilarating online play, as well as brand-new online lobbies that allow you to join/spectate matches with multiple players at once. Also features a packed roster of 36 playable characters, including NESTS Style Kyo, Classic Iori, and Mr. Karate! KOF’s greatest-ever 2D graphics come to life as you face off against players online and around the world!

・3-ON-3 TEAM BATTLE: Choose a default team of 3 characters or make your own team by picking up 3 characters of your choice, and fight against teams until victory! Develop your own team strategy by choosing the best characters for you!

・STORY：In this mode, you will experience a variety of background stories not touched upon in the game’s original Arcade Version. Discover the truth about KOF’s “Ash Saga” and its secrets through the eyes of the main character, Ash Crimson, and oth[/i]er characters who were not directly participating in the tournament. Your decisions and battle results may lead you to discovering new story elements; try out all the different options and every scene!

・NETWORK: "THE KING OF FIGHTERS XIII Steam Edition" now features vastly improved netcode that will provide you with the most comfortable online experience yet! The new netcode features improved communication speeds between you and your opponent, and also tailors your online experience according to your PC environment!

“THE KING OF FIGHTERS XIII Steam Edition” features three different types of ONLINE VERSUS Matches, allowing players to challenge other rivals worldwide in endless and intense battles:
‐ “Ranked Match”: fight under specified regulations, and your results will be reflected in the rankings.
- “Player Match”: playing in this mode will not affect your results. You can fight against others casually.
- “Friend Match”: invite online players and challenge them through this mode for heated competition!

・MISSION: Tackle three different kinds of missions in this mode, and improve your skills!
- “TIME ATTACK”: Defeat all CPU opponents in the shortest time you can.
- “SURVIVAL”: Select a character and fight your way through as many CPU opponents as you can.
- “TRIAL”: In this mode, each character has 10 tasks, which mainly focus on combos. By the time you complete all 10 tasks, you will have mastered some combos for that character.

・TUTORIAL: Rose Bernstein, hostess of the tournament, will teach you the basic techniques as well as explain the gauges and their uses. First time KOF players should start here to get used to the game.

・CUSTOMIZE: This mode allows you to edit your online profile and change character color palette. You can create a team to use online, add icons collected while playing, or enter a preset message that you want to use in your profile. For each character, you can make up to five custom color patterns. Show off your personality on the worldwide stage!

KingofFightersXIIIClimax.title: 拳皇13 Climax
KingofFightersXIIIClimax.notes:
《战斗机之王XIII》于去年年底在PlayStation 3上发布。从那时起，SNK Playmore收集了粉丝们对游戏的建议和投诉，并表达了极大的喜爱。从PS3发布到2012年4月，该公司一直在根据他们的研究进行频繁的更新，以改进游戏，使游戏体验更符合公众的期望。添加了新角色，该公司更好地平衡了游戏，删除了一些不应该存在的无限组合，以及其他改进。不管怎样，SNK Playmore用很多汗水完成了这项工作，《拳王XIII》完全符合玩家的要求。然而，有一个问题困扰着公司。游戏最初是为Arcade发布的，经过一段时间才移植到PS3上。随着更新的进行，人们注意到主版本比原始版本要好得多，这使得KOFXIII在Arcade中过时了。考虑到这一点，公司决定反其道而行之。如果Arcade赋予了游戏的母港生命，那么《斗士之王XIII》必须回到Arcade展示其所有改进，带回特许经营的荣耀。基于这一前提，几天前在日本推出的《斗士之王XIII Climax》诞生了，它带来了PlayStation 3版本的所有功能。不幸的是，SNK在西方的经销商Atlus没有透露是否有计划在这里的街机上推出KOFXIII Climax。

[英文原文]
The King of Fighters XIII was released for PlayStation 3 late last year. Since then, SNK Playmore has collected, with much affection, suggestions and complaints from the fans about the game. From the PS3 release through April 2012, the company has been launching frequent updates based on their research to improve the game and make the title experience more accurate to the public's expectations. New characters have been added, the company has better balanced the game, removed some infinite combos that should not exist, among other improvements.



Anyway, SNK Playmore, with a lot of sweat, had managed to finish the job, The King of Fighters XIII had stayed exactly as the gamers wanted. However, there was an issue that troubled the company. Originally the game was released for Arcade, and only after a time ported to the PS3. With the updates made, it was noted that the home version had gotten much better than the original version, making KOFXIII outdated in Arcade.



Thinking about it, the company decided to do the reverse. If Arcade had given life to the game's home port, The King of Fighters XIII had to go back to Arcade and showcase all of its improvements, bringing back the glory of the franchise.



With this premise is born The King of Fighters XIII Climax, made available a few days ago in Japan, bringing everything the version for PlayStation 3 has. Unfortunately, SNK distributor Atlus in the west has not revealed whether there are plans for the launch of KOFXIII Climax in the Arcades here.

kinniku2.bat_name: Kinnikuman Muscle Grand Prix 2 體育-筋肉人 筋肉大獎賽2
kinniku2.title: 筋肉人 筋肉大獎賽2
kinniku2.notes:
Kinnikuman Muscle Grand Prix 2 is a 3D hybrid wrestling/fighting game developed by AKI Corporation. It was originally released for the Namco System 256 arcade board in Japan on June 21, 2007, and an updated port called Kinnikuman Muscle Grand Prix 2 Tokumori for the PlayStation 2 on September 25, 2008.

MGP2 is a 4-button fighter, with a control scheme reminiscent to Virtua Fighter. It is based on the popular and long-running Kinnikuman anime/manga franchise. This game's roster is focused on the characters from the original 80s series, though it has several characters from the early 2000s sequel Kinnikuman Nisei (known as Ultimate Muscle in the West). Considering the developer's background and Kinnikuman's subject matter, MGP2 has a lot of wrestling game elements, such as ring ropes and an emphasis on throws. However, unlike most other AKI games, MGP2 also has mechanics more at home with your traditional fighting game, like meters, motion inputs and juggles. These mechanics come together to make a game that plays quite like nothing else out there.

kinniku.bat_name: Kinnikuman Muscle Grand Prix 體育-筋肉人 筋肉大獎賽
kinniku.title: 筋肉人 筋肉大獎賽
kinniku.notes: Kinnikuman Muscle Grand Prix (キン肉マン マッスルグランプリ) is a series of fighting video game developed by AKI Corporation, based on the popular Kinnikuman manga and anime series from Weekly Shonen Jump.

KoihimeEnbuAPM3.bat_name: Koihime _ Performance Ryorai Ryorai Version 3 APM3 Edition 格鬥-戀姬演武_遼來來
KoihimeEnbuAPM3.title: 戀姬演武：遼來來
KoihimeEnbuAPM3.notes:
Koihime Enbu RyoRailRai是流行战斗机Koihime Enbu的全面再平衡，有14个可玩角色，有“Chōryō”和“；协助&quot；角色“Kaku”首次加入战场上的对手！

[英文原文]
Koihime Enbu RyoRaiRai is a comprehensive rebalance of the popular fighter Koihime Enbu, featuring 14 playable characters, with “Chōryō” and "assist" character “Kaku” joining their rivals on the battlefield for the first time!

Koihime.title: 戀姬演武：遼來來
Koihime.notes:
Koihime Enbu最初是一款街机格斗游戏，具有快速的战斗、严密的控制、干净的视觉效果和13个不同的可玩角色！

[英文原文]
Originally an arcade fighting game, Koihime Enbu features fast combat, tight controls, clean visuals, and 13 different playable characters!

LGI.title: 海岛探险
LGI.notes:
让我们去岛上：迷失在热带岛屿上是一款世嘉街机游戏，于 2011 年年中发布。它是 我们去丛林吧：迷失在香料岛的续集。故事发生在一个太平洋岛屿上，主角是一位名叫 Zack 的滑稽新西兰向导和一个名叫 Beth 的书加拿大女孩。在一次旅行中，他们的游船与另一艘船相撞，一小群海盗登陆船上，登陆海后被鲨鱼追赶，船长在那里被一只巨型乌贼杀死。但他们设法逃脱了，他们必须去机场才能离开岛屿，当他们到达机场时，飞行员要求 “向他们展示他们所拥有的”，误以为他们是海盗。但是飞机被一只巨大的蜂王袭击了。打败巨型蜂王后，他们被海盗首领绑架，潜入水中，被迫取回 trLet's Go Island:Lost On the Island of Tropics是一款世嘉街机游戏，于2011年年中发布。这是《让我们去丛林》的续集！：迷失在香料岛。故事发生在太平洋的一个岛屿上，主角是一位名叫扎克的新西兰傻瓜导游和一位名叫贝丝的书呆子加拿大女孩。在一次旅行中，他们的游船与另一艘船相撞，一小群海盗降落在船上，在降落到海里后被鲨鱼追赶，船长在那里被一只巨大的鱿鱼杀死。但他们设法逃脱了，他们必须去机场才能离开岛屿，当他们到达机场时，飞行员要求“向他们展示他们把他们误认为海盗的东西”。但是飞机被一只巨大的蜂王袭击了。击败巨型蜂王后，他们被海盗首领绑架，潜入水中，被迫取回tr

故事发生在一个太平洋岛屿上，主角是一位名叫 Zack 的滑稽新西兰向导和一个名叫 Beth 的书加拿大女孩。在一次旅行中，他们的游船与另一艘船相撞，一小群海盗登陆船上，登陆海后被鲨鱼追赶，船长在那里被一只巨型乌贼杀死。但他们设法逃脱了，他们必须去机场才能离开岛屿，当他们到达机场时，飞行员要求 “向他们展示他们所拥有的”，误以为他们是海盗。但是飞机被一只巨大的蜂王袭击了。打败巨型蜂王后，他们被海盗首领绑架，潜入水中，被迫取回 tr
Let's Go Island: Lost On the Island of Tropics is a Sega arcade game that was released in the mid-2011. It's a sequel to Let's Go Jungle!: Lost on the Island of Spice.

Taking place on a Pacific island, the protagonists are a goofball New Zealander guide called Zack and a nerdy Canadian girl called Beth. While on a tour, their tour boat collides with another boat with a small group of pirates landing on the boat and are being chased by sharks after landing in the sea, there the captain is killed by a giant squid. But they manage to escape from it, they must go to the airport in order to get off the island, when they get airport the pilot demands to "to show them what they have" mistaken them for the pirates. But the plane gets attacked by a giant queen bee. After defeating the giant queen bee, they are kidnapped by the leader of pirates, and dives in the water and is forced to retrieve the tr

LGJS.title: 丛林探险特别版
LGJS.notes:
让我们去丛林吧！特别是一款轨道街机射击游戏，由世嘉于 2008 年生产，作为 我们去丛林吧的更新！迷失在香料岛上，两年前上映。玩家坐在旋转座椅上，前面有一个大型投影屏幕，后面有一个大型投影屏幕，他们在丛林中旅行，射击巨大的昆虫和生物。此版本也是 《死者之屋4》特辑的精神续集。我们去丛林吧！Special是一款轨道街机射击游戏，由世嘉于2008年制作，是《Let's Go Jungle！《迷失在香料岛》，两年前上映。玩家坐在一个旋转座椅上，前面有一个大投影屏幕，后面有一个，他们在丛林中拍摄巨大的昆虫和生物。这个版本也是《死亡之屋4特别版》的精神续集。

[英文原文]
让我们去丛林吧！Special 是一款轨道街机射击游戏，由世嘉于 2008 年生产，作为 Let's Go Jungle 的更新！迷失在香料岛上，两年前上映。玩家坐在旋转座椅上，前面有一个大型投影屏幕，后面有一个大型投影屏幕，他们在丛林中旅行，射击巨大的昆虫和生物。此版本也是 The House of the Dead 4 Special 的精神续集。
Let's Go Jungle! Special is an on-rails arcade shooter, produced by Sega in 2008 as an update to Let's Go Jungle! Lost on the Island of Spice, released two years earlier. Players sit on a revolving seat with a large projection screen in front, and another in back, as they travel the jungle shooting giant insects and creatures. This version also serves as a spiritual sequel to The House of the Dead 4 Special.

LGI3D.bat_name: Let_s Go Island 3D_ Lost on the Island of Tropics 射擊光槍-海島探險3D
LGI3D.title: 海岛探险 3D
LGI3D.notes:
让我们去岛上：迷失在热带是 2009 年游戏 让我们去丛林：迷失在香料岛上的世嘉光枪续集游戏。游戏讲述了 Beth 和她笨手笨脚的导游 Zack 的故事。在乘船环岛游览时，被鲨鱼追赶的海盗撞上了他们的船并试图征用它。两人被扔进海里，被冲上了一个热带岛屿的岸上，当地的野生动物已经疯了。如果贝丝和扎克希望逃离这个岛屿，他们必须共同努力。该游戏遵循许多与原始游戏相同的约定，将街机射击与 按X键不死亡片段混合在一起，并进行了一些控制调整。它还以成为世嘉生产的第一款 3D 运动骑乘街机而著称。即使是游戏使用的 3D 系统也令人印象深刻，它使用了 55 英寸自动立体显示器（基本上是任天堂 3DS 光栅 LCD 显示器的放大版），这意味着与其他 3D 街机景点不同，无需眼镜即可享受这款游戏中的 3D2016 年发布了“梦想版”本质上是相同的游戏，只是为 梦想突袭者街机进行了修改。Let's Go Island:Lost In the Tropics是Sega 2009年游戏《Let's Go Jungle:Lost on the Island of Spice》的续作。游戏讲述了贝丝和她笨手笨脚的导游扎克的故事。在岛上乘船游览时，被鲨鱼追赶的海盗撞上了他们的船，并试图劫持它。两人被扔到船外，冲到一个热带岛屿上，当地的野生动物已经疯了。如果贝丝和扎克希望逃离这座岛，他们必须共同努力。游戏遵循了许多与原版游戏相同的惯例，将街机射击与Press X to Not Die片段混合在一起，并进行了一些控制调整。它也是Sega制作的第一个3D动感骑乘街机。即使是游戏使用的3D系统也令人印象深刻，它使用了55英寸的自动立体显示器（基本上是任天堂3DS透镜液晶显示器的放大版本），这意味着与其他3D街机景点不同，在这个游戏中享受3D不需要戴眼镜。2016年发布了“Dream Version”，基本上是同一款游戏，只针对Dream Raiders街机进行了修改。

[英文原文]
Let's Go Island： Lost In the Tropics 是 2009 年游戏 Let's Go Jungle： Lost on the Island of Spice 的世嘉光枪续集游戏。

游戏讲述了 Beth 和她笨手笨脚的导游 Zack 的故事。在乘船环岛游览时，被鲨鱼追赶的海盗撞上了他们的船并试图征用它。两人被扔进海里，被冲上了一个热带岛屿的岸上，当地的野生动物已经疯了。如果贝丝和扎克希望逃离这个岛屿，他们必须共同努力。

该游戏遵循许多与原始游戏相同的约定，将街机射击与 Press X to Not Die 片段混合在一起，并进行了一些控制调整。它还以成为世嘉生产的第一款 3D 运动骑乘街机而著称。即使是游戏使用的 3D 系统也令人印象深刻，它使用了 55 英寸自动立体显示器（基本上是任天堂 3DS 光栅 LCD 显示器的放大版），这意味着与其他 3D 街机景点不同，无需眼镜即可享受这款游戏中的 3D。


2016 年发布了“Dream Version”，本质上是相同的游戏，只是为 Dream Raiders 街机进行了修改。


Let's Go Island: Lost In the Tropics is a Sega light gun sequel game to the 2009 game, Let's Go Jungle: Lost on the Island of Spice.

The game follows the story of Beth and her bumbling tour guide, Zack. While out on a boat tour around the island, pirates being chased by sharks crash into their boat and try to commandeer it. The two are thrown overboard and wash ashore on a tropical island, where the local wildlife has gone crazy. Beth and Zack must work together if they hope to escape the island.

The game follows many of the same conventions as the original games, mixing arcade shooting with Press X to Not Die segments with a few control tweaks. It is also notable for being the first 3D motion ride arcade produced by Sega. Even the 3D system used by the game is impressive, it used a 55" autostereoscopic display (basically, a scaled-up version of the Nintendo 3DS' lenticular LCD display), meaning unlike other 3D arcade attractions, no glasses are required to enjoy the 3D in this game.

2016 saw the release of the "Dream Version", essentially the same game only modified for the Dream Raiders arcade machine.

LGJ.bat_name: Let_s Go Jungle_ Lost on the Island of Spice 射擊光槍-叢林探險
LGJ.title: 丛林探险
LGJ.notes:
让我们去丛林吧！迷失在香料岛是世嘉推出的一款枪式轨道射击游戏，于 2006 年 6 月 27 日使用 林德伯格板发布到街机上。被困在一个被怪物占领的岛屿上，一路杀出一条血路寻找救援。游戏的另一个版本，我们去丛林吧特别让玩家坐在两个大型投影屏幕前后的旋转座椅上。这个版本激发了 《死者之屋4》特辑的开发。2011 年发布了续集，名为 让我们去岛上：迷失在热带岛上精神续集《变形金刚：人类联盟》于 2014 年发布。我们去丛林吧！《迷失在辣味之岛》是世嘉的一款安装在轨道上的枪支射击游戏，于2006年6月27日使用林德伯格板在街机上发布。被困在一个被怪物占领的岛屿上，爆炸寻找救援。游戏的另一个版本，Let's Go Jungle！特别的是，玩家坐在两个大投影屏幕前后的旋转座椅上。这个版本有助于激发《死亡之屋4特别版》的发展。续集于2011年上映，名为《Let's Go Island:Lost on the Island of Tropics》。精神续集《变形金刚：人类联盟》于2014年上映。

[英文原文]
让我们去丛林吧！Lost on the Island of Spice 是世嘉推出的一款枪式轨道射击游戏，于 2006 年 6 月 27 日使用 Lindbergh 板发布到街机上。被困在一个被怪物占领的岛屿上，一路杀出一条血路寻找救援。

游戏的另一个版本，Let's Go Jungle！Special，让玩家坐在两个大型投影屏幕前后的旋转座椅上。这个版本激发了 The House of the Dead 4 Special 的开发。

2011 年发布了续集，名为 Let's Go Island： Lost on the Island of Tropics。精神续集《变形金刚：人类联盟》于 2014 年发布。
Let's Go Jungle! Lost on the Island of Spice is a gun-mounted, on-rail shooter by Sega, released to arcades on June 27, 2006 using the Lindbergh board. Stranded on an island overrun by monsters, blast your way through looking for rescue.

Another version of the game, Let's Go Jungle! Special, has players sitting on a revolving seat in front of and behind two large projection screens. This version helped inspire the development of The House of the Dead 4 Special.

A sequel was released in 2011 called Let's Go Island: Lost on the Island of Tropics. A spiritual sequel, Transformers: Human Alliance, was released in 2014.

LGS.bat_name: Let_s Go Safari   競速-野外探險
LGS.title: 野外探險
LGS.notes:
Let's Go Safari，在日本以Souzou Kids:Let's Go Safari:是一款教育街机游戏，向幼儿传授野生动物知识。这是Let's Go的一部分！系列。Let's Go Safari被安置在一个类似于狩猎吉普车的橱柜里。它的设计可以舒适地容纳两个孩子或一个孩子和一个成年人。游戏模拟驾驶一辆狩猎车穿过野生动物园。开始游戏后，孩子们可以从四种不同类型的狩猎中进行选择，包括“婴儿”、“野生”和“可爱”。每个野生动物园有7只动物，玩家可以选择其中3只通过分支路径系统参观。当每个物种都被访问时，会播放该动物的真人视频，同时由叙述者提供有关它的事实。在访问了3只动物后，狩猎结束，玩家会被问到一个关于他们访问过的动物之一的简单琐事问题。Let's Go Safari包括许多互动功能供孩子们享受。玩家可以左右驾驶吉普车，操作挡风玻璃雨刷，按喇叭，换档以使吉普车移动得更快或更慢。还有一些按钮，可以让烟花绽放或显示即将被拜访的动物的事实。

[英文原文]
Let's Go Safari, released in Japan as Souzou Kids: Let's Go Safari is an educational arcade game which teaches young children about wildlife. It is part of the Let's Go! series.

Let's Go Safari is housed in a cabinet resembling a safari jeep. It is designed to comfortably seat either two children or a child and an adult. The game simulates driving a safari vehicle through a wildlife park. Upon starting the game, children may choose from four different types of safaris, including "baby", "wild", and "cute". Each safari features 7 animals, of which players may select 3 to visit via a branching path system. When each species is visited, a live-action video of that animal is played while a narrator provides facts about it. After 3 animals have been visited, the safari ends, and players are asked a simple trivia question about one of the animals they visited.

Let's Go Safari includes many interactive features for children to enjoy. Players may drive the jeep left and right, operate the windshield wipers, honk the horn, and shift gears to make the jeep move faster or slower. There are also buttons which make fireworks appear or pull up facts about the animal about to be visited.

LethalEnforcers3.bat_name: Lethal Enforcers 3 致命殺手3_正義英雄
LethalEnforcers3.title: 致命杀手3：正义英雄
LethalEnforcers3.notes:
致命执法者3是一款适合一两个玩家的轻枪游戏，它是 致命的执法者系列的最后一款。游戏使用 3D 多边形图形而不是数字化的演员。玩家在射击敌人的同时在轨道上穿过各个阶段。在穿越关卡时，玩家可以躲在盾牌后面，盾牌也会重新装弹。通过连续击中目标而不失误来累积连击以获得奖励积分。当无辜的人被枪杀时，球员的等级会被降级，新闻报纸的头条新闻充斥着屏幕。游戏有 6 个不同的阶段，每个阶段都有自己的标题标志和类似于电视节目的简短介绍：城市中的警察，与秋叶原区的暴徒作战海岸闯入，进入船只，在港口区域打击毒品走私者对手 热在地铁站和隧道中围捕枪支走私者2004 年机场，一架停飞飞机周围的人质情况正义与审判，恐怖分子威胁要炸毁一座核电站致命执法者 3，拯救 《致命执法者3》是一款适合一到两名玩家的轻枪游戏，是《致命执法器》系列的决赛。游戏使用3D多边形图形，而不是数字化的演员。玩家在射击敌人的同时，沿着轨道在舞台上移动。在舞台上奔跑时，玩家可以躲在盾牌后面，盾牌也会重新装弹。通过连续击中目标而不错过，获得额外积分。当无辜的人被枪杀时，球员的排名会被降级，报纸头条会充斥着屏幕。游戏有6个不同的阶段，每个阶段都有自己的标题标志和类似于电视节目的简短介绍：市里的警察，在秋叶原区与暴徒作战海岸闯入，进入一艘船，在港口地区打击毒品走私者竞争对手热火队在地铁站和隧道内围捕枪支走私者2004年机场，一架停飞飞机周围的人质情况正义与审判，恐怖分子威胁要炸毁一座核电站致命执法者3，在政变中营救被俘总理

[英文原文]
Lethal Enforcers 3 是一款适合一两个玩家的轻枪游戏，它是 Lethal Enforcers 系列的最后一款。游戏使用 3D 多边形图形而不是数字化的演员。

玩家在射击敌人的同时在轨道上穿过各个阶段。在穿越关卡时，玩家可以躲在盾牌后面，盾牌也会重新装弹。通过连续击中目标而不失误来累积连击以获得奖励积分。当无辜的人被枪杀时，球员的等级会被降级，新闻报纸的头条新闻充斥着屏幕。

游戏有 6 个不同的阶段，每个阶段都有自己的标题标志和类似于电视节目的简短介绍：
城市中的警察，与秋叶原区的暴徒作战
海岸闯入，进入船只，在港口区域打击毒品走私者
对手 Heat，在地铁站和隧道中围捕枪支走私者
2004 年机场，一架停飞飞机周围的人质情况
正义与审判，恐怖分子威胁要炸毁一座核电站
致命执法者 3，拯救 

Lethal Enforcers 3 is a light gun game for one or two players, and it is the final in the Lethal Enforcers series. The game uses 3D polygon graphics instead of digitised actors.

The players move through the stages on-rails while shooting enemies. While running through the stages players can take cover behind a shield, which also reloads. Rack up combos for bonus points by consecutively hitting targets without missing. When innocent people are shot the players are demoted in rank and news paper headlines fill the screen.

The game has 6 distinct stages, each with its own title logo and short introduction similar to a tv show:
Cops in the city, fight the mob in the Akihabara district
Coast intrudes, enter a ship and fight drug smugglers in the harbor area
Rival Heat, round up gun smugglers in a subway station and tunnels
Airport 2004, hostage situation around a grounded airplane
Justice and Judgement, terrorists threaten to blow up a nuclear power plant
Lethal Enforcers 3, rescue the captured Prime Minister in a coup d'état

LostLand.title: 失落之地探险
LostLand.notes:
失落之地探险是一款街机光枪射击游戏，以其巨大的尺寸和屏幕而著称。该游戏由 万代南梦宫在 Namco系统ES3板上创建，于 2014 年夏天首次登陆日本。一到两名玩家坐在封闭的录像柜和圆顶屏幕内，沿途探索废墟、炸毁敌人并收集宝藏！玩家与经验丰富的寻宝者杰克一起远征世界各地的偏远地区，寻找隐藏的宝藏。位于地图上的宝藏并不容易取回，因为有许多障碍物和生物挡在路上。使用快速反应向巨大的 180° 无缝曲面投影监视器上显示的敌人爆炸。冒险家还必须解决游戏中的谜题才能前进！有四个可选阶段，选择您自己的冒险并使用随附的 PIN 系统保存您的游戏进度。当您完成所有四个阶段时，游戏将解锁一个额外的、具有挑战性的第五阶段。 根据你的玩法水平和收集的宝藏，你会看到不同的结局！包括一个售票机，用于可选的门票兑换游戏。街机轻枪射击游戏《失落的土地冒险》因其巨大的尺寸和屏幕而脱颖而出。该游戏由Bandai Namco在Namco System ES3板上创建，于2014年夏天首次在日本上市。一到两名玩家坐在封闭的视频影院柜和圆顶屏幕内，探索废墟，轰炸敌人，一路收集宝藏！玩家与经验丰富的寻宝者杰克一起远征世界各地的偏远地区，寻找隐藏的宝藏。地图上的宝藏不容易找到，因为路上有很多障碍物和生物。使用快速反应，在巨大的180°无缝曲面投影监视器上向敌人开火。冒险者还必须解决游戏中的谜题才能前进！有四个可选择的阶段，选择自己的冒险，并使用附带的PIN系统保存游戏进度。当你完成所有四个阶段后，游戏将解锁另一个具有挑战性的第五阶段。根据你的表现和收集的宝藏，你会得到不同的结局！包括一个售票机，用于可选的门票兑换游戏。

[英文原文]
Lost Land Adventure 是一款街机光枪射击游戏，以其巨大的尺寸和屏幕而著称。该游戏由 Bandai Namco 在 Namco System ES3 板上创建，于 2014 年夏天首次登陆日本。一到两名玩家坐在封闭的录像柜和圆顶屏幕内，沿途探索废墟、炸毁敌人并收集宝藏！

玩家与经验丰富的寻宝者杰克一起远征世界各地的偏远地区，寻找隐藏的宝藏。位于地图上的宝藏并不容易取回，因为有许多障碍物和生物挡在路上。使用快速反应向巨大的 180° 无缝曲面投影监视器上显示的敌人爆炸。

冒险家还必须解决游戏中的谜题才能前进！有四个可选阶段，选择您自己的冒险并使用随附的 PIN 系统保存您的游戏进度。当您完成所有四个阶段时，游戏将解锁一个额外的、具有挑战性的第五阶段。 根据你的玩法水平和收集的宝藏，你会看到不同的结局！包括一个售票机，用于可选的门票兑换游戏。
Lost Land Adventure, an arcade light gun shooter, stands out for its massive size and screen. Created by Bandai Namco on the Namco System ES3 board, the game first hit Japan in the summer of 2014. One to two players sit inside of the enclosed video theater cabinet and domed screen, exploring ruins, blasting enemies and collecting treasure along the way!

Players join the experienced treasure hunter Jack on an expedition into remote locations throughout the world in search of hidden treasures. The treasures located on the map will not be easy to retrieve as many obstacles and creatures stand in the way. Use quick reflexes to blast away at enemies shown on a huge 180° degree seamless Curved Projection Monitor.

Adventurers will also have to solve puzzles in the game to advance! With four selectable stages, choose your own adventures and save your game progress with the included PIN System. When you complete all four stages, the game unlocks an additional, challenging fifth stage to play.  Depending on how well you play and what treasures to collect, you will be treated to different endings! Includes a ticket dispenser for optional ticket redemption play.

LuigisMansion.title: 路易吉鬼屋 中文
LuigisMansion.notes:
Luigi's Mansion Arcade（日语为Luigi Mansion Arcade）是一款基于任天堂 3DS 的 路易吉的豪宅：黑月亮的街机游戏。由 Capcom公司开发，世嘉在任天堂许可下发行，是第五款以 路易吉为主角的游戏，也是当代发布的为数不多的基于任天堂的街机游戏之一。这是一款轨道上的光枪游戏，带有真空控制器并支持两名玩家。Luigi's Mansion Arcade（日语名为Luigi Mansion Arcade）是一款基于任天堂3DS的Luigi's Mansion:Dark Moon的街机游戏。由Capcom开发，Sega根据任天堂的许可发行，这是第五款以路易吉为主角的游戏，也是本代为数不多的基于任天堂的街机游戏之一。这是一款有真空控制器和两名玩家支持的轨道式轻枪游戏。

[英文原文]
Luigi's Mansion Arcade（日语名为 Luigi Mansion Arcade）是一款基于任天堂 3DS 的 Luigi's Mansion： Dark Moon 的街机游戏。由 Capcom 开发，世嘉在任天堂许可下发行，是第五款以 Luigi 为主角的游戏，也是当代发布的为数不多的基于任天堂的街机游戏之一。这是一款轨道上的光枪游戏，带有真空控制器并支持两名玩家。
Luigi's Mansion Arcade (named Luigi Mansion Arcade in Japanese) is an arcade game based off of Luigi's Mansion: Dark Moon for the Nintendo 3DS. Developed by Capcom and published by Sega under the license from Nintendo, it is the fifth game to feature Luigi as the main character, and it is also one of the few Nintendo-based arcade games released in the current generation. It is an on-rails light gun game with a vacuum controller and support for two players.

gsd.bat_name: M_S_ Gundam SEED Destiny O_M_N_I_ vs Z_A_F_T_ II 動作-機動戰士高達SEED DESTINY 地球聯合軍 vs 扎夫特 II
gsd.title: 機動戰士高達SEED DESTINY 地球聯合軍 vs 扎夫特 II

gundzaft.bat_name: M_S_ Gundam SEED Destiny O_M_N_I_ vs Z_A_F_T_ 動作-機動戰士高達SEED DESTINY 地球聯合軍 vs 扎夫特
gundzaft.title: 機動戰士高達SEED DESTINY 地球聯合軍 vs 扎夫特
gundzaft.notes:
移动套装高达SEED-联邦VS ZAFT，又名移动套装高达SEED-联盟VS ZAFT是移动套装高丹系列的一部分，由Capcom开发，Banpresto出版。它使用Capcom System 246硬件，于2005年7月发布。

[英文原文]
Mobile Suit Gundam SEED - Federation VS ZAFT aka Mobile Suit Gundam SEED - Union VS ZAFT is part of the Mobile Suit Gundam series and was developed by Capcom and Published by Banpresto. It used the Capcom System 246 hardware and was released in July 2005.

MS.title: 馬赫風暴
MS.notes:
Mach Storm是Bandai Namco开发的街机游戏。它利用了几乎同时发布的其他Ace Combat游戏的资产，是首批使用改良的Namco System N2“P.O.D.”显示器的国际街机游戏之一。其部分游戏玩法取自《机动战士高达：战场的债券》，该游戏也使用了N2 P.O.D.系统。Mach Storm于2013年12月在日本发布，并于2014年2月在国际上推出。

[英文原文]
Mach Storm is an arcade game developed by Bandai Namco. It utilizes assets from other Ace Combat games released near the same time, and is one of the first international arcade games to use a modified Namco System N2 "P.O.D." display. Parts of its gameplay are taken from Mobile Suit Gundam: Bonds of the Battlefield, which also used the N2 P.O.D. system.

Mach Storm was released in December 2013 in Japan, and available internationally by February 2014.

MagicalBeat.title: 節拍方塊
MagicalBeat.notes:
Magical Beat通过添加节拍来重新混合益智游戏类型！以三对一的风格将彩色方块放入背景音乐的节奏中，以完美的时机将方块发送到对手的屏幕上。迷人的8位字符和菜单引导您完成不同BPM的阶段，以应对独特的挑战和组合可能性。Magical Beat拥有由Nico Nico名人和多产的声音创作者Kikuo创作的原创Vocaloid配乐，以及Arc System works开发和出版的各种作品的流行配乐，包括“GUILTY GEAR”和“BLAZBLUE”系列的曲目！将色块（也称为beatons）放在原声带的节拍上，并连接3个或更多相同颜色的beatons以消除它们！然后，您可以发送灰色的beatons来扰乱对手，具体取决于消除beatons获得的分数。在他们可以堆叠之前，更快地清除你身边的比顿人，并将你的对手送入比顿地狱！如果你在放下beaton时错过了节拍，你最终会把积木肢解成碎片，它们会随机掉落，从而扰乱你想要的结果。注意方块图侧面的节拍同步计，感受音乐！ 当连接3种或更多种相同颜色时，beatons不会立即被消除，而是会在球场上停留一段时间。利用这段时间连接更多相应颜色的节拍，一次清除更多！这款游戏有100多首配乐！包括“GUILTY GEAR-STRIVE-”、“GUILTY GEAR Xrd”、“BLAZBLUE”、“RIVER CITY”系列的热门作品，以及其他Arc System Works作品中的更多作品！

[英文原文]
Magical Beat remixes the puzzle genre by adding in a beat! Drop colored blocks in a match-3 style to the background music’s rhythm with perfect timing to send blocks to your opponent’s screen. Charming 8-bit characters and menus guide you through stages with different BPMs for unique challenges and combo possibilities. Magical Beat features an original Vocaloid soundtrack created by Nico Nico celebrity and prolific sound creator Kikuo, and also popular soundtracks from various works developed and published by Arc System Works, including tracks from "GUILTY GEAR" and "BLAZBLUE" series!

Drop the color blocks a.k.a. beatons at the soundtrack's beats and connect 3 or more beatons of the same color to eliminate them! You can then send greyed-out beatons to disrupt your opponent depending on the score obtained from eliminating your beatons. Clear the beatons on your side faster before they can stack, and send your opponent into beaton hell!

If you missed the beat when dropping the beaton, you end up dismembering the block into pieces and they fall randomly, thus disrupting you from your desired outcome. Pay heed to the Beat Synchro Gauge at the side of the block map, and feel the music! 

The beatons do not get eliminated immediately upon connecting 3 or more of the same color, and remain on the field for a period of time. Use this time to connect even more beatons of the respective color to clear even more at one go!

Over 100 soundtracks are available for this game! Including popular entries from "GUILTY GEAR -STRIVE-", "GUILTY GEAR Xrd", "BLAZBLUE", "RIVER CITY" series, and more from other Arc System Works titles!

MaiMaiGreen.title: 舞盟Green
MaiMaiGreen.notes:
《malai-GReeN》是世嘉开发和发行的街机节奏游戏，玩家在触摸屏上与物体互动，并执行类似舞蹈的动作。该游戏支持单人和多人游戏，最多可容纳4名玩家。

[英文原文]
maimai GReeN is an arcade rhythm game developed and distributed by Sega, in which the player interacts with objects on a touchscreen and executes dance-like movements. The game supports both single-player and multiplayer gameplay with up to 4 players.

MarioKartGP2.bat_name: Mario Kart Arcade GP 2 競速-馬里奧賽車街機大獎賽 2
MarioKartGP2.title: 馬里奧賽車街機大獎賽 2
MarioKartGP2.notes:
《马里奥赛车街机GP 2》是街机系列的第二款游戏，也是第八款游戏。这是《马里奥赛车街机GP》的续作，也是《马里奥赛车Arcade GP DX》之前的游戏。游戏为角色定制了卡丁车，类似于《马里奥赛车：双冲！》！！以及《马里奥赛车DS》。它几乎包含了原版的所有内容，但通过添加几个新的课程、项目和赛车手，极大地扩展了原版。与前作一样，吃豆人角色在这款游戏中看起来是可玩的。游戏还引入了Mametchi作为可玩角色。在游戏中，它似乎是现场直播的，并由叙述者对玩家进行彩色评论，叙述者的语言取决于游戏的地区。

[英文原文]
Mario Kart Arcade GP 2 is the second game in the Arcade series and the eighth overall. It is a follow-up to Mario Kart Arcade GP, and the game before Mario Kart Arcade GP DX. The game has custom karts for characters, similar to Mario Kart: Double Dash!! and Mario Kart DS. It contains virtually all the content of the original, but greatly expands it with the addition of several new courses, items and racers. Like the predecessor, Pac-Man characters appear as playable in this game. The game also introduces Mametchi as a playable character. In-game, it appears to be broadcast live and has color-commentary of the player by a narrator, whose language depends on the region of the game.

MarioKartGP.bat_name: Mario Kart Arcade GP 競速-馬里奧賽車街機大獎賽
MarioKartGP.title: 馬里奧賽車街機大獎賽
MarioKartGP.notes:
马里奥赛车街机GP是任天堂马里奥赛车系列的街机子系列，由Namco根据任天堂的许可开发和发布。马里奥赛车街机GP是该系列的第一部。总共有六个杯子，每个杯子有四个轨道，总共二十四个。这些杯子是马里奥杯、瓦里奥杯、吃豆人杯、DK杯、鲍泽杯和可解锁的彩虹杯。完成一首曲目后，即使获得第一名，玩家也必须插入额外的积分才能继续游戏。在完成每个阶段的所有四场比赛后，会出现一个“挑战游戏”，要求玩家完成某项任务；它们中的每一个都要求玩家在一定的时间内，在一定的条件下，比如在香蕉皮田里向后行驶，到达一个目标。当玩家点击散布在赛道上的一个项目框时，玩家将获得在比赛开始时选择的三个选定项目之一。Mario Kart Arcade GP提供新旧物品。这款游戏的独特之处在于物品的锁定功能。这款游戏的另一个独特之处是在动力滑行时产生的临时盾牌，可以保护玩家免受其他赛车手投掷的物品的伤害。游戏包含《马里奥赛车64》中的所有八个可玩角色，以及客串角色吃豆人、吃豆人女士和眨眼，总共十一个。游戏的大部分音效来自《马里奥赛车：双倍冲刺！！》！！包括开始比赛的赛前倒计时。

[英文原文]
Mario Kart Arcade GP is an arcade sub-series of Nintendo's Mario Kart series, developed and published by Namco under license from Nintendo. Mario Kart Arcade GP is the initial installment in the series.

There are a total of six cups, with four tracks in each, totalling twenty-four. The cups are Mario Cup, Wario Cup, Pac-Man Cup, DK Cup, Bowser Cup, and the unlockable Rainbow Cup. After a track is completed, the player must insert additional credits to continue the game, even if first place is achieved. After finishing all four races from each stage, a "challenge game" comes up, in which the player is required to complete a certain task; each of them requires the player to drive to a goal under a certain amount of time while under a certain condition, such as driving backwards through a field of banana peels.

When a player hits one of the item boxes scattered throughout the tracks, the player is given one of the three selected items chosen at the start of a race. Mario Kart Arcade GP features items new and old. Unique to this game is a lock-on feature for the items.

Also unique to this game is a temporary shield that is produced while powersliding which protects players from items thrown at them by the other racers.

The game features all eight playable characters from Mario Kart 64, as well as guest characters Pac-Man, Ms. Pac-Man, and Blinky for a total of eleven. Most of the game's sound effects came from Mario Kart: Double Dash!! including the pre-race countdown timer to commence racing.

MKDXUSA106.bat_name: Mario Kart DX USA _1_06_OF_ 競速-馬力歐卡丁車DX 美版 _1_06_正式版_
MKDXUSA106.title: 馬力歐卡丁車DX 美版 1 06 正式版
MKDXUSA106.notes:
《马里奥赛车街机GP DX》是一款街机系统的马里奥赛车游戏，由Namco Bandai Games与任天堂合作开发。这是《马里奥赛车》系列的第十部作品，也是继《马里奥赛车街机GP 2》之后街机系列的第三部作品，《马里奥赛车Arcade GP 2》是《马里奥卡丁车街机GP》的后续作品。该游戏于2013年7月25日在日本发行，2014年在美国发行，后来于2017年在澳大利亚发行。就像前两款Arcade GP游戏一样，可以通过连接多达四个机柜进行多人游戏。

[英文原文]
Mario Kart Arcade GP DX is a Mario Kart game for arcade systems, developed by Namco Bandai Games in partnership with Nintendo. It is the tenth installment in the Mario Kart franchise and the third title in the Arcade series following Mario Kart Arcade GP 2, which was a follow-up to Mario Kart Arcade GP. The game was released in Japan on July 25, 2013 and in the United States during 2014, later followed by Australia in 2017. Just like the previous two Arcade GP games, it is possible to do multiplayer play by linking up to four cabinets.
