SegaOlympic2020.bat_name: Mario and Sonic at the Tokyo 2020 Olympic Games   體育-馬里奧與索尼克2020東京奧運會
SegaOlympic2020.title: 馬里奧與索尼克2020東京奧運會
SegaOlympic2020.notes:
东京奥运会上的马里奥和索尼克是东京奥运会唯一官方授权的街机游戏！运动员可以参加12个项目，包括体操、RUGBY、DISCUS THROW、三级跳远、100米、运动攀登、冲浪和游泳；以及向1964年东京奥运会致敬的四项复古赛事——跳水、110米跨栏、射击和跳投。从众多传奇角色中选择，包括MARIO、SONIC、LUIGI、AMY、TAILS、KNUCKLES、EGGMAN博士、SHADOW、YOSHI、WARIO、BOWSER、PEACH、METAL SONIC、KOOPA JR、DONKEY KONG、VECTOR、WALUIGI、BLAZE、DAISY和SLIVER。

[英文原文]
Mario & Sonic at the Olympic Games Tokyo is the only official licensed arcade game for the Olympic Games Tokyo! Players can participate in twelve events, including GYMNASTICS, RUGBY, DISCUS THROW, TRIPLE JUMP, 100M, SPORT CLIMBING, SURFING & SWIMMING; as well as four retro events DIVING, 110M HURDLES, SHOOTING and VAULT that pay homage to the Olympic Games Tokyo 1964. Choose from a legendary cast of characters including MARIO, SONIC, LUIGI, AMY, TAILS, KNUCKLES, DR. EGGMAN, SHADOW, YOSHI, WARIO, BOWSER, PEACH, METAL SONIC, KOOPA JR, DONKEY KONG, VECTOR, WALUIGI, BLAZE, DAISY and SLIVER.

MarioBros.title: 益智-新超級馬里奧兄弟WII金幣世界
MarioBros.notes:
《新超级马里奥兄弟Wii硬币世界》是2011年与任天堂和卡普空合作推出的一款特殊街机游戏。游戏本身基于新超级马里奥兄弟Wii。游戏采用多人模式，与主机游戏非常相似，主要基于老虎机机制。该游戏还具有各种“事件”元素，每个元素都基于《新超级马里奥兄弟Wii》的游戏玩法。在老虎机上赢得各种活动，让玩家有机会收集钥匙。一旦收集到5个密钥，玩家将与Bowser一起参加活动，赢得头奖。

[英文原文]
New Super Mario Bros. Wii Coin World was a special arcade collaboration with Nintendo and Capcom from 2011. The game itself is based upon New Super Mario Bros. Wii.

The gameplay features multiplayer, much like its console counterpart, and is based primarily on a slot machine mechanic. The game features a variety of "event" elements as well, each based upon gameplay from New Super Mario Bros. Wii. Winning various events and on the slot machine gives players opportunities to collect keys. Once 5 keys are collected, the player enters an event with Bowser to win a jackpot.

MarsSortie.bat_name: Mars Sortie   射擊光槍-火星突擊行動
MarsSortie.title: 火星突擊行動
MarsSortie.notes:
Mars Sortie是一款巨大的射击场视频游戏，有逼真的动作枪，吸引敌人和大量的电源。激动人心的游戏玩法，让玩家回来获得更多。在军事训练模拟中与敌人作战并赢得兑换券。比赛开始时，球员们会摆姿势拍照，表现得足够好，你就会出现在记分牌上。橱柜包括奖品展示柜，用于展示可以兑换门票的物品。物超所值，大型展品。玩家在游戏开始时购买子弹，可以在游戏中拾取更多子弹，或者如果子弹用完，可以购买更多子弹继续游戏。每个玩家都有自己的多币机制和兑换券分配器。

[英文原文]
Mars Sortie is a giant shooting range video game with realistic action guns, engaging enemies and lots of power-ups. Thrilling game play to keep players coming back for more. Battle the enemy in military training simulations and win Redemption Tickets.

Players pose for a photo when the game starts, perform well enough and you’ll appear on the scoreboard. Cabinet includes prize showcase for displaying items that can be exchanged for tickets. Great value, massive show piece.

Players buy bullets at the start of the game and can pickup more whilst playing, or if they run out buy more to continue. Each player has their own multi-coin mechanism and redemption ticket dispenser.

MaximumHeat.title: Dead Heat
MaximumHeat.notes:
Dead Heat（在日本称为Maximum Heat）是一款由Polygon Magic开发的顶级街机赛车游戏，由Namco Bandai于2010年10月19日（在北美）和2011年4月20日（在日本）为街机（使用基于PC的Namco System ES1硬件）发布。《Dead Heat》是一款快节奏的街头赛车游戏，由最初的《Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune》背后的工作室制作，玩家可以在四个城市（纽约、芝加哥、旧金山和伦敦）中的一个城市参加高强度八人制比赛，拥有各种现实生活中的汽车（包括调谐器车，在美国版中还有肌肉车）。它包括一个用于加速、高速漂流、多次跳跃和障碍的亚硝酸系统，以及一个基于PIN的进度系统（允许玩家自定义他们的车辆）。与Namco Bandai当时的一些其他赛车和汽车游戏（如Mario Kart Arcade GP 2和Tank！Tank！Tank！）类似，游戏机在每个显示器上方都有一个摄像头，可以拍摄玩家的照片，用于（向他人）指示其车辆的驾驶员。玩家可以选择让他们的照片在未来的比赛中作为该机器的CPU竞争对手出现。日本版游戏还包括一个可选的安装式头罩（带偏振镜头），用于立体3D模式。该游戏后来于2013年在北美推出了一款以摩托车为主题的续集，名为《Dead Heat Riders》。它保留了大部分相同的游戏机制和界面，以及四个地区。虽然原版游戏的配乐由Yuzo Koshiro（因Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune而闻名）创作，但续集的配乐由Hideki Naganuma（因Jet Set Radio而闻名）制作。

[英文原文]
Dead Heat (known in Japan as Maximum Heat) is an over-the-top arcade car street racing game developed by Polygon Magic and released by Namco Bandai for arcades (using PC-based Namco System ES1 hardware) on October 19, 2010 (in North America) and April 20, 2011 (in Japan).

A fast-paced street racing game from the studio behind the original Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune, Dead Heat puts players in high-octane eight-player races in one of four cities (New York, Chicago, San Francisco, and London) with a wide selection of real-life cars (including tuner cars and, in the US version, muscle cars). It includes a nitrous system for speed boosts, high-speed drifting, numerous jumps and obstacles, and a PIN-based progression system (allowing players to customize their vehicles).

Similar to some of Namco Bandai's other racing and vehicle games at the time (such as Mario Kart Arcade GP 2 and Tank! Tank! Tank!), the game machine includes a camera above each display that takes a picture of the player, which is used to indicate (to others) the driver of their vehicle. Players can opt to have their photo appear as CPU rivals for that machine in future races. The Japanese version of the game also includes an optional mounted head visor (with polarized lenses) for a stereoscopic 3D mode.

The game later received a motorbike-focused sequel in North America in 2013, titled Dead Heat Riders. It retains much of the same gameplay mechanics and interface, as well as the four locales. While the original game features a soundtrack by Yuzo Koshiro (of Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune fame), the sequel features a soundtrack by Hideki Naganuma (of Jet Set Radio fame).

Mballblitz.title: 超級猴子球：票券閃電戰
Mballblitz.notes:
Super Monkey Ball:Ticket Blitz是一款街机游戏，作为Super Monkey Ball系列的一部分发布。这是一个兑换游戏，在这个游戏中，通过关卡前进将为用户提供门票（因此称为“门票闪电战”），然后这些门票将被兑换成奖品。

[英文原文]
Super Monkey Ball: Ticket Blitz is an arcade game released as part of the Super Monkey Ball series. It is a redemption game, in which progressing through levels will give the users tickets (hence "Ticket Blitz") which would then be traded in for prizes.

MedaruNoGunman.bat_name: Medaru No Gunman   射擊光槍-勳章槍手
MedaruNoGunman.title: 勳章槍手
MedaruNoGunman.notes:
Medaru no Gunman是世嘉公司发行的一款奖牌游戏。世嘉物流服务公司宣布将于2017年3月31日终止对这些机器的服务

[英文原文]
Medaru no Gunman is a medal game released by Sega Corporation. Sega Logistics Service announced it would end service on the machines on March 31, 2017

MeltyBloodRE2.bat_name: Melty Blood _RE2_   格鬥-月姬格鬥_逝血之戰再臨
MeltyBloodRE2.title: 月姬格鬥 逝血之戰再臨
MeltyBloodRE2.notes:
《Melty Blood》（Meruti Buraddo）是一款视觉小说和格斗游戏，由东晋圈子Type Moon和French Bread共同开发，最初于2002年12月在Comiket发布。它被简称为Merubura（}ブ"）。基于Type Moon的视觉小说游戏Tsukihime，它后来衍生出了一个名为Act Cadenza的街机版本，由Ecole Software开发，并已移植到PlayStation 2上，这是第一个获得主机版本的Type Moon游戏。小岛武郎的漫画版已在Kadokawa Shoten的《Comp Ace》中连载。

[英文原文]
Melty Blood (メルティブラッド Meruti Buraddo), is a visual novel and fighting game, co-developed by dōjin circles Type-Moon and French-Bread, originally released at Comiket in December 2002. It is shortened as simply Merubura (メルブラ).

Based on Type Moon's visual novel game, Tsukihime, it later spawned an arcade version titled Act Cadenza, developed by Ecole Software and has also been ported to the PlayStation 2, the first Type-Moon title to receive a console release. A manga version by Takeru Kirishima has been serialized in Kadokawa Shoten's Comp Ace.

MB.bat_name: Melty Blood_ Actress Again - Current Code   格鬥-月姬格鬥AACC
MB.title: 月姬格鬥AACC
MB.notes:
该系列的最后一集，&quot；MELTY BLOOD女演员再次当前代码&quot；现在在Steam上！

[英文原文]
The final episode of the series, "MELTY BLOOD Actress Again Current Code" is now on Steam!

MIB.bat_name: Men in Black 光槍射擊-黑衣人
MIB.title: 黑衣人
MIB.notes:
Men in Black: The Game loosely adapts the successful 1997 film into an action/adventure game akin to Resident Evil, with 3D characters moving through pre-rendered backgrounds with fixed camera perspectives.

In an introductory level, players control NYPD cop James Edwards (as played by Will Smith in the film) who investigates a possible robbery in a New York apartment building. After finding out an alien creature is behind it, he is recruited into the Men in Black, a secret organization that supervises alien life on Earth. Now known as Agent J, he, along with his colleagues K and L (Tommy Lee Jones' and Linda Fiorentino's film character, respectively), protect the Earth from malevolent aliens and prevent the public from learning about the existence of extraterrestrial life.

The main part of the game begins at MIB headquarters. Here, players are briefed on the next mission in the briefing room and can change their weapon and do target practice at the shooting gallery. Several different weapons are available, from realistic firearms to the futuristic guns seen in the film, including the small but powerful Noisy Cricket. Before a mission, players can choose to play as J, K or L. The three have different fighting styles and their dialogue also differs. The game includes three main missions, which send the agents to the Arctic, the Amazon and a remote island. Stylized comic-style cutscenes advance the story between levels.

Missions involve exploring the surroundings, combat with aliens (either hand-to-hand or with guns) and puzzle-solving: finding keycards to open doors, restarting the computer system, or distracting a dog for a way to pass. Ammunition is limited and thus should be conserved, but can be refilled from the supplies of fallen enemies or occasional caches found in the levels.

MilkChan.bat_name: MilkChan 平臺跳躍-牛奶小妞
MilkChan.title: 牛奶小妞
MilkChan.notes:
MilkChan is a game where you use punches to propel yourself through stages. The protagonist, Milk-chan, spends her days delivering milk to people, and the ultimate goal of the game is to deliver milk to the king at the highest floor of the castle.

The gameplay is based around a simple control system of movement combined with a single punch button. Stages are particularly vertical in nature, so players must utilize Milk-chan’s arm punch to ascend to higher platforms. She can punch the ground to launch herself into the air and can also punch walls to jump diagonally. The game is highly difficult as there are a variety of gimmicks and traps in each stage, and a number of skillful maneuvers are necessary to advance.

MillionArthurArcanaBlood.bat_name: Million Arthur_ Arcana Blood   格鬥-百萬亞瑟王_聖靈之血
MillionArthurArcanaBlood.title: 百萬亞瑟王 聖靈之血
MillionArthurArcanaBlood.notes:
首次在Steam上，令人难以置信的超顶级2D战斗机《百万亚瑟：阿卡纳之血》已经准备好开球了！拥有热门电影《百万亚瑟王》系列中的许多流行角色以及各种客串战士！

[英文原文]
For the first time on Steam, the incredible, over-the-top 2D fighter Million Arthur: Arcana Blood is ready to kick-off! Featuring many of the popular characters from the smash hit Million Arthur series as well as a variety of guest fighters!

MissionImpossible.bat_name: Mission Impossible 射擊光槍-碟中諜街機版
MissionImpossible.title: 碟中諜街機版
MissionImpossible.notes:
特工，如果你选择接受它，你的任务就是通过破坏敌人旨在将人形机器人武器化的计划来拯救世界。你将拥有一系列武器和高科技设备来完成任务，但请记住，时间不在你身边。世嘉将价值数十亿美元的大片《使命：不可能》引入娱乐市场。世嘉的任务：不可能的街机是一款肾上腺素激增的电子游戏，是伟大设计和娱乐的巅峰之作。令人敬畏的4人超级豪华景点橱柜的设计看起来像国际货币基金组织（不可能的任务部队）的安全屋，其标志性的保险丝以及各种内部细节传达了绝密高科技间谍藏身之处的感觉。

[英文原文]
Agent, your mission should you choose to accept it, is to save the world by sabotaging enemy plans that aim to weaponize humanoid robots. You will have a range of weapons and high-tech gadgets at your disposal to complete your mission but remember time is not your side. Sega brings the multi-billion dollar blockbuster film franchise MISSION: IMPOSSIBLE to the amusements market. SEGA’s Mission: Impossible Arcade is an adrenaline-fueled video game, that is the pinnacle of great design and entertainment. The awe-inspiring 4 player Super Deluxe Attraction cabinet is designed to look like the IMF (Impossible Mission Force) safe house and features the iconic fuse along with various interiors details that convey the feel of a top-secret high-tech spy hideout.

EXVS2.bat_name: Mobile Suit Gundam_ Extreme Versus 2   動作-機動戰士高達極限對決2
EXVS2.title: 機動戰士高達極限對決2
EXVS2.notes:
《Mobile Suit Gundam Extreme Vs.2》是街机游戏《Mobile Suit-Gundam Extreme Vs.》的直接续作。游戏玩法与前作基本相同，是一款2vs2竞技场游戏。图形引擎已经更新，现在基于主机游戏《Gundam Versus》，为移动套装带来了更多细节、鲜艳的调色板和灯光效果。它还在现有的射击、战斗和从Maxi Boost ON扩展的基础上，以联动和移动的形式增加了两个新的爆发。此外，角色在锁定特定目标的同时激活爆发时也可能会说一些特别的话，类似于《联盟对战ZAFT》系列。游戏的可玩演员阵容也将进行大规模的改革，而许多“克隆”变体，如哈曼·卡恩的《Acguy》和Lunamaria Hawke的《Impulse》，都被剪掉了。

[英文原文]
Mobile Suit Gundam Extreme Vs. 2 is the direct sequel to arcade game, Mobile Suit Gundam Extreme Vs. The gameplay remains fairly the same from its predecessors, being a 2vs2 arena game. The graphics engine was updated, now based on the console game, Gundam Versus, resulting in more detail, vibrant color palettes and lighting effects on mobile suits.

It also adds two new Bursts in the form of Linkage and Mobility to the existing Shooting, Fighting and Extended from Maxi Boost ON. Additionally, characters may also say something special when activating burst whilst locked on to a specific target similarly to Alliance vs ZAFT series.

The game would also see a large overhaul in its playable cast, while many "clone" variants such as Haman Karn's Acguy and Lunamaria Hawke's Impulse were cut.

zgundmdx.bat_name: Mobile Suit Z-Gundam_ A_E_U_G_ vs Titans DX 動作-機動戰士Z高達_奧古 vs 提坦斯 豪華版
zgundmdx.title: 機動戰士Z高達 奧古 vs 提坦斯 豪華版

zgundm.bat_name: Mobile Suit Z-Gundam_ A_E_U_G_ vs Titans 動作-機動戰士Z高達_奧古 vs 提坦斯
zgundm.title: 機動戰士Z高達 奧古 vs 提坦斯

MotoGP.bat_name: Moto GP   競速-世界摩托車錦標賽
MotoGP.title: 世界摩托車錦標賽
MotoGP.notes:
体验真正的MotoGP™！MotoGP™15 Compact有18条赛道和2015年的官方涂装等着你，让你有机会与你的MotoGP®英雄们一起比赛。不要错过这个机会！

[英文原文]
Experience the real MotoGP™! 18 tracks and the official 2015 liveries are waiting for you in the MotoGP™15 Compact, offering you the chance to race with your MotoGP™ heroes. Don't miss this opportunity!

motogp2000.bat_name: Moto GP 競速-摩托英豪_世界大獎賽
motogp2000.title: 摩托英豪_世界大獎賽
motogp2000.notes:
作为2001年MotoGP赛季的官方车手之一，参加了这场摩托车比赛模拟。MotoGP具有分层游戏模式，可让您快速上手：训练模式-学习转弯、制动、最高速度和加速快速比赛-单场比赛计时赛-基于最快圈数的资格赛街机锦标赛-基于积分的街机风格赛车大奖赛-职业模式有5个不同的难度级别。一开始，你被限制在少数赛道上。一旦你进入大奖赛模式，你就可以在16条官方赛道中的10条上参加整个赛季的比赛。你的比赛由大约30名经验丰富的骑手组成，他们驾驶着各种品牌和型号的500cc摩托车。比赛在世界各地举行，包括德国、西班牙、荷兰和澳大利亚，以及多宁顿和铃鹿等著名赛道上。通过职业模式进行游戏将为计时赛和快速比赛模式解锁更多赛道。自定义功能包括根据您的喜好分配控件，为您的自行车、头盔、皮革等选择颜色，导入您自己的自定义音轨，以及其他升级，这些升级将通过您获胜时获得的能力积分解锁。为了真实感，添加了天气变化、可变照明、欢呼的球迷和赛道上的参赛者动画等图形效果。多人游戏是2、3或4名玩家的分屏游戏以及局域网游戏。

[英文原文]
Race as one of the official 2001 MotoGP season riders in this motorcycle racing simulation.

MotoGP features layered modes of play to get you up to speed:
Training Mode - learn cornering, braking, top speed and acceleration
Quick Race - race a single race
Time Trials - qualifying rounds based on fastest laps
Arcade Championship - points-based arcade style racing
Grand Prix - Career mode
There are 5 different difficulty levels. In the beginning, you are limited to a small number of race tracks. Once you make it to Grand Prix mode, you can race the entire season on 10 of the 16 official race tracks. Your competition consists of about 30 experienced riders on various makes and models of 500cc motorcycles. Races take place all over the world including Germany, Spain, the Netherlands, and Australia and on famous tracks such as Donington and Suzuka. Playing through the Career mode will unlock more tracks for the Time Trials and Quick Race modes.

Customizations include the ability to assign the controls to your preference, color choices for your bike, helmet, leathers etc., importing your own custom soundtracks, and other upgrades which are unlocked with ability points you earn as you win. Graphical effects like weather changes, variable lighting, cheering fans and on-track competitor animations have been added for realism.

Multiplayer is split-screen for 2, 3 or 4 players as well as LAN play.

MusicGunGun2.title: 音乐枪枪2
MusicGunGun2.notes:
音乐枪2街机是 台东的一款混合音乐和射击游戏。这部续集收录了 100 多首歌曲，包括来自音乐家阵容的新创作音乐。在游戏中，一两个玩家可以从 100 多首歌曲的目录中选择一首歌曲，并根据该歌曲的节拍射击生成的怪物。游戏的歌单被划分成七个类别：J-pop、动漫、游戏、初音未来（和其他声乐合成器歌手）、原创、古典和孩子们。游戏中包含的一些动漫歌曲包括 死亡笔记本中的“泽祖博比利”、火影忍者 希普登中的“蓝鸟”、天使击败 中的“我的灵魂，你的节拍”、某科学轨道中的“只有我的轨道炮”、Aquarion的《Aquarion的起源》和凉宫春日的忧郁中的“超级司机”《音乐枪2》街机是台东的一款音乐和射击混合游戏。这部续集收录了100多首歌曲，其中包括来自音乐家阵容的新创作音乐。在游戏中，一到两名玩家可以从100多首歌曲中选择一首歌曲，并根据歌曲的节拍射杀怪物。游戏的歌曲列表分为七类：J-pop、动漫、游戏、初音三木（和其他人声歌手）、原创、古典和儿童。游戏中包含的一些动漫歌曲是《死亡笔记》中的《泽图博比利》、《火影忍者》中的“蓝鸟”、《天使节拍》中的「我的灵魂，你的节拍」！《特定科学轨道车》中的“只有我的轨道炮”，《Aquarion的起源》中的《Aquarion的起源》，以及《Haruhi Suzumiya的忧郁》中的「超级司机」。

[英文原文]
Music Gun Gun 2 街机是 Taito 的一款混合音乐和射击游戏。这部续集收录了 100 多首歌曲，包括来自音乐家阵容的新创作音乐。

在游戏中，一两个玩家可以从 100 多首歌曲的目录中选择一首歌曲，并根据该歌曲的节拍射击生成的怪物。

游戏的歌单被划分成七个类别：J-pop、Anime、Game、初音未来（和其他Vocaloid歌手）、Original、Classical和Kids。游戏中包含的一些动漫歌曲包括 Death Note 中的“Zetsubō Billy”、火影忍者 Shippūden 中的“Bluebird”、Angel Beats！ 中的“My Soul， Your Beats”、A Certain Scientific Railgun 中的“only my railgun”、Aquarion 的“Genesis of Aquarion”和凉宫春日的忧郁中的“Super Driver”。
Music Gun Gun 2 arcade machine is a hybrid Music and Shooting game from Taito. This sequel features over 100 songs, including newly created music from a lineup of musicians.

In the game, one or two players can select a song from a catalog of over 100 songs and gun down monsters that spawn according to that song's beat.

The game's song list is divided up into seven categories: J-pop, Anime, Game, Hatsune Miku (and other Vocaloid singers), Original, Classical, and Kids. Some of the anime songs included in the game are "Zetsubō Billy" from Death Note, "Bluebird" from Naruto Shippūden, "My Soul, Your Beats" from Angel Beats!, "only my railgun" from A Certain Scientific Railgun, "Genesis of Aquarion" from Aquarion and "Super Driver" from The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya.

NERF.bat_name: NERF Arcade 射擊光槍-熱火街機大亂鬥
NERF.title: 熱火街機大亂鬥
NERF.notes:
Nerf Arcade是一款高能量、快节奏的游戏，适合所有年龄段的孩子和家庭。玩家抓住两个超大的NERF Blaster，射击尽可能多的目标，以赢得门票或获得高分。

[英文原文]
Nerf Arcade is a high-energy, fast-paced game that is exciting for kids of all ages and family-friendly. Players grab hold of two oversized NERF Blasters and shoot as many targets as possible to win tickets or reach a high score.

NFSHeatTakedown.bat_name: Need For Speed HEAT Takedown   競速-極品飛車_熱力追擊
NFSHeatTakedown.title: 極品飛車 熱力追擊
NFSHeatTakedown.notes:
NFS Heat Takedown是热门赛车游戏系列的最新创新，为速度爱好者带来刺激和激烈的动作。这款赛车模拟器配备了高清图形、灵敏的控制和直观的用户界面。玩家可以从各种著名的跑车中进行选择，并在充满挑战和障碍的壮观赛道上比赛。

[英文原文]
NFS Heat Takedown is the latest innovation in the popular racing game franchise, delivering thrills and intense action for speed enthusiasts. This racing simulator is equipped with high-definition graphics, responsive controls and an intuitive user interface. Players can choose from a variety of prestigious sports cars and compete on spectacular circuits, filled with challenges and obstacles.

NicktoonsNitro.bat_name: Nicktoons Nitro Racing   競速-尼克卡通賽車
NicktoonsNitro.title: 尼克卡通賽車
NicktoonsNitro.notes:
Nicktoons Nitro是一款街机赛车游戏，由开发商Raw Thrills于2009年11月10日发布。这是Nicktoons Racing和Nicktoons Winners Cup Racing的续集。《海绵宝宝》、《丹尼幻影》、《吉米·中子历险记：天才男孩》、《相当奇怪的父母》、《入侵者齐姆》和《阿凡达：最后的风之子》中的角色。

[英文原文]
Nicktoons Nitro is an arcade racing game released in November 10, 2009 by developer Raw Thrills. It's a sequel to Nicktoons Racing and Nicktoons Winners Cup Racing. It features characters from SpongeBob SquarePants, Danny Phantom, The Adventures of Jimmy Neutron: Boy Genius, The Fairly OddParents, Invader Zim, and Avatar: The Last Airbender.

AfterDark2.bat_name: Night Hunter - After Dark_ Chapter 2 射擊光槍-暗夜獵人-夜幕第二章
AfterDark2.title: 暗夜獵人-夜幕第二章
AfterDark2.notes:
在宇宙空间的《夜猎人》中，装载并准备猎杀夜间的邪恶生物。这是该公司于2012年发布的《天黑后》的续集。继续《After Dark》游戏中的故事，格伦仍在努力消灭世界上的一个恶魔般的邪恶，这个邪恶正在肆虐，并摧毁一切穿过它的东西。你将面对吸血鬼、僵尸、恶魔、动画雕像和其他奇异的怪物，所有这些都有一门可靠的大炮提供保护。After Dark中的轮子功能仍然存在，必须在某些事件中使用，当你需要操纵物体或躲避攻击时。然而，这把枪现在有了一个新功能——一个拉动时可以在蓝色或红色弹药之间切换的杠杆。某些敌人也会是蓝色或红色的；一定要搭配颜色，以减少额外的伤害！

[英文原文]
Load up and get ready to hunt evil creatures of the night in Night Hunter by Universal Space. This is a sequel to After Dark that the company had released back in 2012.

Continuing with the story found in the After Dark game, Glenn is still on a quest to stamp out a demonic evil in the world that is wreaking havoc and laying waste to everything that crosses it’s path. You will face vampires, zombies, demons, animated statues and other bizarre monsters, all with a trusty cannon providing protection. The wheel feature from After Dark is still present and must be used during certain events when you need to steer an object or dodge an attack. The gun now has a new feature however – a lever that when pulled will switch between blue or red ammo. Certain enemies will also be blue or red; be sure to match the colors to deal out extra damage!

Nirin.title: Nirin賽車
Nirin.notes:
Nirin Motorcycle Arcade Racing提供5个很棒的赛道，每个赛道都会用各种曲折来测试你，有些甚至会通过拥挤的交通来增加玩家撞车的风险。更具挑战性的是，每门课程都是在晚上进行的，难度大大增加，即使对于资深玩家来说，这也是一款具有挑战性的游戏。您可以从5种不同的摩托车中进行选择，每种摩托车都有自己独特的特点，从Maxi Scooter到抽搐的Super Sports机器。这款街机赛车引人注目，将吸引玩家尝试这款有趣的摩托车游戏。该机柜采用高清晰度（1368x768）32英寸液晶显示器，由Namco的System ES1硬件供电。

[英文原文]
Nirin Motorcycle Arcade Racing offers 5 awesome race courses, each testing you with a variety of twists and turns, and some even through heavy traffic to increase players risk of crashing.

For even more of a challenge each course is at night and increases the difficulty significantly, making this a challenging game even for veteran gamers.

You can choose from 5 different motorbikes and each has it's own unique characteristics, from a Maxi Scooter to a twitchy Super Sports machine.

This arcade racer is eye catching and will attract players to try this fun motorcycle game. The cabinet features a High Definition (1368x768) 32 inch LCD monitor and is powered by Namco's System ES1 hardware.

NitroplusBlasterz.title: Nitro+爆裂：女主角大亂
NitroplusBlasterz.notes:
这款热门的跨界2D战斗机终于登陆PC，更新到最新的街机版本，用于角色平衡，添加了背景动画和额外的获胜姿势。它还包括主机版本的所有DLC，如额外的战士Homura和Heart，在一个价值包中。

[英文原文]
The hit crossover 2D fighter finally makes its way to PC, updated to the latest arcade version for character balancing, added background animations and additional winning poses. It also includes all DLC from the console release, such as additional fighters Homura and Heart, in a single value package.

Nosferatu.title: 射擊-吸血鬼女孩莉莉諾阿
Nosferatu.notes:
吸血鬼Lilino的女儿被吸血鬼猎人蹂躏，她和她的侍从Zasha正在寻找一个新的据点。然而，这里住着早期客人的恶魔。..“我们现在先去底层。让我们把大人物打倒，理顺等级制度。"这款游戏是一款复古的舞台清理益智动作游戏，将吸血鬼女孩莉丽诺带到了她的目标。游戏的难度很高，游戏的风格是在多次挑战后寻求一条清晰的路线。

[英文原文]
The daughter of a vampire, Lilinor, was ravaged by vampire hunters, and she and her squire, Zasha, were on a quest to find a new stronghold. However, it was inhabited by the demons of the earlier guests...

'We'll go to the bottom level for now. Let's go take down the big guys and get the hierarchy straightened out."

The game is a retro-like stage-clearing puzzle action game that leads the vampire girl Lilinor to her goal. The game's difficulty level is very high, and the game's style is to seek a clear route after multiple challenges.

OG.title: 幽灵特警中文
OG.notes:
世嘉逼真的战术街机光枪射击游戏又回来了。G.H.O.S。行动让玩家扮演训练有素的特种部队特工。他们必须使用精确射击和快速反应来完成任务，同时使用一些他们可以使用的全新工具！除了新的武器、小工具和设备外，幽灵行动还配备了全彩 LED 监视器环绕，与游戏中的动作同步。这与枪式扬声器以及流行的挑战部分的回归相结合，提供了一种游戏体验，让玩家真正沉浸在 G.H.O.S。的激烈世界中。世嘉的现实战术街机轻枪射击游戏又回来了。G.H.O.S.T.行动让玩家扮演训练有素的特种部队特工。他们必须使用精确射击和快速反应来完成任务，同时使用一些全新的工具！除了新的武器、小工具和装备外，幽灵行动还配备了与游戏中动作同步的全彩LED显示器。再加上安装在枪上的扬声器，以及流行的挑战部分的回归，提供了一种游戏体验，让玩家真正沉浸在G.H.O.S.T.的激烈世界中。

[英文原文]
世嘉逼真的战术街机光枪射击游戏又回来了。G.H.O.S.T. 行动让玩家扮演训练有素的特种部队特工。他们必须使用精确射击和快速反应来完成任务，同时使用一些他们可以使用的全新工具！

除了新的武器、小工具和设备外，Operation Ghost 还配备了全彩 LED 监视器环绕，与游戏中的动作同步。这与枪式扬声器以及流行的挑战部分的回归相结合，提供了一种游戏体验，让玩家真正沉浸在 G.H.O.S.T. 的激烈世界中。
Sega's realistic tactical arcade light gun shooter is back. Operation G.H.O.S.T. puts players in the shoes of highly trained special force agents. They must use precision shooting and quick reactions to complete the mission whilst using some of the brand new tools at their disposal!

As well as new weapons, gadgets and equipment, Operation Ghost features a full coloured LED monitor surround which is synced with the in game action. This, combined with a gun mounted speaker, as well as the return of the popular challenge sections, provides a game play experience that will really immerse players in to the intense world of the G.H.O.S.T.'s.

OffroadThunder.title: 越野雷霆
OffroadThunder.notes:
越野雷霆是越野和中途岛雷霆系列中的一款越野赛车游戏。玩家可以从三种游戏模式中选择：拆除-粉碎其他参赛者获得积分；拉力赛-定期比赛到终点线；夺旗-抓住并持有国旗可获得积分。有七个未锁定的轨道（飞行时间、阿尔卑斯山航空、卡尼混沌、双桶、高辛烷值、过N度、隧道视野）和一个锁定的轨道。它们有秘密路径、捷径、飞行障碍和硝基电源。有八辆可用的车辆（Bad Omen、General、Nitro Ninja、Outlaw、Silver Streak、Snake Eyes、Stinger、Thrasher）和四辆隐藏的车辆（Chieftain、Dust Devil、Hyena、Wildcat）。

[英文原文]
Offroad Thunder is an off-road racing game in both the Off Road and Midway's Thunder Racing series.

The player can choose from three game modes: Demolition - earning points for smashing other racers; Rally - regular race to the finish line; Snag the Flag - earning points for grabbing and holding the flag.

There are seven unlocked tracks (Airtime, Alpine Air, Carnie O' Chaos, Double Barrel, High Octane, Over 'N' Under, Tunnel Vision) and one locked (Cliffhanger). They have secret paths, shortcuts, flying obstacles and nitro power-ups.

There are eight available vehicles (Bad Omen, General, Nitro Ninja, Outlaw, Silver Streak, Snake Eyes, Stinger, Thrasher) and four hidden ones (Chieftain, Dust Devil, Hyena, Wildcat).

OCCPinball.bat_name: Orange County Choppers   體育-橘郡機車彈珠檯
OCCPinball.title: 橘郡機車彈珠檯
OCCPinball.notes:
Orange County Chopper是由Incredible Technologies于2005年创建的视频弹球机。游戏的核心是打造多达八辆定制自行车，拍摄它们，然后骑到拉斯维加斯炫耀它们。你从The Shop开始，挑选一辆自行车来打造。第一辆自行车需要三个部分来完成，你可以在操场上拍摄各种照片来收集。完成此操作后，您将进入照片拍摄模式（这是顶部游戏场）20秒。你必须击倒所有目标才能完成照片拍摄，然后回到商店。你可以继续制造更多的自行车（最多八辆），也可以把你制造的自行车带到拉斯维加斯。

[英文原文]
Orange County Choppers is a video pinball machine created by Incredible Technologies in 2005. The game is all about building up to eight custom bikes, photographing them and then riding to Las Vegas to show them off.  You start out in The Shop and pick a bike to build. The first bike needs three parts to complete which you collect by shooting various shots around the playfield. Once you've done this, you go into photo shoot mode (which is the top playfield) for 20 seconds. You have to knock down all the targets to complete the photo shoot and go back to The Shop.

You can continue to build more bikes (up to the maximum of eight) or you can take what you've build and head off to Vegas.

OtoshuDX.title: Otoshū DX
OtoshuDX.notes:
这是声音射击的扩展续集！！包含原版游戏的所有歌曲以及新歌和更新的游戏玩法。与原版游戏一样，这款游戏融合了侧滚街机射击和节奏游戏；这一次，节奏游戏部分增加了额外的泳道，以增加难度。

[英文原文]
This expanded sequel of Sound Shooting!! features all of the original game's songs along with new songs and updated gameplay. Like the original game, this blends side-scrolling arcade shooting and rhythm gameplay; this time, the rhythm game sections feature extra lanes for added difficulty.

or2spdlx.bat_name: OutRun 2 SP SDX   競速-OutRun 2 SP SDX
or2spdlx.title: OutRun 2 SP SDX
or2spdlx.notes:
OutRun 2 SP SDX是OutRun 2和OutRun 2 SP的更新版本。它代表“OutRun 2 Special Tours Super Deluxe”，于2006年7月7日在私人举办的世嘉展会上首次亮相。此版本的OutRun 2不在Sega Chihiro上运行，而是在Sega Lindbergh上运行，允许图形以800x480的分辨率显示，而不是以前版本的640x480。这款游戏以大型复制品法拉利驾驶舱为特色，驾驶舱会随着屏幕上的动作而移动和倾斜，并具有合作游戏模式，两名玩家可以在同一辆车上并排坐着，轮流使用自己的控制装置驾驶。制作了两个版本的内阁。2人制机柜被指定为DX（豪华型），4人制机柜则被指定为SDX（超级豪华型）。这些大型、昂贵的SDX设备专为大型游戏中心和游乐园设计，是一种特殊的吸引力。

[英文原文]
OutRun 2 SP SDX is an updated version of OutRun 2 and OutRun 2 SP. It stands for "OutRun 2 Special Tours Super Deluxe" and was first shown at a privately held Sega show on July 7, 2006. This version of OutRun 2 does not run on the Sega Chihiro, but rather the Sega Lindbergh, allowing the graphics to be displayed at a resolution of 800x480 rather than the previous versions' 640x480. The game features large replica Ferrari cockpits which move and tilt with the onscreen action, and features a cooperative play mode where two players can sit next to each other in the same car and take turns driving with their own set of controls.

Two versions of the cabinet were produced. The 2-Player cabinet is designated as DX (Deluxe), and the 4-Player cabinet is designated as SDX (Super Deluxe), with raceview cameras on the players, and a live leaderboard over the center units. These large, expensive SDX units are designed for large game centers and amusement parks as a special attraction.

Persona4U.bat_name: P4UU_ Persona 4 The Ultimax Ultra Suplex Hold   格鬥-女神異聞錄 4_午夜競技場 2
Persona4U.title: 女神異聞錄4 無敵究極背橋摔
Persona4U.notes:
《女神异闻录4》惨败！

[英文原文]
A Persona 4 Smackdown!

Persona4A.bat_name: P4U_ Persona 4 The Ultimate in Mayonaka Arena   格鬥-女神異聞錄4 終極深夜競技場
Persona4A.title: 女神異聞錄4 終極深夜競技場
Persona4A.notes:
Perosna 4事件发生后，主角Yu Narukami回到Inaba，却发现Teddie和Rise不见了，午夜频道已经回来了。在潜入午夜频道后，调查队被卷入了一场由神秘的“特迪船长”精心策划的看似格斗比赛。一个神秘的学生，Labys也出现在电视世界，以及“影子特工”的成员。作为一款格斗游戏，控制器按钮使用四个按钮进行各自的动作。虽然角色可以自己进行攻击，但他们也可以在战斗中召唤他们的角色来协助他们。如果Persona被对手攻击，玩家将失去位于健康栏下方的一张蓝卡。在四次攻击之后，玩家将在短时间内无法使用Persona。一些攻击也可能有状态元素，如毒药，随着时间的推移，对手会受到伤害。通过按钮组合，角色能够执行一系列特殊攻击，并长时间自卫。最强的攻击是“瞬间杀伤”，如果攻击成功，可以立即击败对手。然而，由于使用了屏幕底部蓝色条形式的“SP仪表”，这些类型的技术受到了限制。当角色的生命值较低时，他们会进入“觉醒状态”，重新填充SP量表并增加角色的防御。在生命栏下方有爆裂计，可以访问其他形式的人格面具攻击，并根据使用方式重新填充SP计。游戏机版本还具有故事模式和在线模式，前者提供多个专注于单个角色的活动。首次启动游戏时，只有四个角色战役可用，需要玩家完成才能解锁更多。在整个故事中，玩家可以选择问题的答案，这可能会导致与常规结局不同的结局。

[英文原文]
After the events of Perosna 4, the main protagonist Yu Narukami returns to Inaba, only to find out that Teddie and Rise are missing, and that the Midnight channel has returned. After diving back into the Midnight Channel, the Investigation Team is roped into what seem like a fighting tournament, orchestrated by the enigmatic "Captain Teddie". A mysterious student, Labys is also present in the TV World, as well as members of the "Shadow Operatives".

As a fighting game, the controllers buttons have their own respective actions using four buttons. While characters are able to perform attacks on their own, they are also able to call their Personas to assist them during battles. Should the Persona be attacked by the opponent, the player will lose a blue card situated below the health bar. Following four attacks, the player will be unable to use Persona for a short time. Some attacks can also have status elements such as poison in which the opponent suffers damage over time.

Through button combinations, characters are able to perform a series of special attacks as well as defend themselves for a prolonged time. The strongest attack is the "Instant Kill" which can immediately defeat the opponent if the attack connects. However, these types of techniques are limited as a result of using the "SP Gauge" which is at the bottom of the screen in the form of blue bars. When the character has low life left, they enter into the "Awakening State" that refills the SP Gauge and increases the character's defense. Below the life bar there is the Burst Gauge which gives access to other forms of the Persona Attacks as well as refill the SP Gauge depending on how it is used.

The console versions also feature a story mode and an online mode, with the former giving multiple campaigns that focus on a single character. When first starting the game, only four character campaigns are available, requiring the player to complete to unlock more. Across the story, the player is given the option of choosing answers for questions which can result in a different ending from the regular one.

PPQ.title: 噗喲噗喲Quest
PPQ.notes:
普尤普约！！《Quest Arcade》（ぷる"！！エスアーケー）是由世嘉开发和发布的免费益智RPG街机游戏。游戏使用了Puyo Puyo系列的设计和角色，但与原始的坠物益智游戏不同，并添加了RPG元素。

[英文原文]
Puyopuyo!! Quest Arcade (ぷよぷよ!!クエスト アーケード) is a free-to-play puzzle RPG arcade game developed and released by Sega. The game uses designs and characters from the Puyo Puyo series, but features different gameplay than the original falling-object puzzle and added RPG elements.

pacmanbr.bat_name: Pac-Man Battle Royale 動作-喫豆人_大混戰
pacmanbr.title: 喫豆人 大混戰
pacmanbr.notes:
Pac-Man Battle Royale是Pac-Man系列中的第12款官方街机游戏。它是《吃豆人》30周年纪念的一部分，由Namco Bandai Games开发。它于2011年1月在街机上发布，后来于2014年移植到吃豆人博物馆进行数字发布（Xbox 360、PlayStation 3和Windows PC）。最多四名玩家可以同时参加比赛，选择三到九轮之间的游戏长度。每个玩家控制一个不同颜色的吃豆人角色；一个玩家面对一个电脑控制的吃豆人对手。玩家在迷宫中移动，避开鬼魂，试图吃掉散布在各处的点和能量颗粒。每当玩家将其全部吃掉时，新的点和颗粒就会出现。此外；如果任何玩家吃掉了鬼魂笼子旁边出现的奖励物品，所有剩余的点和小球都会立即被移除并替换。

[英文原文]
Pac-Man Battle Royale is the 12th official arcade game in the Pac-Man series. It is made as part of Pac-Man's 30th Anniversary and developed by Namco Bandai Games. It was released for the arcade in January 2011 and later ported to Pac-Man Museum for a digital release (Xbox 360, PlayStation 3 and Windows PC) in 2014.

Up to four players can compete at once, choosing a game length of between three and nine rounds. Each player controls a differently coloured Pac-Man character; a single player faces one computer-controlled Pac-Man opponent. The players move throughout a maze, avoiding ghosts and attempting to eat dots and power pellets scattered throughout. New dots and pellets appear whenever the players eat them all. In addition; if any player eats a bonus item that appears next to the ghosts' cage, all remaining dots and pellets are immediately removed and replaced.

pacmanap.bat_name: Pac-Man_s Arcade Party 解謎-喫豆人 街機派對
pacmanap.title: 喫豆人 街機派對
pacmanap.notes:
Pac-Man Arcade Party是一款街机游戏，由Namco于2010年发布；顾名思义，它的发布是为了纪念他们最成功的独立街机游戏《吃豆人》问世30周年，并在一个橱柜里放了一个它的复写本（以及该系列第一个16位游戏之一《吃豆狂热》），橱柜的侧面有受《吃豆的人》、《加拉加》和《挖人》启发的艺术品。汇编包括：*《吃豆人》（1980）、《吃豆狂热》（1987）：尽管合辑的名字是，但其中只有两个吃豆人游戏：原版和该系列第一个16位游戏的美国版本（19轮）。*Galaxian（1979），Galaga（1981），Galanga'88（1987）：Namco的Galaxian标题中有三个也在这个汇编中：第一个，以及该系列的第一和第三个续集（只是不是1984年的Gaplus）。*《拉力X》（1980）：南科的第一款驾驶游戏（与吃豆人有一些相似之处）也收录在本汇编中；然而，由于这不是安排，你不能攻击红色汽车。*Bosconian（1981）：Namco的第一款使用8向操纵杆的游戏也再次出现在这个汇编中；由于这是“新”版本，太空基地的布局与“旧”版本不同。*《挖迷宫》（1982）：南宫唯一一款“自制迷宫”游戏，除了1996年的《安排》外，再次亮相；由于是原版，第256轮是“杀机”。*Xevious（1982）：纳姆科的第一款垂直滚动射击游戏再次出现在这里；由于这是原始版本，玩家在游戏结束后最多可以在高分桌上输入十个字符。*Mappy（1983）：Namco的第一款平台游戏第五次出现在这个汇编中；这也是美国版，猫在吸引模式下被称为“Goro”和“Meowky”就是明证。*《滚雷》（1986）：南科的第一次跑动和射击第六次出现在这里；这也是一个“新”版本，可以从完成一个阶段的150秒（2:30）时间限制中得到证明。*《龙之灵》（1987）：南科的第三款垂直卷轴射击游戏第七次也是最后一次出现在这里；它也是“新”版本，正如开头的“阶段选择”屏幕所证明的那样。

[英文原文]
Pac-Man Arcade Party is a compilation arcade game, which was released by Namco, in 2010; as its name suggests, it was released to mark the thirtieth anniversary of their most successful stand-alone arcade game, Pac-Man, and features a carbon copy of it (along with one of the series' first 16-bit title, Pac-Mania) in a cabinet that features artwork inspired by Pac-Man, Galaga, and Dig Dug on its sides.

The compilation contains:

* Pac-Man (1980), Pac-Mania (1987): Despite the compilation's name, only two Pac-Man titles are featured in it: the original one, and the US version of the series' first 16-bit one (nineteen rounds).
* Galaxian (1979), Galaga (1981), Galaga '88 (1987): Three of Namco's Galaxian titles are also in this compilation: the original one, and the series' first and third sequels (just not Gaplus, of 1984).
* Rally-X (1980): Namco's first driving game (which shares some similarities with Pac-Man) is also featured for this compilation; however, as it is not the Arrangement, you can't attack the red cars.
* Bosconian (1981): The first game from Namco to use an 8-way joystick is again also featured in this compilation; as it's the "new" version the space bases are arranged different to the "old" one.
* Dig Dug (1982): Namco's only "make-your-own-maze" game, save for an Arrangement of it from 1996, is once again also featured; as it is the original version, the 256th round is the "kill screen".
* Xevious (1982): Namco's first vertical scrolling shooter is yet again also featured here; as it's the original version players can enter up to ten characters on the high score table after a game-over.
* Mappy (1983): Namco's first platform game is, for a fifth time, also featured in this compilation; it is also the US version, evidenced by the cats being called "Goro" and "Meowky" in attract mode.
* Rolling Thunder (1986): Namco's first run and gun is, for a sixth time, also featured in here; it is also the "new" version, evidenced by the 150-second (2:30) time limit for which to finish a stage.
* Dragon Spirit (1987): Namco's third vertical scrolling shooter is for a seventh and last time also featured here; it is also the "new" version, as evidenced by the "stage select" screen at the start.

PacmanChomp.bat_name: Pacman Chomp-Mania 喫豆人_嚼食狂熱
PacmanChomp.title: 喫豆人 嚼食狂熱
PacmanChomp.notes:
Pac-Man Chomp Mania, originally known as Pac-Man Ticket Mania, is an arcade game developed by Raw Thrills and released in 2013 by Bandai Namco Amusement America. It is a redemption-based version of the original Pac-Man.

The player must finish one round of Pac-Man with only one life. Fruits will appear and bounce around the screen, similar to Ms. Pac-Man.

After the first level is completed, the player is able to enter the "Pac Pot". Pac-Man will be placed in a maze with no dots, and the Ghosts will aggressively pursue him; the player must navigate Pac-Man inside of the Ghost Home to win a prize. The machine can be set to dispense either tickets (with a jackpot of 1000 tickets) or gift cards; though it is set to dispense tickets by default.

The Chomp Mania machine features a large, animated marquee made up of many LEDs. The marquee displays pixel animations pertaining to the player's gameplay.

Pengo5.title: Pengo! Online
Pengo5.notes:
彭戈！《Online》是基于1982年出现在街机电子游戏早期的动作益智游戏《Pengo》。彭戈！在线游戏最多可玩8个，玩家可以随时加入游戏！此外，通过触摸屏上的另一个玩家，你可以向他发送“好”的信息。

[英文原文]
Pengo! Online is based on the action puzzle Pengo (1982) that appeared in the early days of the arcade video game. Pengo! Online is playable up to 8 and players can join the game at any time! Furthermore, by touching another player on the touchscreen, you can send him the "nice" message.

PhantomBreaker.title: 幻象破壞者
PhantomBreaker.notes: An arcade version of the game running on the RingEdge 2 board titled Phantom Breaker: Another Code (ファントムブレイカー アナザーコード, Fantomu Bureikā: Anazā Codo) was released on April 4, 2013. Version 1.1 was released on June 2013. This version adds Infinity, the game’s final boss, as a playable character, rebalanced gameplay, and a new opening movie.

PointBlankX.title: 趣味射击
PointBlankX.notes:
Point Blank X是目标射击传奇Point Blank的续集。而不是一个单一的游戏，你通过这个基于枪支的冒险进展给你一个令人难以置信的72个阶段！你必须成为一名神枪手才能掌握所有72个阶段！

[英文原文]
Point Blank X is the sequel to the target shooting legend Point Blank. Instead of a single game that you progress through this gun based adventure gives you an incredible 72 stages! You will have to be a sharpshooter to master all 72 stages!

PokkenTournament.title: 寶可拳
PokkenTournament.notes:
Pokén Tournament是由Bandai Namco Studios开发并由The Pokémon Company发行的格斗视频游戏。该游戏将Bandai Namco的铁拳系列游戏元素与任天堂口袋妖怪系列的角色相结合。它于2015年7月在日本街机上发布。

[英文原文]
Pokkén Tournament is a fighting video game developed by Bandai Namco Studios and published by The Pokémon Company. The game combines gameplay elements from Bandai Namco's Tekken series with characters from Nintendo's Pokémon franchise. It was released for Japanese arcades in July 2015.

PoliceTrainer2.title: 警察训练2
PoliceTrainer2.notes:
《警察训练师2》是一款轻枪街机游戏，是《警察训练师》的续作。它由美国Phantom Systems和Team Play股份有限公司公司于2003年发行，既有单口游戏柜，也有坐式游戏柜。就像它的前身《警察教练》一样，玩家在整个游戏中有三条命。在模拟阶段，玩家将有一个健康指标。如果仪表为空，或者玩家在某个阶段未能达到配额，则失去一条生命。内阁。

[英文原文]
Police Trainer 2 is a light gun arcade game and the sequel to Police Trainer. It was released by American companies Phantom Systems and Team Play Inc. in 2003 as both a stand-up cabinet and sit-downLike its predecessor Police Trainer, players have three lives for the entire game. On simulation stages, players will have a health gauge. If the gauge is empty or if the player fails to reach a quota in a stage, one life is lost. cabinet.

PowerPuttLive2012.title: 强力推杆（高尔夫）实况2012
PowerPuttLive2012.notes:
Power Putt LIVE 2012是一款于2012年春季推出的迷你高尔夫游戏，将迷你高尔夫提升到了一个新的水平。从荒野深处到埃及大金字塔，这六个独特的球场将高尔夫球手带到世界各地的异国他乡。

[英文原文]
Power Putt LIVE 2012 is a mini-golf game launched in the spring of 2012 and took mini-golfing to the next level. From deep in the wilderness to the Great Pyramids of Egypt, the six unique courses take golfers to exotic locations around the world.

PowerPuttLive2013.title: 强力推杆（高尔夫）实况2013
PowerPuttLive2013.notes:
把有史以来最深的迷你高尔夫游戏带到你的地下室或人洞！*在异国情调的地方享受11种不同的课程！从非洲野生动物园到鬼屋之旅，这个阵容非常深刻，提供了各种各样的有趣挑战！*定制你的高尔夫球手！成为你一直想成为的角色，从独特而多彩的帽子、衬衫和裤子中选择！*试试你的运气在扑克Putt！这个令人兴奋的游戏模式让玩家有机会在球场上获得成就的扑克牌！*展示你的历史最佳成绩！您所有最伟大的游戏、分数和成就都将保存并存储在游戏中！*开个派对吧！最多16名球员可以参加迷你高尔夫锦标赛。整个社区都可以参与进来！*易于设置，甚至更容易移动！将其插入您选择的高清电视，并在您玩完一天后将其移开！

[英文原文]
Bring the deepest mini-golf game ever made to your basement or man cave!

* Enjoy 11 different courses in exotic locations! From a African safari to a journey through a haunted house, this lineup is remarkably deep and presents a wide variety of fun challenges!
* Customize your golfer! Be the character you’ve always wanted to be, and select from unique—and colorful—hats, shirts and pants!
* Try your luck at Poker Putt! This exciting game mode gives players the opportunity to earn playing cards for achievements on the course!
* Show off your all-time bests! All your greatest games, scores and achievements will be saved and stored on the game!
* Make it a party! Up to 16 players can compete in mini-golf tournaments. The whole neighborhood can get involved!
* Easy to setup and even easier to move! Plug it into your HD television of choice and move it out of the way once you're done playing for the day!

prdgp03.bat_name: Pride GP 2003 格鬥-Pride GP 2003 綜合格鬥
prdgp03.title: Pride GP 2003 綜合格鬥
prdgp03.notes:
由Capcom开发，并于2003年在日本Pride GP大奖赛2003上发布，其中包含了非常详细的角色模型、战斗机的真实视频入口以及来自世界各地的大量战斗机。

[英文原文]
Developed by Capcom and released in 2003 in Japan Pride GP Grand Prix 2003 featured nicely detailed character models, real life video entrances of the fighters, and a huge roster of fighters hailing from around the world.

Primevil.title: 远古狩猎
Primevil.notes:
原始狩猎是一款以恐龙为主题的光枪射击游戏，以第一人称视角进行游戏。在游戏中，玩家扮演恐龙猎人的角色。在游戏中，玩家使用霰弹枪、步枪或复合枪进行恐龙狩猎，以杀死恐龙。游戏提供 12 个常规阶段和一些隐藏阶段，其中会遇到十种不同的恐龙，包括暴龙、三角龙和迅猛龙。触摸屏用于在地图上选择目标、绘制路线和更改摄像机角度。该游戏可以单人玩，也可以与朋友一起玩。《原始狩猎》是一款以恐龙为主题的轻枪射击游戏，以第一人称视角进行游戏。在游戏中，玩家扮演恐龙猎人的角色。在游戏中，玩家使用霰弹枪、步枪或复合枪进行恐龙狩猎，杀死恐龙。游戏提供了十二个常规阶段和一些隐藏阶段，在这些阶段中会遇到十种不同的恐龙，包括霸王龙、三角龙和迅猛龙。触摸屏用于在地图上选择目标、绘制路线和更改相机角度。这个游戏可以单独玩，也可以和朋友一起玩。

[英文原文]
Primeval Hunt 是一款以恐龙为主题的光枪射击游戏，以第一人称视角进行游戏。在游戏中，玩家扮演恐龙猎人的角色。

在游戏中，玩家使用霰弹枪、步枪或复合枪进行恐龙狩猎，以杀死恐龙。游戏提供 12 个常规阶段和一些隐藏阶段，其中会遇到十种不同的恐龙，包括暴龙、三角龙和迅猛龙。触摸屏用于在地图上选择目标、绘制路线和更改摄像机角度。该游戏可以单人玩，也可以与朋友一起玩。
Primeval Hunt is a dinosaur-themed lightgun shooter played from a first-person perspective. In the game the player assumes the role of a dinosaur hunter.

In the game the player goes on a dinosaur hunt using a shotgun, rifle or compound gun to kill the dinosaurs. The game offers twelve regular stage and some hidden stages in which ten different dinosaurs are encountered including a tyrannosaurus, triceratops and velociraptors. A touch screen is used to select a target on the map, plot a course and change the camera angle. The game can be played solo or with a friend.

ProjectDiva.title: 歌姬計劃AC
ProjectDiva.notes:
在初音三木的顶级节奏游戏中占据中心舞台，由世界排名第一的虚拟流行歌星主演！凭借令人惊艳的服装清单和巨大的衣橱，这是Miku的终极之旅——它所需要的就是你。

[英文原文]
Take center stage in Hatsune Miku’s premier rhythm game starring the world’s #1 virtual pop star! With a stunner setlist and enormous wardrobe to style, it’s Miku’s ultimate tour—all it needs is you.

PsychicForce2012.bat_name: Psychic Force 2012 for NESiCAxLive   格鬥-超能力格鬥2012
PsychicForce2012.title: 超能力格鬥2012
PsychicForce2012.notes:
故事发生在灵力事件两年后，续集发现世界陷入了争夺地球控制权的两个派系之间的交火之中。在与老朋友伯恩·格里菲斯（Burn Griffiths）进行了决定性的战斗后返回，基思·埃文斯（Keith Evans）以新NOA的身份复活了NOA，并再次开始征服为联合心理学家建立乌托邦的事业。脱离NOA的Richard Wong建立了自己的通灵师团体，称为“军队”，并试图消灭新NOA，以征服世界。当这两个团体为控制地球的命运而斗争时，发现自己被卷入冲突的独立心理学家试图追捕Neo-NOA和the Army的成员，试图找到真相并帮助找到他们失踪的家人和朋友。

[英文原文]
Taking place two years after the events of Psychic Force, the sequel finds the world caught in the crossfire between two factions who vie for control over the Earth. Upon returning after his fateful past battle against his old friend Burn Griffiths, Keith Evans resurrects NOA as Neo NOA and once again resumes his conquest of establishing a utopia for united Psychiccers. Richard Wong, who had broken away from NOA, establishes his own group of Psychiccers known as "The Army" and seeks to eliminate Neo NOA in an attempt to conquer the world. As the two groups fight for control over the fate of the Earth, independent Psychiccers who find themselves being drawn into the conflict seek to hunt down members of Neo NOA and The Army in an attempt to find the truth and help locate their missing family and friends.

PuckOff.title: 冰球狂飆：VR激鬥場
PuckOff.notes:
Puck Off将沙狐球游戏提升到了一个全新的水平。它不仅包括传统的沙狐球，还包括3种新的游戏风格，具有令人上瘾的游戏玩法。玩家可以挑战8个不同难度级别的动画角色对手，或在双人模式下与朋友对战。 特征：*传统沙狐球加上3种新游戏风格*超过60个可定制的冰球（重量）*带RPM计的单人练习模式*在双人模式下挑战朋友*远程玩家挑战赛，挑战世界各地的玩家*8个不同难度级别的动画角色对手

[英文原文]
Puck Off takes the game of shuffleboard into a whole new level. Not only does it include traditional shuffleboard, but also 3 NEW game styles with addictive game play. Players can challenge the 8 animated character opponents with various difficulty levels or play against friends in 2-Player Mode. 

Features:
*Traditional Shuffleboard plus 3 New Game Styles
*Over 60 Customizable pucks (weights)
*Single Player Practice Mode with RPM Gauge
*Challenge Friends in 2 Player Mode
*Remote Player Challenge, challenge players across the world
*8 Animated Character Opponents with various difficulty levels

PullTheTrigger.bat_name: Pull The Trigger   射擊光槍-扳機
PullTheTrigger.title: 扳機
PullTheTrigger.notes:
Pull the Trigger是由Covielsa制造的街机，基于韩国公司Digital Silkroad的游戏。这是一个由一两个玩家同时进行的枪支游戏。Covielsa获得了在欧洲的分销权。游戏可以选择使用存储卡来保存和继续游戏。《扣动扳机》讲述了一场在现代城市爆发的战争。游戏由三个章节组成，分别发生在酒店、敌方建筑和敌方货船上。每章由4个场景组成，这些场景又分为其他阶段。

[英文原文]
Pull the Trigger is an arcade machine manufactured by Covielsa, based on the game by the Korean company Digital Silkroad. It is a gun game for one or two simultaneous players. Covielsa obtained the rights for its distribution in Europe. The game had the option of using memory cards to save and continue games.

Pull the Trigger is about a war that breaks out in a modern city. The game consists of 3 chapters that take place in a hotel, an enemy building and an enemy cargo ship. Each chapter consists of 4 scenes and the scenes are divided into additional stages.

PuyoPuyoEsports.title: 噗喲噗喲：電競
PuyoPuyoEsports.notes:
Puyo Puyo电子竞技有24个可玩的角色，有自己独特的AI行为和发烧下降模式，尽管其中一些角色只是重复使用了游戏中未出现的角色的现有AI。这些角色包括原版《编译》游戏系列中的粉丝最喜欢的角色，如Arle和Dark Prince，以及在日本任天堂3DS游戏《Puyo Puyo Chronicle》中首次亮相的Ally等新角色。使用aime卡可以解锁和保存所有内容。

[英文原文]
Puyo Puyo eSports features 24 playable characters, complete with their own distinct AI behavior and Fever drop pattern, though some of these characters simply reuse the existing AI of characters not appearing in the game as playable. These characters include fan-favorites from the original Compile game series such as Arle and Dark Prince, as well as newer characters such as Ally, who debuted in the Japan-only Nintendo 3DS game Puyo Puyo Chronicle. Everything is unlocked and saved by using using aime cards.

PuzzleBobble.title: 泡泡龍
PuzzleBobble.notes:
Bust-A-Move是经典益智游戏的非官方转换。基于SNES版本，它复制了许多模式和级别，但也缺少一些元素。基本游戏玩法与其他版本相同：玩家控制屏幕底部的大炮，发射随机颜色的气泡。目标是以一种与相同颜色的其他气泡连接的方式激发气泡。一旦三个或更多个相同颜色的触摸，它们就会被删除。游乐区的天花板不断下降。如果任何气泡到达底部，游戏就输了，一旦所有气泡都被清除，游戏就赢了。单人益智模式由90个谜题组成。许多级别都是对SNES的直接改编，但没有任何特殊的气泡，如爆炸或闪电气泡。快速完成关卡或使多个气泡同时下降也没有奖励。密码功能允许从上次玩的关卡继续。还有一个对抗模式，可以对抗AI（有六个难度设置）或对抗第二个玩家。这里的目标是要么先清除泡沫，要么让其他参与者失败。成功清除气泡会将额外的气泡发送给其他玩家。最后是挑战模式。在这种无休止的模式下，不是天花板向底部移动，而是更多的气泡不断地从顶部重新填充。没有获胜的可能：这是为了获得高分。

[英文原文]
Bust-A-Move is an unofficial conversion of the classic puzzle game. Based on the SNES version, it copies many of its modes and levels, but is also missing some elements.

The basic gameplay is the same as in other versions: the player controls a cannon at the bottom of the screen that shoots bubbles of random colors. The goal is to fire the bubbles in such a way that they connect to others of the same color. Once three or more of the same color touch, they are removed. The ceiling of the play area continually descends. The game is lost if any bubbles reach the bottom and won once all bubbles are cleared.

The single player puzzle mode consists of 90 puzzles. Many of the levels are direct adaptations from the SNES, but without any of the special bubbles like explosive or lightning bubbles. There also is no bonus for quick level completion or making many bubbles fall at once. A password feature allows continuation from the last level played.

There is also a versus mode that can be played either against the AI (with six difficulty settings) or against a second player. The goal here is to either clear the field of bubbles first or make the other player fail. Successfully clearing bubbles sends extra bubbles over to the other player.

Finally, there is the challenge mode. In this endless mode, instead of the ceiling moving towards the bottom, more bubbles are constantly refilled from the top. There is no way to win: it is played for a high score.

R-Tuned.bat_name: R-Tuned _ Ultimate Street Racing   競速-極限競速街頭賽
R-Tuned.title: 極限競速街頭賽
R-Tuned.notes:
R-Tuned:Ultimate Street Racing是世嘉于2008年10月23日在亚洲和北美以及2009年4月17日在欧洲发布的街机赛车游戏。游戏聚焦于进口场景和非法街头赛车。游戏在Sega-Lindbergh平台上运行，并使用Virtua Fighter 5的角色模型引擎。玩家可以使用IC卡保存他们的进度和记录。方向盘上有加速按钮，玩家可以在游戏中无限次加速。游戏有两种模式：战斗模式：玩家试图在比赛中获得最高分数时间攻击：玩家试图以最快的时间完成比赛总共有20辆车。这些汽车可以调高到更高的水平，以获得更好的性能。此外，汽车上还可以添加漫画图案贴纸和霓虹灯管。

[英文原文]
R-Tuned : Ultimate Street Racing is an arcade racing game released by Sega on 23 October 2008 in Asia and North America, and on 17 April 2009 in Europe. The game focuses on the import scene and illegal street racing. The game runs on the Sega Lindbergh platform, and uses Virtua Fighter 5's character model engine. Players can save their progress and records by using IC cards. There are boost buttons on the steering wheel, players can use unlimited boosts to speed up during the game.

There are 2 modes of the game :

Battle mode : players try to get highest points during the race
Time attack : players try to finish the course with the fastest time

There are total 20 cars. The cars can be tuned up to higher levels for better performance. Also, comic graphic stickers and neon tubes can be added to the cars.

RabbidsHollywood.title: 疯狂兔子：勇闯好莱坞
RabbidsHollywood.notes:
你是神枪手吗？与朋友竞争，阻止 拉比入侵好莱坞。在四人冒险中射击所有疯狂的生物，并探索 3 种不同的电影场景。警告：带有前卫的幽默和永无止境的乐趣！与 育碧合作创建，以流行的 拉比为特色：售出 14M 视频游戏，230 集电视剧，以及超过 1B 的在线观看次数。4 人射击游戏3拉比电影设置永无止境的乐趣！你是神枪手吗？与好友竞争，阻止拉比入侵好莱坞。在四人冒险中拍摄所有疯狂的生物，探索3个不同的电影场景。警告：带有前卫的幽默和无尽的乐趣！与Ubisoft合作创建，以流行的Rabbids为特色：售出1400万个视频游戏，230集电视节目，在线观看量超过10亿。四人射击游戏3拉比电影设置无尽的乐趣！

[英文原文]
你是神枪手吗？与朋友竞争，阻止 Rabbids 入侵好莱坞。在四人冒险中射击所有疯狂的生物，并探索 3 种不同的电影场景。警告：带有前卫的幽默和永无止境的乐趣！与 Ubisoft 合作创建，以流行的 Rabbids 为特色：售出 14M 视频游戏，230 集电视剧，以及超过 1B 的在线观看次数。

4 人射击游戏
3 Rabbidized 电影设置
永无止境的乐趣！
Are you a sharpshooter? Compete with buddies to stop the Rabbids invasion of Hollywood. Shoot all the crazy creatures during a four-player adventure and explore 3 different movie sets. Warning: comes with edgy humor and never-ending fun! Created in partnership with Ubisoft and features the popular Rabbids: 14M video games sold, 230 TV episodes, and more than 1B online views.

4-Player shooting game
3 Rabbidized movie settings
Never-ending fun!

RaccoonRampage.bat_name: Raccoon Rampage 射擊光槍-浣熊特工_4人_
RaccoonRampage.title: 浣熊特工 4人
RaccoonRampage.notes:
Raccoon Rampage是一款4层喷水游戏，会让你渴望更多的动作！在关卡中猛攻，收集有价值的道具，并解锁武器提升，这将帮助你对敌人造成严重破坏。与你的浣熊特工同事合作，战略性地克服障碍，参与史诗般的老板之战，这将考验你的技能和策略。准备好踏上充满乐趣的挑战的惊险之旅吧！

[英文原文]
Raccoon Rampage is a 4-player water blasting game that will leave you craving for more action!  Rampage through the levels, collect valuable props, and unlock weapon boosts that will help you wreak havoc on your enemies. Collaborate with your fellow raccoon agents to strategically overcome obstacles and engage in epic boss battles that will put your skills and strategy to the test.  Get ready to go on a thrilling journey through filled with fun challenges!

RadikalBikers.bat_name: Radikal Bikers _Third-Party Emulator_   競速-駭客車手
RadikalBikers.title: 駭客車手
RadikalBikers.notes:
Radikal Bikers是一款以地中海环境为背景的游戏，玩家在运送披萨的同时展示他们的摩托车技能。游戏让两名玩家进行直接的、正面的竞争，以尽快交付披萨。

[英文原文]
Radikal Bikers is a game set in a Mediterranean environment in which players show off their motorbike skills while delivering pizzas.

The game places two players in direct, head-to-head competition to deliver pizzas as fast as possible.

RaidenIVNesica.bat_name: Raiden IV for NESiCAxLive   射擊-雷電4NESiCAxLive
RaidenIVNesica.title: 雷電4NESiCAxLive
RaidenIVNesica.notes:
传奇街机射击游戏再次回归！Raiden IV是长期运行的垂直射击系列中的另一款。该游戏包括对原始街机游戏的直接转换，以及“Xbox 360模式”，该模式重新设计了敌人模式和两个全新的阶段。还包括老板冲刺模式、得分攻击模式、回放保存和船模库。这款游戏的外观和玩法与前一款游戏非常相似，并采用了该系列众所周知的可升级武器：标准火山火、高功率激光火和著名的紫色等离子束“牙膏激光”。还有三种不同的子武器可供选择。该游戏提供了八种难度设置，可以单人玩、双人合作玩，也可以在一名玩家同时控制两艘船的“双模式”下玩。额外的玩家船可以从Xbox Live Marketplace购买。游戏在日本和美国的首次印刷包括一张以《Raiden IV》原声带为特色的原声带光盘，以及整个《Raiden》系列的特别安排。

[英文原文]
The legendary arcade shooter has returned once more! Raiden IV is another entry in the long-running series of vertical shooters. The game includes a direct conversion of the original arcade game, as well as an "Xbox 360 Mode" which has reworked enemy patterns and two completely new stages. Also included are a boss rush mode, a score attack mode, replay saving, and a ship model gallery.

The game looks and plays much like the previous title, and features the same upgradeable weaponry the series is known for: standard vulcan fire, high-powered laser fire, and the famous purple plasma beam "toothpaste laser". There are also three different sub-weapons to pick up. The game offers eight difficulty settings, and can be played solo, two-player cooperative, or in "dual mode" where one player controls two ships simultaneously. Extra player ships can be purchased from Xbox Live Marketplace.

The first printing of the game in both Japan and the US included a soundtrack disc featuring the Raiden IV original soundtrack as well as special arrangements from the entire Raiden series.

RaidenIII.title: 雷電3
RaidenIII.notes:
这款游戏是Arcade原版的移植版。它于2006年仅在日本发布，但在2014年也在Steam平台上重新发布了全球数字下载。玩家再次控制著名的Raiden超音速攻击战斗机，玩家1为红色，玩家2为蓝色，与往常一样；没有可选择的船只。双人模式通过一种独特的新攻击得到了增强：一种光束，只要一名玩家排在另一名玩家前面，就可以使用。在双人游戏模式下，两名玩家共享直播和炸弹库存，无需继续。在PlayStation 2中，两个玩家可以从同一个控制器玩游戏。

[英文原文]
This game is a port of the original Arcade release. It was released only in Japan in 2006 but it also was re-release worldwide in 2014 for digital download on the Steam platform.

Players once again take control of the famous Raiden Supersonic Attack Fighter, red for player 1 and blue for player 2 as usual; there are no selectable ships. Two player mode is enhanced by an exclusive new attack: a beam that is usable whenever one player lines up in front of the other.

In Double play mode, both players share the live and bomb stocks, and without continue. In PlayStation 2, both players can be played from the same controller.

RaidenIIINesica.title: 雷電3 NESiCAxLive
RaidenIIINesica.notes:
这款游戏是Arcade原版的移植版。它于2006年仅在日本发布，但在2014年也在Steam平台上重新发布了全球数字下载。玩家再次控制著名的Raiden超音速攻击战斗机，玩家1为红色，玩家2为蓝色，与往常一样；没有可选择的船只。双人模式通过一种独特的新攻击得到了增强：一种光束，只要一名玩家排在另一名玩家前面，就可以使用。在双人游戏模式下，两名玩家共享直播和炸弹库存，无需继续。在PlayStation 2中，两个玩家可以从同一个控制器玩游戏。

[英文原文]
This game is a port of the original Arcade release. It was released only in Japan in 2006 but it also was re-release worldwide in 2014 for digital download on the Steam platform.

Players once again take control of the famous Raiden Supersonic Attack Fighter, red for player 1 and blue for player 2 as usual; there are no selectable ships. Two player mode is enhanced by an exclusive new attack: a beam that is usable whenever one player lines up in front of the other.

In Double play mode, both players share the live and bomb stocks, and without continue. In PlayStation 2, both players can be played from the same controller.

RainbowBombergirl.bat_name: Rainbow Bombergirl 多人遊戲-彩虹炸彈妞
RainbowBombergirl.title: 彩虹炸彈妞
RainbowBombergirl.notes: Bombergirl Rainbow is an update to Bombergirl for the Arcade. In this update, a new Bombergirl is introduced: Platinum (Bomber type). She can hold a lot of bombs. There is a total of 22 girls already available: 6 Bomber, 5 Attacker, 6 Shooter and 5 Blocker. The online battle maps from the console version are added: Karakuri Castle 3, Hieres Village (melting snow) and Panic Island 6. There are also some changes in class and rank: the Grand Master is now "Grand Master C" and the girls rank has been raised to 135. In single battle, you can now rent and use a Bombergirl that you have not acquired but her rank will not increase if you win. The Startup Stamp, which collects stamps for each play, has been renewed, making it easier to acquire characters and items. Some adjustements are made to battle and skills. If you play the updated version, you will not be able to play the previous version. But all data will be carried over to Bombergirl Rainbow.

Rambo.title: 兰博
Rambo.notes:
你扮演约翰·兰博。该游戏是按时间顺序复述前三部电影。他必须逃离囚禁他的国民警卫队的第一个任务之一，他知道的唯一方法 - 枪杀他们。在第二个任务中，他必须保护被关押在越南监狱院落中的战俘（战俘）。在任务 3 中，他必须拯救他的朋友和导师特劳特曼上校，因为他在阿富汗任务中被绑架。该游戏具有独特的愤怒计，可通过按下枪上的按钮来激活。酒吧必须充满电才能激活。这使得兰博在短时间内立于不败之地。坏人还有一个敌人攻击量表，这有助于玩家识别敌人何时要射击或他们是否正在重新装弹。你扮演约翰·兰博。这个游戏是对前三部电影的按时间顺序重述。他必须完成的第一个任务是逃离监禁他的国民警卫队，这是他唯一知道的方法——枪杀他们。在第二次任务中，他必须保护被关押在越南监狱大院的战俘。在任务3中，他必须拯救他的朋友和导师特劳特曼上校，此前他在阿富汗执行任务时被绑架。 这款游戏有一个独特的愤怒计，按下枪上的按钮即可激活。酒吧必须充满电才能激活。这使得兰博在短时间内战无不胜。坏人也有一个敌人攻击量表，这有助于玩家识别敌人何时射击或是否正在装弹。

[英文原文]
你扮演约翰·兰博。该游戏是按时间顺序复述前三部电影。他必须逃离囚禁他的国民警卫队的第一个任务之一，他知道的唯一方法 - 枪杀他们。在第二个任务中，他必须保护被关押在越南监狱院落中的战俘（战俘）。在任务 3 中，他必须拯救他的朋友和导师特劳特曼上校，因为他在阿富汗任务中被绑架。

该游戏具有独特的愤怒计，可通过按下枪上的按钮来激活。酒吧必须充满电才能激活。这使得兰博在短时间内立于不败之地。坏人还有一个敌人攻击量表，这有助于玩家识别敌人何时要射击或他们是否正在重新装弹。
You play John Rambo. The game is a chronological retelling of the first three films.One the first mission he must escape the national guard that imprisoned him, the only way he knows how - by gunning them down. In the second mission he must protect the POWs (prisoners of war) that are held in a Vietnam prison compound. In mission 3 he must save his friend and mentor Colonel Trautman, after he is abducted on an Afghanistan mission. 

This game features a unique rage meter which is activated by pressing a button on the gun. The bar must be fully charged to be activated. This makes Rambo invincible for a short period of time. Bad guys also have an enemy attack gauge, this helps the player identify when the enemy is going to shoot or if they are reloading.

Rampage.title: 動作-橫衝直撞
Rampage.notes:
与机器人作战，夺回土地！尝试在后启示录的荒地中生存，那里似乎一切都想让你死！后启示录环境中的战术隐形行动！

[英文原文]
Fight against the robots and reclaim the land! Attempt to survive in a post-apocalyptic wasteland, where it seems like everything wants you dead! Tactical stealth action in a post-apocalyptic settings!

RastanSaga.title: 拉斯坦傳奇
RastanSaga.notes:
*要自定义密钥，请右键单击并运行Controlls+General SettingsRastan Saga有五个级别的黑客和砍杀游戏，每个级别末尾都有一个老板。在你的旅程中，许多敌人会攻击你，比如会飞的恶魔、嵌合体、瓦尔基里、食人鱼、骷髅亡灵等等。战斗到底，把洛格拉斯的土地从某种厄运中拯救出来。游戏具有不同的武器，如斧头、狼牙棒和火剑，每种武器都有自己的属性，如射程或攻击力。盔甲也可以以盾牌、斗篷和盔甲的形式拾取，从而减少敌人攻击的伤害。其他物品包括戒指（提高武器速度）和珠宝，可获得额外积分。

[英文原文]
* To customize keys , right click and run Controlls + General Settings

Rastan Saga features five levels of hacking and slashing gameplay with a boss at the end of each level. Numerous enemies assault you on your journey such as flying demons, chimeras, valkyries, piranhas, skeleton undead and more. Fight through to the end and save the land of Lograth from certain doom.

The game features different weapons such as axes, maces and fire swords, each with its own attributes like extended range or attack power. Armour can also be picked up in the forms shields, cloaks and armour, reducing the damage from enemy attacks. Other items include rings (increase the speed of your weapon) and jewelery for bonus points.

RazingStorm.bat_name: Razing Storm 光槍射擊-完毀襲擊
RazingStorm.title: 完毀襲擊
RazingStorm.notes:
消灭你的敌人！一个有影响力和危险的国际军事组织决定向美国宣战。作为精英特遣部队SCAR的一员，你被部署到南美，目的是抓捕这场冲突背后的策划者。摧毁眼前的一切，从环境到旨在将你打倒的未来恐怖分子！有了你可以支配的武器库，在可破坏的环境中导航，摧毁你路上的任何人或任何东西。自由世界的未来取决于你，士兵。

[英文原文]
RAZE YOUR ENEMIES! An influential and dangerous international military organization decides to declare war against the United States. As part of an elite task force, SCAR, you’re being deployed to South America for the purpose of capturing the mastermind behind this conflict. Destroy everything in sight, from the environments to the futuristic terrorists aiming to take you down! With an arsenal of weapons at your disposal, navigate through destructible environments and raze anyone or anything that stands in your path. The future of the free world depends on you, soldier.

Revolt.title: 征服
Revolt.notes:
Re Volt允许您引导28辆遥控车中的一辆通过设置在不寻常环境中的疯狂赛道。路缘变成了巨大的墙壁，玩具变成了障碍，一切都是可以继续行驶、穿过或越过的。

[英文原文]
Re-Volt lets you guide one of 28 remote control cars through insane race tracks set in unusual environments. Curbs become huge walls, toys are obstacles, and everything is fair game to drive on, through, or over.

RingRiders.bat_name: Ring Riders   競速-環形賽車
RingRiders.title: 環形賽車

RollingGunner.title: 旋轉炮手
RollingGunner.notes:
2061年3月18日&quot；下降行动&quot；由于对BAC的依赖，人类甚至忘记了如何操作基本的交通工具，更不用说武器了。在BAC的袭击和随后的社会混乱之后，人口减少了一半。

[英文原文]
March 18th, 2061 - "Operation Downfall" Commences With its reliance on BAC, humanity had forgotten how to operate even basic transportation, let alone weapons. After the attacks from BAC and the subsequent social chaos, the human population was reduced by half.

SAO.title: 刀劍神域：深淵探險家
SAO.notes:
一个突然出现在种子网络中的神秘空间，通常被称为“未知”。您将支持Kirito和他的朋友们从游戏中心的新游戏机“ViSTer”潜入未知世界，并将共同挑战冒险。不仅支持单人游戏，还支持最多3人的店内/在线合作游戏！

[英文原文]
A mysterious space that suddenly appeared in The Seed's network, commonly known as "Unknown".

You will support Kirito and his friends who are diving into the Unknown from the new game machine "ViSTer" at the game center, and will challenge the adventure together.

Supports not only single-player play, but also in-store/online co-op play for up to 3 people!

segartv.bat_name: SEGA Race TV   競速-世嘉極速狂飆
segartv.title: 世嘉極速狂飆
segartv.notes:
Sega Race TV是Sega Lindbergh街机系统板上的赛车游戏。该片于2008年2月19日在日本上映，2008年7月4日在美国上映，2009年3月13日在欧洲上映。游戏中的八辆车是：福特野马GT、雪佛兰Camaro概念车、雪佛兰Corvette C3 Stingray、普利茅斯HEMI Cuda、马自达MX-5、三菱Eclipse、Ruf RK Roadster、普利茅斯徘徊者和水星敞篷车。所有这些都以可转换的形式存在，可以定制。定制汽车可以通过街机橱柜中的密码获得。这是铃木裕离开世嘉AM2后唯一成功完成的游戏。他参与的另外两个项目Psy Phi和Shenmue Online从未发布。Sega Race TV是铃木与Sega的最后一场比赛，之后他建立了自己的工作室YS。NET，随后从公司退休。

[英文原文]
Sega Race TV is a racing game for the Sega Lindbergh arcade system board. It was released on February 19, 2008 in Japan, July 4, 2008 in the US and on March 13, 2009 in Europe.

The eight cars featured in the game are: Ford Mustang GT, Chevrolet Camaro Concept, Chevrolet Corvette C3 Stingray, Plymouth HEMI Cuda, Mazda MX-5, Mitsubishi Eclipse, Ruf RK Roadster, Plymouth Prowler and Mercury Convertible. All exist in convertible forms and can be customized. Custom cars can be obtained through passwords in an arcade cabinet.

This was the only game Yu Suzuki was successfully able to complete after his departure from Sega AM2. The other two projects that he worked on, Psy-Phi and Shenmue Online, were never released. Sega Race TV was Suzuki's last game with Sega, after which he established his own studio, YS.NET, and subsequently retired from the company.

segartvelf2.bat_name: SEGA Race TV elf2 _Elfloader2_   競速-世嘉極速狂飆
segartvelf2.title: 世嘉極速狂飆 elf2
segartvelf2.notes:
Sega Race TV是Sega Lindbergh街机系统板上的赛车游戏。该片于2008年2月19日在日本上映，2008年7月4日在美国上映，2009年3月13日在欧洲上映。游戏中的八辆车是：福特野马GT、雪佛兰Camaro概念车、雪佛兰Corvette C3 Stingray、普利茅斯HEMI Cuda、马自达MX-5、三菱Eclipse、Ruf RK Roadster、普利茅斯徘徊者和水星敞篷车。所有这些都以可转换的形式存在，可以定制。定制汽车可以通过街机橱柜中的密码获得。这是铃木裕离开世嘉AM2后唯一成功完成的游戏。他参与的另外两个项目Psy Phi和Shenmue Online从未发布。Sega Race TV是铃木与Sega的最后一场比赛，之后他建立了自己的工作室YS。NET，随后从公司退休。

[英文原文]
Sega Race TV is a racing game for the Sega Lindbergh arcade system board. It was released on February 19, 2008 in Japan, July 4, 2008 in the US and on March 13, 2009 in Europe.

The eight cars featured in the game are: Ford Mustang GT, Chevrolet Camaro Concept, Chevrolet Corvette C3 Stingray, Plymouth HEMI Cuda, Mazda MX-5, Mitsubishi Eclipse, Ruf RK Roadster, Plymouth Prowler and Mercury Convertible. All exist in convertible forms and can be customized. Custom cars can be obtained through passwords in an arcade cabinet.

This was the only game Yu Suzuki was successfully able to complete after his departure from Sega AM2. The other two projects that he worked on, Psy-Phi and Shenmue Online, were never released. Sega Race TV was Suzuki's last game with Sega, after which he established his own studio, YS.NET, and subsequently retired from the company.

SRC.bat_name: SEGA Racing Classic   競速-世嘉競速傳奇
SRC.title: 世嘉競速傳奇
SRC.notes:
Sega Racing Classic是2009年为Sega RingWide硬件发布的街机赛车游戏。尽管它的名字相当通用，但它实际上是以1280x720的分辨率重新制作的代托纳美国赛道，并且删除了所有提及代托纳国际赛道的内容。

[英文原文]
Sega Racing Classic is an arcade racing game released for Sega RingWide hardware in 2009. Despite its fairly generic name, it is actually a remake of Daytona USA running at a resolution of 1280x720 and with all references to the Daytona International Speedway removed.

SR3.bat_name: SEGA Rally 3 競速-世嘉拉力 3
SR3.title: 世嘉拉力 3
SR3.notes:
Sega Rally 3是Sega racing Studio为Sega Europa-R街机硬件开发的2008街机赛车游戏。它是Sega Rally 2的直接续作，与Sega Ralley Revo同时开发。在开发过程中，它的代号为“超级挑战”。

[英文原文]
Sega Rally 3 is a 2008 arcade racing game developed by Sega Racing Studio for Sega Europa-R arcade hardware. It is a direct sequel to Sega Rally 2 and was developed simultaneously with Sega Rally Revo. During development, it went under the codename of Super Challenge.

SNKHeroines.title: SNK女格鬥家大亂鬥
SNKHeroines.notes:
控制SNK最具标志性的女性角色，并在这个疯狂的标签战斗游戏中与之战斗，游戏中有大量可爱的服装和配饰！这款游戏具有一键式特殊动作和深度但简化的组合系统，非常适合格斗游戏迷和新手！

[英文原文]
Take control of SNK’s most iconic female characters and battle it out in this crazy tag fighting game featuring a plethora of cute costumes and accessories! With one button special moves and a deep but simplified combo system this is a great game for fighting game fans and newcomers alike!

AKB48.bat_name: Sailor Zombie_ AKB48 光槍射擊-水手服殭屍_AKB48 AC版
AKB48.title: 水手服殭屍 AKB48 AC版
AKB48.notes:
《水手僵尸：AKB48街机版》是根据一部名为《水手僵尸》的日本电视剧改编的，该剧告诉了女学生试图在僵尸泛滥的后世界末日世界中生存的故事。在《水手僵尸：AKB48街机版》中，玩家必须射杀其他变成僵尸的AKB48成员，或者向成员注射解毒剂，以及与大坏老板作战。随着你的进步，《水手僵尸：AKB48街机版》突然变成了一款节奏游戏，僵尸女学生随着AKB48的曲调跳舞。

[英文原文]
Sailor Zombie: AKB48 Arcade Edition is based on a Japanese TV series called Sailor Zombie that tells the story of schoolgirls trying to survive in a post-apocalyptic world overrun by zombies. In Sailor Zombie: AKB48 Arcade Edition players must either shoot the other AKB48 members that have been transformed into zombies or inject an antidote to the members, as well as fight Big Bad Bosses. As you progress, Sailor Zombie: AKB48 Arcade Edition suddenly turns into a rhythm game, with the zombie schoolgirls dancing to AKB48 tunes.

SamuraiSpiritsSen.bat_name: Samurai Spirits Sen   格鬥-侍魂_閃
SamuraiSpiritsSen.title: 侍魂 閃
SamuraiSpiritsSen.notes:
Samurai Spirits Sen是SNK Playmore的武士击倒系列战斗游戏中的第四款3D游戏，也是该系列的第十一款总冠军。游戏发生在《武士大溃败：勇士之怒》事件之前。

[英文原文]
Samurai Spirits Sen (サムライスピリッツ閃) is the fourth 3D game in SNK Playmore's Samurai Shodown series of fighting games, and the eleventh overall title in the series. The game takes place before the events of Samurai Shodown: Warriors Rage.

SamuraiShodown.title: 侍魂：曉
SamuraiShodown.notes:
武士重启！一款全新的SAMURAI SHODOWN游戏瞄准了世界舞台！

[英文原文]
SAMURAI REBOOT! A brand new SAMURAI SHODOWN game takes aim for the world stage!

SavageQuest.title: 野蠻征途
SavageQuest.notes:
Savage Quest is a game where you play as one of the most terrifying monsters of the dinosaur age.... Tyrannosaurus Rex. The plot is simple, an evil shaman (I suppose that's who he is) has stolen your clutch of eggs... for reasons unknown... and you are on a mission to find him and rescue your eggs.
You encounter various enemies and bosses along the journey, including Torosaurus, Spinosaurus, Allosaurus, an armoured Apatosaurus, Styracosaurus, along with various others, while almost continuously being bombarded with attacks by smaller enemies such as Velociraptors and/or those blue guys who throw spears at you. Also if it is two bosses you are fighting at the same time, these constant assaults by those smaller enemies make it increasingly difficult to stay alive, especially if you are slowly starving to death. Long story short, basically you are trying to kill one or often two bosses, warding off smaller enemies and trying to grab something to eat to prevent yourself from starving... all at the same time. The trick is to KEEP MOVING... all this action combined with the fact that you control your T. rex via a joystick really makes your hand ache. Overall... that is the only problem I have with this game. What I really LOVE about this game, however, is the killing; you can actually hunt other dinosaurs and make your own kills. On one level, there is a herd of large plant-eating dinosaurs crossing a river, you can simply pick a target and run straight towards them. They will scatter, like wildebeests when encountered by a lion, and you can keep biting your chosen victim until it keels over and dies.
i

SchoolOfRagnarok.bat_name: School of Ragnarok   格鬥-諸神黃昏學園
SchoolOfRagnarok.title: 諸神黃昏學園
SchoolOfRagnarok.notes:
《拉格纳罗克学校》是史克威尔艾尼克斯出品的一款在线1对1战术5D格斗游戏，玩家必须与每个人和学校守护者战斗才能脱颖而出！该机柜可以连接到第二个机柜进行现场战斗，但是，它是一台在线兼容的机器，许多比赛都可以在线进行。玩家以学生的身份在游戏学校之一进入游戏，并与其他自定义角色战斗。玩家可以升级他们的角色，获得战利品和物品掉落，并使用它们来不断定制他们的角色。根据学校的不同，玩家的武器和“学校监护人”会有所不同。其他可玩的学校守护者包括瓦尔哈拉德（立木文彦饰）、露西（高桥嘉树饰）、Urushihara Ukiyo（内田友马饰）和Star Cook（金田友子饰）。Mistwalker的藤坂木彦设计了这些角色，而Monaca的冈部敬一则创作了音乐。史克威尔艾尼克斯游戏制作人柴田隆正和Spike Chunsoft游戏场景编剧Kazutaka Kodaka也参与了该项目。

[英文原文]
School of Ragnarok is an online, 1 vs 1 tactical 5D fighting game from Square Enix in which players must battle each and School Guardians to come out on top!

The cabinet can link up to a second cabinet for on location battles, however, it is an online compatible machine and many matches can be played online.

Players enter the game as a student at one of the game's schools, and battle other custom characters. Players can level up their characters, get loot and item drops, and use them to keep customising their characters.

Depending on the school, the player's weapons and “school guardian” will change. Other playable school guardians include Valhallades (Fumihiko Tachiki), Lucy (Chiaki Takahashi), Urushihara Ukiyo (Yūma Uchida), and Star Cook (Tomoko Kaneda).

Mistwalker’s Kimihiko Fujisaka has designed the characters, and Monaca’s Keiichi Okabe composed the music. Square Enix game producer Takamasa Shiba and Spike Chunsoft game scenario-writer Kazutaka Kodaka are also involved in the project.

SWDC.bat_name: Sega World Drivers Championship   競速-世嘉世界車手錦標賽
SWDC.title: 世嘉世界車手錦標賽
SWDC.notes:
世嘉世界车手锦标赛（SWDC）是世嘉基于超级GT许可证开发的街机赛车游戏。这是第一款将本地多人游戏与全国在线游戏相结合的街机游戏。以前街机游戏要么只允许在本地使用多个机柜玩，要么一个机柜连接到互联网。最多10名玩家可以同时玩。

[英文原文]
Sega World Drivers Championship (SWDC) is an arcade racing game by Sega based on the Super GT license.

It is the first arcade game to combine local multiplayer with nationwide online play. Previously arcade games either just allowed to be played locally with multiple cabinets, or a single cabinet connects to the internet. Up to 10 players can play simultaneously.

SegaOlympic2016.title: 馬里奧與索尼克2016東京奧運會
SegaOlympic2016.notes:
马里奥和索尼克首次在街机上相遇，玩家将参加九项比赛，包括100米、链球和射箭。游戏将带您前往奥林匹克体育场，在那里您可以从路易吉、Knuckles、Peach和Tails等传奇人物中进行选择。帮助他们奔跑、投掷和跳跃，走向胜利！

[英文原文]
Mario and Sonic's coming together for the first time in arcades sees players compete in nine events, including 100m, Hammer Throw and Archery. The game will take you to the Olympic Stadium where you can choose from a legendary cast of characters including Luigi, Knuckles, Peach, and Tails. Help them run, throw and jump their way to victory!

sbxc.bat_name: Sengoku Basara X 格鬥-戰國BASARA X
sbxc.title: 戰國BASARA X
sbxc.notes:
这款游戏是《魔鬼王》/《巴沙拉》系列的衍生作品，是Arc System Works的一款2D格斗游戏，游戏中的角色来自该系列，是同名街机游戏的更新，游戏中有挑战模式和新的可玩角色片仓浩郎和韩北高中。基于这款游戏的漫画于2006年在杂志上发布。基于这款游戏的12集动画于2009年在DVD上发布。

[英文原文]
A spin-off of the Devil Kings / Basara franchise, this title is a 2D fighting game by Arc System Works featuring characters from the franchise and an update of the arcade game of the same name featuring a challenge mode and newly-playable characters Kojuro Katakura and Hanbei Takanaka.

Manga based on this game was released on magazine in 2006. A 12-part Episode anime based on this game was released on DVD in 2009.

SenkoNoRondeDuo.bat_name: Senko no Ronde_ DUO - Dis-United Order   射擊-旋光之輪舞
SenkoNoRondeDuo.title: 旋光之輪舞
SenkoNoRondeDuo.notes:
两名玩家使用名为Rounders的巨型机器人从自上而下和等距的角度相互战斗。这款游戏可以被描述为一个战斗机/shmup混搭，2D战斗机的元素与现代自上而下的射击游戏混合在一起。它与《灵力》非常相似，这是一款独特的、以投射物为基础的格斗游戏，由G.rev的创始人在台东工作时开发。然而，与灵力不同，它提供了更精细的射击模式，让人联想到丹玛库射击美学。“B.O.S.S.模式”进一步强化了这一点，这是一种超级攻击，允许玩家变成可以填满屏幕的boss飞船，可以用子弹填满屏幕。它也可以被比作“虚拟On的2D版本”，混合了shmup boss遭遇和现代danmaku模式。由于它与Virtual On的机制密切相关，它的一些策略也可以应用于这款游戏。Senko no Ronde中的每个角色都拥有独特的武器、子弹图案和游戏风格，每个角色都有两种变体，称为弹药筒A和弹药筒B，其属性和武器属性略有修改。所有角色都有一个主武器和副武器，以及3-4个名为“拦河坝”的特殊攻击，这些攻击是通过类似于2D战斗机的命令输入激活的。比赛开始时，玩家会获得两个“B.O.S.S.Stock”，让玩家切换到一个名为“B.O.S.Mode”的更大的机器人，这与标准shmups中的boss船相当。在Boss模式下，玩家的火力增加，将恢复一部分生命值，但移动受到更多限制，一次只能激活一个Boss形态。输掉比赛后，您将重新获得一支Boss股票。如果你的角色的健康栏耗尽，他们将进入一种称为“消失模式”的特殊状态，这会减小角色命中框的大小，但如果再有一次命中，你将输掉这一轮。在消失模式下很好地使用Boss Stock将导致使用更强大的Boss模式，称为“最终Boss”模式，该模式具有额外火力或更高机动性等优点。最终Boss模式还可以获得额外强大的超级攻击。

[英文原文]
Two players fight each other from top-down and isometric perspectives using giant robots called Rounders. The game can be described as a fighter/shmup mashup, with elements of 2D fighters mixed with modern top-down shooters. It is very similar to Psychic Force, a unique, heavily projectile-based fighting game developed at Taito while G.rev's founders worked there. Unlike Psychic Force, however, it offers even more elaborate firing patterns that conjure a danmaku shooter aesthetic. This is further reinforced by "B.O.S.S. Mode," a super attack that allows players to transform into screen-filling boss ships that can fill the screen with bullets. It may also be likened to "a 2D version of Virtual On" mixed with shmup boss encounters and modern danmaku patterns. Due to its close ties with Virtual On's mechanics, several of its strategies can also be applied to this game as well.
Each character in Senko no Ronde boasts unique weapons, bullet patterns, and game play styles, each have two variations called Cartridge A and Cartridge B which have slightly modified stats and weapon properties. All characters have a main weapon and sub weapon, as well as 3-4 special attacks called "Barrages", which are activated via command inputs similar to 2D fighters. When matches start players are given two "B.O.S.S. Stock" which lets a player switch to a larger robot called "B.O.S.S. Mode", which is comparable to a boss ship in standard shmups. In Boss Mode a player has increased firepower and will regain a portion of health, but movement is more restricted, only one boss form can be activated at a time. Upon losing a match you will regain one Boss Stock. If your character's health bar is depleted they will enter a special state called "Vanish Mode" which reduces the size of the characters hitbox, but if one more shot connects you will lose the round. Using a Boss Stock well in Vanish Mode will result in using a more powerful Boss Mode, called "Final Boss" Mode, which has benefits such as additional firepower or more mobility. Final Boss mode also has access to an extra powerful super attack.

SenkoNoRondeDuoNesica.bat_name: Senko no Ronde_ DUO - Dis-United Order for NESiCAxLive   射擊-旋光之輪舞 NESiCAxLive
SenkoNoRondeDuoNesica.title: 旋光之輪舞 NESiCAxLive

It is very similar to Psychic Force, a unique, heavily projectile-based fighting game developed at Taito while G.rev's founders worked there. Unlike Psychic Force, however, it offers even more elaborate firing patterns that conjure a danmaku shooter aesthetic. This is further reinforced by "B.O.S.S. Due to its close ties with Virtual On's mechanics, several of its strategies can also be applied to this game as well.
Each character in Senko no Ronde boasts unique weapons, bullet patterns, and game play styles, each have two variations called Cartridge A and Cartridge B which have slightly modified stats and weapon properties. All characters have a main weapon and sub weapon, as well as 3-4 special attacks called "Barrages", which are activated via command inputs similar to 2D fighters.
