Using a Boss Stock well in Vanish Mode will result in using a more powerful Boss Mode, called "Final Boss" Mode, which has benefits such as additional firepower or more mobility. Final Boss mode also has access to an extra powerful super attack.

Shigami3.title: 式神之城3
Shigami3.notes:
这款游戏的玩法与之前的射击游戏非常相似。如前所述，每个级别分为五个部分，每个部分的末尾都有一个boss。在主要老板之前和关卡之间，有以剧中角色为特色的对话过场动画。根据出版商的说法，每对不同的角色所选择的对话都是独一无二的，从而产生了55种不同的场景。这款游戏仅在日本发行。

[英文原文]
The game plays much like its shooter predecessors. As before, there are five levels each in two parts, with a boss at the end of each part. Before major bosses and between levels there are cutscenes with dialogue featuring the character(s) in play. The dialogue is unique for each different pair of characters selected, resulting in, according to the publisher, 55 different scenarios.

This game was released only in Japan.

ShiningForceCrossElysion.title: 光明力量：Cross Elysion
ShiningForceCrossElysion.notes:
Shining Force Cross Elysion是对Shining Force Cross-Raid的更新。

[英文原文]
Shining Force Cross Elysion is an an update to Shining Force Cross Raid.

ShiningForceCrossRaid.title: 光明力量：Cross Raid
ShiningForceCrossRaid.notes:
Shining Force Cross Raid是对Shining Force Crosss的更新。它没有移植到任何家庭系统。CPU：英特尔奔腾E2160 CPU@1.8 GHz图形：384MB GDDR3 RAM的“nVidia GPU”，支持Shader Model 4.0和2x 1920×1200显示器。音频：5.1声道高清音频内存：1GB去DDR2 PC2-6400 RAM网络：板载千兆局域网，兼容所有。净存储：32GB SSD驱动器用于存储操作系统：微软Windows嵌入式标准2009

[英文原文]
Shining Force Cross Raid (シャイニング・フォース クロスレイド) is an update to Shining Force Cross. It was not ported to any home systems.


CPU : Intel Pentium E2160 CPU @ 1.8 GHz
Graphics : A “nVidia GPU” 384MB of GDDR3 RAM and supports Shader Model 4.0 and 2x 1920×1200 displays.
Audio : 5.1 ch HD Audio
Memory : 1GB de DDR2 PC2-6400 RAM
Network : Onboard Gigabit LAN, Compatible ALL.Net
Storage : 32GB SSD drive for storage
Operating System : Microsoft Windows Embedded Standard 2009

Showdown.bat_name: Showdown   競速-塵埃_一決高下
Showdown.title: 塵埃 一決高下
Showdown.notes:
《DiRT:Showdown》是《DiRT》赛车系列中的一款游戏，与之前的游戏不同，它不太像是一款拉力赛游戏，更侧重于看台上的公众、评论员、更大范围的车辆和基于动作的游戏。主要游戏模式是通过旅游系统构建的；一系列活动和比赛，获胜将带来新的挑战，并提供奖金以购买新车或升级新车。除了经典的赛车，许多赛道都充满了碎片，还有可用的助推器，而且经常需要损坏其他车辆。与之前的游戏不同，大多数汽车都是虚构的。真正的汽车只能用于某些活动。主要的游戏模式分为四类：赛车、拆迁、Hoonigan和派对。-赛车包括不同的赛事，包括常规赛道赛车、基于积分的赛车，其中赛道被划分为扇区，每个扇区都有最快时间的积分，以及淘汰赛，计时器倒计时，淘汰最后一名车手，直到剩下一名。在这种模式下，轨道上经常有障碍物和碎片。-拆除的核心是消灭对手，无论是在常规的碗状比赛中（Rampage），还是在可以撞倒其他赛车的高架赛道上（Knock out）。还有一种生存模式（硬目标），玩家的车会被其他人瞄准，还有8球作为一种赛道比赛，有多个交叉路口，汽车可以碰撞。-Hoonigan类似于DiRT 3中的Gymkhana模式。目标是通过单独表演技巧（Trick Rush）或对抗对手（Head 2 Head）来得分。第三种模式是Smash Hunter，汽车需要砸碎球队颜色的砖块，避开其他砖块。-派对仅在多人游戏中可用。它包含Smash&Grab，团队可以在其中抢夺战利品并需要持有。当对手击中汽车时，它就会丢失。Transporter定期捕获标志，Speed Skirmish是一个基于时间的事件，需要以任何顺序到达检查点。该游戏为两名玩家和最多八名在线玩家提供分屏多人游戏。它包括用于跟踪统计数据的Racenet社交服务，还有一个Crashback回放功能，可以捕捉碰撞并将其直接上传到YouTube。

[英文原文]
DiRT: Showdown is an entry in the DiRT racing series and unlike the previous titles it is less of a rally game and focuses more on short circuit tracks with public in the stands, a commentator, a larger scope of vehicles, and action-based gameplay. The main game mode is constructed through a tour system; a series of events and races where winning opens up new challenges and provides prize money to acquire new vehicles op upgrade them. Next to classic racing many tracks are filled with debris, there is boost available and often other vehicles need to be damaged. Unlike previous games most cars are fictional. Real cars can only be used for certain events.

The main game modes are divided over four categories: Racing, Demolition, Hoonigan and Party.

- Racing includes different events with regular circuit racing, point-based racing where a circuit is divided into sectors with points for the fastest time in each, and elimination where a timer counts down eliminating the last driver until one remain. In this mode there are often obstacles and debris on the track.

- Demolition is centered around taking out opponents, either in a regular bowl head-to-head (Rampage), or on an elevated track where other cars can be knocked off (Knock Out). There is also a survival mode (Hard Target) where the player's car is targeted by the others, and 8-Ball as a circuit race with multiple crossovers where cars can collide.

- Hoonigan is similar to the Gymkhana mode from DiRT 3. The goal is to score points by performing tricks, either alone (Trick Rush) or against an opponent (Head 2 Head). A third mode is Smash Hunter where the car needs to smash through bricks of the team's colour and avoid the other ones.

- Party is only available in multiplayer. It contains Smash & Grab where a team can grab loot and needs to hold on to it. It is lost when an opponent hits the car. Transporter is regular capture-the-flag, and Speed Skirmish is a time-based event where checkpoints need to be reached in any order.

The game offers split-screen multiplayer for two players and up to eight players online. It includes the Racenet social service to track statistics and there is a Crashback replay function to capture crashes and upload them directly to YouTube.

SiN.title: SiN
SiN.notes:
现在是2037年。世界各地的警察部队因无力阻止不断上升的犯罪浪潮而被解散。相反，私人安保公司已经承担起保护公民或整个公司免受犯罪分子侵害的责任，并收取一定费用。自由港市最著名的安全部门之一是由约翰·布莱德上校指挥的HardCorps。一场涉及人质情况的大规模银行抢劫案，显然是由著名歹徒曼奇尼实施的，引起了HardCorps的注意，约翰被传唤到犯罪现场。进一步的调查揭示了一种名为U4的强大新药的存在，并可能与一家名为SiNtech的跨国生物技术公司有关，该公司由美丽而神秘的Elexis Sinclaire指导。在HardCorps同事的帮助下，约翰将不得不避免更大的威胁，拯救这座城市。SiN是一款第一人称射击游戏，使用了雷神之锤II引擎的改进版本。John Blade配备了相当标准的FPS武器库，从默认的裸指关节和手枪开始，到火箭发射器和等离子步枪等重型枪支结束。该游戏是第一款完全基于隐形任务的FPS游戏（即，如果检测到英雄，游戏将自动丢失）。游戏结合了逼真的伤害效果：头部射击会立即生效，而向敌人膝盖射击只会阻碍他的行动。SiN还包括黑客攻击计算机终端以禁用安全性的选项。过场动画被用来推进关卡之间的情节。在某些时候，任务的结果会根据玩家在任务中的行为而有所不同。受《毁灭公爵3D》的启发，SiN以一个聪明的破解主角、幽默的“复活节彩蛋”和高度互动的环境为特色。

[英文原文]
The year is 2037. The police forces of the world have been disassembled due to their incompetence at stopping the ever-rising waves of crime. Instead, private security companies have taken upon themselves to protect citizens or entire companies from criminals for a fee. One of the best-known security services in the city of Freeport is HardCorps, under the command of Colonel John Blade. A large-scale bank heist involving a hostage situation, apparently perpetrated by a well-known gangster Mancini, attracts the attention of HardCorps, and John is summoned to the crime scene. Further investigation reveals the existence of a powerful new drug called the U4, and possible ties to a multi-national biotechnology corporation known as SiNtech, which is guided by the beautiful and enigmatic Elexis Sinclaire. With the help of his colleagues from HardCorps, John will have to avert the greater threat and save the city.

SiN is a first-person shooter that uses a modified version of the Quake II engine. John Blade is armed with a rather standard FPS arsenal, starting with a default bare knuckles and a pistol, and ending with heavy guns such as rocket launcher and plasma rifles. The game is notable for being the first FPS that had missions exclusively based on stealth (i.e., the game is automatically lost if the hero is detected). The game incorporates realistic damage effects: headshots are instantly effective, while shooting an enemy in the knees will merely hinder his movements. SiN also includes the option of hacking computer terminals to disable security.

Cutscenes are employed to advance the plot between the levels. At certain times, the outcome of a mission will be different depending on the player's actions during it. Taking a cue from Duke Nukem 3D, SiN features a wise-cracking main hero, humorous "easter eggs", and environments with a high degree of interaction.

SilentHill.title: 寂静岭
SilentHill.notes:
游戏发生在 1993 年，当时五名学生和一个神秘俱乐部的成员前往寂静岭解开托卢卡湖之谜。众所周知，75 年前，一艘名为“小男爵夫人”的船与所有船员和乘客一起在湖上消失了，尸体一直没有被找到。到达后的第二天早上，学生 Eric 和 Tina（主角）是他们现在的一个著名的保障部门成员，尽管他的人太少了，但他们都有残留物寂静岭：拱廊是一款类似于 死亡之屋游戏的轨道射击游戏，配有屏幕外装填和武器道具。玩家将在各种熟悉（但并非如此）的地点击落成群的怪物，包括布鲁克海文医院、寂静岭历史协会、湖滨游乐园等，然后前往灾难的中心——小男爵夫人号上的一个小女孩。游戏有四个结局，其中一个是传统的 “不明飞行物”结局。游戏发生在1993年，当时五名学生和一个神秘俱乐部的成员前往寂静岭，解开托卢卡湖的谜团。众所周知，75年前，一艘名为“小男爵夫人”的船与湖上的所有船员和乘客一起失踪，尸体一直没有找到。抵达后的第二天早上，学生埃里克和蒂娜（主角）发现他们的一名俱乐部成员受伤，其他人失踪，整个城镇到处都是怪物。《寂静岭：街机》是一款类似于《死亡之屋》游戏的轨道射击游戏，配有屏幕外重新装弹和武器加电功能。玩家将在各种熟悉（或不熟悉）的地点击落成群的怪物，包括布鲁克黑文医院、寂静岭历史学会、湖滨游乐园等，前往灾难的中心——小男爵夫人号上的一个小女孩。游戏有四个结局，其中一个是传统的“不明飞行物”结局。

[英文原文]
游戏发生在 1993 年，当时五名学生和一个神秘俱乐部的成员前往寂静岭解开托卢卡湖之谜。众所周知，75 年前，一艘名为“小男爵夫人”的船与所有船员和乘客一起在湖上消失了，尸体一直没有被找到。到达后的第二天早上，学生 Eric 和 Tina（主角）发现他们的一名俱乐部成员受伤，而其他人失踪，整个小镇都爬满了怪物。

Silent Hill： The Arcade 是一款类似于 The House of the Dead 游戏的轨道射击游戏，配有屏幕外装填和武器道具。玩家将在各种熟悉（但并非如此）的地点击落成群的怪物，包括布鲁克海文医院、寂静岭历史协会、湖滨游乐园等，然后前往灾难的中心——小男爵夫人号上的一个小女孩。游戏有四个结局，其中一个是传统的 “UFO ”结局。
The game takes place in 1993, when a group of five students and members of an occult club travel to Silent Hill to solve the mystery of Toluca Lake. It is known that seventy-five years ago a boat called "Little Baroness" disappeared with all the crew and passengers on the lake, and the bodies have never been found. The next morning after the arrival, students Eric and Tina (the protagonists) discover that one of their club members is injured while others are missing, and that the whole town is crawling with monsters.

Silent Hill: The Arcade is a rail shooter in the vein of The House of the Dead games, complete with off-screen reloading and weapon power-ups. The players will shoot down hordes of monsters in various familiar (and not so) locations including Brookhaven Hospital, Silent Hill Historical Society, Lakeside Amusement Park etc., on their way to the heart of the catastrophe — a little girl aboard the Little Baroness. The game features four endings, one them being a traditional "UFO" ending.

SilverStrikeBowlingLive.bat_name: Silver Strike Bowling Live   體育-保齡球
SilverStrikeBowlingLive.title: 保齡球
SilverStrikeBowlingLive.notes: In 2010, the world of Silver Strike changed forever with the release of Silver Strike LIVE. Similar to IT's partner product, Golden Tee LIVE, SS LIVE allows players to compete in online tournaments against one another at all times around the country. Customizable bowlers and bowling balls also made their debut in Silver Strike LIVE, while Spare Challenge – an all-new game mode was also introduced. Finally the world's greatest bowling game gave players the chance to put their skills up against the entire online USA.

Skullgirls2E.title: 骷髏女孩：二度返場
Skullgirls2E.notes:
--Evo 2022主舞台游戏！--终极Skullgirls体验：拥有14个手绘动画角色、全配音故事模式、无数调色板和无与伦比的基于GGPO的多人网络代码。

[英文原文]
--Main Stage Game at Evo 2022!-- The ultimate Skullgirls experience: Featuring 14 hand-animated characters, fully voiced story mode, countless palettes, and unparalleled GGPO-based multiplayer netcode.

Skylanders.bat_name: Skylanders_ Cloud Patrol 觸摸-小龍斯派羅_雲端奇襲
Skylanders.title: 小龍斯派羅 雲端奇襲
Skylanders.notes:
The popular Skylanders have finally landed in the arcade thanks to this new mobile-to-arcade port by Adrenaline Amusements.

In Skylanders Cloud Patrol, players join the “Skylanders” as they patrol the Skylands for escaped trolls. Players start by choosing their favorite Skylander, and then take to the skies in a flying gunship to help put those troublesome trolls in their place. Tap to shoot or slide your fingers across targets creating amazing knock out combos! Score the highest combo area to win more tickets or points, and show friends who rules the skies.

SonicBlastHeroes.bat_name: Sonic Blast Heroes 索尼克爆破英雄
SonicBlastHeroes.title: 索尼克爆破英雄
SonicBlastHeroes.notes:
Sonic Blast Heroes is a new punch machine with improved safety features. It features 5 advanced video stages. The player punches the pad as hard as possible to knock away the enemies. Modes include VS Bank Robber, VS Trailer, VS Dinosaur, VS Kraken, VS Meteor.

This punch machine can be played from 2 to 4 players.

SSASR.bat_name: Sonic _ SEGA All-Stars Racing   競速-索尼克與世嘉全明星賽車
SSASR.title: 索尼克與世嘉全明星賽車
SSASR.notes:
索尼克和世嘉全明星在高速赛道对决中争夺胜利！在Sonic&Sega All Stars Racing中，您可以驾车、乘坐怪兽卡车、骑自行车，甚至乘坐飞机前往赛道。探索令人惊叹的新赛道，包括Sonic Seaside Hill、Curien Mansion和Blizzard Castle，您可以在中世纪城堡的城墙周围飞驰，在郁郁葱葱的雨林树冠下疾驰，在疯狂的比赛中穿过繁华的城市景观，冲向终点线。在您独特的角色车中，Jostle将迎战20名挑战者，包括超级猴子球的Ai Ai、桑巴的Amigo和邪恶的Eggman博士。通过躲避陷阱和发动令人发指的角色动作，如无敌的超级声波、香蕉闪电战的猴子球攻击或Tails狂野龙卷风，保持领先地位，将任何车辆都抛向空中！但如果你被殴打、殴打和破碎，一切还没有结束！为您的车辆加电以重新参加比赛，并确保对秘密捷径保持警惕，这将使您获得胜利的优势。•派对赛车乐趣-单人对决，在4人分屏中挑战你的朋友，进行终极赛道赛车对决！•所有你最喜欢的赛车手-从Sonic&SEGA宇宙中的20个不同角色中选择，包括Sonic、Tails、Aiai和Amigo。•高速车辆-每个角色都驾驶自己独特的车辆，包括跑车、自行车、飞机，甚至还有一根巨大的香蕉，来表演定制的特殊男子作品！•全明星移动-需要通过竞争对手？无法超越赛车手？然后用拾取武器（导弹、地雷和其他障碍物）或20个独特的角色动作中的一个将它们拿出来，让接受者知道是谁击中了它们！•令人惊叹的视觉效果-在中世纪城堡的城墙上、郁郁葱葱的雨林树冠下和繁华的城市景观中比赛，同时穿越索尼克和世嘉宇宙的27条具有挑战性的赛道。

[英文原文]
Sonic and Sega All-Stars race for victory in a high speed racetrack showdown!Take to the track by car, monster truck, bike and even airplane in Sonic & Sega All-Stars Racing.

Explore stunning new circuits including Sonic Seaside Hill, Curien Mansion and Blizzard Castle as you zip around medieval castle ramparts, hurtle under lush rain forest canopies and tear through bustling city scapes in a frantic race to the finish line. Jostle against a selection of 20 challengers including Super Monkey Ball’s Ai Ai, Amigo from Samba and the evil Dr. Eggman in your unique character vehicle. Stay ahead of the pack by dodging traps and launching outrageous character moves such as the invincible Super Sonic, Banana Blitz assault of monkey balls or Tails wild Tornado - set to throw any vehicle clean in the air! But if you’ve been battered, beaten and broken, it’s not over yet! Super-charge your vehicle with power-ups to get back in the race and be sure to stay alert for the secret short-cuts that will give you the edge to victory.

•Party Racing Fun - Battle it out in single player, challenge your friends in 4 player split-screen for the ultimate track racing showdown!

• All Your Favorite Racers - Choose from 20 different characters from the Sonic & SEGA universe including Sonic, Tails, Aiai and Amigo.

• High Velocity Vehicles - Every character drives their own unique vehicle including sports cars, bikes, planes and even a giant banana to perform bespoke special man-oeuvres!

• All-Star Moves - Need to get by a competitor? Can’t overtake a racer? Then take them out with a pick-up weapon (missiles, mines and other obstacles) or one of the 20 unique character moves that allows the recipient to know who just hit them!

• Stunning Visuals - Race over medieval castle ramparts, under lush rain forest canopies and through bustling city scapes as you battle through 27 challenging tracks from the Sonic and SEGA Universe.

SonicDashExtreme.title: 索尼克極速狂飆：Nu世代
SonicDashExtreme.notes:
Sonic Dash Extreme是由Sega Amusements开发并由Sega发布的手机游戏《Sonic Dash》的街机版。街机版于2015年5月在英国部分地区上市。街机版具有每日和全天排行榜，以及大型d-pad控制器的不同控制方法。

[英文原文]
Sonic Dash Extreme is an arcade version of the mobile phone game, Sonic Dash, developed by Sega Amusements and released by Sega. An arcade version became available in selected places in the United Kingdom on May 2015. The arcade version features daily and all-time leaderboards and different control methods for large-sized d-pad controllers.

soulclb2.bat_name: Soul Calibur II Arcade Edition 對戰-靈魂能力II 街機版
soulclb2.title: 靈魂能力II 街機版
soulclb2.notes:
在古代，有一种被称为灵魂边缘的强大武器，它的力量吸引了许多人。但灵魂边缘是一种邪恶的武器，当齐格弗里德声称拥有它时，他变成了一个名叫噩梦的生物。随着时间的推移，噩梦席卷了整个欧洲，留下了一条毁灭之路，尽管其他战士做出了努力。一天，一个拿着镰刀的神秘男子面对梦魇，将齐格弗里德从他被诅咒的身体中分离出来。然后，他复活了Azure Armor，继续作为“梦魇”生物。与此同时，一个年轻的女孩Tira发誓要接受灵魂边缘的黑暗力量，一个名叫Setsuka的女人发誓要为她的主人报仇。一直以来，关于灵魂边缘的新谣言在世界各地传播，导致许多以前寻找过它的人再次冒险外出。..Soulcalibur III是一款3D格斗游戏，拥有各种角色，每个角色都携带独特的武器和独特的战斗风格。战斗的基础是在不同的姿势下，从水平攻击、垂直攻击、投掷、踢腿和灵魂冲锋的组合中衍生出来的。角色在1vs1战斗中相互交战，当一方的能量损失、从环中移除或时间耗尽时结束。游戏有两种主要模式。第一个是《灵魂的故事》，玩家可以选择24个角色中的任何一个，并通过他们的个人故事来搜索灵魂边缘。这种模式的大部分是标准的战斗，但是在世界地图上可以做出选择，在过场动画中可以执行动作。第二部是《剑记》，其中创造了一个定制角色，并将其带到三国之间的战争中服役。必须使用战略来指挥部队和保卫重要据点。战场的某些位置包括“效果”，如增加重力或加速玩家或在黑暗中战斗。大多数战场任务以占领敌方据点或关键军官而结束。获得的黄金可用于购买各种内容，如新武器和服装。最后还有一些次要的游戏模式。其中之一是Versus模式，这是一种标准的1vs1模式，其中2名玩家可以参与。还有灵魂竞技场和生存模式来克服特定的挑战。在许多这些设置中，可以使用自定义角色，这些角色是由大量身体部位和服装创建的。奖励武器、服装、角色或内容可以通过在主要游戏模式中实现隐藏目标或在商店收集黄金并消费来解锁。

[英文原文]
In ancient times, a powerful weapon known as the Soul Edge existed, and tales of it's power lured many. But Soul Edge was an evil weapon, and when Siegfried claimed it, he was turned into a creature named Nightmare. As time passed, Nightmare rampaged across Europe leaving a path of destruction, despite the efforts of other fighters. One day, a mysterious man carrying a scythe confronts Nightmare and splits Siegfried from his cursed form. He then resurrects the Azure Armor to carry on as the "Nightmare" creature. At the same time, a young girl Tira pledges herself to Soul Edge's dark power, and a woman named Setsuka swears to avenge her master. All the while new rumors of the Soul Edge spread across the world, causing many who had searched for it before to once more venture out...

Soulcalibur III is a 3D fighting game featuring a variety of characters, each carrying a distinctive weapon and unique fighting style. The basics of the combat is a derived, in different stances, from a combination of Horizontal Attacks, Vertical Attacks, Throws, Kicks and a Soul Charge. Characters engage one another in 1vs1 fights that end when the energy of one side is lost, removed from the ring or run out of time.

There are two major modes of gameplay. The first is Tales of Souls, which allows the player to select any one of 24 characters and travel through their individual story to search for the Soul Edge. Most of this mode is standard fighting, however there are choices to be made on the world map and actions to be performed during cutscenes.

The second is Chronicles of the Sword, where a custom character is created and brought to serve in a war between three nations. Strategy must be used to direct units and defend important strongholds. Certain positions of the battlefield include "effects" such as increasing gravity or speeding players up or fighting in the dark. Most battlefield missions end with the capture of the enemy stronghold or a key officer. Gold is obtained which can be used to purchase a variety of content, such as new weapons and clothing.

Finally there are minor modes of gameplay. One of which is Versus mode, which is a standard 1vs1 in which 2 players can participate. There are also Soul Arena and Survival modes to overcome specific challenges. On many of these settings, custom characters can be used, having been created from a vast selection of body parts and clothing. Bonus weapons, clothing, characters or content can be unlocked through meeting hidden objectives in either of the main gameplay modes or by collecting gold and spending it at the shop.

soulclb3.bat_name: Soul Calibur III Arcade Edition 格鬥-靈魂能力III_街機版
soulclb3.title: 靈魂能力III 街機版
soulclb3.notes:
SoulCalibur III:Arcade Edition由Namco于2005年制作。在古代，有一种被称为灵魂边缘的强大武器，它的力量吸引了许多人。但灵魂边缘是一种邪恶的武器，当齐格弗里德声称拥有它时，他变成了一个名叫噩梦的生物。随着时间的推移，噩梦席卷了整个欧洲，留下了一条毁灭之路，尽管其他战士做出了努力。一天，一个拿着镰刀的神秘男子面对梦魇，将齐格弗里德从他被诅咒的身体中分离出来。然后，他复活了Azure Armor，继续作为“梦魇”生物。与此同时，一个年轻的女孩Tira发誓要接受灵魂边缘的黑暗力量，一个名叫Setsuka的女人发誓要为她的主人报仇。一直以来，关于灵魂边缘的新谣言在世界各地传播，导致许多以前寻找过它的人再次冒险外出。..Soulcalibur III是一款3D格斗游戏，拥有各种角色，每个角色都携带独特的武器和独特的战斗风格。战斗的基础是在不同的姿势下，从水平攻击、垂直攻击、投掷、踢腿和灵魂冲锋的组合中衍生出来的。角色在1vs1战斗中相互交战，当一方的能量损失、从环中移除或时间耗尽时结束。游戏有两种主要模式。第一个是《灵魂的故事》，玩家可以选择24个角色中的任何一个，并通过他们的个人故事来搜索灵魂边缘。这种模式的大部分是标准的战斗，但是在世界地图上可以做出选择，在过场动画中可以执行动作。第二部是《剑记》，其中创造了一个定制角色，并将其带到三国之间的战争中服役。必须使用战略来指挥部队和保卫重要据点。战场的某些位置包括“效果”，如增加重力或加速玩家或在黑暗中战斗。大多数战场任务以占领敌方据点或关键军官而结束。获得的黄金可用于购买各种内容，如新武器和服装。最后还有一些次要的游戏模式。其中之一是Versus模式，这是一种标准的1vs1模式，其中2名玩家可以参与。还有灵魂竞技场和生存模式来克服特定的挑战。在许多这些设置中，可以使用自定义角色，这些角色是由大量身体部位和服装创建的。奖励武器、服装、角色或内容可以通过在主要游戏模式中实现隐藏目标或在商店收集黄金并消费来解锁。

[英文原文]
SoulCalibur III: Arcade Edition was produced by Namco in 2005.

In ancient times, a powerful weapon known as the Soul Edge existed, and tales of it's power lured many. But Soul Edge was an evil weapon, and when Siegfried claimed it, he was turned into a creature named Nightmare. As time passed, Nightmare rampaged across Europe leaving a path of destruction, despite the efforts of other fighters. One day, a mysterious man carrying a scythe confronts Nightmare and splits Siegfried from his cursed form. He then resurrects the Azure Armor to carry on as the "Nightmare" creature. At the same time, a young girl Tira pledges herself to Soul Edge's dark power, and a woman named Setsuka swears to avenge her master. All the while new rumors of the Soul Edge spread across the world, causing many who had searched for it before to once more venture out...

Soulcalibur III is a 3D fighting game featuring a variety of characters, each carrying a distinctive weapon and unique fighting style. The basics of the combat is a derived, in different stances, from a combination of Horizontal Attacks, Vertical Attacks, Throws, Kicks and a Soul Charge. Characters engage one another in 1vs1 fights that end when the energy of one side is lost, removed from the ring or run out of time.

There are two major modes of gameplay. The first is Tales of Souls, which allows the player to select any one of 24 characters and travel through their individual story to search for the Soul Edge. Most of this mode is standard fighting, however there are choices to be made on the world map and actions to be performed during cutscenes.

The second is Chronicles of the Sword, where a custom character is created and brought to serve in a war between three nations. Strategy must be used to direct units and defend important strongholds. Certain positions of the battlefield include "effects" such as increasing gravity or speeding players up or fighting in the dark. Most battlefield missions end with the capture of the enemy stronghold or a key officer. Gold is obtained which can be used to purchase a variety of content, such as new weapons and clothing.

Finally there are minor modes of gameplay. One of which is Versus mode, which is a standard 1vs1 in which 2 players can participate. There are also Soul Arena and Survival modes to overcome specific challenges. On many of these settings, custom characters can be used, having been created from a vast selection of body parts and clothing. Bonus weapons, clothing, characters or content can be unlocked through meeting hidden objectives in either of the main gameplay modes or by collecting gold and spending it at the shop.

SpaceInvaders.bat_name: Space Invaders for NESiCAxLive   射擊-太空侵略者
SpaceInvaders.title: 太空侵略者
SpaceInvaders.notes:
自1978年推出以来，《太空入侵者》以一款无法停止的游戏让数百万人感到惊讶和娱乐。保护地球，摧毁Huidizo不明飞行物，发现征服世界的游戏的隐藏秘密！

[英文原文]
Since its launch in 1978, Space Invaders has amazed and entertaining millions of people with a game that simply cannot stop playing.Protect the earth, destroy the Huidizo UFO, and discover the hidden secrets of the game that conquered the world!

SpicaAdventure.title: Spica 大冒險
SpicaAdventure.notes:
Spica Adventure是台东的街机游戏。游戏中的女主角必须经历一系列充满抽象和卡通危险的阶段，类似于台东早期的泡泡泡泡系列（尽管从图形上讲，它类似于台东后来的Driller先生游戏）。这款游戏仍然是日本街机的独家游戏，它于2005年在台东Type X硬件上首次亮相。虽然它在更大的游戏世界中仍然默默无闻，但由于其快节奏的游戏玩法，它在速度跑社区中很受欢迎。

[英文原文]
Spica Adventure is an Arcade game from Taito. The game's heroine must pass through a series of stages filled with abstract and cartoony dangers, similar to Taito's earlier Bubble Bobble series (though, graphically, it resembles Taito's later Mr. Driller games). The game remains exclusive to the Japanese Arcade, where it debuted in 2005 on the Taito Type X hardware. While it remains an obscurity in the greater gaming world, it is popular in the speed run community due to its fast-paced game play.

Spiderman.title: 動作-蜘蛛俠
Spiderman.notes:
第一次，你可以打扮成蜘蛛侠，看看成为世界上最受欢迎的超级英雄是什么感觉。了解Stark Industries升级的全新网络射击游戏的来龙去脉，并在完成快节奏的瞄准试验时掌握不同的网络类型。

[英文原文]
For the first time, you can suit up as Spider-Man and see what it’s like to be the world’s favorite superhero. Learn the ins and outs of your brand new Stark Industries upgraded web shooters and master different web types as you race to complete fast-paced targeting trials.

SpongeBob.title: 海綿寶寶：比奇堡滾球狂飆（街機競技版）
SpongeBob.notes:
在PC游戏中，您可以在比基尼底部进行旋转和交易，将棋盘游戏带入全新的互动兴奋水平。扮演你最喜欢的海绵宝宝角色之一——海绵宝宝、帕特里克、桑迪或章鱼哥，最多可同时有四名玩家。四种游戏模式-经典、海绵宝宝、章鱼哥和浮游生物14个令人上瘾的小游戏！喜欢。讨价还价-快速点击操作可获得房产的最佳价格泵恐慌-哦，藤壶！您的水电费将由游泳池的水位决定！

[英文原文]
Wheel and deal your way through Bikini Bottom in the PC game that takes the board game to whole new levels of interactive excitement.

Play as one of your favorite SpongeBob Characters - SpongeBob, Patrick, Sandy or Squidward with up to four players at the same time.

Four modes of play - Classic, SpongeBob, Squidward and Plankton

14 addictive minigames! Like. Bargain Battle - Quick click action gets the best price for the property

Pump Panic - Oh barnacles! Your Utility rent will be determined by the water level in the pool!

StarTrekVoyager.title: 星际迷航：航海者号
StarTrekVoyager.notes:
星际迷航：航海家 - 街机游戏是一款第一人称风格的射击街机游戏，由 君主娱乐和 Team Play股份有限公司。制造，于 2002 年发布。星际迷航：航海家 - 街机游戏是一款从第一人称射击游戏的角度玩的光枪游戏。玩家使用一把光枪，可以瞄准屏幕上的敌人并射击。装填过程被称为重新调制，这是《星际迷航》中使用的一个术语，是通过在屏幕外射击枪来完成的。游戏的大部分时间都发生在 航海家号上，射击各种外星入侵者，例如 博格、广根猎人、物种8472以及来自星际迷航宇宙的其他几个外星物种。游戏有几个任务，玩家可以随着游戏的进行进行选择。一些任务涉及乘坐 达美航空公司飞行，达美航空公司是 航海家号船员使用的穿梭机之一。在这些序列中，玩家攻击博格飞船，例如博格立方体和球体。《星际迷航：旅行者-街机游戏》是一款第一人称射击街机游戏，由君主娱乐公司和Team Play股份有限公司制造，于2002年发行。Star Trek:Voyager-The Arcade Game是一款从第一人称射击角度玩的轻枪游戏。玩家使用一把可以瞄准和射击屏幕上敌人的轻枪。重新装弹过程被称为重新调制，这是《星际迷航》中使用的一个术语，是通过在屏幕外射击枪支来完成的。游戏的大部分内容都发生在USS Voyager上，拍摄了各种外星入侵者，如博格、广根猎人、8472物种以及《星际迷航》宇宙中的其他几个外星物种。游戏有几个任务，玩家可以随着游戏的进展进行选择。一些任务涉及三角洲飞行器的飞行，这是美国航空母舰旅行者号船员使用的航天飞机之一。在这些序列中，玩家攻击博格飞船，如博格立方体和球体。

[英文原文]
星际迷航：航海家 - 街机游戏是一款第一人称风格的射击街机游戏，由 Monarch Entertainment 和 Team Play Inc. 制造，于 2002 年发布。

星际迷航：航海家 - 街机游戏是一款从第一人称射击游戏的角度玩的光枪游戏。玩家使用一把光枪，可以瞄准屏幕上的敌人并射击。装填过程被称为重新调制，这是《星际迷航》中使用的一个术语，是通过在屏幕外射击枪来完成的。

游戏的大部分时间都发生在 USS Voyager 上，射击各种外星入侵者，例如 Borg、Hirogen Hunters、Species 8472 以及来自星际迷航宇宙的其他几个外星物种。游戏有几个任务，玩家可以随着游戏的进行进行选择。一些任务涉及乘坐 Delta Flyer 飞行，Delta Flyer 是 USS Voyager 船员使用的穿梭机之一。在这些序列中，玩家攻击博格飞船，例如博格立方体和球体。
Star Trek: Voyager — The Arcade Game is a first-person style shooter arcade game, manufactured by Monarch Entertainment and Team Play Inc. and released in 2002.

Star Trek: Voyager — The Arcade Game is a light gun game played from the first-person shooter perspective. The player uses a light gun which can be aimed and fired at on-screen enemies. The reloading process is referred to as remodulation, a term used in Star Trek, and is done by shooting the gun off-screen.

Much of the game takes place on the USS Voyager, shooting various alien intruders such as the Borg, Hirogen Hunters, Species 8472 as well as several other alien species from the Star Trek universe. The game has several missions players can select as the game progresses. Some missions involve flight in the Delta Flyer, one of the shuttles used by the crew of the USS Voyager. During these sequences players attack Borg vessels such as Borg Cubes and Spheres.

StarWars.title: 星球大戰：戰鬥艙
StarWars.notes:
Star Wars: Battle Pod is an experiential arcade game that features a dome-shaped screen, transporting players into heated battles in a galaxy far, far away.
In iconic locations like the Death Star, players will be able to take control of some of the most memorable vehicles and moments in the Star Wars universe and pilot them to victory.

SRG.bat_name: Storm Racer G   競速-雷動G
SRG.title: 雷動G
SRG.notes:
《风暴赛车G》是2011年首次发行的《风暴赛车》的续集。玩家一路开车穿过山区和偶尔的城镇，试图击败对手，以第一名的成绩回家。游戏有14辆车（股份有限公司隐藏7辆）和12条赛道（股份有限公司隐藏6辆）。

[英文原文]
Storm Racer G is the sequel to Storm Racer that was first released in 2011. Players drive through mountain regions and the occasional town along the way, in a bid to defeat their rivals and go home with a 1st place finish.

The game features 14 cars (inc. 7 hidden) and 12 tracks (inc. 6 hidden).

StormRider.bat_name: Storm Rider   競速-風暴騎士
StormRider.title: 風暴騎士
StormRider.notes:
MMORPG《风暴骑士》不仅仅是一款游戏，它是一个栩栩如生的传说，在那里你将有机会成为功夫大师并实现你的命运。

[英文原文]
MMORPG Storm Riders is not just a game, it is a legend that has come to life, where you will get an opportunity to become a kung-fu master and fulfill your destiny.

StraniaTheStellaMachina.bat_name: Strania -The Stella Machina-   射擊-星霜鋼機_斯特蘭尼亞
StraniaTheStellaMachina.title: 星霜鋼機 斯特蘭尼亞
StraniaTheStellaMachina.notes:
日本精品游戏工作室G.rev与Strania在Steam上首次亮相！

[英文原文]
Japanese boutique game studio G.rev makes its long-awaited debut on Steam with Strania!

StreetFighterIII3rdStrike.bat_name: Street Fighter III_ 3rd Strike - Fight for the Future for NESiCAxLive   格鬥-街頭霸王3_三度衝擊
StreetFighterIII3rdStrike.title: 街頭霸王3 三度衝擊
StreetFighterIII3rdStrike.notes:
第三季的这个版本标志着春丽的回归以及奖金回合。这个版本的《街头霸王III》增加了五个新角色，如春丽（来自《街头霸王II》）、诚（柔道专家）、十二（另一个吉尔克隆人）、Q（类似于日本超级英雄铁津28）和雷米（Guile/Nash克隆人）。这场比赛也标志着《超级街头霸王2》中最后一轮奖金的回归。在单人游戏中选择超级艺术后，您将有两个阶段可供选择。如前所述，对于除最后两个阶段外的每个阶段，您都可以从两个对手中进行选择。一旦你选择了要与谁战斗，播音员（或某人）会发表一些演讲（“这就是我所期望的”或其他什么。这是随机的），然后你将继续与对手战斗。如果你继续，你仍然可以选择2个对手，但你可以重新选择要与谁战斗。所以，如果你认为对手1很难获胜，那么你可以选择对手2。在单人游戏中，为了完成游戏，你有10个对手可以对抗。由于不断的VS比赛，没有人有机会达到那么远（在漫长的VS比赛开始之前，我已经达到了第7阶段）。然而，如前所述，在第9和第10阶段，你将无法选择对手（即根据你在第9阶段的角色确定对手），第10阶段应该是每个角色的吉尔。你的角色将与你的第9阶段对手进行一些对话。在第三阶段和第六阶段之后，您将有机会尝试奖金阶段。在第三阶段之后是“压碎汽车”奖金阶段，而在第六阶段之后则是“接球”奖金阶段。在汽车奖励阶段之前，VS屏幕将显示VS SUV（面包车的名称和图片）。然后它就像SF2游戏一样。但是，您不需要切换侧面，因为整辆车只能被一侧摧毁，您可以使用Super Moves。虽然超级米没有显示，但它仍然会随着你的移动而累积。不幸的是，你不能像SF2游戏那样有2人奖励阶段。当另一个玩家加入时，它就会直接进入战斗。帕里球奖励阶段（在VS屏幕上显示为你VS篮球，肖恩的照片拿着一个篮球）的工作原理类似于SF3:2I。根据你达到之前的表现，它仍然有不同的级别。但是，也有细微的差异。首先，它有自己的背景，而不是重复使用其中一个角色背景，而且你不仅仅局限于一个屏幕。当你离肖恩太远时，背景会滚动。除此之外，它的工作原理是一样的，你有20个球要挡。等级评判系统在整个游戏中都得到了应用。对于每个阶段，你都会得到一个分数，具体取决于你的表现（主要是像不输一轮、做超级取消、做长组合、用超级艺术获胜等会给你更高的分数）。你在每个阶段获得的分数会被记录下来，并显示在每个阶段之前你击败的角色列表中。在最后（当你没有继续或获胜时），将显示所有阶段的图表以及你为他们获得的成绩。在成绩下面，有一个标有“SP”的条，对于某些阶段，你在这个条上有一个点（我想SP意味着超级？）。这个等级评判系统和SP很可能是解锁某个秘密老板的钥匙。..在双人对战中，你有一组单独的等级。对于至少有一场胜利的玩家，他/她获得的最高分数将显示在他们的胜利下方。他们获得的胜利越多，他们在那场比赛中获得更高成绩的机会就越大。一旦他们输了，成绩就消失了。帕里斯。..它仍在游戏中，但现在只有三个版本。F在地上躺了一个小时

[英文原文]
This version of the third series marks the return of Chun Li along with the Bonus Rounds.

This version of Street Fighter III adds five new characters to the rosters such as Chun Li (from Street Fighter II), Makoto (a judo expert), Twelve (another Gill clone), Q (who resembles a Japanese superhero similar to Tetsujin 28) and Remy (a Guile/Nash clone). This game also marks the return of bonus rounds which were last present in Super Street Fighter II.

After choosing a Super Art in a 1-Player game, you'll then be given a choice of 2 stages to proceed to. As mentioned, earlier, for each stage except the last 2 stages, you have a choice, out of 2 opponents to fight with. Once you've selected who you'll be fighting, the announcer (or someone) will give some speech remarks (either "That's what I expect" or something else. It's random), and then you'll proceed to fighting the opponents. If you continue, you'll still have the same choice of 2 opponents, but you can re-select who to fight. So, if you think Opponent 1 is hard to win, you can then go for Opponent 2.

In the 1-Player game, you have a course of 10 opponents to fight against in order to complete the game. Due to constant VS matches, no one had the chance to reach that far (I reached Stage 7 before the long VS matches began). However, as mentioned earlier, in Stages 9 and 10, you would not have a choice of opponents (i.e. fixed opponent depending on your character in Stage 9), and Stage 10 should be Gill for every character. Your character will have some dialogue with your Stage 9 opponent.

After Stage three and Stage six, you will be given the chance to try out the Bonus Stages. After Stage three is the "Crush the Car" Bonus Stage, while after Stage 6 is the "Parry the Ball" Bonus Stage. Before the car Bonus Stage, the VS screen will show you VS SUV (the name of the van and a picture of it). Then it goes like in the SF2 games. However, you don't need to switch sides, as the whole car can be destroyed by only 1 side, and you CAN use Super Moves. Although the Super Meter is not shown, but it's still accumulated as you do moves. Unfortunately, you CAN'T have 2-Player Bonus Stages as in the SF2 games. When another player joins in, it just goes straight to the fight.

The Parry the Ball Bonus Stage (shown as you VS Basketball at the VS screen, with Sean's picture holding a Basketball) works something like the one if SF3:2I. There are still different levels of it, depending on your performance before you reach it. However, there are slight differences. For one, it gets it very own background, instead of reusing one of the character backgrounds, and you're not just limited to one screen. The background can scroll when you move too far away from Sean. Other than that, it works the same, and you have 20 balls to parry.

The Grade Judgment System is applied throughout the game. For each stage, you'll receive a grade, depending on your performance (mostly stuff like don't lose a round, do Super Cancels, do long combos, win with Super Arts, etc. will give you a higher grade). And the grade you've obtained for each stage is keep track and shown on the list of characters that you've defeated before each stage. At the very end (when you don't continue or win), a chart will be shown for all the stages and the grades you've obtained for them. Below the grades, there's a bar labelled as "SP" and for certain stages, you have a dot on this bar (I suppose SP means Super?). There's a high chance that this Grade Judgment System and the SP should be a key in unlocking some secret boss...

In 2-Player battles, you have a separate set of grades. For the player that has at least 1 win, the highest grade he/she has obtained will be shown below their wins. The more wins they have, the more chances for them to obtain higher grades for that match. Once they lose, the grade disappears.

Parries... It's still in the game, but there are only three versions of it now. F on the ground for a h

StreetFighterIV.bat_name: Street Fighter IV   格鬥-街頭霸王4
StreetFighterIV.title: 街頭霸王4
StreetFighterIV.notes:
Street Fighter® IV brings the legendary fighting series back to its roots by taking the beloved fighting moves and techniques of the original Street Fighter® II, and infusing them with Capcom's latest advancements in next generation technology to create a truly extraordinary experience that will re-introduce the world to the time-honored art of virtual martial arts.

Everything that made the legendary Street Fighter II a hit in the arcades, living rooms and dormitories across the globe has been brought back in Street Fighter IV. Players can play their favorite classic characters, such as Ryu, Ken, Chun-Li and Guile, along with new characters, including Crimson Viper, Abel, El Fuerte, and Rufus. Characters and environments are rendered in stylized 3D, while the game is played in the classic Street Fighter 2D perspective with additional 3D camera flourishes. Six-button controls for the game return, with a host of new special moves and features integrated into the gameplay system. Street Fighter IV brings a brand new fighting game to fans the world over.

StreetFighterVTypeArcade.bat_name: Street Fighter V_ Type Arcade   格鬥-街頭霸王5 街機版
StreetFighterVTypeArcade.title: 街頭霸王5 街機版
StreetFighterVTypeArcade.notes:
2017年10月5日，Capcom宣布《街头霸王V：街机版》将于2018年1月16日在美国和日本发布，并于1月19日在欧洲发布。游戏包括第一季和第二季所有DLC角色的代码，以及新的界面图形、两种新的游戏模式（街机模式和额外战斗模式）、每个角色一个额外的V-Trigger和一个新的CG开场电影。该游戏既可作为原始游戏所有者的免费下载更新，也可作为以优惠价格出售的独立零售游戏。街机版是为使用NESiCAxLive系统而开发的。

[英文原文]
On October 5, 2017, Capcom announced Street Fighter V: Arcade Edition for release on January 16, 2018 in the United States and Japan and on January 19, 2018 in Europe. The game includes codes for all of the DLC characters from seasons 1 and 2, as well as new interface graphics, two new gameplay modes (Arcade Mode and Extra Battle Mode), one additional V-Trigger per character, and a new CG opening cinematic. The game is available both as a free downloadable update for owners of the original game, and a standalone retail game sold at a reduced price. The Arcade Edition has been developed to use the NESiCAxLive system.

StreetFighterZero3.bat_name: Street Fighter Zero 3 for NESiCAxLive   格鬥-街頭霸王ZERO3
StreetFighterZero3.title: 街頭霸王ZERO3
StreetFighterZero3.notes:
*要自定义密钥，请右键单击并运行Controlls+General SettingsStreet Fighter Zero 3摒弃了之前Zero游戏中的“手动”和“自动”模式，而是提供了三种不同的游戏风格，称为“主义”，供玩家选择。标准的游戏风格，A-ism（或日本的Z-ism），是基于之前的Zero游戏，在这些游戏中，玩家有一个三级超级组合量规，可以使用几个超级组合动作。X-ism是一种基于《超级街头霸王II Turbo》的简单风格，玩家有一个单级超级组合仪表，可以使用一个单一但强大的超级组合动作。第三种风格，V-ism（或“可变”风格），是一种独特的风格，允许玩家执行类似于《街头霸王0 2》中的自定义组合，但不能使用超级组合。在X-ism中，玩家不能进行空气阻挡或执行阿尔法计数器，并且只能在其强大的3级版本中使用1个超级组合移动。Zero 3还引入了一个“守卫力量计”，每次玩家阻挡时，该计都会耗尽——如果该计完全耗尽，那么玩家将仍然容易受到攻击。在选择要使用的角色和超级尺寸时，I-ism风格是可定制的，这仅适用于Dreamcast版本的Saikyo Dojo模式，或PSP版本在世界巡回赛或/和进入模式下的MAX更新。

[英文原文]
* To customize keys , right click and run Controlls + General Settings

Street Fighter Zero 3 discards the "Manual" and "Auto" modes from the previous Zero games and instead offers three different playing styles known as "isms" for players to choose from. The standard playing style, A-ism (or Z-ism in Japan), is based on the previous Zero games, in which the player has a three-level Super Combo gauge with access to several Super Combo moves. X-ism is a simple style based on Super Street Fighter II Turbo, in which the player has a single-level Super Combo gauge and access to a single but powerful Super Combo move. The third style, V-ism (or "variable" style), is a unique style that allows the player to perform custom combos similar to the ones in Street Fighter Zero 2, but cannot use Super Combos. In X-ism, players cannot air-block nor perform Alpha Counters, and can only use 1 Super Combo move in its powerful Level 3 version. Zero 3 also introduces a "Guard Power Gauge" which depletes each time the player blocks – if the gauge is completely depleted, then the player will remain vulnerable to an attack. The I-ism style is customizable when selecting which character and super gauge to be used, which is only exclusive to Dreamcast version's Saikyo Dojo Mode, or PSP version's MAX update on World Tour or/and Entry Modes.

SuggoiArcanaHeart2Nesica.bat_name: Suggoi_ Arcana Heart 2 for NESiCAxLive   格鬥-聖靈之心2
SuggoiArcanaHeart2Nesica.title: 聖靈之心2
SuggoiArcanaHeart2Nesica.notes:
2008年10月30日，Examu发布了名为Suggoi！阿卡纳心脏2。这个版本进一步平衡了游戏并修复了一些错误。它还进行了一些设计更改，例如新的角色插图和Kaya Hirotaka的红色重新设计。新增内容包括一个附加阶段；三个新角色，包括Nazuna Inuwaka、Akane Inuwaka和Parace L'Sia；他们各自的Arcana、Kayatsuhime（花）、Fenex（声音）、Parace L'sia（生命）；每个角色的新调色板，可通过按角色选择屏幕上的“开始”按钮获得；以及额外的训练模式。苏盖！Arcana Heart 2于2009年2月27日进一步更新到2.6版本。

[英文原文]
On October 30, 2008, Examu released a major update to Arcana Heart 2 called Suggoi! Arcana Heart 2. This version further balanced the game and fixed some bugs. It also featured some design changes, such as new character illustrations and a red redesign for Kaya Hirotaka. New additions included an additional stage; three new characters including Nazuna Inuwaka, Akane Inuwaka, and Parace L'Sia; their respective Arcana, Kayatsuhime (Flower), Fenex (Sound), Parace L'sia (Life); new color palettes for each character, available by pressing the Start button on the character select screen; and an additional training mode. Suggoi! Arcana Heart 2 was further updated to version 2.6 on February 27, 2009.

FNFSB2.bat_name: Super Bikes 2   競速-超級摩托2
FNFSB2.title: 超級摩托2
FNFSB2.notes:
战斗机攻击不明飞行物，冲进巴黎闹鬼的地下墓穴，在超空间躲避巨大的蠕虫，在摩押地区疾驰而过。逃离泰国丛林中的大象，跳过拉斯维加斯的火焰环，在西班牙与公牛一起奔跑，在喜马拉雅山脉令人难以置信的白雪覆盖的山顶巡航。从9名骑手和12辆自行车中选择，发动机、贴纸、轮胎等都经过了多次精心升级！

[英文原文]
Race through Moab as fighter jets attack UFOs, descend into the haunted catacombs of Paris, and dodge giant worms in hyperspace. Escape elephants in the jungles of Thailand, jump through the flaming hoops of Vegas, run with the bulls in Spain and cruise through the unbelievable snow-covered mountaintops of the Himalayas. Choose from 9 riders and 12 bikes with multiple tricked-out upgrades for engines, decals, tires and more!

SB3.bat_name: Super Bikes 3 競速-超級摩托3
SB3.title: 超級摩托3
SB3.notes:
超级自行车街机系列的第三部大获成功，其图形更加耀眼，游戏玩法得到改进，橱柜设计超级时尚多彩。《超级自行车3》以明亮、引人注目的颜色呈现，让发动机在摩托车上快速运转，确保你感觉良好，真正成为这个快节奏、激烈的赛车街机游戏的一部分。成为拥有八个独特骑手角色和八条杀手级赛道的赛车冠军。当你和其他七名车手奋力完成比赛时，你的技能将受到考验，包括急转弯、蜿蜒弯道和令人难忘的风景。这个引人注目的街机橱柜配有一个发光的灯箱，确保标志即使在整个街机室中也能脱颖而出。屏幕两侧的Chrome拱形设计使整个设置看起来非常时尚，而骑手两侧的两个扬声器确保了完全沉浸式体验和真正独特的街机体验。

[英文原文]
The third instalment of the hugely successful Super Bikes arcade series is here, with even more dazzling graphics, improved gameplay and a super stylish, colourful cabinet design.

Presented in bright, eye-catching colours, Super Bikes 3 gets engines revving with a large ride-on motorbike that ensures you feel well and truly part of this fast-paced, fierce racing arcade game.
Become a racing champion with eight unique rider characters and eight killer tracks. You'll have your skills put to the test with sharp turns, wandering bends and unforgettable scenery as you and seven other riders battle it out to finish the race out on top.

This striking arcade cabinet features an illuminated light box, ensuring the logo stands out even from across the arcade room. Chrome arches either side of the screen give the whole setup an incredibly sleek look, while two speakers on either side of the rider ensure total immersion and a truly unique arcade experience.

superdbz.bat_name: Super Dragon Ball Z 格鬥-超級龍珠Z
superdbz.title: 超級龍珠Z
superdbz.notes:
《超级龙珠Z》（Super Dragon Ball Z）是一款基于鸟山明创作的日本漫画系列《龙珠》的3D格斗游戏。远离最近系列的游戏玩法，如龙珠Z/武道和火花！/Budokai Tenkaichi游戏，超级龙珠Z将其风格带回了一个更传统的公式，该公式因Capcom和SNK而闻名。1990年代的游戏。

[英文原文]
Super Dragon Ball Z (超 スーパードラゴンボールZ) is a cel-shaded 3D fighting video game, based on the Japanese manga series Dragon Ball created by Akira Toriyama. Shifting away from the gameplay of recent series such as the Dragon Ball Z / Budokai and Sparking! / Budokai Tenkaichi games, Super Dragon Ball Z brings its style back to a more traditional formula made famous with the Capcom & SNK. games of the 1990s.

SuperStreetFighterIVArcadeEdition.bat_name: Super Street Fighter IV_ Arcade Edition   格鬥-超級街頭霸王4_街機版
SuperStreetFighterIVArcadeEdition.title: 超級街頭霸王4 街機版
SuperStreetFighterIVArcadeEdition.notes:
《超级街头霸王®IV街机版》将《街头霸王®》的最终愿景带到了PC上。广受好评的《超级街头斗士®IV》的后续版本将通过经典的2D街头霸王战斗动作、大量新角色和回归角色、增强的在线模式等进一步重新定义战斗游戏类型。《超级街头霸王IV街机版》拥有39个角色。这包括《街头霸王IV》中的角色，如Ryu、Chun-li、El Fuerte和Rufus，同时增加了《超级街头霸王IV®》中的10个角色和4个新角色，包括经典战斗员Yun、Yang和Evil Ryu以及全新的Oni。除了角色，Super Street Fighter®IV街机版首次在PC上添加了全新的平衡、更好的在线功能和功能齐全的回放频道。

[英文原文]
Super Street Fighter® IV Arcade Edition, brings the definitive vision of Street Fighter® to the PC. The follow-up to the critically acclaimed Super Street Fighter® IV will further redefine the fighting game genre with classic 2D Street Fighter fighting action, a host of new and returning characters, beefed up online modes, and more.

Super Street Fighter® IV Arcade Edition features a roster of 39 characters. This includes characters from the original Street Fighter IV such as Ryu, Chun-li, El Fuerte, and Rufus, while adding the 10 characters from Super Street Fighter® IV and 4 new characters, including classic combatants Yun, Yang, and Evil Ryu as well as the all-new Oni.

Beyond characters, Super Street Fighter® IV Arcade Edition adds all-new balancing, better online functionality, and the fully-featured Replay Channel, on the PC for the first time.

SuperStreetFighterIVArcadeEditionEXP.title: 超級街頭霸王4 街機版 Export
