VF5Esports.bat_name: Virtua Fighter esports   格鬥-VR戰士 電競
VF5Esports.title: VR戰士 電競
VF5Esports.notes:
这款游戏的增强版重制版名为《Virtua Fighter 5 Ultimate Showdown》，在日本街机上也被称为《Virtura Fighters》电子竞技，于2020年9月在2020年东京电玩展在线上被称为“Virtua战斗机x电子竞技项目”，并于2021年5月宣布，以庆祝世嘉成立60周年。该版本由Ryu Ga Gotoku Studio和Sega AM2共同开发，具有更新的图形、使用龙引擎、新的背景音乐、新的用户界面、新的开场电影和新的在线功能。

[英文原文]
An enhanced remaster of the game, titled Virtua Fighter 5 Ultimate Showdown, also known in Japanese arcades as Virtua Fighter esports, was teased at Tokyo Game Show 2020 Online in September 2020 as Virtua Fighter x esports Project and announced in May 2021, in celebration of Sega's 60th anniversary. Co-developed by Ryu Ga Gotoku Studio and Sega AM2, this version features updated graphics, using the Dragon Engine, new background music, new user interface, new opening cinematic, and new online features.

VirtuaStriker3.bat_name: Virtua Striker 3 Ver_ 2002 體育-VR射手3 2002版
VirtuaStriker3.title: VR射手3 2002版
VirtuaStriker3.notes:
《Virtua Striker》（日语："ー";Ś?)!$(%イイー）电子游戏是世嘉的街机风格足球/足球运动游戏。该系列最初由世嘉AM2开发，后来与Virtua Striker 3一起转移到了Amusement Vision。但该系列再次以Virtua Striker 4转移到Sega AM2。最初的Virtua Striker于1994年发布，是第一款使用3D计算机图形的足球比赛，也因其早期使用纹理映射而闻名[1]，以及Sega自己的赛车视频游戏Daytona USA。[2]

[英文原文]
The Virtua Striker (バーチャストライカー in Japanese) video games are arcade-style football/soccer sports games by Sega. Originally developed by Sega AM2, the series moved to Amusement Vision with Virtua Striker 3. But the series moved again to Sega AM2 with Virtua Striker 4. The original Virtua Striker, released in 1994, was the first association football game to use 3D computer graphics, and was also notable for its early use of texture mapping,[1] along with Sega's own racing video game Daytona USA.[2]

VirtuaStriker4.title: VR射手4 2004版
VirtuaStriker4.notes:
《Virtua Striker 4》是一款为Triforce硬件平台发布的足球游戏，是《Virtua Striker 3》的直接续作。它尚未移植到任何家庭系统。尽管玻利维亚、委内瑞拉、安哥拉、科特迪瓦、利比里亚、斯洛文尼亚、泰国、乌兹别克斯坦、斐济和塔希提岛已被替换，但2002年版《维图阿前锋3》的大多数球队都将重返《维图亚前锋4》。目前还不清楚这款游戏是否像前作一样隐藏了球队。

[英文原文]
Virtua Striker 4 (バーチャストライカー4) is a football game released for Triforce hardware and the direct sequel to Virtua Striker 3. It has not been ported to any home systems.

Most of the teams from from Virtua Striker 3 Ver. 2002 return in Virtua Striker 4, though Bolivia, Venezuela, Angola, Cote D'Ivoire, Liberia, Slovenia, Thailand, Uzbekistan, Fiji and Tahiti have been swapped. It is also not known if the game has hidden teams like its predecessors.

VT3.bat_name: Virtua Tennis 3   體育-威力網球3_黃金激鬥場_耀世街機版_
VT3.title: 威力網球3 黃金激鬥場 耀世街機版
VT3.notes: Virtua Tennis returns for a third interation, featuring improved AI, higher detail for the characters, and various modes such as career, mini-games, and more.

VT3ELF2.bat_name: Virtua Tennis 3 _Elfloader2_   體育-威力網球3_黃金激鬥場_Elfloader2_
VT3ELF2.title: 威力網球3 黃金激鬥場 Elfloader2
VT3ELF2.notes: Virtua Tennis returns for a third interation, featuring improved AI, higher detail for the characters, and various modes such as career, mini-games, and more.

VT4.bat_name: Virtua Tennis 4   體育-威力網球4_黃金激鬥場_耀世街機版_
VT4.title: 威力網球4 黃金激鬥場 耀世街機版
VT4.notes:
世界顶级球员回归，一些最激动人心的后起之秀也加入了进来。7月1日前购买并保存！

[英文原文]
The top players in the world return, joined by some of the most exciting up-and-coming contenders. Purchase before July 1st and save!

WackyRaces.bat_name: Wacky Races   競速-怪車大賽
WackyRaces.title: 怪車大賽
WackyRaces.notes:
这款快节奏的街机赛车游戏让玩家在六条赛道上的11辆不同汽车中控制23个不同的古怪种族卡通人物之一。玩家们在赛道上高速奔跑，使用武器互相攻击，就像在超级马里奥赛车风格的卡丁车游戏中一样。除了卡丁车赛车的比喻外，它还具有Outrun风格的计时器：玩家有有限的时间玩，但可以通过检查站积累更多时间。

[英文原文]
This fast-paced arcade racing game has players take control of one of 23 different Wacky Races cartoon characters in one of 11 different cars across six tracks. Players blast through the tracks at high speed, using weapons to take each other out like in Super Mario Kart-style kart racing games. Aside from kart racing tropes, it also features an Outrun-style timer: players are given a limited time to play, but can build up more time by passing checkpoints.

wadaikomaster.bat_name: Wadaiko Master 音樂-太鼓達人
wadaikomaster.title: 太鼓達人
wadaikomaster.notes:
Wadaiko Master is the Brazilian version of the Taiko no Tatsujin: Momoiro Version arcade cabinet that was released in 2014.

Due to copyright reasons, only about 30 songs are available there. Also, it does not support the Banapassport card reader.

WalkingDead.bat_name: Walking Dead 射擊光槍-行屍走肉街機版
WalkingDead.title: 行屍走肉街機版
WalkingDead.notes:
街机轻枪游戏基于AMC电视剧，玩家使用弩消灭步行者并到达安全地带。玩家可以获得其他有用的武器，如钉枪、刀、撬棍等。营救幸存者会给玩家带来健康奖励。一个或两个玩家合作。

[英文原文]
Arcade light-gun game based on the AMC TV series where the player uses a crossbow to eliminate walkers and get to safety. The player can obtain other useful weapons such as nailguns, knives, crowbars and more. Rescuing survivors gives the player a health bonus. One or two player co-op.

WMMT3.bat_name: Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 3   競速-灣岸午夜極速3DX
WMMT3.title: 灣岸午夜極速3DX
WMMT3.notes:
Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 3（也称为Maximum Tune-3，或简称Maxi 3）是由NAMCO开发和发布的街机赛车电子游戏，基于Wangan Midnight漫画。这是万安午夜最高音系列的第三款游戏，也是万安午夜街机系列的第四款游戏。该片于2007年在日本和北美上映。

[英文原文]
Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 3 (also known as Maximum Tune 3, or simply Maxi 3) is an arcade racing video game developed and published by NAMCO and based on the Wangan Midnight manga. It is the third game in the Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune series and the fourth entry of the Wangan Midnight arcade series. This was released in 2007 in both Japan and North America.

WMMT3DXP.bat_name: Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 3DX PLUS   競速-灣岸午夜極速3DX plus
WMMT3DXP.title: 灣岸午夜極速3DX plus
WMMT3DXP.notes:
Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 3DX+是一款基于Wangan Midnight漫画的街机电子游戏。这是万安《午夜最高音3》街机系列的第二次升级，第一次是万安的《午夜最低音3DX》。这也是Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune在美国发行的最后一部作品。

[英文原文]
Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 3DX+ is an arcade video game based on the Wangan Midnight manga. It is the second upgrade of the Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 3 arcade series, the first being Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 3DX. It's also the last Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune installment to be released in the United States.

WMMT5.bat_name: Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 5   競速-灣岸午夜極速5
WMMT5.title: 灣岸午夜極速5
WMMT5.notes:
Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 5（在北美也称为Maximum Tune-5，或简称Maxi 5或Maxitune 5）是由Namco开发和发行的街机赛车电子游戏，基于Wangan Midnight漫画。这是万安午夜最高音系列的第五款游戏，也是万安午夜街机系列的第八款游戏。这也是继Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 3DX+之后，Wangan Midnight系列在北美正式发布的第一款游戏。就像北美的《万安午夜最高音4》一样，这是万安午夜最大高音系列中第一款在中国大陆被跳过的游戏，直到《万安半夜最高音5》的下一次更新。

[英文原文]
Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 5 (also known as Maximum Tune 5 in North America, or simply Maxi 5 or Maxitune 5) is an arcade racing video game developed and published by Namco and based on the Wangan Midnight manga. It is the fifth game in the Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune series and the eighth entry of the Wangan Midnight arcade series. This is also the first game in the Wangan Midnight series to be officially relased in North America since Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 3DX+. Just like Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 4 in North America, this is the first game in the Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune series to be skipped in Mainland China until the next update of Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 5.

WMMT5DX.bat_name: Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 5DX   競速-灣岸午夜極速5DX
WMMT5DX.title: 灣岸午夜極速5DX
WMMT5DX.notes:
Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 5DX（也称为Maximum Tune-5DX，简称Maxi 5DX）是由Namco开发和发行的街机赛车电子游戏，基于Wangan Midnight漫画。这是万安午夜街机游戏系列的第五款游戏。本次更新在日本版中增加了两个外国制造商（道奇和奥迪）和箱根（太坎山），这两个制造商以前只在国际版的万安午夜最高音5中可用，日本版万安午夜最大高音5的两个课程（池袋副中心和新宿/涩谷）在国际版中首次亮相。这场比赛介绍了科比球场。

[英文原文]
Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 5DX (also known as Maximum Tune 5DX, or simply Maxi 5DX) is an arcade racing video game developed and published by Namco and based on the Wangan Midnight manga. It is the fifth game in the Wangan Midnight arcade game series. This update adds two foreign makers (Dodge and Audi) and Hakone (Mt. Taikan) in the Japanese version that were previously available only in the International versions of Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 5 and two courses from the Japanese version of Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 5 (Sub-Center Ikebukuro, and Shinjuku/Shibuya) were made its debut in the International version. This game introduces the Kobe course.

WMMT5DXPlus.bat_name: Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 5DX_   競速-灣岸午夜極速5DX plus
WMMT5DXPlus.title: 灣岸午夜極速5DX plus
WMMT5DXPlus.notes:
Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 5DX（也称为Maximum Tune-5DX，简称Maxi 5DX）是由Namco开发和发行的街机赛车电子游戏，基于Wangan Midnight漫画。这是万安午夜街机游戏系列的第五款游戏。本次更新在日本版中增加了两个外国制造商（道奇和奥迪）和箱根（太坎山），这两个制造商以前只在国际版的万安午夜最高音5中可用，日本版万安午夜最大高音5的两个课程（池袋副中心和新宿/涩谷）在国际版中首次亮相。这场比赛介绍了科比球场。

[英文原文]
Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 5DX (also known as Maximum Tune 5DX, or simply Maxi 5DX) is an arcade racing video game developed and published by Namco and based on the Wangan Midnight manga. It is the fifth game in the Wangan Midnight arcade game series. This update adds two foreign makers (Dodge and Audi) and Hakone (Mt. Taikan) in the Japanese version that were previously available only in the International versions of Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 5 and two courses from the Japanese version of Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 5 (Sub-Center Ikebukuro, and Shinjuku/Shibuya) were made its debut in the International version. This game introduces the Kobe course.

WMMT6.bat_name: Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 6 競速-灣岸午夜極速6
WMMT6.title: 競速-灣岸午夜極速6
WMMT6.notes:
Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 6 is the tenth game in the Wangan Midnight: Maximum Tune racing series based on the Wangan Midnight manga. In this racing game players have access to over 80 car models from thirteen Japanese and international manufacturers. This title introduces Porsche for the first time along with several new vehicles from other manufacturers as well, replacing RUF. Races take place on actual urban expressways of Japan such as C1, Hanshin Expressway Loop Line and Fukuoka Urban Expressway. The cabinet's controls are designed to resemble a real car with a steering wheel, accelerator, brakes and six-speed transmission.

The arcade setup consists of four units that are used for local versus multiplayer in the VS Player mode. Players can also race online ghosts from past performances by real players in the Online Ghost VS Battle. This is a new mode for the series, with up to three ghost simultaneously. In the game's Story Mode 100 original episodes of Wangan Midnight are revisited where races are interspersed with story sequences. In Time Attack players race alone and times are compared with other players countrywide. As with previous titles in the series gameplay data can be saved using a physical BANAPASSPORT Card to keep the progress saved. Cars can be customized in various ways.

WMMT6R.bat_name: Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 6R   競速-灣岸午夜極速6R
WMMT6R.title: 灣岸午夜極速6R
WMMT6R.notes:
Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 6 R（也称为Maximum Tune-6 R，简称Maxi 6 R）是由Namco开发和发行的街机赛车电子游戏，基于Wangan Midnight漫画。这是万安午夜最大调街机游戏系列的第十一款游戏。这是Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 6街机系列的首次升级，该版本于2020年1月21日在日本推出。

[英文原文]
Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 6 R (also known as Maximum Tune 6 R, or simply Maxi 6 R) is an arcade racing video game developed and published by Namco and based on the Wangan Midnight manga. It is the eleventh game in the Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune arcade game series. It is the first upgrade of the Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 6 arcade series and this version was launched in January 21, 2020 in Japan.

WMMT6RR.bat_name: Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 6RR   競速-灣岸午夜極速6RR
WMMT6RR.title: 灣岸午夜極速6RR
WMMT6RR.notes:
《Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 6 RR》（又称《Maximum Tune-6 RR》、《Maxi 6 RR》或《Maximum Tune-6 Double R》）是由Namco开发并发行的街机赛车电子游戏，基于《Wangan Midnight》漫画。这是万安午夜最大调街机游戏系列的第十二款游戏。这是Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 6街机游戏的第二次升级，该游戏于2021年11月17日在日本发布，并于2021年12月22日在亚洲/大洋洲发布。新功能包括：*万安锦标赛*宾果挑战*最高等级从SSSSS提高到SSSSSS（SSSSS等级玩家一旦转移，将从SSSSS 9等级开始）*最高VS等级从10级提高到12级（10级职业选手将从一个等级开始，取决于他们转移后拥有的VS奖牌）*新车轮品牌：Work*Yuzo Koshiro的5首新歌*VS试赛（亚洲/大洋洲）*万安领航员Navi Scratch（亚洲/大洋洲）

[英文原文]
Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 6 RR (also known as Maximum Tune 6 RR, Maxi 6 RR, or Maximum Tune 6 Double R) is an arcade racing video game developed and published by Namco and based on the Wangan Midnight manga. It is the twelfth game in the Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune arcade game series. It is the second upgrade of the Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 6 Arcade game and the game is released in Japan (November 17, 2021) and Asia/Oceania in December 22, 2021.

New features include:
* Wangan Tournament
* Bingo Challenge
* Max Class level increased from SSSSS to SSSSSS (SSSSS Class players will start from SSSSS9 Class once transferred over)
* Max VS Grade level increased from 10th Grade to 12th Grade (10th Grade Pro players will start from a grade dependent on the VS medals they possess once transferred over)
* New wheels brand: Work
* 5 new songs by Yuzo Koshiro
* VS Trial Race (Asia/Oceania)
* Navi Scratch-off on Wangan Navigator (Asia/Oceania)

wanganmr.bat_name: Wangan Midnight R 競速-灣岸競速_傳奇再現
wanganmr.title: 灣岸競速 傳奇再現
wanganmr.notes:
Wangan Midnight R是Namco于2002年发布的一款赛车街机游戏；它运行在Namco System 246硬件上，顾名思义，它是去年发布的《万安午夜》的第一部续集。除了原始游戏中可选择的所有汽车外，CPU控制的对手车辆也可供选择，包括隐藏的“魔鬼Z”。要在插入硬币后选择其中一辆，玩家必须在向任一方向转动方向盘的同时踩下油门踏板（但是，除非满足某些条件，否则其中一些可能不会被选择）。 与原版一样，游戏有三种模式；故事模式、时间攻击模式和对战模式（在最后一个模式中，还增加了5分钟的单局游戏子模式，以及一个不计时的单局模式和一个只入侵的模式），但像尾随车的加速这样的几个平衡已经重新调整，这样玩家就可以更享受彼此的比赛。

[英文原文]
Wangan Midnight R is a racing arcade game that was released by Namco in 2002; it runs on Namco System 246 hardware, and as its name suggests, it is the first sequel to Wangan Midnight, which was released in the previous year. In addition to all the cars that were selectable for the original game, the CPU-controlled opponents' vehicles from it have also been made available for selection, including the hidden one "Devil-Z" - and to select one of them after inserting a coin, a player has to step on the gas pedal while turning the steering wheel in either direction (however, some of them may not be selected unless certain conditions have been met). 

As in the original, the game has three modes; Story Mode, Time Attack Mode and Versus Mode (for the last of these, a 5-minute one-game sub-mode has also been added, along with an untimed single-game one and an intrusion-only one), but several balances like the trailing car's acceleration have been readjusted so players may enjoy racing each other more.

wanganmd.bat_name: Wangan Midnight 競速-灣岸競速
wanganmd.title: 灣岸競速
wanganmd.notes:
Wangan Midnight是一款基于日本同名漫画的街机赛车游戏。游戏聚焦于万安高速公路上的高速街头赛车，这是日本著名的高速公路，以其长而直的道路而闻名。玩家可以从各种各样的汽车中进行选择，每辆汽车都有自己独特的特点，并与人工智能控制的对手或其他玩家进行比赛。游戏强调速度和精度，因为玩家在交通中导航并试图超越对手。玩家可以定制他们的汽车，调整发动机和轮胎等部件以提高性能。游戏还具有不同的模式，包括故事模式，玩家可以在其中体验漫画中的关键事件。

[英文原文]
Wangan Midnight is an arcade racing game based on the Japanese manga of the same name. The game focuses on high-speed street racing on the Wangan Expressway, a famous highway in Japan known for its long, straight roads. Players can choose from a variety of cars, each with its own unique characteristics, and race against AI-controlled opponents or other players.

The gameplay emphasizes speed and precision as players navigate traffic and try to outpace their rivals. Players can customize their cars, adjusting parts like the engine and tires to improve performance. The game also features different modes, including story mode, where players can experience key events from the manga.

WartranTroopers.title: 沃特兰骑兵
WartranTroopers.notes:
Wartran部队是 科乐美的四人街机游戏，玩家在其中扮演士兵的角色，与邪恶的雇佣兵、陆地和空中车辆作战，并对巨大的机甲战争机器发动攻击。DX 版本有两个 50 英寸显示器。它是 世界大战的续集。玩家必须在每个任务中与最多四名队友一起进行防御、掩护和攻击，他们必须与队友合作，才能在这个史诗般的战场模拟中生存下来。每个敌方角色都拥有自己的技能和攻击，因此玩家需要用战场上的大量武器来装备自己，才能击败和摧毁敌人。Wartran Troopers是Konami的四人街机游戏，玩家扮演士兵的角色，与邪恶的雇佣兵、陆地和空中车辆作战，并对巨大的机械战机器发动攻击。DX版本有两个50英寸的显示器。这是《世界大战》的续集。玩家必须在每个任务中与最多四名队友一起进行防御、掩护和攻击，他们必须与他们合作才能在这个史诗般的战场模拟中幸存下来。每个敌人角色都拥有自己的技能和攻击，因此玩家需要在战场上装备各种各样的武器，以击败和摧毁敌人。

[英文原文]
Wartran Troopers 是 Konami 的四人街机游戏，玩家在其中扮演士兵的角色，与邪恶的雇佣兵、陆地和空中车辆作战，并对巨大的机甲战争机器发动攻击。DX 版本有两个 50 英寸显示器。它是 World Combat 的续集。

玩家必须在每个任务中与最多四名队友一起进行防御、掩护和攻击，他们必须与队友合作，才能在这个史诗般的战场模拟中生存下来。

每个敌方角色都拥有自己的技能和攻击，因此玩家需要用战场上的大量武器来装备自己，才能击败和摧毁敌人。
Wartran Troopers is Konami's four player arcade game where players assume the character of a soldier and battle vicious mercenaries, land and air vehicles and launch attacks against huge mech war machines. The DX version has two 50 inch monitors. It is the sequel to World Combat.

Players must defend, cover and attack with up to four team mates on each mission, who they must work together with in order to survive this epic battle-field simulation.

Each enemy character boasts their own skills and attacks, so players need to equip themselves with the huge range of weaponry found on the battle field in order to defeat and destroy the enemy.

WastelandRacers.bat_name: Wasteland Racers 2071   競速-荒野飆車 2071
WastelandRacers.title: 荒野飆車 2071
WastelandRacers.notes:
《荒原赛车手2071》是Triotech于2006年11月20日发布的街机风格电子游戏。模拟器发生在2071年，有六条赛道（从机场混乱到失落的拉斯维加斯废墟）和五辆汽车（从拦截器到破碎机）。如果玩家先完成，他们将收到一个解锁新车和赛道的代码。《荒原赛车2071》是Chuck E.Cheese的街机游戏之一。这些汽车都与雪佛兰或福特等实际制造商无关；基于未来原型的幻想汽车被用来在后启示录时代的赛车场中导航。它们能够提供高达2Gs的加速。因为标题中有“荒原”一词，所以假设游戏背景设定在反乌托邦的21世纪。这款街机游戏有两个版本；标准配置有27英寸显示器，豪华配置有52英寸显示器。

[英文原文]
Wasteland Racers 2071 is an arcade-style video game by Triotech that was released on November 20, 2006.
The simulator takes place in the year 2071 with six race tracks (from Airport Mayhem to the Ruins of Lost Vegas) and five cars (from the Interceptor to the Crusher). If the player finishes first, they will receive a code that unlocks new cars and race courses. Wasteland Racers 2071 is one of the arcade games featured at Chuck E. Cheese's. None of the cars are linked to an actual manufacturer like Chevrolet or Ford; fantasy cars based on futuristic prototypes are used to navigate the post-apocalyptic racing venues. They have the ability to deliver up to 2Gs of acceleration. Because the title has the word "Wasteland" in it, it is assumed that the game is set in a dystopian 21st century.

There are two versions of this arcade game; the standard has a 27" monitor while the deluxe has the 52" monitor.

WheelOfFortune.title: 塔羅牌命運之輪
WheelOfFortune.notes:
由主持人Pat Sajak和Vanna White主演的热门电视游戏节目《Wheel of Fortune》第一版《Wheel of Fortune》再次出现在孩之宝互动的《Wheel ofFortune》PC游戏系列中。《幸运之轮》第一版游戏这款游戏没有Pat Sajak，由Vanna White担任节目的唯一主持人。 《财富之轮》包含2000多个谜题，特别幻想奖品，现场设置，可选择将工作室更改为各种布景和主题，全动态视频，Vanna White的评论，一到三名玩家的游戏和两种游戏模式（经典和锦标赛）《财富之车轮》第一版作弊。 该剧的粉丝会发现，除了Sajak之外，《财富之轮》第一版评论中的所有功能都完好无损。除了常规的美元金额、一轮头奖和《财富之轮》第一版PCG的最高奖金外，还有“特殊”的有奖牌。赢得奖金回合，您将获得一段关于旅行、金钱、车辆或您赢得的《财富之轮》第一版游戏中任何豪华幻想奖品的视频演示。

[英文原文]
Wheel of Fortune 1st Edition Wheel of Fortune, the popular television game show starring host Pat Sajak and Vanna White, makes another appearance in the line of Wheel of Fortune PC titles with this release from Hasbro Interactive. Wheel of Fortune 1st Edition game This one comes sans Pat Sajak and features Vanna White acting as the sole hostess of the show. 

Wheel of Fortune contains over 2,000 puzzles to solve, special fantasy prizes, on-location settings with the option to change the studio to a variety of sets and themes, full motion video, commentary from Vanna White, games with one to three players and two modes of play (classic and tournament) Wheel of Fortune 1st Edition cheats. 

Fans of the show will find all the features intact in this title (except for Sajak) Wheel of Fortune 1st Edition review. There are "special" tiles with prizes in addition to the regular dollar amounts, a jackpot round and the culminating bonus round Wheel of Fortune 1st Edition PCG. Win the bonus round and you'll be treated to a video presentation of the trip, money, vehicle or whatever luxurious fantasy prize you've won Wheel of Fortune 1st Edition game.

WildWestShootout.title: 狂野西部槍戰
WildWestShootout.notes:
Colt's Wild West Shootout is a first person rail shooter where the player the player takes control of a sheriff who's job it is to stop the desperadoes robbing the Red River Bank. Similar to other games of its kind the player character automatically moves through the game world and stops at specific locations where the bad guys pop up from behind cover and attack the player, who has to aim quickly and shoot them down before any damage is done. The player is equipped with a simple revolver with unlimited ammo but which has to be reloaded manually when the cylinder is empty. Occasionally weapons, such as a shotgun or a rifle, become available although these have limited quantities of ammo. Health is represented by sheriff's stars and one is lost every time the player is hit. It can be increased however by clicking on potions that appear at times. In addition to the villains there are also civilians that have to be avoided.

The game consists of four levels that can be played in any order. Locations include a town, a church, a train and a mine. Each of these ends with a boss fight against a famous outlaw from history, for example Billy the Kid or Jessie James. These differ from regular enemies in that they throw objects at the player that has to be shot down and that they can take multiple hits. In addition to the regular levels there is also a practice level where the player gets to shoot down bottles in a saloon.

WinningEleven08.bat_name: Winning Eleven 08   體育-實況足球2008_巔峯對決
WinningEleven08.title: 實況足球2008 巔峯對決
WinningEleven08.notes: Pro Evolution Soccer 4 (known as World Soccer: Winning Eleven 8 in Japan and World Soccer: Winning Eleven 8 International in North America) is the fourth installment of Konami's Pro Evolution Soccer football video game series. It's the first game of the series to appear on the original Xbox, with online game. The cover features former Arsenal striker Thierry Henry, AS Roma forward Francesco Totti, and world-renowned Italian referee Pierluigi Collina. It was the first game in the series to feature licensed leagues.

SnoCross.bat_name: Winter X Games SnoCross   競速-雪地狂飆
SnoCross.title: 雪地狂飆
SnoCross.notes:
SnoCross是Raw Thrills的最新赛车手。SnoCross有6辆雪地摩托赛车、6辆杀手级雪橇和疯狂的定制升级。此外，还可以在法国、南极洲、中国、阿拉斯加、华盛顿特区、莫斯科和科罗拉多州的7条密集赛道上环游世界。这款游戏由ESPN正式授权，参赛者可以表演与X Games中相同的病态技巧。巨大的播放时间让你有更多的时间尝试疯狂的技巧。向对手扔雪球，争夺领先地位。

[英文原文]
SnoCross is the latest racer from Raw Thrills. SnoCross has 6 snowmobile racers, 6 killer sleds, and insane custom upgrades. Plus travel the world by riding on 7 intense tracks in France, Antarctica, China, Alaska, Washington D.C., Moscow and Colorado. This game is officially licensed from ESPN and racers are able to perform the same sick tricks as seen in the X Games. Huge airtime gives you even more time to try crazy tricks. Throw snowballs at your opponents to battle for the lead.

WonderlandWars.title: 仙境战争
WonderlandWars.notes:
《仙境战争》（Wonderland Wars）是一款类似于《Sangokushi Taisen》的街机策略游戏。与《边境突破》一样，它翻译了一种流行的西方流派，即MOBA（多人在线战斗竞技场），并将其翻译成日本街机。游戏使用一个操纵杆和一支笔来操纵游戏环境，并执行和执行动作。首先，你从20多个字符中选择4个，有多个变体，进行4vs4匹配。他们有健康、魔法、基础攻击、速度和绘图距离统计数据（与用笔绘图的有效性有关）。你可以升级你的角色，并用不同的卡牌对其进行自定义，以应用不同的“攻击技能”、辅助卡牌，在比赛中的投球中，你可以激活一张终极“灵魂卡”，这可能是比赛中的决定性因素。就像在Sangokushi Taisen一样，一个真正的K.O.或对手在时间限制后更高的健康标准决定了比赛。要降低敌人的生命值，您需要击败对手角色以及驻扎在战场上的城堡。

[英文原文]
Wonderland Wars (ワンダーランド ウォーズ) is an arcade strategy game similar to Sangokushi Taisen.
Like Border Break, it translates a popular western genre, that being the MOBA (Multiplayer Online Battle Arena), and translates it to Japanese arcades. The game plays with one joystick and a pen to use to manipulate the game’s environment, and perform and execute actions.

At first you choose four out of more than 20 characters, with multiple variations, for a 4vs4 match. They have health, magic, base attack, speed, and drawing distance stats (related to effectiveness of drawing with the pen). You level your character and customize them with different cards to either apply different “attack skills”, assist cards and during a pitch during a match you can activate an ultimate “Soul Card”, that could be a deciding factor during a match. Like in Sangokushi Taisen, an actual K.O. or the opponents higher health bar after the time limit decides the match. To knock down the enemies health, you defeat your opponent characters as well as the castles stationed on the field.

Snowboarder.bat_name: X-Games Snowboarder   體育-X極限運動會_雪板狂潮
Snowboarder.title: X極限運動會 雪板狂潮
Snowboarder.notes:
X Games滑雪板街机电子游戏是Raw Thrills另一款令人惊叹的雪主题街机游戏。这款豪华的滑雪板赛车模拟器让玩家沿着冰岛冰冷的山峰疾驰而下，绕过撒哈拉沙漠的沙丘。X Games的特色是不可能的特技和心跳加速。游戏中有一个真正的“真实动作滑雪板”来控制动作。玩家用手柄或侧栏稳定自己，用脚控制棋盘。您最多可以连接8台机器进行面对面的比赛！

[英文原文]
X Games Snowboarder Arcade Video Game is another one of Raw Thrills’ amazing snow themes arcade game. This deluxe racing Snowboard simulator sends players hurtling down Iceland’s icy peaks and tricking off the sandy dunes of the Sahara. X Games features impossible stunts and heart-pounding speed boosts.

 The game features an actual ‘real motion snowboard’ that controls the action. Players steady themselves with the handles or side rails and control the board with their feet. You can link up to 8 machines for head-to-head competition!

YugiohDT6U.title: 卡牌-遊戲王5D's：決鬥終端6
YugiohDT6U.notes:
The Duel Terminal由Konami设计，旨在协助推出当时新的Yu-Gi Oh！5D动漫向新老玩家开放。决斗终端本身看起来像一台传统的街机，有各种游戏模式，使用的是《游戏王》中的卡片！官方纸牌游戏。玩家可以使用系统选择的牌组，或者决斗者可以使用他/她自己的牌，前提是他们有ＤＵＥＬ ＴＥＲＭＩＮＡＬ 作为版本。这些卡片由内置的卡片扫描仪识别，允许玩家在游戏中使用卡片。“决斗终端版”卡仅适用于“决斗终端”。游戏本身的价格为‎日本每场100日元，美国每场1美元，墨西哥每场13美元。游戏结束后，决斗终端版卡将在机器底部释放。决斗终端卡本身不能在受制裁的锦标赛中玩，除非它们也在更广泛的来源中发布。《决斗终端6》分为两部分发行。决斗终端6a是第一部分，由OCG设定的决斗终端：欧米茄的审判！！2012年2月3日发布，《决斗终端6b》由OCG套装《决斗终端：Xyz Startup！！》组成！！并于2012年5月25日发布。

[英文原文]
The Duel Terminal (デュエルターミナル Dyueru Tāminaru) was designed by Konami to assist in introducing the then new Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's anime to new and existing players.

The Duel Terminal itself looks like a traditional arcade machine and has a variety of game modes, using cards from the Yu-Gi-Oh! Official Card Game. Players can either use a Deck chosen by the system, or the Duelist can use his/her own cards, provided they have ＤＵＥＬ ＴＥＲＭＩＮＡＬ as the Edition. These cards are recognized by the built-in card scanner, allowing the player to use the card in the game. "Duel Terminal Edition" cards are only available from "Duel Terminals". The game itself is priced at ‎¥100 per play in Japan, $1 per play in the United States, and $13 per play in Mexico. After ending the game, a Duel Terminal Edition card is released at the bottom of the machine.

Duel Terminal cards themselves are not playable in sanctioned tournaments unless they have also been released in a more widely available source.

Duel Terminal 6 was released in two parts. Duel Terminal 6a is the first part, made up of the OCG set Duel Terminal: Judgment of Omega!! and was released February 3, 2012, and Duel Terminal 6b is made up of the OCG set Duel Terminal: Xyz Startup!! and was released May 25, 2012.

zoidiexp.bat_name: Zoids Infinity EX Plus _ver_ 2_10_ 動作-機甲獸神_無限之戰EX_ _ver_ 2_10_
zoidiexp.title: 動作-機甲獸神：無限之戰EX+
zoidiexp.notes:
《Zoids Infinity EX Neo》是街机游戏《Zoids无限》的移植版。在这个扩展版本的游戏中，玩家可以通过Xbox Live在线对战。

[英文原文]
Zoids Infinity EX Neo is a port of the arcade game Zoids Infinity. In this expanded version of the game, players could play against each other online through Xbox Live.

zoidsinf.bat_name: Zoids Infinity 動作-機甲獸神_無限之戰
zoidsinf.title: 動作-機甲獸神 無限之戰
zoidsinf.notes:
《Zoids Infinity》由Taito于2004年制作。Zoids Infinity是一款使用Zoids的战斗动作游戏，Zoids是有限公司开发的恐龙/动物/昆虫机器人。玩家可以根据设计、速度和机动性选择最喜欢的Zoids。您可以通过使用您拥有的武器零件和物品来定制自己的ZOIDS。游戏允许你在战斗中控制僵尸机器，同时通过击败僵尸来收集零件。街机最初有29个Zoid来控制。在2层模式下，屏幕水平分割，每个玩家从个人有利位置观看动作。

[英文原文]
Zoids Infinity was produced by Taito in 2004.

Zoids Infinity is a battle action game using Zoids, which are dinosaur/animal/insect robots developed by Tomy Co., Ltd. Players can choose favorite Zoids based on design, speed and mobility. You can customize your own ZOIDS by using weapons parts and items which you have got. The game allows you to take control of Zoids machines in battle while you collect parts by defeating Zoids. The arcade originally featured 29 Zoids to control. In 2-player mode, the screen is split horizontally where each player views the action from a personal vantage point.

tatsuvscap.title: 龍之子 VS 卡普空
tatsuvscap.notes:
《Tatsunoko vs.Capcom：终极全明星》是一款由Eighting开发、Capcom发行的跨界格斗游戏。游戏中的角色来自Capcom的电子游戏特许经营权和Tatsunoko Production制作的各种动漫系列。它最初于2008年12月在日本为街机和Wii电子游戏机发布，名为《Tatsunoko vs.Capcom：英雄的交叉世代》（タノ"и.Capcom Cross Generation of Heroes）。在国际粉丝的强烈需求下，Capcom与Tatsunoko合作解决了国际许可问题，并于2010年1月在北美、日本和欧洲为Wii发布了第二个版本《终极全明星》，其中包含更多角色和在线多人游戏。

[英文原文]
Tatsunoko vs. Capcom: Ultimate All-Stars is a crossover fighting game developed by Eighting and published by Capcom. The game features characters from both Capcom's video game franchises and various anime series produced by Tatsunoko Production. It was originally released in Japan for arcades and the Wii video game console in December 2008 as Tatsunoko vs. Capcom: Cross Generation of Heroes (タツノコ VS. CAPCOM CROSS GENERATION OF HEROES). Following high demand from international fans, Capcom worked with Tatsunoko to resolve international licensing issues and a second version, Ultimate All-Stars, was released for the Wii in North America, Japan, and Europe in January 2010, featuring additional characters and online multiplayer.
